english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Thou, my everlasting portion,
More than friend or life to me,
All along my pilgrim journey,
Savior, let me walk with Thee.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Close to Thee, Close to Thee,
Close to Thee, Close to Thee,
All along this tedious journey,
Savior, let me walk with Thee.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Not for ease or worldly pleasure,
Nor for fame my prayer shall be;
Gladly will I toil and suffer,
Only let me walk with Thee.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Lead me through the vale of shadows,
Bear me o'er life's fitful sea;
Then the gate of life eternal
May I enter, Lord, with Thee.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Iwo ni ipin mi titi
o ju iye fun mi lo
ni gbogbo ojo aye mi,
je kin le sunmo O si

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Je kin le… sunmo O
Je ki nsunmo O si
Ni gbogbo… ojo aye mi
Je kin le sunmo O si

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ki nse f’ohun asan aye,
nikan ni ebe mi je
Pel’ayo ni ngo farada
ki nsa le sunmo O si

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Mu mi la gbogbo wahala
Ati irumi aye
Ati ni ‘kehin ajo mi
Ki nle wo ‘joba Orun

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Is there a heart that is waiting,
Longing for pardon today?
Hear the glad message we bring you,
Jesus is passing this way.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Jesus is passing this way,
This way, today;
Jesus is passing this way,
He’s passing this way today.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Is there a heart that has wandered?
Come with thy burden today;
Mercy is tenderly pleading,
Jesus is passing this way.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Is there a heart that is broken?
Weary and sighing for rest?
Come to the arms of thy Saviour,
Pillow thy head on His breast.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Come to thy only Redeemer,
Come to His infinite love;
Come to the gate that is leading
Homeward to mansions above.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Okan wo ni o nfe duro
Gba idariji loni
Gbo bi iranse re ti nwi
Jesu nkoja lo nihin

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Jesu nkoja lo nihin…
(Jesu nkoja lo, O nkoja nihin)
Nihin... loni…
(O nkoja nihin, O nkoja loni)
Jesu nkoja lo nihin..
(Jesu nkoja lo nihin loni)
O nkoja nihin loni

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Okan to ti sako mbe bi?
Gbe eru Re wa loni
Anu Re lo nro o je-je
Jesu nkoja lo nihin

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Okan ti o baje mbe bi?
To re to si nwa sinmi?
Wa sodo Olugbala re
Gb’ori re le ese Re

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Wa sodo Olugbala Re
Wo ‘nu ‘fe Re ainiwon
Wa! s’enu ona tooro yi
To nlo si Orun
3.THE BIBLE STANDS
(Bibeli Duro)

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Bibeli duro bi apata ninu gbogbo iji ti nja
Oro re je otito ti-ti aye o si ntan bi imole

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Bibeli duro b’oke le sidi
Gbati aye yo koja yo duro gboingboin
Emi yo duro lori ’pinle re
Bibeli duro
Ese2:
Bibeli duro bi oke t’o ga ju gbogbo ise eeyan
Ko s’eni le kojuja s’ooto na won ko le pa oro na run

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Bibeli nikan ni yo duro gbati aye yi ba koja
Oro Olorun ni emi yo si gbo-ran si gbogbo ase Re

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Bibeli bori gbogbo idanwo tor’Oro Olorun ni,
Nipa ore-ofe ngo fi Oro Olorun yi se ini mi

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
The Bible stands like a rock undaunted
'Mid the raging storms of time;
Its pages burn with the truth eternal,
And they glow with a light sublime.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
The Bible stands, though the hills may tumble,
It will firmly stand when the earth shall crumble;
I will plant my feet on its firm foundation,
For the Bible stands.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
The Bible stands like a mountain towering
Far above the works of men;
Its truth by none ever was refuted,
And destroy it they never can.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
The Bible stands, and it will forever,
When the world has passed away;
By inspiration it has been given,
All its precepts I will obey.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
The Bible stands every test we give it,
For its Author is divine;
By grace alone I expect to live it,
And to prove it and make it mine.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Bibeli duro bi apata ninu gbogbo iji ti nja
Oro re je otito ti-ti aye o si ntan bi imole

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:

Gbati aye yo koja yo duro gboingboin 
Emi yo duro lori ’pinle re 
Bibeli duro

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:

Ko s’eni le kojuja s’ooto na won ko le pa oro na run

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:

items.lyrics:

Nipa ore-ofe ngo fi Oro Olorun yi se ini mi

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
I’m pressing on the upward way,
New heights I’m gaining every day;
Still praying as I’m onward bound,
“Lord, plant my feet on higher ground.”

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Lord, lift me up and let me stand,
By faith, on Heaven’s tableland,
A higher plane than I have found;
Lord, plant my feet on higher ground.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
My heart has no desire to stay
Where doubts arise and fears dismay;
Though some may dwell where these abound,
My prayer, my aim, is higher ground.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
I want to live above the world,
Though Satan’s darts at me are hurled;
For faith has caught the joyful sound,
The song of saints on higher ground.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
I want to scale the utmost height
And catch a gleam of glory bright;
But still I’ll pray till heaven I’ve found,
“Lord, lead me on to higher ground.”

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mo ntesiwaju lona na,
Mo ng’oke lo l’ojojumo
Mo ngbadura bi mo ti nlo
Oluwa f’ese mi mule

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Jesu jowo gbe mi soke
Ki nle duro nipa ‘gbagbo
S’ori oke to ga julo
Oluwa f’ese mi mule

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Okan mi ko fe duro mo
N’nu ‘yemeji ati eru
B’awon miran ba fe wa be
Ibi giga ni mo fe lo

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Mo fe ibi to ga julo
Ki nsi ri ogo didan na
Sibe ngo sa ma gb’adura
Jo sin mi lo si ‘bi giga

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Trying to walk in the steps of the Saviour,
Trying to follow our Saviour and King;
Shaping our lives by His blessed example,
Happy, how happy, the songs that we bring.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
How beautiful to walk in the steps of the Saviour,
Stepping in the light, stepping in the light,
How beautiful to walk in the steps of the Saviour,
Led in paths of light.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Pressing more closely to Him who is leading,
When we are tempted to turn from the way;
Trusting the arm that is strong to defend us,
Happy, how happy, our praises each day.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Walking in footsteps of gentle forbearance,
Footsteps of faithfulness, mercy, and love,
Looking to Him for the grace freely promised,
Happy, how happy, our journey above.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Trying to walk in the steps of the Saviour,
Upward, still upward, we’ll follow our Guide;
When we shall see Him, the King in His beauty,
Happy, how happy, our place at His side.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
A nrin lona t’Olugbala wa ti rin
A ntele amona at’Oba wa
Ni fi f’apere Re diwon aye wa
Bawo ni ayo wa yo ti po to

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
O ti dara lati to ‘pase Olugbala
A nrin n’nu ‘mole/2x	2times

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ao tunbo sunmo Jesu amona wa
Bi ‘danwo lile tile yi w aka
Ni gbigbeke l’agbara to le gba wa
Bawo ni ayo way o ti po to

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
A nto ‘pase t’Olugbala wa ti rin
Tit d’opin lao tel’amona wa
Gbat’ A ba ri Oba ninu ewa Re
Awa yo yo lati wa pelu RE

englishTitle: DON’T PUT OFF SALVATION TOO LONG

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Life is uncertain, death is sure,
Sin is the cause, Christ is the cure.
Don’t put off salvation too long;
It’s time to trust Him and sing a new song.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Don’t put off salvation too long, too long,
Don’t leave your life in the dark of sin;
Today is the day, now’s the right time to say,
“I’ll follow You, Lord, all the way.”

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
When will you trust Him, when will it be?
Tomorrow may never come for thee;
Don’t wait for a future that might not appear,
Give Him your heart while He’s near.

number: 6: DON’T PUT OFF SALVATION TOO LONG

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Jesus, my heavenly King, loves me, I know,
Praises to Him I sing, onward I go;
Closely to Him I cling, blessings still flow,
I love my Saviour too.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
I love my Saviour, He loves me too;
I seek His favor in everything I do.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Walking with Him each day, love light does shine,
Doing His will always, never repine;
Kneeling to Him I pray, Thy will not mine,
I love my Saviour too.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Happy to serve my friend, lean on His arm,
Rapture will never end, nothing alarm;
Voices will sweetly blend under His charm,
I love my Saviour too.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Kristi Oba Orun fe mi mom o
Mo nko orin ‘yin si bi mo ti nlo
Mo faramo Jesu yo bukun mi
Mo fe Olugbala

items.lyrics:

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Mo ba Jesu rin lo l’ojojumo
Sise ife Re sa li ayo mi
Mo faramo Jesu yo bukun mi
Mo fe Olugbala

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Jesus forgives and forgets,
He cleanses hearts and He removes regrets;
Though your sins be as scarlet, He’ll wash them away,
His forgiveness is yours today.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Jesus forgives and forgets, so come to Him now,
Lay your burdens before Him, humbly bow;
He will wipe every tear, take your guilt and your fears,
For Jesus forgives and forgets.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
When you feel burdened by wrongs of the past,
Run to the Saviour, His mercy is vast;
He will embrace you with love so complete,
At the cross, find peace at His feet.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Yin Olorun pe aanu mbe loke
Ni ‘le t’orun re ki yo wo lae
Tori Jesu nfi ese wa ji wa
Ko si ni rnti won si wa mo

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Jesu Krist’…..ndariji…
(………..Jesu Krist’ ma ndariji)
On ko ni….. ranti mo…
(………..On ko tun ni ran-ti mo)
Eda le dariji ko tun ranti
Sugbon Jesu ko ni ranti mo

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Gbat’a wole l’eba ite aanu
Ta si kan ‘lekun lati wole
Jesu ti f’ese wa ji wa l’ofe
On ko ni ranti won si wa mo

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Awon miran so pe won dariji
Sugbon won ole sai tun ranti mo
Jesu f’eje Re se ‘didi ‘gbala
Yo fi ji Oun ko ni ranti mo

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Ki yo si akosile won l’Orun
B’a ba f’ese was ranse saaju
Ko s’eru b’a ba ti f’ese wa ji
Jesu wa ko ni ranti won mo

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Days are filled with sorrow and care,
Hearts are lonely and drear;
Burdens are lifted at Calvary,
Jesus is very near.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Burdens are lifted at Calvary,
Calvary, Calvary;
Burdens are lifted at Calvary,
Jesus is very near.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Cast your care on Jesus today,
Leave your worry and fear;
Burdens are lifted at Calvary,
Jesus is very near.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Troubled soul, the Saviour can see,
Every heartache and tear;
Burdens are lifted at Calvary,
Jesus is very near.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Wa, iwo t’eru ese npa, wa sib’agbelebu
Idariji mbe ni Kalfari, Jesu sunmo tosi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Idariji mbe ni Kalfari,
Kalfari/2x
Jesu ti san gbogbo gbese re
Wa gba isinmi re

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
K’aniyan re to Jesu wa, yo ru ‘banuje re
Idariji mbe ni Kalfari, Jesu sunmo tosi

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Iwo t’ese de ni ‘gbekun, wa gba idande re
Idariji mbe ni Kalfari, Jesu sunmo tosi

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Yo dahun gbogbo adura, wa sibi ‘te aanu
Idariji mbe ni Kalfari, Jesu sunmo tosi

items.title: Ese 5
items.lyrics:
Gba’anu t’Olorun fi nlo o, wa sibi ‘te aanu
Idariji mbe ni Kalfari, Jesu sunmo tosi

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Jesus gave His life a ransom yonder on Calvary,
On Mount Calvary, cruel Calvary;
Paved the way by blood that we might win a bright shining crown,
Praise His holy name, salvation has been brought down.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Oh, glory! Praise the Lord! Blessed Lord!
Salvation has been brought down from heaven,
Go and shout and tell it to the world around;
Go preach it and tell it today to people in sorrow,
Tell it today, tell it tomorrow.
Preach the Word of God that we might win a shining crown,
Tell the lost, salvation is full and free,
To sinners spread the blessed news all over the land and sea;
Go, teach it and tell it afar in every nation,
Tell it afar all over creation,
Praise the Lord, salvation has been brought down.

english.title: Verse 2

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Jesu f’emi Re le ‘le lori oke Kalfari
Ani Kalfari, Oke Kalfari
Nipa eje Re o si ona igbala sile
Ogo f’ooko Re… (Ona ‘gbala si sile, Yin Oluwa)

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Like a blind man I wandered so lost and undone,
A beggar so helpless, without God or His Son;
But then my Saviour in mercy heard and answered my cry,
And oh, what a difference since Jesus passed by!

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Since Jesus passed by, since Jesus passed by,
Oh, what a difference since Jesus passed by;
Well, I can’t explain it, and I cannot tell you why,
But oh, what a difference since Jesus passed by!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
All my yesterdays are buried in the deepest of the sea,
That old load of guilt I carried is all gone, praise God, I’m free;
Looking for that bright tomorrow where no tears will dim the eye,
Well, oh, what a difference since Jesus passed by!

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mo nsako bi afoju
Mo nkiri lai ni ‘reti
Alagbe ti ko lagbara
Beeni nko mo Olorun
Sugbon Jesu ‘nu aanu Re
Ran idahun s’ebe mi i
Tori ‘yipada de ‘gba Jesu gba mi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
‘Gba Jesu gba mi/2x
A! iyipada t’enu ko le so
Nko le salaye re
Beni nko mo idi re
Sugbon ‘yipada de
Gba Jesu gba mi

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Asise mi igba aimo
L’a ti ri s’okun jinjin
A gbe eru ese mi lo
Yin Oluwa mo d’om’nira
Mo nreti ooro ologo
Nibi t’ekun k’yo sim o
Tori ‘yipada de ‘gba Jesu gba mi

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
More about Jesus would I know,
More of His grace to others show;
More of His saving fullness see,
More of His love who died for me.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
More, more about Jesus,
More, more about Jesus;
More of His saving fullness see,
More of His love who died for me.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
More about Jesus let me learn,
More of His holy will discern;
Spirit of God, my teacher be,
Showing the things of Christ to me.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
More about Jesus in His Word,
Holding communion with my Lord;
Hearing His voice in every line,
Making each faithful saying mine.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
More about Jesus on His throne,
Riches in glory all His own;
More of His kingdom’s sure increase,
More of His coming, Prince of Peace.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mo fe mo nipa Jesu si,
ki nf’ore-ofe Re han si
Tor’o’fe to ti ngba ni la,
ti ‘fe Re to fi ku fun mi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ki nmo nipa Jesu si/2x
T’or’ofe to fi ngba ni la
Ti ‘fe Re bo se ku fun mi

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ngo keko si nipa Jesu
Nipa iwa mimo Re si
Emi Orun yo ma ko ni
Yo ma f’ohun ti Krist’ han mi

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Mo fe mo oro Jesu si
Ko nwa ni s’okan pelu Re
Ki ngboran si gbogb’ase Re
Ki ns’olotito n’gbagbogbo

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
A o mo si nipa Jesu
Lori ‘te Re ninu ogo
Bi joba re ti gbinle si
Om’alade alafi-a

englishTitle: HIS EYES IS ON THE SPARROW

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
His Eye is On The Why should I feel discouraged,
Why should the shadows come,
Why should my heart be lonely, and long for heaven and home,
When Jesus is my portion? My constant friend is He:
His eye is on the sparrow, and I know He watches me;
His eye is on the sparrow, and I know He watches me.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
I sing because I’m happy,
I sing because I’m free,
For His eye is on the sparrow,
And I know He watches me.

english.title: Verse 2
Verse 3

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ng o se so ‘reti nu? Ng o se banuje?
Eese t’aye fi su mi? T’okan mi nfa s’Orun?
Gbati Jesu j’ore mi, O wa ntosi n’gbagbogbo
O nse itoju eiye… mo pe O ntoju mi/2x

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Mo le k’orin pel’ayo….. o ns’aniyan fun mi
O nse itoju eiye, mo O pe o ntoju mi

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Gba ti idanwo ba de, ti ‘sudede bo mi
Gba ti ‘reti fere pin, t’aniyan k’okan mi
Ngo tubo sunmo Jesu, Oun yo fun mi ni ‘segun
O nse itoju eiye, mo mo pe On toju mi/2x

number: 13: HIS EYES IS ON THE SPARROW

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Happy (You’ll be happy), you’ll be happy (O so happy),
When Jesus comes into your heart to stay;
Happy (You’ll be happy), you’ll be happy (O so happy),
When you let Him wash your sins away.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Such contentment, real contentment,
(a) peace the world cannot afford;
Happy (You’ll be happy), you’ll be happy (O so happy),
When you give up the world to serve the Lord.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Happy (You’ll be happy), you’ll be happy (O so happy),
For He will take away all doubt and fear;
Happy (You’ll be happy), you’ll be happy (O so happy),
He promises to be so very near.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Happy (You’ll be happy), you’ll be happy (O so happy),
Your life will radiate His perfect love,
Happy (You’ll be happy), you’ll be happy (O so happy),
To know you’re on the way to Heav’n above

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Have you a heart that's weary
Tending a load of care?
Are you a soul that's seeking
Rest from the burden you bear?

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Do you know (Do you know) my Jesus?
Do you know (Do you know) my Friend?
Have you heard He loves you?
And that He will abide 'til the end?

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Who knows your disappointments?
Who hears each time you cry?
Who understands your heartaches?
Who dries the tears from your eyes?

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Who knows your heart of pilgrim?
What does your life reveal?
Who knows your every heartache
Who dries the tears from your eyes?

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Okan re ha nporuru

(….Ore too-to ni………)

(…. O ha mo p’O fe o)

items.lyrics:

To le nu omije re nu

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
All along on the road to the soul true aboard
There's an eye watching' you
Every step that you take, this great eye is awake
There's an eye watching' you

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Watchin' you/2x
Every day, mind the course you pursue
Watchin' you/2x
There's an all seeing eye watching you

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
As you make life's big flight, keep the pathway of right
There's an eye watchin' you
God will warn not to go in the path of the foe
There's an eye watchin' you

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Fix your mind on the goal, that sweet home of the soul
There's an eye a watchin' you
Never turn from the way to the kingdom of day
There's a eye watchin' you

items.lyrics:

Oju to ni gbogb’aye nwo o

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
O hear my cry, be gracious now to me,
Come, Great Deliv'rer, come;
My soul bowed down is longing now for Thee,
Come, Great Deliv'rer, come.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
I've wandered far away o'er mountains cold,
I've wandered far away from home;
O take me now, and bring me to Thy fold,
Come, Great Deliv'rer, come.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
I have no place, no shelter from the night,
Come, Great Deliv'rer, come;
One look from Thee would give me light,
Come, Great Deliv'rer, come.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
My path is lone, and weary are my feet,
Come, Great Deliv'rer, come;
Mine eyes look up Thy loving smile to meet,
Come, Great Deliv'rer, come.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Thou wilt not spurn contrition's broken sigh,
Come, Great Deliv'rer, come;
Regard my prayer, and hear my humble cry,
Come, Great Deliv'rer, come.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Gb’adura mi, Jesu saanu fun mi
Wa Olugbala wa
Okan mi npongbe fun O ni irele
Wa Olugbala wa

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Mo ti sako jina bi aguntan
Mo ti sako jina si ‘le
Gba mi pada sin’ agbo nisinyi
Wa olugbala wa

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Robinuje okan ni wo k’yo gan
Wa olugbala wa
Gb’adura mi fetisi ebe mi
Wa olugbala wa

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mase foya, agbo kekere
Iku Re je ona si ‘ye fun o
Gbogbo agbara laye at’Orun
La ti fun Jesu tor’awon ayanfe Re

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Saa ni ‘gbagbo/2x
Ko s’ohun to soro fun Olorun
Saa ni ‘gbagbo/2x
Ko s’ohun to soro fun Olorun

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Mase foya te ‘ju mo Jesu
Yo s’amona re lon tooro yi
Gbogbo ‘mi Maara ni yo di didun
O-n ti mu ‘nu re ni Getsemane

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Mase foya ohun to wu ko de
Oun ti la igbi, irora koja
Ko je gbagbe re, ki yo ko o sile
Sa gbeke re le, b’okunkun tile su
\

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Have faith in God when you pathway is lonely
He sees and knows all the way you have trod
Never alone are the least of His children
Have faith in God, have faith in God

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Have faith in God, He's on His throne
Have faith in God, He watches o’er his own
He cannot fail, He must prevail
Have faith in God, have faith in God

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Have faith in God when you pray'rs are unanswered
Your earnest plea He will never forget
Wait on the Lord, trust His Word and be patient
Have faith in God, He'll answer yet

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Have faith in God in your pain and your sorrow
His heart is touched with your grief and despair
Cast all your cares and your burdens upon Him
And leave them there, oh, leave them there

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Have faith in God tho' all else fail about you
Have faith in God He provides for His own
He cannot fail tho' all kingdoms shall perish
He rules He reigns upon His throne

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Sa ni gbagbo b’ona re ba s’okunkun
Olorun mo ona ti iwo nrin
Ko je f’awon omo Re nikan sile
Sa ni ‘gbagbo/2x

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Gb’Olorun gbo, lori ‘te re
Sa ni ‘gbagbo, O mso awon tire
Oun yoo bori, ko le kuna
Sa ni ‘gbagbo nin’Olorun

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Bi a ko tile dahun adura re,
Sa ni ‘gbagbo Oun ko je gbagbe re
Duro de Oluwa gba oror Re gbo
Sa ni gbagbo, Oun  yo dahun

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Sa ni ‘gbagbo n’nu rora ati s’oro
Olorun yo ba o ru ‘soro re
Ko ‘soro ati gbogb’aniyan re le
Fi won sile yo toju re

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Sa ni ‘gbagbo bi ohun gbogbo kuna
Olo-run yo pese f’awon tire
Oun ko kuna bi joba tile parun
On be loke lori ‘te Re

englishTitle: EVERY BRIDGE IS BURNED BEHIND ME

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Since I started out to find thee,
Since I did to the Ark did flee,
Ev'ry bridge is burned behind me,
I will never turn from thee.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Strengthen all the ties that bind me
Closer, closer, Lord to thee;
Ev'ry bridge is burned behind me,
Thine I evermore will be.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Thou didst hear my plea so kindly,
Thou didst grant me so much grace;
Ev'ry bridge is burned behind me,
I will ne'er my steps retrace.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Cares of life perplex and grind me,
Yet I keep the narrow way;
Ev'ry bridge is burned behind me,
I from thee will never stray.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
All in all, I ever find thee,
Saviour, Lover, Brother, Friend;
Ev'ry bridge is burned behind me,
I will serve thee to the end.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Gba mo de odo Re Jesu
Ti mo wo ‘ko igbala
Gbogbo ide aye ti ja
Nko tun pada l’ehin Re

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Fa mi mora, Olugbala
Pelu ide to nipon
Gbogbo ide aye ti ja
Ngo si je tire titi

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Iwo ti f’anu gb’ebe mi
Mo r’opo or’ofe gba
Gbogbo ide aye ti ja
Nko ni boju w’ehin lai

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Mo nrin l’ona tooro sibe
Bi wahala tile po
Gbogbo ide aiye ti ja
Nko ni sako l’odo Re

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
O ti j’ohun gbogbo fun mi
Olugbala Ore mi
Gbogbo ide aye ti ja
Ngo sin o titi d’opin

number: 20: EVERY BRIDGE IS BURNED BEHIND ME

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
1 Have you wandered away from your Father's care,
Heavy hearted and sad do you roam?
There's a sweet gentle voice calling now to you--
Wand-ring child, wand'ring child, O come home.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Child, come home, child come home,
Wand'ring child, why longer roam?
'Tis thy Father entreats--
Wand'ring child, O come home.
Child, come home, child come home,
Wand'ring child, why longer roam?
'Tis thy Father entreats--
Wand'ring child, O come home.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Is your frail bark adrift on life's raging sea,
Are you tossed on its billows and foam?
There's a safe harbor home, waiting now for you--

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
He is pleading today, heed His gentle voice,
As He bids you no longer to roam,
To that dear Father's house haste without delay--
Wand-ring child, wand'ring child, O come home.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
O ha ti sako lo kuro n’mu agbo
To nrin kiri pelu banuje
Ohun kan lat’Orun lo npe o jeje
Asako, asako, jo wale

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
T: Jo wale……..jo wale
(…………..jo wale………jo wale)
T: Asako jowo wale…..
(………’ko jowo wale, wale)
T: Baba re…… lo npe o
(……Baba re npe o jeje….)
All: Asako jo wale (wale)

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Olorun npe loni teti s’ohun Re
Bo ti npe o kuro n’nu ese
Wa s’odo Oluwa mase jafara
Asako, asako joo wale

yorubaTitle: Oluwa Mo npada bo Wa Ile

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
I've wandered far away from God,
Now I'm coming home;
The paths of sin too long I've trod,
Lord, I'm coming home.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Coming home, coming home,
Nevermore to roam,
Open wide Thine arms of love,
Lord, I'm coming home.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
I've wasted many precious years,
Now I'm coming home;
I now repent with bitter tears,
Lord, I'm coming home.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
I've tired of sin and straying, Lord,
Now I'm coming home;
I'll trust Thy love, believe Thy word,
Lord, I'm coming home.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
My soul is sick, my heart is sore,
Now I'm coming home;
My strength renew, my hope restore,
Lord, I'm coming home.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mo ti sako jina s’Oluwa
Nisinyi mo de
Mo ti rin Ona ese tipe, Oluwa mo de

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Mo pada bo wale
Nko tun sako mo
Na owi anu at’ ife Re
Ko gba mi sile

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Mo ti lo opo odun l’ofo
Oluwa mo de
Jowo wa dri ese ji mi
Oluwa mo de

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Okan mi rewesi ninu mi
Nisiyi mo de
Jowo so agbara mi d’otun
Oluwa mo de

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
I am resolved no longer to linger,
Charmed by the world's delight;
Things that are higher, things that are nobler,
These have allured my sight.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
I will hasten to Him,
hasten so glad and free;
Jesus, greatest, highest,
I will come to Thee.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
I am resolved to go to the Savior,
leaving my sin and strife;
He is the true one, He is the just one,
He has the words of life. [Refrain]

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
I am resolved, and who will go with me?
Come, friends, without delay;
taught by the Bible, led by the Spirit,
we'll walk the heavenly way. [Refrain]

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mo ti pinnu pe nko ni sako mo
Lati s’afe aye
Ohun to s’owon, ohun to dara
‘wonyi gb’okan mi kan

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
E…mi yo tete wa
Pelu inu didun
Jesu to ku fun mi
Ngo wa s’odo Re

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Mo ti pinnu lati w’Olugbala
Ngo k’ese mi sisle
On ni Olooto, On ko l’ebi kan
On ni ona iye

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Mo ti pinnu lati tele Jesu
Pel’okan otito
Ngo j’Olugboran, ngo se ife Re
On li ona iye

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Mo ti pinnu lati wo ‘joba Orun
Ngo k’ese mi sile

Ngo sa de ‘be dandan

Mo ti pinnu, tani yo ba mi lo

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Ho, ev’ry one that thirsteth,
Come to the waters and buy
Here is the living fountain
Nought else can satisfy,

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Come tis the Lord’s invitation
The spirit calls then be wise
Drink from the well of salvation
Only Jesus satisfies

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Labour and money wasted
Vain every earthy quest
Seek this eternal treasure
Come be the saviour’s guest

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Come like the one of Samaria
Weary the way to tread
When she had found her messiah
Give me to drink she plead

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Now is the day of salvation
Mercy is offer’ed you
Heed then the Saviou’s counsel
Leave all His will to do

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Gbogbo eni t’ongbe ngbe
E wa si ‘bi omi
Nihin l’orisun omi ‘ye
To le te okan l’orun

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Wa, ipe Jesu leyi fun o
Emi Re nro o, je ologbon
Mu ninu kanga igbala
Jesu l’O nte ni l’orun

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Oro aye yo segbe
At’ogbon inu re
Wa isura ailopin
E wa di ore Jesu

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Wa gege bi obinrin
Ara Samaria
Lodo Olugbala re
O mu omi iye

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Loni lojo igbala
Jesu nfanu lo o
Feti si ‘pe Oluwa
Fi gbogbo okan re fun UN

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
I was sinking deep in sin,
Far from the peaceful shore,
Very deeply stained within,
Sinking to rise no more;
But the Master of the sea
Heard my despairing cry,
From the waters lifted me–
Now safe am I.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Love lifted me,
Love lifted me,
When nothing else could help,
Love lifted me;
Love lifted me,
Love lifted me,
When nothing else could help,
Love lifted me.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
All my heart to Him I give,
Ever to Him I'll cling,
In His blessed presence live,
Ever His praises sing.
Love so mighty and so true
Merits my soul's best songs;
Faithful, loving service, too,
To Him belongs.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Souls in danger, look above,
Jesus completely saves;
He will lift you by His love
Out of the angry waves.
He's the Master of the sea,
Billows His will obey;
He your Savior wants to be–
Be saved today.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mo ti ri s’ogbun ese
Ese mi p’apoju
Ayo jina s’okan mi
Ko tile si reti
Bi mo ti ngba adura,
Jesu gbo ebe mi
Jesu gba mi la o yo mi mo si ye

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Jesu gba mi/2x
(Jesu gba an’emi)2x
Gbat’oluranwo ko si, Jesu gba mi
Jesu gba mi/2x
(Jesu gba an’emi)2x
Gbat’oluranwo ko si, Jesu gba mi

items.lyrics:
Gba ‘ye mi ati ‘fe mi
‘Wo l’emi o rom o
Ngo sa ma wo oju Re
To kun fun ife nla
Orin iyin, ola Re
L’enu mi yo ma ko
Ngo j’olooto si O
Ninu ise mi

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Gbogbo okam nin’ese
W’oke Jesu ngbala
On fe fi ‘fe Re yo o
Kuro ninu egun
Oun l’Oba Alafia

B’o ba gb’adura

english.title: Verse 1
Verse 2
english.lyrics:
He stopped and listened to ev’ry sweet chord,
He remembered the time he once loved the Lord:
Come on! says the tempter, come on with the throng;
But hark! from the church again swells the song:
While the billows near me roll,
While the tempest still is high.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
O tempter, depart, I have served thee too long.
I fly to the Saviour, He dwells in the song:
O Lord, can it be, that a sinner like me
May find a sweet refuge by coming to Thee?
Other refuge have I none:
Hangs my helpless soul on Thee.
I come, Lord, I come,
Thou’lt forgive the dark past, and
O, receive my soul at last.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Elese kan nkiri l’ale ojo kan
Esu mba jijakadi n’nu okn re
Lati yan odod tabi ese,
O gb’orin lati soosi kan to so wipe

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Jesu Oluf’okan mi
Je ki nsala s’aya Re

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
O duro, o teti lele gb’orin na
O ranti igba kan ti o nfe Oluwa
Ka lo, wa ka lo, wa rin ona gbooro
Leekan si o gb’orin ti won nko wipe

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Saa ti ‘rumi sunmo mi
Saa ti iji nfe soke

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Satani pada, mo ti sin o pe to,
Ngo sa to Olugbala, on ni yo gba mi
Jesu, elese bi ru mi ha le ri
Abo ti o daju bi mob a to wa?

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Abo mii emi ko ni
Iwo l’okan mi rom o

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Mo de Oluwa, gba mi bi mo ti ri, jo
Nikehin gba okan mi

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
As you travel along on the Jericho road,
Does the world seem all wrong and heavy your load?
Just bring it to Christ, your sins all confess,
On the Jericho road your heart He will bless.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
On the Jericho road there’s room for just two,
No more and no less, just Jesus and you;
Each burden He’ll bear, each sorrow He’ll share,
There’s never a care for Jesus is there.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
On the Jericho road blind Bartimaeus sat,
His life was a voice, so empty and flat;
But Jesus appeared, one word bro’t him sight,
On the Jericho road Christ banished his night.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
O brother to you this message I bring,
Tho hope may be gone, He’ll cause you to sing;
At Jesus’ command, sin’s shackles must fall,
On the Jericho road will you answer His call?

Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Hear the voice that entreats you,
O return ye unto God!
Hear the voice that entreats you,
O return ye unto God!
He is of great compassion,
And of wondrous love;

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Gbo ohun to nro o jeje, pada wa s’od’Olorun/2x
Aanu ati ‘fe ‘yebibiye ko tile legbe
Gbo ohun to nro o jeje/2x
Pada wa s’od’Olorun/2x

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Yo dari ese Re ji o, Oun ko ni ranti won mo/2x
E koju si mi gbogb’aiye ka si gba yin la
Yo dari ese Re ji o/2x
Oun ko ni ranti won mo/2x

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Oh a hill far away stood an old rugged cross,
The emblem of suff’ring and shame,
And I love that old cross where the dearest and best
For a world of lost sinners was slain.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
So I’ll cherish the old rugged cross ( cross the old rugged cross),
Till my trophies at last I lay down;
I will cling to the old rugged cross (cross the old rugged cross),
And exchange it some day for a crown.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
O that old rugged cross, so despised by the world,
Has a wondrous attraction for me;
For the dear Lamb of God left His glory above,
To bear it to dark Calvary.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
In the old rugged cross, stain’d with blood so divine,
A wondrous beauty I see, For ‘twas on that old cross
Jesus suffered and died,
To pardon and sanctify me.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
To the old rugged cross I will ever be true,
Its shame and reproach gladly bear,
Then He’ll call me some day to my home far away,
Where His glory forever I’ll share.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Lor’oke l’ehin ‘lu
L’agbelebu kan wa
Apeere iya at’egan
Okan mi fa sibe
B’olufe mi owon
T’a pa f’ese gbogbo aiye

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Mo gbe agbelebu Re na ru
(Mo gbe agbelebu, le bu re na ru)
Titi ngo fi ko ere mi jo
Mo ro mo agbelebu mi na
K’emi le de ade nikehin

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Lor’agbelebu yi
L’eje mimo san si
O lewa pupo loju mi
Toripe lori re, Jesu jiya fun mi
O f’ese ji o we mi mo

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Lor’agbelebu yi
Ti araye Kegan
On lo si lewa loju mi
Nitor’Om’ Olorun bo ogo Re sile
O si ti lo si Kalfari

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
S’eni to ku fun mi
Emi yo jolooto
Ngo s’egun egan at’itiju
Nigbose yo pe mi
Lo ‘le aiyeraiye
Ki nle pin ninu ogo Re

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
I heard an old, old story, how a Savior came from glory
How He gave His life on Calvary to save a wretch like me
I heard about His groaning, of His precious blood's atoning
Then I repented of my sins, and won the victory

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Oh, victory in Jesus, my Savior forever
He sought me and bought me with His redeeming blood
He loved me 'ere I knew Him and all my love is due Him
He plunged me to victory beneath the cleansing flood

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
I heard about His healing, of His cleansing power revealing
How He made the lame to walk again and 'caused the blind to see
And then I cried, "Dear Jesus, come and heal my broken spirit"
And somehow Jesus came and brought to me the victory

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mo gbo ninu itan kan
P’Olugbala wa lat’Orun
O fi eje Re s’etutu
Lati gb’okan mi la
Itan na so ti eje
Iyebiye t’a ta sile
Gba mo ko ese mi sile
O fun mi ni ‘segun

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
A! isegun n’nu Jesu
Olugbala mi laelae
O wa mi ri, o f’eje Re
Ra okan mi pada
O fe mi k’emi to mo
Ngo si fi ife mi fun
On fun mi ni isegun
N’nu eje ‘wenumo na

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Mo gbo nipa agbara ‘wosan
To mbe ‘nu eje na
Eyi ti o nmu aro rin
To nla’ju afoju
‘gbana mo ke pe Jesu
Fun ‘wosan okan ese mi
O sokale si okan mi
O fun mi ni ‘segun

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Mo gbo nipa ile kan
Ti Jesu nko fun mi l’Orun
Nipa awon ita wura
L’oke Orun l’ohun
Nipa orin awon Angel’
Ati orin irapada
L’ojo kan ngo dapo mo won
Ko orin isegun

english.title: Verse 1
Chorus
english.lyrics:
Christ is the answer (Answer here below) this I know (answer this I know),
He is the only one to whom for life to go;
He is our refuge (refuge that’s secure) safe and sure, (refuge safe and sure),
Christ is the answer to life’s problem here below.

english.title: Verse 2

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Opo lo sonu sin’ese
Won si nwa ona otito
Oye at’ogbon aye yi si ti kuna
Won ko ri ife okan won
Tori won ko mo Oluwa
Jesu ni ‘dahun si gbogbo ‘soro aye

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Jesu ni ‘dahun………. L’aye yi………….
(……............ ‘dahun l’aye yi, o da mi loju)
Oun nikan lo le tan gbogbo isoro
Oun si ni abo………. T’o daju………….
(……………….. abo to daju, abo to daju)
Jesu ni ‘dahun si gbogbo ‘soro aye

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Bi ‘wo ba fe j’om’Olorun
F’okan re fun Jesu loni
Yo ba o rin ajo mimo lo si Orun
Ko aye sile gb’adura
Si gbo-ran si gbogb’ase Re
Jesu ni ‘dahun si gbogbo ‘soro aye

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
We are journeying on ward to Canaan land,Guided by our God’s right hand;From the world’s dark Egypt to a land of light,Where the blessed Saviour drives away the night:We are feasting daily upon Angels’ food,
Come thou with us, and God will do thee good.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Come thou with us, and God will do thee goodLeave the husks of Egypt, and feast on heavenly food,Break every earthly tie, on God alone rely,O! Come thou with us and God will do thee good.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Start today to march the narrow trail,Faith in God can never fail;Just obey our blessed Lord’s supreme command,And He’ll guide your foot-steps with His mighty Hand;Jesus feeds His soldiers upon Angels’ food,A Come thou with us, and God will do thee good.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: There are foes to meet on this pilgrim way,Jesus wins and has full sway;As we overcome each trial and bitter test,We are led in triumph to eternal rest;By God’s help all pow’rs of hell can be withstood.A Come thou with us, and God will do thee good.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
A-wa nlo si ile Kenaani
Owo Olorun nto wa
Lati ‘nu aye ese si ‘lu orun
Nibi t’Olugbala nu omije nu
A nfi ounje Orun bow a lojojo
Wa ba wa ka lo ao se o l’oore

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ba……..wa  ka lo
(wa ba wa ka lo)
A o se o l’oore (o l’oore)
F’adun ese sile
Wa je ounje orun (ounje Orun)
Ja………ide to de o,
(ja ‘de ide to de o)
Gbe……kele Olorun
Wa ba wa ka lo,
A o se o l’oore

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
A npade ota l’ona ajo yi
Jesu nse oluto wa
Bayi lawa nla ‘danwo kikoro ja
Pelu ‘segun l’awa blo sile Kenaan’
L’agbara Kristi ao segun gbogb’ota
Wa ba w aka lo, ao se o l’oore

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Nipa ore-ofe ao de le ogo
Lodi keji Jordani
Pelu okan to ti bo lowo ese
Ao tesiwaju lati lo gba ere
Ao ke hosanna b’a ti nrin lo s’Orun
Wa, ba wa ka lo ao se o l’oore

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
War in li ona tooro yi l’oni
Wo yo ri ibukun gba
Oloru ki yo dojuti ‘gbagbo re
YO fi owo agbara nla Re to o
Jesu yo f’ounje Orun b’awon tiRE
Wa ba w aka lo ao se o l’oore

englishTitle: JUST ONE WAY TO THE GATE

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: There are many paths….through this world of sin,But there’s only one I shall travel in;’Tis the old Cross Road…. or the way called “Straight”There is just one way to the pearly gate.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: There is just one way to the pearly gate,To the crown of life and the friends who wait;’Tis the old Cross Road, or the way called “Straight”There is just one way to the pearly gate.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: There are some who sneer at the old Cross Road,At the pearly gate and the soul’s abode;Yet I mind them not, but, with happy songAnd assurance sweet, still I press along.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Others risk their souls on some new-made way,Thinking they will come to the gate some day;Oh, may they find out, ere their lives are done,That the old Cross Road is the only one.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ona pupo mbe………… l’aye ese yii
Sugbon ona kan………. Lo ntoka s’orun
Hiha si loju……………ona tooro ni
O si lo tara …………… si ‘lekun wura

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ona kan l’o lo………… tara si Orun
O la ewu lo………….... sib’ade iye
Ngo te’se m’ona……… agbelebu yi
Titi ngo fi de…………. Orun ni ‘kehin

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Opo lo Kegan………… ona tooro yii
Gbigboro l’ona……...... ti won si mba lo
Lati da ese……………. Ni won se nrin mbe
O si daju pe…………... nwon ko ni d’Orun

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Jesu di mi mu…….. lona tooro yi
Ki ng ma ba sako…..kuro lodo Re
Jo s’oluto mi ……… at’amona mi
L’abe ‘toju Re…….. mu mi de Orun

number: 33:  JUST ONE WAY TO THE GATE

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Jesus, Saviour, pilot me
Over life's tempestuous sea;
Unknown waves before me roll,
Hiding rock and treach'rous shoal.
Chart and compass come from Thee.
Saviour, pilot me.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Though the sea be smooth and bright
Sparkling with the stars of night
And my ship's path be ablaze
With the light of halcyon days
Still I know my need of Thee;
Savior, pilot me

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
As a mother stills her child,
Thou canst hush the ocean wild;
Boist'rous waves obey Thy will
When Thou sayest to them, "Be still!"
Wondrous Sovereign of the sea,
Saviour, pilot me.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
When at last I near the shore,
And the fearful breakers roar
'Twixt me and the peaceful rest,
Then, while leaning on Thy breast,
May I hear Thee say to me,
"I will pilot Thee."

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Jesu jo s’amona mi
La irumi aye ja
Igbi omi nyi lu mi
Ewu airi yi mi ka
Iwo je amona mi
Jesu jo, s’amona mi

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
B’iya ti nb’omo re wi
‘Wo le da riru okun
Iji lile gb’ohun Re (gbo)
Gba t’o wipe “duro jee”
Alase l’ori okun
Jesu jo s’amona mi

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
‘Gba mba d’ebute ‘kehin
T’igbi nla f’iberu ja
L’arin emi at’ayo
Gba nba sinmi l’aya Re
L’ohun jeje ki ngbo pe
“Emi yo s’amona re

englishTitle: IS YOUR ALL ON THE ALTAR?
yorubaTitle: O ha nfi Aye re Rubo?

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: You have longed for sweet peace,And for faith to increase,And have earnestly, fervently prayed.But you cannot have rest,Or be perfectly blest,Until all on the altar is laid

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Is your all on the altar of sacrifice laid?Your heart does the Spirit control?You can only be blest,And have peace and sweet rest,As you yield Him your body and soul.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Would you walk with the LordIn the light of His Word,And have peace and contentment alway?You must do His sweet willTo be free from all ill–On the altar your all you must lay

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Oh, we never can knowWhat the Lord will bestowOf the blessings for which we have prayed,Till our body and soulHe doth fully control,And our all on the altar is laid.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Who can tell all the loveHe will send from above,And how happy our hearts will be made,Of the fellowship sweetWe shall share at His feetWhen our all on the altar is laid!

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
O ha nfe Alafia, ‘gbagbo to ye koro
O ha nfi itara gb’adura?
O ko le ni sinmi at’alafia pipe
Afi b’o fi gbogb’okan re fun-UN

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
O ha nfi gbogb’aye re rubo f’Oluwa
Emi mimo ha nsakoso aiye re
Iwo o ri ‘bukun at’alafia pipe
B’o f’aiye at’okan Re fun Krist’

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
O nfe b’Olorun rin, n’nu ‘mole Oro Re?
O si nfe ni Alafia pipe?
Gboran si ase Re, si mu ife Re se
Fi gbogb’aye at’okan re fun-UN

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
A ko le f’enu so bi ‘fe Re ti po to
Titi ao fi ara wa rubo
Anu ti o nfi han at’ayo to nfun ni
Je t’awom to f’aye won rubo

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Ta lo le so t’ayo ati ‘jinle ife
To t’orun sokale s’okan wa
Iru ‘dapo di-dun t’a o pin pelu Re
Gbat’a ba fi aye wa rubo

number: 36: IS YOUR ALL ON THE ALTAR

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: 1 Sweet is the promise of Christ who died,Opening for sinners the fountain wide;Come ye and wash in the sacred tideFlowing on Calvary from His side

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Sweet is the promise so rich and free,Sweet is the promise of Christ to me;Where He abideth I soon shall be,Saved by His grace thro’ eternity.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Sweet is the promise, I hear Him say,"All of thy burdens I’ll take away";Sweet is the promise, "I’ll with thee stay,"Thro’ all the stress of life’s weary day.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Sweet is the promise of Christ to all,Answering freely His loving call;If ye believe Him naught can appall,For He will keep you whate’er befall.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Didun ni ‘leri “N ko ni gbagbe re”
Ninu wahala ngo ranti ‘leri na
Okunkun le su n’nu aye osi yi
Ojo ‘mole ailo—pin kan mbe fun O

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
“Emi ko ni gbagbe re titi lae”
Ngo gbe o l’apa mi, l’abe iye apa mi
Emi ko ni gbagbe re titi lae
Emi lo gba o la, ngo ma toju re

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Gba ‘leri na gbo, “N ko ni gbagbe re”
Ngo ma tesiwaju pel’orin ayo
Bi aye ati ore ko mi sile
Baba l’oke Orun yi o ranti mi

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Gba mo ba duro l’enu ‘lekun wura
Ti gbogbo ‘danwo ati ‘banuje tan
Yo ti dun to, ‘gba t’Olugbala wipe
Bo s’ayo Baba re wo olotito

yorubaTitle: Je kin le Fe o Si

english.title: Verse 1
Chorus
english.lyrics:
More and more (More and more),
More and more (More and more)!
Oh to love Thee Saviour, more and more!
More and more (More and more),
More and more (More and more)!
Oh to love Thee Saviour, more and more!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
For the blessings that surround me,
Lord, Thy mercy I adore;
For Thy care so deep and tender,
I would love Thee more and more.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Raging tempest, rolling billow,
Thou hast brought me safely o’er;
Thou hast led me, safely led me,
And I long to love Thee more!

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Till my journey here is ended.
Till I reach the heav’nly shore,
This my earnest supplication
That my soul may love Thee more

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Fun oore Re Olugbala
Emi o ma gbe O ga
Je ki Emi mimo to mi
Lati le feran Re si

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Je kin le fe o si
Ki ife Re bori okan mi
Ki ‘fe Re kun okan mi
Olugbala je ki nfe O si

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Fun ibukun to yi w aka
A yin O, a si dupefun itoju Re gbagbogbo
Je ka e feran re si

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Idanwo ati ‘ponju nla
Ti f’agbara ro lpu mi
Sugbom o ti mu mi bori
Gbogbo i---gbi ‘banuje

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Ki ‘re ‘je mi l’aye to pin
Ki nto de eba Jordan’
Ebe at’adura mi ni
Wipe ki nferan Re si

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Speak to my heart Lord JesusSpeak that my soul may hearSpeak to my heart Lord JesusCalm every doubt and fear

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Speak to my heartOh speak to my heartSpeak to my heart I prayYielded and still seeking Thy willOh speak to my heart today

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Speak to my heart Lord JesusPurge me from every sinSpeak to my heart Lord JesusHelp me the lost to win

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Speak to my heart Lord JesusIt is no longer mineSpeak to my heart Lord JesusI would be wholly Thine

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
B’okan mi soro Jesu
Ma je kin lo lai gbo
B’okan mi soro Jesu
Mu ese me kuro

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Oluwa mi jo ba mi soro
Eyi l’adura mi
Mo setan lati se ‘fe RE
Jo ba mi soro loni

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
B’okan mi soro Jesu
Mu ese mi kuro
B’okan mi soro JESU
Mu asako wa ‘le

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
B’okan mi soro Jesu
Ko tun je t’emi mo
B’okan mi soro Jesu
Emi yo je mimo

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: It pays to serve Jesus, I speak from my heart;He’ll always be with us, if we do our part;There’s naught in this wide world can pleasure afford,There’s peace and contentment in serving the Lord.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: I love Him far better than in days of yore,I’ll serve Him more truly than ever before;I’ll do as He bids me, whatever the cost,I’ll be a true soldier — I’ll die at my post.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: And oft when I’m tempted to turn from the track,I think of my Savior my mind wanders backTo the place where they nailed Him on Calvary’s treeI hear a voice saying, I suffered for thee.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: There’s a place that remembrance still brings back to me,’Twas there I found pardon  ’twas Heaven to me;There Jesus spoke sweetly to my weary soul,My sins were forgiven, He made my heart whole.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: 4 How rich is the blessing the world cannot give,I’m satisfied fully for Jesus to live;Tho’ friends may forsake me, and trials arise,I’m trusting in Jesus, His love never dies.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Isin Jesu Kristi ni ere pupo
Oun yo duro ti wa b’a ba se ‘fe Re
Ko s’ohun miran mo to le m’ayo wa
Alafia pupo mbe ninu isin Re

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ife Re k’okan mi ju t’atehinwa
Ngo j’oloto n’nu isin Re de opin
Ngo gboran s’ase Re bo ti wu ko ri
Ngo sin Jesu titi de oju iku

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Gbati ‘danwo ba fe mu mi sako lo
Mo ranti olugbala to gba mi la
Mo ro t’agbelebu t’a kan Jesu mo
Mo gb’ohun Re wipe “Mo jiya fun O”

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Mo ranti pe nib emo d’ominira
Nibe ni ‘dariji lat’orun ba mi
Jesu b’okan mi soro jeje nibe
O we ese mi nu, o gba okan mi la

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Aye ko le fun mi ni ‘bukun nla yi
Lati wa fun Jesu saa te mi l’orun
B’ore ko mi sile ti danwo ba mi
Ngo gbekele Jesu ti ‘fe Re ki ku

items.title: Ese 5
items.lyrics:
Jesu l’Enikan na t’o nfun ni l’ayo
Ife Re ko l’egbe ore Re ki tan
L’ojo l’erun tabi ni igbakugba
Ife Re ki pada bakanna ni lae.

items.title: Ese 6
items.lyrics:
Wo ha fe ni ‘bukun ti Jesu fun ni
Igbala ofe dipo egun ese
Wa sodo olugbala nib’agbelebu
Eje Re nsan sibe yo s’ese Re nu

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Come to Jesus, He will save you,
Tho’ your sins as crimson glow;
If you give your heart to Jesus,
He will make it white as snow.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Come to Jesus (Come, come today)/2x
(Come to Jesus! Come, yes, come, come today)!
Come to Jesus (Come, come today)/2x
Come to Jesus! Come, come today!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Come to Jesus do not tarry,
Enter in at mercy’s gate;
O delay not till the morrow,
Lest Thy coming be too late.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Come to Jesus dying sinner,
Other Savior there is none;
He will share with you His glory,
When your pilgrimage is done.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Wa ‘do Jesu yi o gba o
B’ese re pon b’Ododo
Bo fun Jesu li okan re
Yo mu o funfun bi sno

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Wa ‘do Je………su/2x
(Wa, wa loni)/2x
Wa sodo Jesu loni (beni wa loni)
Wa ‘do Je………su/2x
(Wa, wa loni)/2x
Wa sodo Jesu loni (beni wa loni)
Wa si odo Jesu l’oni

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Wa ‘do Jesu ma duro pe
Gba ona Anu wo’le
Wa ma se da duro d’ola
Ki wiwa ma ba pe ju

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Wa ‘do Jesu elese wa
Ko s’Olugbala miran
Yo pin n’ogo Re pelu Re
L’Opin irin ajo Re

yorubaTitle: O ti Siro Ohun ti Yoo Gba O

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: There's a line that is drawn by rejecting our Lord,Where the call of His Spirit is lost,And you hurry along with the pleasure-mad throng -Have you counted, have you counted the cost?

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Have you counted the cost, if your soul should be lostTho' you gain the whole world for your own?Even now it may be that the line you have crossed,Have you counted, have you counted the cost?

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: You may barter your hope of eternity's morn,For a moment of joy at the most,For the glitter of sin and the things it will win -Have you counted, have you counted the cost?

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: While the door of His mercy is open to you,Ere the depth of His love you exhaust,Won't you come and be healed, won't you whisper, I yield -I have counted, I have counted the cost.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ewu pupo lo nse ni kiko Olorun
Kiko ebun ipe ife Re
Nipa kiko iha sohun asan aye
O ha siro…… ohun ti yo…..gba O

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Kini yoo je fun o…B’o so emi re nu
B’o tile jere gbogbo aye
On f’emi re w’ewu ni kiki ipe na
O ha siro ohun ti yo gba o

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ayo igba die, ati ‘rora fere
Ko to lati fi se akawe
Ayo ainipekun ti jesu yo fun o
O ha siro ‘hun ti yo gba o

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Gbati ‘lekun anu Re si sile fun o
Gbat’o nfi suuru duro sibe
To wa fun igbala so fun Jesu wipe
Mo ti siro ‘hun ti yo gba mi

englishTitle: IT IS NO SECRET WHAT GOD CAN DO

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
The chimes of time ring out the news;
Another day is through.
Someone slipped and fell.
Was that someone you?
You may have longed for added strength,
Your courage to renew.
Do not be disheartened,
For I bring hope to you.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
It is no secret what God can do.
What He's done for others,
He'll do for you.
With arms wide open,
He'll pardon you,
It is no secret what God can do.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
There is no night,
For in His light you'll never walk alone;
Always feel at home wherever you may roam.
There is no pow'r can conquer you,
While God is on your side;
Just take Him at His promise,
Don't run away and hide.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Igba ati Akoko nwipe ojo nkoja lo
Enikan subu wo ha l’eni na
O le ma pongbe Olorun ati igbala re
Mase so ‘reti nu mo mu ‘hin ayo wa

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Opo ohun nla l’Olorun nse
Ohun to se f’elomii yo se fun o
Yo dariji O lopolopo
Opo ohun nla, l’Olorun nse

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ko s’ohun to le ba O ninu imole Re
F’okan Re bale lodo Olorun
Ko s’ogun to le bori re lodo Olorun Re
Ro mo ileri re, mase kuro nibe

number: 43. IT IS NO SECRET WHAT GOD CAN DO

englishTitle: WHY SHOULD I WORRY OR FRET
yorubaTitle: Eese ti Ngo fi Se Aniyan

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
I believe, I believe, I believe
So why should I worry or fret.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
He holds the future in the palm of His Hand,
And He has never failed me yet,
I know He's leading and still has control,
So why should I worry or fret.
I know He holds the future, and I know He holds my hand,
I know just as sure as I'm singing this song,
I'm a part of His almighty plan.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
He told me He'd protect me and go with me
each day,
And brother i've no reason to doubt, He's
been near me every step of the way
And He will surely lead His children out.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
There are some people who live each day in
fear of what tomorrow may bring; But I'm
trusting in the one who is walking so near
I'm talking about the King of all Kings.

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Mo gbagbo/2x
Eese ti ngo fi s’aniyan

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Igbesi aye mi wa lowo Jesu
On ko si je ko mi sile
Mo mo pe Olorun wa l’ori ite Re
Eese ti ngo fi s’aniyan

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ojo ola yo dara
Bi Jesu ba wa fun mi
Mo mo pe bi mo ti nko orin yi
Jesu ns’aniyan l’ori mi

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
O so fun mi pe oun yo pa mi mo d’opin
Mo si gba ileri Re gbo
O wa nitosi Oun yo mi lojojo
Oun yo si toju awon omo re d’opin

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Awon miran wa ti won kun fun iberu
Bi ojo ola yo ti ri
Sugbon emi gba Enikan to wa lo’oke gbo
Eyi ni Jesu Oba awon Oba

number: 44. WHY SHOULD I WORRY OR FRET

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Living below in this old sinful world
Hardly a comfort can afford
Striving alone to face temptation so
Now won't you tell me
Where could I go but to the Lord
Where could I go oh where could I go
Seeking the refuge for my soul
Needing a friend to save me in the end
Where could I go but to the Lord

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Life here is grand with friends I love so dear
Comfort I get from God's own word
Yet when I face that chilling hand of death
Where could I go but to the Lord
Where could I go but to the Lord
Where could I go oh where could I go
Seeking the refuge for my soul
Needing a friend to save me in the end
Where could I go but to the Lord

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Bi mo ti nlo ni aye ese yi
Mo nw’ona lati ri ‘sinmi
Mo nfe ni ‘segun l’ori idanwo
Odo Jesu ni ‘ranwo wa

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
‘bo ni ngo lo, odo tani ngo lo
Lati ri ‘tunu f’okan mi
Tani le ran mi lowo de opin
Odo Jesu l’emi yo lo

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Bi mo ti nlo n’nu irin ajo mi
Mo nri ‘tura n’n’ Or’ Olorun
‘gbati ‘ku ba fe mu mi lo sile
Odo Jesu l’emi o lo

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Awon ore mi feran mi pupo
An jumo ngbe peluu ‘repo
Sugbon gbat’okan mi nf’onje iye
Odo Jesu ni ranwo wa

englishTitle: STANDING ON THE PROMISES OF GOD

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Standing on the promises of Christ my King,
Through eternal ages let His praises ring,
Glory in the highest, I will shout and sing,
Standing on the promises of God.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Standing, standing,
Standing on the promises of God my Savior;
Standing, standing,
I’m standing on the promises of God.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Standing on the promises that cannot fail,
When the howling storms of doubt and fear assail,
By the living Word of God I shall prevail,
Standing on the promises of God.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Standing on the promises I now can see
Perfect, present cleansing in the blood for me;
Standing in the liberty where Christ makes free,
Standing on the promises of God.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Standing on the promises of Christ the Lord,
Bound to Him eternally by love’s strong cord,
Overcoming daily with the Spirit’s sword,
Standing on the promises of God.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics:
Standing on the promises I shall not fall,
List’ning every moment to the Spirit’s call.
Resting in my Savior as my All in all,
Standing on the promises of God.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Duro l’ori ‘leri Kristi Oba mi
Ni gbogbo ojo si ma gb’ogo Re ga
Ogo f’Olorun l’oke l’orin ‘yin mi
Duro l’ori ‘leri Olorun

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Duro/2x
Duro l’ori ileri/2x
Duro l’ori ‘leri Jesu Olugbala
Duro/2x
Duro lori ileri/2x
Ngo duro lori ‘leri Olorun

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Duro lori ileri ti ko le ye
Ninu igbi ati idanwo aye
Nipa oro Re ni iwo yo duro
Duro l’ori ‘leri Olorun

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Duro l’ori ‘leri Re ti kyo subu
T’eti sile gba t’emi Re ban to o
Gbe gbogbo okan re le Jesu Olugbala
Duro lori ‘leri Olorun

number: 46. STANDING ON THE PROMISES OF GOD

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Faith of our fathers, living still
In spite of dungeon, fire and sword,
O how our hearts beat high with joy
Whene’er we hear that glorious word!
Faith of our fathers! holy faith!
We will be true to thee till death!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Our fathers, chained in prisons dark,
Were still in heart and conscience free;
And blest would be their children’s fate,
If they, like them should die for thee:
Faith of our fathers! holy faith!
We will be true to thee till death!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Faith of our fathers, we will strive
To win all nations unto thee;
And through the truth that comes from God
Mankind shall then indeed be free.
Faith of our fathers! holy faith!
We will be true to thee till death!

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Faith of our fathers, we will love
Both friend and foe in all our strife,
And preach thee, too, as love knows how
By kindly words and virtuous life.
Faith of our fathers! holy faith!
We will be true to thee till death!

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Igbagbo awon baba wa
Ko beru ida at’ina
Gbat’a gbo ‘rohin ‘gbagbo won
Igbagbo mimo baba wa

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Igbagbo mimo baba wa
Ao s’ooto si O de iku

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ninu ewon ati ‘damu
Okan awon baba wa yo
B’awon omo ba le se bee
Igbagbo mimo baba wa

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ao n’ife s’ore at’ota
Ninu ijakadi aye
Ao si f’ife nla rohin Re
Ninu oro at’ise wa

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: It was good for our mother,it was good for our mothers,It was good for our mothers,And it's good enough for me.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: 'Tis the old-time religion,'Tis the old-time religion,'Tis the old-time religion,And it's good enough for me.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: It has saved our fathers,It has saved our fathers,It has saved our fathers,And it's good enough for me.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Makes me love ev'rybody,Makes me love ev'rybody,Makes me love ev'rybody,And its' good enough for me.

english.title: Verse  4
english.lyrics: It will do when I'm dying,It will do when I'm dying,It will do when I'm dying,And it's good enough for me.

english.title: Verse  5
english.lyrics: It will take us to Heaven,It will take us to Heaven,It will take us to Heaven,And it's good enough for me.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
O fi ife s’okan mi/3x
O dara fun mi pelu

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
O dara f’awon ‘ya wa/3x
O dara fun mi pelu

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
O ti gba won baba wa/3X
O dara fun mi pelu

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Yo gba awon omo wa/3x
O dara fun mi pelu

items.title: Ese 5
items.lyrics:
O dara fun Paul on Sila/3x
O dara fun mi pelu

items.title: Ese 6
items.lyrics:
Yo gba mi nigba ‘ku ba de
O dara fun mi pelu

items.title: Ese 7
items.lyrics:
Yi o mu wa de Orun/3x
O dara fun mi pelu

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
O mighty God, when I behold the wonder
Of nature’s beauty, wrought by words of Thine,
And how Thou leadest all from realms up yonder,
Sustaining earthly life in love benign

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
With rapture filled, my soul Thy name would laud,
O mighty God! O mighty God!
With rapture filled, my soul Thy name would laud,
O mighty God! O mighty God!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
When I behold the heavens in their vastness,
Where golden ships in azure issue forth,
Where sun and moon keep watch upon the fastness
Of changing seasons and of time on earth,

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
When I behold His Son to earth descending,
To help and heal and teach distressed mankind;
When evil flees and death in fear is bending
Before the glory of the Lord divine,

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
When, crushed by guilt of sin, before Him kneeling
I plead for mercy and for grace and peace,
I feel His balm and, all my bruises healing,
He saves my soul and sets my heart at ease.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics:
When finally the mists of time have vanished,
And I in truth my faith confirmed shall see,
Upon the shores where earthly ills are banished,
I enter, Lord, to dwell in peace with Thee.

english.title: Verse 6
english.lyrics:
With rapture filled, my soul Thy name would laud,
Thanks be to Thee, O mighty God!
With rapture filled, my soul Thy name would laud,
Thanks be to Thee, O mighty God!

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
‘Gbati mo wo gbogbo ise iyanu
T’Olorun se yika gbogbo aye
Awon irawo, oorun at’osupa
Gbogbo eda t’Olorun da s’aiye

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Okan mi kun f’orin ope si o
Alagbara ni Olorun	2x

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
‘Gbati mo wo awon igi ‘nu igbo
Mo w’oye pe Olorun lo da won
Mo ranti igi kan l’oke Kalfari
Nibi t’Omo Re owon gbe ku fun mi

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Nigbati wahala aye ba koja
T’awon mimo pe yi ‘te ogo ka
Iyin wa si Olorun ki yo l’opin
Ao joba pelu Jesu t’o ra wa

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Blessed Saviour, we adore thee;we thy love and grace proclaim.Thou art mighty; thou are holy.Glorious is thy matchless name!
Refrain:Glorious, is thy name, O Lord!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Great Redeemer, Lord and Master,light of all eternal days,let the saints of every nationsing thy just and endless praise!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: From the throne of heaven's gloryto the cross of sin and shame,thou didst come to die a ransom,guilty sinners to reclaim!

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Come, O come, immortal Saviour,come and take thy royal throne.Come, and reign, and reign forever;be the kingdom all thine own! [Refrain]

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
A yin O Olugbala wa
Fun ore ofe nla Re
Oluwa Olodumare
Ogo ni f’Oruko Re

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
O……go, o……go
(ogo f’oko Re Jesu)
Ogo ni f’oruko Re		2x

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Oluwa, Olurapada
Imole gbogbo aye
Ki gbogbo orile-ede
Ma korin ‘wa mimo Re

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
O f’ite Ogo Re sile
O ku l’or’agbelebu
O f’emi Re s’etutu
Lati gba araiye la

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Jowo wa Olugbala
Sokale l’ona nla Re
Oluwa wa gba ijoba
Ki ‘joba ‘ye di tiRe

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Who can move the mountainsThat are hindering you todayWho can pick them up like pebblesClear them from the wayWho can prove His powerWhen a Christian kneels to prayIt is Jesus He's the One

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Jesus holds all powerIn His mighty hands divineHe's the One who healed the sickTurned the water into wineHe makes all things possibleAnd He's a friend of mineJesus He's the One

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Who can heal the heartacheThat is crushing you withinWho can pour the balm of heavenWhere the hurt has beenWho can chase the shadowsMake the song of joy beginIt is Jesus He's the One

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Who can keep you from all harmAnd guide you by His handWho can give you powerFor service and the strength to standWho can give you graceFor all that living may demandIt is Jesus He's the One

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Talo l’agbara lati wo oke ‘soro re?
Ta lo le mu won kuro bi okuta lasan?
Talo le f’agbara han ninu adura re?
A fi Jesu….. Oun nikan

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Gbogbo agbara l’aye l’owo Jesu lo wa
Oun lo wo ‘lokurun san to s’omi di waini
Ohun gbogbo ni sise fun Jesu Oluwa
Olubukun ni Jesu

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ta lo l’agbara lati w’ogbe okan re san?
Ta l’eni to si le bu ororo ‘tura si?
T’o si le m’okan re yok o si k’orin ayo?
Afi Jesu, Oun nikan

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ta lo le fi owo agbara Re pa o mo?
T’o si le fun o l’agbara ninu isin re
Ta lo le fun O l’or’ofe l’ona tooro yi
Afi Jesu… Oun nikan
Extra:
Ta lo l’agbara lati gb’okan re la loni
Ta lo l’agbara lati s’okan re di mimo
Ta lo l’agbara lati fi Emi Re kun O
A fi Jesu, Oun nikan

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Come from the loathsome way of sin,Hide you in the blood of Jesus;Come, for the Lord will take you in,Hide you in the blood of Jesus.
Refrain:O hide you in the blood,For the storms are raging high,O hide you in the blood,Till the dangers pass you by.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Come to the shelter’s safe retreat,Hide you in the blood of Jesus;Come, for the storms around you beat,Hide you in the blood of Jesus.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Come, for your sins the Lord has bled,Hide you in the blood of Jesus;Come, tho’ they be like crimson red,Hide you in the blood of Jesus.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Come to the Lord, He’s calling thee,Hide you in the blood of Jesus;Come, let His Spirit set you free,Hide you in the blood of Jesus.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics: Come, there is safety in the blood,Hide you in the blood of Jesus;Now plunge beneath the crimson flood,Hide you in the blood of Jesus.

english.title: Verse 6
english.lyrics: Come now, believing in the Lord,Hide you in the blood of Jesus;Trusting His grace and precious Word,Hide you in the blood of Jesus.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
F’ara re pamo Akoko nlo
Fi eje Jesu se abo
Wa Oluwa yi o gba o
Fi eje Jesu se abo

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Wa f’a…..ra re pamo
(………wa f’a……….re pamo)
Titi aiye yi yo pin
Wa fa……ra re pamo
(………wa f’a……….fara re pamo)
Titi ‘bi yo re o koja

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Wa s’abe abo to daju
Fi eje Jesu se abo
Wa ewu ni o yi o ka (wa ewu ni o yi o ka)
Fi eje Jesu se abo

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Jesu ti ku nitori re
Fi eje Jesu se abo
Yo fo ese re fun jus no
Fi eje Jesu se abo

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Nigba ti ‘pe ‘kehin ba dun
Fi eje Jesu se abo
Odo Jesu ni abo wa (wa s’abe aabo Oluwa)
Fi eje Jesu se abo

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Deeper, deeper in the love of JesusDaily let me go;Higher, higher in the school of wisdom,More of grace to know
Refrain:Oh, deeper yet, I pray,And higher ev'ry day,And wiser, blessed Lord,In Thy precious, holy word.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Deeper, deeper! blessed Holy Spirit,Take me deeper still,Till my life is wholly lost in Jesus,And His perfect will.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Deeper, deeper! tho' it cost hard trials,Deeper let me go!Rooted in the holy love of Jesus,Let me fruitful grow.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Deeper, higher, ev'ry day in Jesus,Till all conflict past,Finds me conqu’ror, and in His own imagePerfected at last. [Refrain]

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mo fe jinle ninu ife Jesu ni ojojumo
Mo fe mo giga ogbon at’ore ofe Olorun

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Jowo……… mu mi jinle
(… ‘wo mu mi jinle, eyi l’ebe mi)
Mu mi……... ga lojojo
(… mi ga lojojo……… ki nga lojojo)
Mo fe………… je ologbon
(…… fe je ologbon, ki nje ologbon)
Ninu oro mimo Re

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Emi mimo ran mi lowo lati je olotito
Titi gbogbo aiye mi yo j’okan pelu ife Re

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Bi ‘danwo lile ba je ipin mi, sa mu mi duro
Ki nfi gbongbo mule ki nsi s’eso ninu ‘fe Jesu

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Ki ndagba lojojumo n’nu Jesu titi de opin
Ki nma segun ko ba mi l’aworan tiRe lotito

items.title: Ese 5
items.lyrics:
Mo fe jinle ni ‘gbagbo n’nu Jesu ki nwulo fun O
Ki nma lepa agbara Olorun ni alafi-a

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Go and tell the story to thy friends to-day,How the Lord of glory met thee on thy way;How He cleansed thy spirit from the stain of sin,Driving out the foe who reigned thy heart within

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Go and tell the story, tell it fer and wide,How the Lord of glory for the sinner died;And the soul that hears it, and in faith believes,Straightway he the cleansing from the Lord receives.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Go and tell the story, of His pow'r to save,Of the sinful "Legion" sunk beneath the wave;Tell of His compassion, of His love so true,Of the wondrous things the Lord hath done for you.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Go and tell the story, how He reigns above,Winning men to glory thro' His dying love;How He waits to crown them kings forevermore,In the home awaiting, on the other shore.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Lo so itan Jesu f’awon ore re
B’Oluwa ogo tipade re l’ona
B’o ti gb’okan re la kuro ninu ese
B’o ti segun ota to m’egun kuro

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Lo so itan Jesu, so jakejado
B’Oluwa ogo ti ku fun elese
Enit’o gbo ihin na to si gbagbo
Yo ri idnade kuro ninu ese

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
So ti agbara Jesu lati gbala
B’o ti f’agbara Re se ogun esu
Lo so t’ohun Re ati ife nla Re
F’ayo so t’ohun nla to ti se fun O

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Lo so itan Jesu to njoba l’oke
B’o ti fi ‘rapada se wa ye f’Orun
B’o ti pese ade ogo kan fun wa
B’o ti nduro de w anile wa orun

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: The church's one foundationis Jesus Christ, her Lord;she is His new creation,by water and the word.From heav'n He came and sought herto be His holy bride;with His own blood He bought her,and for her life He died.

english.title: Verse  2
english.lyrics: Elect from every nation,yet one o'er all the earth,her charter of salvation:one Lord, one faith, one birth.One holy name she blesses,partakes one holy food,and to one hope she presses,with every grace endued.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Though with a scornful wonder,men see her sore oppressed,by schisms rent asunder,by heresies distressed,yet saints their watch are keeping,their cry goes up, "How long?"and soon the night of weepingshall be the morn of song!

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: The church shall never perish!Her dear Lord to defend,to guide, sustain, and cherish,is with her to the end;though there be those that hate her,and false sons in her pale,against the foe or traitorshe ever shall prevail.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics: 'Mid toil and tribulation,and tumult of her war,she waits the consummationof peace forevermore;till with the vision gloriousher longing eyes are blest,and the great church victoriousshall be the church at rest.

english.title: Verse 6
english.lyrics: Yet she on earth hath unionwith God the Three in One,and mystic sweet communionwith those whose rest is won;O happy ones and holy!Lord give us grace that we,like them, the meek and lowly,on high may dwell with Thee.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Jesu Oluwa ni se ipinle ijo Re
Omi ati Oro Re ni Oun si fi tun da
O t’Orun wa o fi se iyawo mimo Re
Eje Re lo si fi ra ti o si ku fun un

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
N’ile gbogbo l’a sa won, sugbon won je okan
Oluwa kan, ‘gbagbo kana ti Baptisi kan
Oruko kan ni nwon nyin Ounje kan ni won nje
Opin kan ni nwon nlepa, nipa ore ofe

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Bi aye tile nkegan, gbat’iyonu de ba
B’ija oun eko k’eko ba mu iyapa wa
Awon mimo yo ma ke wipe “yo ti pe to?”
Oru ekun fere di, ooro orin ayo

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
L’aarin gbogbo ‘banuje ati ‘yonu aye
O nreti ojo ‘kehin, Alafi-a laelae
Titi yo f’oju re ri iran ologo na
Ti ijo nla asegun yo di ‘jo ti nsinmi

items.title: Ese 5
items.lyrics:
L’aye yi o ni ‘dapo pelu Metalokan
O si ni ‘dapo didun pel’awon to ti sun
A! alabukun mimo, Oluwa fi fun wa
K’a ba le ri bi awon, k’a ba O gbe l’Orun

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Behold this King so innocent
A crown of thorns upon His head
Feel His heart His heart of grace
Behold this Man of suffering
Who bore the cross and all our shame
Breathe again this mystery
Nailed to a cross there in our place
O Lamb of God You made a way

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Once for all You died so I could live again
Once for all You washed away our sin
Streams of mercy and love flowing free forevermore
And Your blood ran down once for all

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
The scars of love can still be seen
On Your hands and on Your feet
We feel Your heart Your heart of grace
Heaven's gates have opened wide
You have raised us up to life
We breathe again this mystery
Nailed to a cross there in our place
O Lamb of God You made a way

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
In the shadow of the cross
We see our shame for what it was
And feel Your heart Your heart of grace
We see Your power breaking through
And all that we've become in You
We breathe again this mystery
Up from the grave now raised to life
O Son of God we lift You high

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mo bo low’ofin, mo di alayo
Eje Jesu ti we ese mi mo
Ofin m’egun wa ati isubu
Or’ofe lo ra wa pada

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Leekan so, elese tire ni
Leekan so arakunrin gbagbo
Ro m’agbelebu pelu ‘gbagbo
Jesu ra wa titi aye

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Bayi a d’ominira ‘dalebi tan
Jesus pese ‘rapada ti o yanju
Gbo ohun Re ti npe o pe wa
O wa fun ‘rapada ‘raiye

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Om’Olorun gbo ipe oloho
Or’ofe Re daju yoo gbe war o
O wa pe lati ‘nu iku si iye
Igbala ni ti wa

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
You have tried the path of worldly pleasure,
Sought for peace the world can never give;
O be careful where you place your treasure,
You need One to teach you how to live.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Try Jesus, He never fails (never fails),
O’er evil His love prevails (for evermore prevails),
In sunshine or stormy gales (in the stormy gales),
Try Jesus, He never fails (never, never fails).

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Oft your day begins with seeming gladness,
Hope is high, your heart with joy is light;
Shadows fall and darkness brings you sadness,
You need One to banish fears of night.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
As you walk alone in silence, thinking,
How you meet with failures on the way;
Ere your soul in deep despair is sinking,
You need One whom winds and waves obey.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Time is short, the moments swiftly flying,
Money cannot buy sweet peace within;
You are longing, seeking, groping, sighing,
You need One to cleanse you from your sin.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
O ti dan oro t’aye nfe ni wo
O rip e ko s’alafia n’nu re
Jo sora mo b’o ti p’okan re mo
O nf’eniti yo to o sona

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Dan Jesu wo kii kuna (ki kuna)
Ife re nbori ese (nbori)‘Gbakugba ti ‘ji ba nja
Gbekele ko le kuna (ko le kuna)

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Gba miran ayo yoo kun okan re
Ireti re yoo mu okan re
Banuje at’okunkun yo tun de
O f’eniti yo mu eru re lo

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
B’o ti nlo l’ona ajo re s’Orun
O nba opo isoro pade
Okan re fere damu fun ‘soro
O nf’eni ma da igbi duro

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
When the way seems dark and long,
as I pass amid the throng,
Hold to my hand, dear Lord, I pray;
Give me grace thru love divine,
ever in thy light to shine,
Lord, lead me on from day to day

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
In this world of doubt and gloom,
when hopes flowers fail to bloom,
Hold to my hand, dear Lord, I pray;
I have put my faith in Thee,
till the homeland I shall see,
Lord, lead me on from day to day,

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
When old age is stealing on,
and my strength is almost gone,
Hold to my hand, dear Lord, I pray;
Surely Thou wilt ne’er forsake,
till in heaven I awake,
Lord, lead me on from day to day,

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Lord, lead me on from day to day,
I want to, want to walk the holy way;
Tho friends forsake, me all alone,
I ask Thee, Lord, to lead me on.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
‘Gbat’ona mi ba s’okun, ninu aye osi yi
Jo di mi mu............ l’adura mi…………
