Fun mi l’ore ofe Re, kin le je ‘mole ti ntan
Ten: S’amona mi……………l’ojojumo……….
(…………….S’amona mi…………..l’ojojumo)

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
S’amona mi………….. l’ojojumo………….
K’emi le rin…………… ni ‘wa mimo………
‘Gbat’o k’emi………….. nikan soso………..
Oluwa mi………………. Samona mi……….

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
‘Gbati ‘reti gbogbo pin, lakoko iyemeji
Jo di mi mu............ l’adura mi…………
(……………jo di mi mu…………l’adura mi)
Mo fi ‘gbagbo ro mo O, titi ngo koja odo
Ten: S’amona mi……………l’ojojumo……….

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: It may be at morn, when the day is awaking,When sunlight thro' darkness and shadow is breaking,That Jesus will come in the fullness of glory;To receive from the world His own.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: O Lord Jesus, how long, how longEre we shout the glad song.Christ returneth! Hallelujah!Hallelujah! Amen,Hallelujah! Amen.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: It may be at midday, it may be at twilight,It may be, perchance, that the blackness of midnightWill burst into light in the blaze of His glory,When Jesus receives His own.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: While hosts cry Hosanna, from heaven descending,With glorified saints and the angels attending,With grace on His brow, like a halo of glory,Will Jesus receive His own.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: O joy! O delight! Should we go without dying,No sickness, no sadness, no dread and no crying,Caught up thro' the clouds with our Lord into glory,When Jesus receives His own.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
O le je owuro nigbati ‘le nmo lo
‘Gba t’orun bay o t’okunkun si kojaa
Ni jesu yoo de ni titobi ogo Re
Lati gba awon ‘mo Re soke

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Yo ti pe to Jesu Oba
K’a to k’orin ayo
Alleluya, Jesu ti de
Alleluya Amin/2X

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
O le je l’osan tab’afemojumo
O tun le je nigba oganjo oru
Oru yo d’osna  nipa ‘tansan ogo Re
‘Gba Jesu ba ngb’awon tiRe

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Pel’ogo nla niawon mimo sokale
Won ke hosanna Angel’ nse ‘ranse fun won
Pe-lu or’ofe bi itansan ologo
Ni Jesu yoo gb’awon tiRe

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Awon to wa l’aye yoo f’ayo goke lo
Ko si aisan, eru, ‘banuje, tab’ekun
Ao gba wa s’awosanmo ninu ogo Re
‘Gba Jesu ba gb’awon tiRe

yorubaTitle: Awon Ohun ti mo fe ri

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
All I once held dear, all that used to be my joy
All the pleasures I had enjoyed at the expense of my soul
All the dark and dreary nights, all the things I do in dark
All I once hold dear, they don’t matter anymore

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Thanks (be) to Calvary, I am not the same (again)
There’s a difference now they’re all not as they were
(Christ made the greatest change, Yes o praise the Lord)
Since I met the Lord, and He set my free
(When I met the Lord, gladly set my free)
All I once hold dear as mine
Are my hates and dislikes

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
All the lustful cares, all the glittering’ deadly things
All the things I hold do high, all the wrongs I did before
They don’t matter anymore, Christ has made the greatest change
All I once held dear, they’re all now as nothing worth

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ohun ti mo fe, to j’ayo mi leekan ri
Gbogbo ‘gbadun aye yi ti mo je lai r’opin mi
Gbogbo igba okunkun, gbogbo ese ikoko,
Ohun ti mo fe, won ko ja mo ohun kan

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Tori Kal…fari… nko ri bakanna mo……….
(……Nitori Kalfari……. Nko ri bakanna mo)
Iyipada de….. ‘fe atijo koja lo……………..
(Krist’ ti yi mi pada………… mo, yi Oluwa)
‘Gba mo w’odo RE….. t’O fi’fe gba mi
(‘Gba mo w’odo Re……… O fi ‘fe gba mi)
Ohun asan aye di irir f’okan mi

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Gbogbo ‘fekufe gbogbo ‘hun didan aye
Gbogbo ‘hun to gb’okan mi, asise at’ehinwa
Kristi f’ese mi ji mi, ‘yipada de b’okan mi
Ohun ti mo fe won ko ja mo ohun kan

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Down at the cross where my Savior died,Down where for cleansing from sin I cried,There to my heart was the blood applied;Glory to his name!
Refrain:Glory to his name,Glory to his name;There to my heart was the blood applied;Glory to his name!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: I am so wondrously saved from sin,Jesus so sweetly abides within;There at the cross where he took me in;Glory to his name!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Oh, precious fountain that saves from sin,I am so glad I have entered in;There Jesus saves me and keeps me clean;Glory to his name!

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Come to this fountain so rich and sweet,Cast thy poor soul at the Savior’s feet;Plunge in today, and be made complete;Glory to his name!

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Nib’agbelebu t’Oluwa ku
Nibe mo ke fun iwenumo
Nibe l’o f’eje we okan mi
Ogo f’oko Re

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ogo f’oko Re/2x
Nibe l’o f’eje we okan mi
Ogo f’oko Re

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
A gba mi la l’ona iyanu
Jesu si ngbe ninu okan mi
Nibi agbelebu l’o gba mi
Ogo f’oko Re

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Isun ‘yebiye to nwese nu
Mo l’ayo p emo so inu re
Nibi Jesu gba mi, O we mi
Ogo f’oko Re

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
A pilgrim was I, and a wandering,
In the cold night of sin I did roam,
When Jesus the kind Shepherd found me,
And now I am on my way home.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Surely goodness and mercy shall follow me
All the days, all the days of my life;
Surely goodness and mercy shall follow me
All the days, all the days of my life.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
He restoreth my soul when I'm weary,
He giveth me strength day by day;
He leads me beside the still waters,
He guards me each step of the way.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
When I walk through the dark lonesome valley,
My savior will walk with me there;
And safely His great hand will lead me
To the mansions He's gone to prepare.
Coda:
And I shall dwell in the
house of the Lord forever,
And I shall feast at the
table spread for me;
Surely goodness and
mercy shall follow me
All the days, all the days of my life.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mo ti sako lo rere b’aguntan
Ninu ese ni mo nrin kiri
Sugbon Jesu si ti wa miri
Nisinyi mo wa l’ona si ‘le

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ni tooto ire at’anu je t’emi
Ni gbogbo ojo aye mi titi
Ni tooto ire at’anu je t’emi
Ni gbogbo ojo aye mi

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ninu afonifoji okunkun
Olugbala yo pelu mi
Yo fi owo nla Re di mi mu
Titi ngo fi de ‘le ogo

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
O tu mi ninu nigba ‘banuje
O fun mi lagbara lojo
O mu mi lo si ipa odo
O si s’amona mi l’ona Re
Ngo si ma gbe ‘nu ile Olorun mi titi
Nibiti ‘wO  te tabili fun mi… D.S

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Not to the swift is the race for the crowning.
Not to the mighty is the battle’s heat;
Faith brings the grace and the strength for the conq’ring,
Smooths stony ways and wings the wearied feet.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Faith finds away, Faith finds away
Thru stromy waters,
O’er the rugged mountains;
Only believe, Trust and receive,
Lean on His arms and you will find away.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Faith is the key that unlocks ev’ry blessing,
Pulls down the glory to the trusting heart;
When in the smoke of the conflict distressing,
Faith finds away when strength and courage part.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Thru faith the prophets subdued mighty kingdoms,
Wro’t righteousness escaped the deadly sword;
Quench’d burning fires, stopped the mouths of the lions,
Waxed strong and valiant thru their conquering Lord.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ki ‘se ipa l’o le mu wa d’asegun
Beni agbara wa ko si je nkan
‘Gbagbo fun wa lor’ofe at’agbara
O si nf’okun fun okan alare

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
‘Gbagbo r’ona/2x
N’nu igbi omi ati l’orii oke
Saa ni ‘gbagbo, gbeke re lE
Ro m’apa Jesu isegun daju

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
‘Gbagbo nikan l’o le s’ilekun ‘bukun
O mb’owo f’okan to ba gbeke lee
Ninu isoro at irewesi
‘Gbagbo yo r’ona gba ‘pa eda pin

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
‘Gbagbo mu k’awon woli gba ‘le oba
Ise ododo won bori ida
Won la ina ati kiniun koja
Nipa ‘gbagbo won segun gbogb’ota

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Careless soul, why will you linger,Wand’ring from the fold of God?Hear you not the invitation?Oh, prepare to meet thy God.
Refrain:Careless soul, oh, heed the warning,For your life will soon be gone;Oh, how sad to face the judgment,Unprepared to meet thy God.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Why so thoughtless are you standing,While the fleeting years go by,And your life is spent in folly?Oh, prepare to meet thy God.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Hear you not the earnest pleadingsOf your friends that wish you well?And perhaps before tomorrowYou’ll be called to meet your God.

english.title: Verse  4
english.lyrics: If you spurn the invitationTill the Spirit shall depart,Then you’ll see your sad condition,Unprepared to meet thy God.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Okan eese to fi sako
Kuro l’agbo Olorun
O ko ha gbo ipe na bi?]
“Mura lati r’Olorun”

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Alafa………..ra gbo ikilo
(Alafara, Alafara, gbo ikilo, gbo ikilo)
L’aipe ai…….ye o koja
(Laipe aiye re o koja, laipe aiye re o koja)
‘Banuje……. Ni ‘dajo yo je
(‘Banuje……. Ni ‘dajo yo je2x)
L’aimura(l’aimura) ……. Fun Olorun (fun Olorun)

items.lyrics:
O se duro l’aini ‘ronu
Bi odun se nyi l’odun
O sin lo aiye re l’aigbon
Mura lati r’Olorun

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
O ko ha gbo ohun ebe
Awon ore t’o fe o
Boya ki ‘le ola to mo
Ao pe o s’od’Olorun

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Bi iwo ba gan ipe na
Titi Emi yo fi lo
‘wo o ri ‘po ‘banuje Re
L’aimura fun Olorun

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: From all the dark placesOf earth's heathen races,Oh, see how the thick shadows fly!The voice of salvation Awakes ev'ry nation,Come over and help us, they cry.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: The kingdom is spreading,Oh, tell ye the story,God's banner exalted shall be!The earth shall be full of His knowledge and glory,As waters that cover the sea!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: The sunlight is glancingO'er armies advancingTo conquer the kingdoms of sin;Our Lord shall possess them, His presence shall bless them,His beauty shall enter them in.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: With praising, and singing,And jubilant ringing,Their arms of rebellion cast down,At last ev'ry nation, The Lord of salvation,Their King and Redeemer shall own!

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Wa wo bi okunkun ti ‘gbinle ‘nu aye
Wo bi ese ti gbinle to
Ipe ihinrere nso gbogbo okan ji
Lo wasu ‘hinrere fun won

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
So fun won pe Jesu Krsiti mpada bow a
Gbe asia Olorun ga
Ki imo Olorun le kun inu aye
Bi omi ti b’ori okun

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Pelu orin ‘segun ati ohun ipe
A o segun gbogbo ota
Oruko Oluwa Oba Olugbala
Yo bori ni gbogbo aye

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Awon omo oghun Jesu ntesiwaju
Lati segun ogun esu
Olorun yo di won mu, yo si bukun won
Yo si f’ewa si ara won

englishTitle: IT IS GLORY JUST TO WALK WITH HIM
yorubaTitle: Adun ni o je Lati Baa Rin

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
It is glory just to walk with Him whose blood has ransomed me;It is rapture for my soul each day.It is joy divine to feel Him near where'er my path may be.Bless the Lord, it's glory all the way!
Refrain:It is glory just to walk with Him.It is glory just to walk with Him.He will guide my steps aright,Thro' the vale and o'er the height.It is glory just to walk with Him.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: It is glory when the shadows fall, to know that He is near.Oh, what joy to simply trust and pray!It is glory to abide in Him when skies above are clear.Yes, with Him, it's glory all the way

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: 'Twill be glory when I walk with Him on heaven's golden shore,Never from His side again to stray.Twill be glory, wondrous glory with the Saviour evermore,Everlasting glory all the way

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Adun ni lati ba Enit’o f’eje Re ra mi rin;
Ayo okan mi ni l’ojojo
Mo l’ayo lati mo p’o wa pelu mi ni gbogb’ona
Fi ‘bukun fun mi ni gbogb’ojo

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Adun ni o je lati ba ri (ba rin)
Ayo ni o je lati ba rin (bar in)
On yo ma to ‘sise mi, lor’oke on petele
Ayo li o je lati ba rin (ba a rin)

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ayo ni lati p’o wa nitosi b’okunkun su
Ayo ni lati gbeke wa le
Ogo ni lati wa n’nu Re gbat’oju orun bam o
Ayo ni lati wa pelu re

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ogo ni yo je lati ba rin l’ebute wura ni
Nk’yo sako kuro l’odo Re mo
Ogo nla ni yo je lati wa lodo Oluwa lae
Ogo ailopin nigbagbogbo

number: 71. IT IS GLORY JUST TO WALK WITH HIM

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Under His wings I am safely abiding.Tho' the night deepens and tempests are wild,Still I can trust Him; I know He will keep me.He has redeemed me, and I am His child.
Refrain:Under His wings, under His wings,Who from His love can sever?Under His wings my soul shall abide,Safely abide forever.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Under His wings, what a refuge in sorrow!How the heart yearningly turns to His rest!Often when earth has no balm for my healing,There I find comfort, and there I am blest.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Under His wings, oh, what precious enjoyment!There will I hide till life’s trials are o’er;Sheltered, protected, no evil can harm me.Resting in Jesus, I’m safe evermore.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mo ngbe l’abe iye Re li ailewu
Bi okun tile su t’igbi si le
Sibe mo gbekele pe yo pa mi mo
O ti da mi n’de omo Re ni mi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
L’abe ojiji ife Re
Tani le y mi kuro?
L’abe iye apa Re l’emi
Yo ma gbe l’aifoya lailai

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
L’abe iye Re ‘tunu fun ‘banuje
Wo b’okan ti npongbe fun ‘sinmi Re
‘Gbati aiye ko le tan ‘banuje mi
Nibe mo ri ‘tura ati ‘bukun

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
L’abe iye Re ayo na ti po to
Ngo wa nibe titi iji yo koja
L’abe abo Re ibi ko le ba mi
N’nu Krist’ mo wa l’alafia titi

englishTitle: WHILE THE DAYS ARE GOING BY

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
There are lonely hearts to cherish,While the days are going by;There are weary souls who perish,While the days are going by;If a smile we can renew,As our journey we pursue,O, the good we all may do,While the days are going by!
Refrain:Going by, going by,Going by, going by;O, the good we all may do,While the days are going by!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: There's no time for idle scorning,While the days are going by;Let your face be like the morning,While the days are going by;For the world is full of sighs,Full of sad and weeping eyes;Help your fallen brother rise,While the days are going by.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: All the loving links that bind us,While the days are going by;One by one we leave behind us,While the days are going by;But the seeds of good we sow,Both in shade and shine will grow,And will keep our hearts aglow,While the days are going by.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Opolopo okan lo wa, bi ojo ti nkoja lo
Opo l’o si fere segbe, bi ojo ti nkoja lo
Won nfe ka ran won lowo, b’a ti rin ‘rin ajo wa
Ise rere ta le se, bi ojo ti nkoja lo

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Akoko……. Nkoja lo/2x
(……..Akoko, nkoja lo)2x
E je k’a s’ojuse wa, bi ojo ti nkoja lo.

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ko s’aye lati se ‘mele, bi ojo ti nkoja lo
Ki ‘gbes’aye wa je ‘mole, bi ojo ti nkoja lo
Op’onirobinuje pel’omije loju won
Won nfe iranlowo wa, bi ojo ti nkoja lo

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Awon ‘hun t’a feran l’aye bi ojo ti nkoja lo
Ao fi won sile lokookan, bi ojo ti nkoja lo
Sugbon ‘hun rere ta se, o daju pe yo s’eso
Yo si munokan way o bi ojo ti nkoja lo

number: 73. WHILE THE DAYS ARE GOING BY

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
There's a call comes ringing o'er the restless wave,
"Send the light! Send the light"There are souls to rescue, there are souls to save,Send the light/2x

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Send the light, the blessed gospel light;Let it shine from shore to shore!Send the light the blessed gospel light;Let it shine forevermore!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
We have heard the Macedonian call today
,"Send the light! Send the light!"And a golden off'ring at the cross we lay,Send the light!Send the light!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
3 Let us pray that grace may ev'rywhere abound,
"Send the light! Send the light!"And a Christ-like spirit ev'rywhere be found,Send the light!Send the light!

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
4 Let us not grow weary in the work of love,
"Send the light! Send the light!"Let us gather jewels for a crown above,Send the light!Send the light!

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ipe kan ndun l’atona jinjin rere
Ran ‘mole/2x
Okan pupo nku loni l’aini Jesu
Ran ‘mole/2x

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ran ‘mole, ‘mole ihinrere
Je ko tan, jakejado
Ran ‘mole, ‘mole ihinrere
Je ko tan, jakejado (Jakejado)

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
A gbo ipe ti Makedonia wa
Ran ‘mole/2x
Ifararubo nibi agbelebu
Ran ‘mole/2x

englishTitle: GO YE INTO ALL THE WORLD

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Far, far away, in death and darkness dwelling,Millions of souls forever may be lost;Who, who will go, salvation’s story telling,Looking to Jesus, heeding not the cost?
Refrain:“All pow’r is given unto Me,All pow’r is given unto Me,Go ye into all the world and preach the gospel,And lo, I am with you alway.”

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: See o’er the world wide open doors inviting,Soldiers of Christ, arise and enter in!Christians, awake! your forces all uniting,Send forth the gospel, break the chains of sin.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: “Why will ye die?” the voice of God is calling;“Why will you die?” re-echo in His name;Jesus has died to save from death appalling,Life and salvation, therefore, go proclaim.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: God speed the day, when those of every nation"Glory to God!" triumphantly shall sing;Ransomed, redeemed, rejoicing in salvation,Shout Hallelujah, for the Lord is King.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Gbogbo aiye ti nu s’okunkun ese
Awon okan aimoye lo ns’egbe
Tani yo lo so ti ‘rapada fun won
T’yo ma wo Jesu lai fi ota pe

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Gbogb’agbara l’a fi fun mi/2x
E lo si gbogbo aiye ke ma wasu ihinrere
Ngo ma ba yin lo.

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Wo gbogb’aye, ilekun si o npe o
Om’ogun Krist’ e dide k’e si lo
Onigbagbo, e fi imo yin s’okan
Wasu ‘hinrere fo ipa ese

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Olorun npe, eese ti e o fi ku
Olorun npe, eese ti eo fi ku
Jesu ti ku, ki o le ra yin pada
Lati ‘nu ‘ku si iye ailopin

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Ojo kan mbo, gbogbo awon ayanfe,
Yo k’orin pe ogo fun Olorun
Pelu ‘gbala l’awon eni’rapada
Yo k’alleluya f’Olorun Oba

number: 75. GO YE INTO ALL THE WORLD

yorubaTitle: Nibo Lo ti fe lo Aiyeraiye?

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Where will you spend eternity?This question comes to you and me!Tell me, what shall your answer be?Where will you spend eternity?Eternity! eternity!Where will you spend eternity?

english.title: Verse  2
english.lyrics: Many are choosing Christ today,Turning from all their sins away;Heav’n, shall their happy portion be?Where will you spend eternity?Eternity! eternity!Where will you spend eternity?

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Leaving the strait and narrow way,Going the downward road today,Sad will their final ending be,--Lost thro’ a long eternity!Eternity! eternity!Lost thro’ a long eternity!

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Repent, believe, this very hour,Trust in the Savior’s grace and pow'r.Then will your joyous answer be,Saved thro’ a long eternity!Eternity! eternity!Saved thro’ a long eternity!

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Nibo lo nfe lo aiyeraiye
Ibeere yi fun ‘wo at’emi
So fun mi, kini ‘dahun re?
Nibo lo nfe lo aiyeraiye?
Aiyeraiye

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Aiyeraiye/2x
Nibo lo nfe lo aiyeraiye
Aiyeraiye

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Opo ngba Jesu gbo loni
Won si nko ese won sile
Nwon d’eni ibukun l’orun
Nibo lo nfe lo aiyeraiyer
Aiyeraiye

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Opo nk’ona tooro sile
Won rin l’ona gbigboro loni
Ibanuje ni ipin won
Nwon segbe tit’aiyeraiye
Aiyeraiye

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Gbagbo ko ese re sile
Gbeke l’agbara to ngba ni la
Eyi ni yo je ‘dahun re
Mo ri ‘gbala aiyeraiye
Aiyeraiye

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
No tears in heaven, no sorrows given,All will be glory in that land;There'll be no sadness, all will be gladness,When we shall join that happy band.
Refrain:No tears in heaven fair, no tears, no tears up there,Sorrow and pain will have have flown;No tear, in heaven fair, no tears, no tears up there,No tears in heaven will be known.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Glory is waiting, waiting up yonder,Where we shall spend an endless day;There with our Savior, we'll be forever,where no more sorrow can dismay.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Some morning yonder, we'll cease to ponderO'er things this life has bro't to view;All will be clearer, loved ones be dearer,In heav'n where all will be made new.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ko s’ekun l’orun, tabi ‘banuje
Ogo Jesu yo gba ‘le kan
Ofo ki yo si, a o kun f’ayo
‘Gbat’a dapo m’awon t’Orun

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ekun……. (ko si l’Orun)
Ko si iku nibe
‘rora on ‘banuje yo pin
Ekun……. (ko si l’Orun)
Ko si iku nibe, Olorun yo n’omije nu

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ogo at’iyin lo nduro de wa
Ni ‘le na ti ko si odun
Ao wa titi lai lod’Olugbala
Ibanuje yo si d’opin

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
How to reach the masses, men of ev'ry birth,For an answer Jesus gave the key:“And I, if I be lifted up from the earth,Will draw all men unto Me.
Refrain:Lift Him up, (Lift the precious Savior up),Lift Him up, (Lift the precious Savior up),Still He speaks from eternity:“And I, if I be lifted up from the earth,Will draw all men unto Me.”

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Oh! the world is hungry for the Living Bread,Lift the Savior up for them to see;Trust Him, and do not doubt the words that He said,“I’ll draw all men unto Me.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Don’t exalt the preacher, don’t exalt the pew,Preach the Gospel simple, full and free;Prove Him and you will find that promise is true,“I’ll draw all men unto Me.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: 4 Lift Him up by living as a Christian ought,Let the world in you the Savior see;Then men will gladly follow Him who once taught,“I’ll draw all men unto Me.”

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ba’o la se le gba gbogbo aye la
Fun idahun Jesu so wipe
An’Emi, bag be soke ninu aye
Ngo gba gbogb’enia la

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Gbe soke……. Gbe Jesu soke
(Gbe Olugbala soke, Gbe Jesu soke)
O ti nwi be lati Orun
An’Emi, ba gbe mi soke ninu aye
Yo gba gbogb’eniyan la

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Gbogb’aye l’ebi npa fun ounje iye
Gbe Jesu Olugbala soke
Gba a gbo ma se s’iyemeji oro Re
Ngo gba gbogb’enia la

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Fi han n’nu iwa re bi onigbagbo
Je k’aye mo p’O ti gba o la
Ki gbogbo aye le f’ayo tele Jesu
T’o ngba gbogbo eniyan

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Encamped along the hills of light,Ye Christian soldiers, riseAnd press the battle ere the nightShall veil the glowing skies.Against the foe in vales belowLet all our strength be hurled;Faith is the victory, we know,That overcomes the world.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Faith is the victory! (Faith is the victory!)Faith is the victory! (Faith is the victory!)Oh, glorious victoryThat overcomes the world.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: His banner over us is love,Our sword the Word of God;We tread the road the saints aboveWith shouts of triumph trod.By faith they, like a whirlwind's breath,Swept on o'er ev'ry field;The faith by which they conquered deathIs still our shining shield.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: To him who overcomes the foeWhite raiment shall be giv'n;Before the angels he shall knowHis name confessed in heav'n.Then onward from the hills of light,Our hearts with love aflame;We'll vanquish all the hosts of nightIn Jesus' conq'ring name.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
E dide, Kristian Ologun
T’o pago l’or’oke
Tesiwju l’oju ija
Ki okunkun to kun
Je ki a sa gbogbo ipa
Lati ba ota ja
Igbagbo li awa mop e
O le segun aye

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Igbagbo ni ‘segun
Igbagbo ni’segun
Isegun ti o l’ogo
Ti o bori aye

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ife Re ni asia wa
Oro Re n’ida wa
A nrin l’ona f’awon mimo
Nipa igbagbo won
Nipa igbagbo won segun
Gbogbo awon ota
Igbagbo ti won fi segun
L’apata wa sibe

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ota wa yi wa kakiri
Nnwon si gbogun kikan
Jek’a fi irora sile
Ki a lo s’oju ‘ja
Pelu asibori ‘gbala
At’amure ooto
Ile yo mi l’abe ‘se wa
Aye yo ho pelu

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Enit’o ba segun ota
Yo wo aso funfun
Yo si mo pe a ko ooko
On sile li orun
Lat’ori oke imole
Pelu ife pipe
Ao segun ipa okunkun
Li oruko Jesu

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
If you are burdened down with care,
Take it to Jesus Christ in prayer.
It’s really surprising Really surprising
What the Lord can do; What the Lord can do;
He can give gladness day and night.
He can change darkness into light,
It’s really surprising Really surprising
What the Lord can do (What the Lord can do).

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
It’s really surprising Really surprising
What the Lord can do,
What the Lord can do,
He can make a lost sinner (Make a lost sinner)
Just as good as new (Just as good as new);
And if you will let Him (If you will let Him)
He’ll pardon you (He will pardon you),
It’s really surprising Really surprising
What the Lord can do (What the Lord can do).

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
When you are lost and cannot see,
Jesus will hear your feeble plea,
It’s really surprising (Really surprising)
What the Lord can do (What the Lord can do);
Blessings He gives to one and all
Who on His precious name will call,
It’s really surprising (Really surprising)
What the Lord can do (What the Lord can do).

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
If you are wand’ring from the fold
He can redeem your precious soul,
It’s really surprising (Really surprising)
What the Lord can do (What the Lord can do);
Jesus will be your dearest friend,
He will go with you till the end,
It’s really surprising (Really surprising)
What the Lord can do (What the Lord can do).

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Bi aniyan bo okan re, mu to Jesu lo n’n’adura
Iyanu nla l’ohun……… ti Jesu yo se…………….
(…………Iyanu l’ohun, ti Jesu yo se, ti Jesu yo se)
O fun ni l’ayo n’gbagbogbo, o so okunkun di ‘mole
Iyanu nla l’ohun……… ti Jesu yo se…………….
(…………Iyanu l’ohun, ti Jesu yo se, ti Jesu yo se

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Iyanu nla l’ohun……… ti Jesu yo se…………….
(…………Iyanu l’pupo, ni Jesu yo se………………)
O nyi elese pada………... si eni rere………………
(……………….Elese pada……………..si eni rere)
B’o ba fi okan re fun UN……….…... yo dariji o
(……………fi okan re fun UN…………….yo dariji o)
Iyanu nla l’ohun……… ti Jesu yo se…………….
(…………Iyanu l’ohun, ti Jesu yo se, ti Jesu yo se)

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Nigbati isoro ba De, Jeus y gbo adura re
Iyanu nla l’ohun……… ti Jesu yo se…………….
(…………Iyanu l’ohun………………..ti Jesu yo se)
Jesu yo j’ore re tooto, yoo ba o gbe titi d’opin
Iyanu nla l’ohun……… ti Jesu yo se…………….
(…………Iyanu l’ohun, ti Jesu yo se, ti Jesu yo se)

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Bi iwo ba je elese, Jesu yo gba okan re la
Iyanu nla l’ohun……… ti Jesu yo se…………….
(…………Iyanu l’ohun………………. ti Jesu yo se)

Iyanu nla l’ohun……… ti Jesu yo se…………….
(…………Iyanu l’ohun, ti Jesu yo se, ti Jesu yo se)

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
O brother, life’s journey beginning,With courage and firmness arise!Look well to the course thou art choosing;Be earnest, be watchful, and wise!Remember—two paths are before thee,And both thy attention invite;But one leadeth on to destruction,The other to joy and delight.
Refrain:God help you to follow His banner,And serve Him wherever you go;And when you are tempted, my brother,God give you the grace to say No!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: O brother, yield not to the tempter,No matter what others may do;Stand firm in the strength of the Master,Be loyal, be faithful, and true!Each trial will make you the stronger,If you, in the name of the Lord,Fight manfully under your Leader,Obeying the voice of His Word.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: O brother, the Savior is calling!Beware of the danger of sin;Resist not the voice of the Spirit,That whispers so gently within.God calls you to enter His service—To live for Him here, day by day;And share by and by in the gloryThat never shall vanish away. [Refrain]

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Arakunrin ajo wa beere
Dide pel’okan igboya
S’o ona t’o yan daradara
Mura giri k’o si s’ora
Ranti pe ona meji lo mbe
Ona mejeji li o nfa o
Okan lo tara si ‘parun
Ekeji lo s’ibi ayo

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Olorun yo se amona re
Nibikibi ti o ba nlo
‘Gba ‘danwo ba de arakunrin
Olorun yo mu o segun

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ara mase gbo t’oludanwo
B’elomi tile gbo tire
Duro n’nu agbara Oluwa
J’oloto l’ona re gbogbo
Idanwo yo fun o lokan si
B’o ba le teju mo Jesu
Ja bi okunrin l’abe ajogun
Sa gboran sa se ife Re

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Arakunrin Olugbala npe
Sora ki o ma ba d’ese
Ma se ko ipe Emi mimo
To nke jeje nin’okan re
Olorun npe o fun ise Re
K’o le ma wi fun lojojo
‘Gba to ba pari ‘se re laye
K’o le bo si ‘bi ‘sinm’ogo Re

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
The Holy Spirit came at Pentecost, He came in mighty fullness then;
His witness thru believers won the lost,
And multitudes were born again.
The early Christians scattered o’er the world.
They preached the gospel fearlessly;
Tho some were martyred to lions hurled,
They marched along in victory!

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Come, Holy Spirit, Dark is the hour,
We need filling, Your love and Your mighty pow’r;
Move now among us, Stir us, we pray.
Come, Holy Spirit, Revive the Church today!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Then in an age when darkness gripped the earth,
“The just shall live by faith” was learned;
The Holy Spirit gave the Church new birth,
As reformation fires burned.
In later years the great revivals came,
When saints would seek the Lord and pray;
O once again we need that holy flame
To meet the challenge of today!

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Emi mimo de l’ojo Pentikost’
Pelu agbara isoji
Ifihan Re kun okan t’o ‘gbagbo
Jere opo okan fun Krist’
Ijo Kirsti tan ka gbogbo aye
Won soro na ni igboya
Ninu won si ku bi ajeri ‘ku
Won fi ‘gbagbo lo si ‘segun

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Wa, Emi Mimo, okunkun su
Mu wa soji, fi agabara nla Re kun wa
Dana ife Re si okan wa
Wa, Emi Mimo, so gbogbo okan ji

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
‘Gba t’okunkun ese b’ori aye
Emi Mimo tan ‘mole Re
Olododo yo ye nipa ‘gbagbo
Ki won kede ja ‘ke ja ‘do
Olorun ti ran opo isoji
Ki ‘na adura jo gere
A nfe iru isoji bi eyi
Lati so aye ese ji

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ran isoji l’oni/3x
So ijo ji loni

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: True-hearted, whole-hearted, faithful and loyal,King of our lives, by Thy grace we will be;Under the standard exalted and royal,Strong in Thy strength we will battle for Thee.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Peal out the watchword! silence it never!Song of our spirits, rejoicing and freePeal out the watchword! loyal forever,King of our lives, by Thy grace we will be.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: True-hearted, whole-hearted, fullest allegianceYielding henceforth to our glorious King;Valiant endeavor and loving obedience,Freely and joyously now would we bring.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: True-hearted, whole-hearted, Savior all-glorious!Take Thy great power and reign Thou alone,Over our wills and affections victorious,Freely surrendered and wholly Thine own.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Fi gbogb’okan at’otito sin Jesu
Nipa ore-ofe Re li a duro
L’abe opagun Re isegun daju
J’agbara nin’ogun Jesu

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
So itan Jesu k’o mase dake
K’orin ……… l’ayo ‘rapada
So itan Jesu pelu igboya
Nipa or’ife Re li a duro

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Fi otito okan si Olugbala
Lo ninu ipa ati agabra Re
Ki ife Jesu kun gbogbo ero re
Jowo gbogb’aye at’ife re fun

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Jesus has a table spreadWhere the saints of God are fed,He invites His chosen people, “Come and dine”;With His manna He doth feedAnd supplies our every need:Oh, ’tis sweet to sup with Jesus all the time!
Refrain:“Come and dine,” the Master calleth, “Come and dine”;You may feast at Jesus’ table all the time;He Who fed the multitude, turned the water into wine,To the hungry calleth now, “Come and dine.”

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: The disciples came to land,Thus obeying Christ’s command,For the Master called unto them, “Come and dine”;There they found their heart’s desire,Bread and fish upon the fire;Thus He satisfies the hungry every time.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Soon the Lamb will take His brideTo be ever at His side,All the host of heaven will assembled be;Oh, ’twill be a glorious sight,All the saints in spotless white;And with Jesus they will feast eternally.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Jesu te tabili kan f’awon eni rapada
O npe gbogbo awon ayanfe sibe
Yo fi mana b’okan won
Yoo tan gbogbo aii won
Jowo wa s’odo Jesu Olugbala

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Jowo wa, Jesu lo npe o, jowo wa
Yo te okan re l’orun l’ona gbogbo
O mbo gbogbo alaini,
O si le tan ongbe won (yooo fi ounje b’okan won)
Jesu npe gbogbo okan t’er’ese npa (Gbogbo okan t’ebi npa wa s’odo Re)

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
L’aipe Od’aguntan yok o gbogb’awon ayanfe
Gbogbo won yo si pejo ni ‘lu orun
Ao si wa niwaju Re pelu aso funfun wa
A o wa peleu Jesu titi laelae

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
This life will end some fu­ture day,Another life will then be­gin;Are you pre­pared for that event,Just af­ter death—what then?
Refrain:Just af­ter death—O! an­swer me,Where will you spend eter­ni­ty?When time on earth shall cease to be,Just af­ter death—what then?

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: The saved will have eter­nal life,And they will safe­ly en­ter in.To share the glo­ries of the Lord,Just after death—what then? [Refrain]

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: The lost will go in­to des­pair,Their tor­ment there will then be­gin;They’ll cry for mer­cy from the Lord,Just af­ter death—what then? [Refrain]

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Aye yi yo pin l’ojo kan
Aye miran yo tun bere
Iwo ha setan f’ojo naa
L’ehin iku, kini?

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
L’ehin iku, da mi l’ohun
Nibo lo nfe lo ayeraye
Nigbati aye yi ba pin
L’ehin iku, kini?

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Eru yo b’awon eni egbe
‘Gbati ‘ya ojo naa yoo bere
Won yo ke f’aanu Olorun
Sugbon yoo ti peju

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
It won't be long
Till we'll be leavin' here
It won't be long
We'll be goin' home.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Count the years as months
and count the months as weeks
and count the weeks as days
any day now
We'll be goin' home
We shall be like Him
We shall be like Him
We shall be like Him
Any day now
We'll be goin' home.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
It won't be long
Till we'll be leavin' here
It won't be long
We'll be goin' home.
It won't be long
Till we'll be leavin' here
It won't be long
We'll be goin' home.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Igba ko ni p emo;
Ti aye yo d’opin
Igba ko ni pe mo
Ti jesu yo pada
Ti awon oku ninu Kristi yio jinde
Lati pade Oluwa li awosanmo

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Igba ko ni pe mo/3x
Ti Jesu yo pada
Ojo na sunmo ‘le
Iwo ha setan bi
Lati pade jesu
Mura fun ojo na ti jesu yo pada

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Igba ko ni pe mo
T’a ko ni sako mo
T’a o ri Olugbala
Pelu inu didun
La o rin n’ita wura
A o k’orin pelu awon eni ‘rapada ninu ogo
Ki yo si iku mo

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
There’s a wedding feast preparingFor the saved of all mankind;All the wedding garment wearing,Will a hearty welcome find.
Refrain:For the Bridegroom asks you,And the Bridegroom asks me,To put on the wedding garment,For the royal feast prepare;There’s a welcome for you,And a welcome for me,The invitation I’ve accepted I’ll be there.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Not a soul on earth is slighted;“Whosoever will,” said He;I’m so glad that He invitedAn unworthy guest like me.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: O be ready for the warningThat may come by night or day;If at midnight or at morning,Do you loiter on the way.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Keep your faith-light calm and steady,Never doubt the promise made,But be ever, always ready,In your wedding robe arrayed.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Jesu s’ase ‘gbeyawo kan
F’awon eni ‘rapada
Ao wa n’nu aso ‘gbeyawo
Jesu yo ki wa kaabo

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Jesu nro O wi pe (ma bo)
Jesu nro mi (ma abo)
Lati w’aso ‘gbeyawo t’a pese
Fun ase nla ni
Jesu npe o sibe
Jesu npe mi sibe
Mo ti gba ‘pe lati wa nibe
Ngo wa mbe (wa mbe)

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Jesu koi ta enikan nu
Enit’ o ba fe le wa
Inu mi dun ‘gba t’o pe mi
Emi ab’osi julo

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
T’eti sile si ikilo
T’o le wa l’osan l’oru
Kristiani mase jafara
Jesu mbo eyi daju

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Jeki ‘na ‘gbagbo jo gere
Mase gan ileri Re
Ma f’ojusona n’gbagbogbo
Ninu aso ‘gbeyawo re

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Awake, ye that slumber,Awake from your sleep,With lamps trimmed and burning,A watch you must keep,You know not how quickly,The cry you may hear,Go forth to meet the Bridegroom,For lo, He is near.
Refrain:Behold, He cometh,The blessed Bridegroom cometh,Then go ye forth to meet Him,A glad and grateful throng.Behold, He cometh,The blessed Bridegroom cometh,Then go ye forth to meet Him,With a happy, happy song.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Awake, ye that slumber,His welcome prepare.Awake and be ready,His banquet to share.The hour is approaching,No time for repose,The open door of mercy,Forever may close.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Awake, ye that slumber,No longer despiseThe warning that bids youBe watchful and wise.The Bridegroom may tarry,But true to His word,Your blessèd call to meet HimWill surely be heard. [Refrain]

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
E ji onigbagbo, kuro ninu orun
E tun fitila yin se, e ma sona
E ko mo wakati ti ipe yo dun
Mura lati pade Jesu, o wa ntosi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Sa wo (sa wo) o mbo wa
Oko iyawo ti de
E lo lati pade Re, pelu orin isegun
Sa wo (sa wo) o mbo wa
Oko iyawo ti de
E jade, e lo pade Re
Pely ayo ♪ orin ayo

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
E ji onigbagbo e dide giri
E ji lati pade Re l’awosanmo
Ko si pada s’ehin ni wakati yi
‘lekun anu to sile yo ti titi lae

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
E ji onigbagbo, ma s’aibikita
Ikilo l’eyi pe sora j’ologbon
Mase jafara oro Re kii ye
(B’O ba ti s’oro yO mu se)
Jesu yo pada

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
He is coming Halleluya, He is coming Christ the King
Let the ransomed of all nations
Loud hosanna gladly sing
He is coming we are waiting
With a hope that cannot die
O how marvelous the glory
When we see Him face to face

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
And He shall reign…..
(forever and ever)

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
O npada bo alleluya, Kristi Oba npada bo
Je ki awon eni ‘rapada, l’aye f’ayo k’hosana
O npada bo ninu ogo; Enit’a pa s’etutu
Enit’o ‘segun iku at’ese, Yo tun pada wa s’aye

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Oun yo joba………./3x
…….titi lai…… titi lai)
On yo ma j’Oba lai yO ma j’Oba titi lailai
Oun l’Oba………… Oluwa………
(Oun l’Oba awon Oba; Oluwa awon Oluwa)
Oun yo ma j’Oba lailai yo ma j’Oba titi lailai
Alleluya/3x yo joba)2x
Alleluya/4x)
ALLELUYA

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
O npada bo alleluia, Ki se bi eniyan mo
Sugbon bi Oba awon oba; li Olugbala yoo de
Awon omo Re nf’ojusona, pelu ‘reti ti kii ku
Ha! Ogo naa yoo ti po to ‘gba t’a ba ri I nigbose

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Sowing in the morning, sowing seeds of kindness,Sowing in the noontide and the dewy eve;Waiting for the harvest, and the time of reaping,We shall come rejoicing, bringing in the sheaves.
Refrain:Bringing in the sheaves,Bringing in the sheaves,We shall come rejoicing, bringing in the sheaves;Bringing in the sheaves,Bringing in the sheaves,We shall come rejoicing, bringing in the sheaves.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Sowing in the sunshine, sowing in the shadows,Fearing neither clouds nor winter's chilling breeze;By and by the harvest, and the labor ended,We shall come rejoicing, bringing in the sheaves. [Refrain]

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Going forth with weeping, sowing for the Master,Though the loss sustained our spirit often grieves;When our weeping's over, He will bid us welcome,We shall come rejoicing, bringing in the sheaves.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Fun ‘rungbin l’owuro
Fun ‘rungbin ‘wa rere
Fun ‘rungbin ni osan
L’ale ‘gba ‘ri nse
Duro de ikore
‘Gba ikore ba de
Ayo la o fi ko ikore wo ‘le

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ikore wo ‘le/2x		)
Ayo la o fi ko ikore wo ‘le    )2x

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Fun ‘rugbin n’iboji
Fun ‘rugbin nin’orun
Mase beru iji
Tab’ikun omi
L’aipe wahala at’ija yo d’opin
Ayo la o fi koikore wo ‘le

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
B’eyin ti nfi ekun
Fun ‘rugbin fun Jesu
Bi ‘banuje nyin pa
Emi yin l’ara
Gba ekun ba d’opin
YO ki w ape kaabo
Ayo la o fi ko ikore wo ‘le

englishTitle: THE LAST MILE OF THE WAY

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
If I walk in the pathway of duty,If I work till the close of the day,I shall see the great King in His beautyWhen I've gone the last mile of the way.
Refrain:When I've gone the last mile of the way,I will rest at the close of the day,And I know there are joys that await meWhen I've gone the last mile of the way.

english.title: Verse  2
english.lyrics: If for Christ I proclaim the glad story,If I seek for His sheep gone astray,I am sure He will show me His gloryWhen I've gone the last mile of the way.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Here the dearest of ties we must sever,Tears of sorrow are seen ev'ry day,But no sickness, no sighing foreverWhen I've gone the last mile of the way.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: And if here I have earnestly striven,And have tried all His will to obey,'Twill enhance all the rapture of heavenWhen I've gone the last mile of the way.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Bi mo f’aye mi rubo fun Jesu
Titi d’opin ojo aye mi
Ngo ri Oba nla ninu ewa Re
L’opin irin ajo aye mi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
L’opin irin ajo aye mi (aye mi)
Ngo sinmi nipari ajo mi (ajo mi)
Ngo bo sinu ayo Oluwa mi
L’opin irin ajo aye mi

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Bi mo kede ihin ‘gbala Jesu
Ti mo w’aguntan Re to sako
O daju pe y’O gba mi sin’ogo
L’opin irin ajo aye mi

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
L’aye a pinya pel’awon ore
Omi pupo nsan l’oju wa
K’yo si aisan tabi ‘banuje mo
L’opin irin ajo aye mi

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Bi mo ngboran si gbogbo ife Re
Ti mo ngoran si gbogb’ase Re
Ayo mi yo po ‘gba mba ri Jesu
L’opin irin ajo aye mi

number: 95. THE LAST MILE OF THE WAY

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Than to be the king of a vast domainOr be held in sin's dread sway.I'd rather have Jesus than anythingThis world affords today.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Oro aye yi l’opolopo nlepa
Won si fe ki aye mo won (aye mo won)
Won ni fadaka ti ki tenilorun
Won si j’ota s’Oluwa wa

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Alto: Mo fe…..ki nje ti Je….su…. ju lati j’Oloro aye yi
(………..Mo fe je ti……….Jesu ju la-ti…. Je…O….lor’aye yi)
Alto: Mo fe…….ki nni Je…su, ju lati je oloro aye yi
(Mo fe kin ni………Jesu ju lati……….je- o-lor’aye yi)
Alto: Ngo yan………ipo ire……le, ki nsi je alaini fun ‘gba die
(……..Ngo yan ipo, irele ki nsi…….. je….. a……laini fun ‘gba die)
Alto: Ju lati………..j’ore aye ……yi , l’ai l’oruko ninu iwe iye
(……..ju lati ni…………… ini aye yi, l’ai l’oruko, ni……..nu iwe iye)

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Mo gbagbo pe won o f’oro aye yi sile
‘Gbat’ iku ba de l’ojiji (l’ojiji)
Tori won fi gbogb’oj’aye won s’afe
L’ai mo p’onidajo mbo wa

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ire wo lo wa n’nu oro aye yi
‘Banuje ‘kehin ti po to
F’awon to s’emi won nu tori owo
Won ki yo de ‘lu Olorun

yorubaTitle: Ese ko le de ibe lai

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Heaven is a holy place,Filled with glory and with grace—Sin can never enter there;All within its gates are pure,From defilement kept secure—Sin can never enter there.
Refrain:Sin can never enter there,Sin can never enter there;So if at the judgment barSinful spots your soul shall mar,You can never enter there.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: If you hope to dwell at last,When your life on earth is past,In that home so bright and fair,You must here be cleansed from sin,Have the life of Christ within—Sin can never enter there.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: You may live in sin below,Heaven’s grace refuse to know,But you cannot enter there;It will stop you at the door,Bar you out forevermore—Sin can never enter there.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: If you cling to sin till death,When you draw your latest breath,You will sink in dark despairTo the regions of the lost,Thus to prove at awful cost,Sin can never enter there.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Orun je ibi mimo, t’o kun f’ogo Olorun
Ese ko le de ‘be lai
Ohun eeri ko wo o-na ile ogo na ri
Ese ko le de ‘be lai

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ese ko le de ‘be lai/2x
Ni wakati idajo, b’ese ba wa l’ona re
O ko ni le de ‘be lai

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Bi o ba ni ireti lati wa l’aye titi
Ninu ile didan ni
O gbodo mo l’aye yi, ki o si wa n’nu Kristi
Ese ko le de ‘be lai

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
O le j’elese l’aye, sugbon orun ko fe mo
O ko si ni le de ‘be
Ese yo si d’ona re, l’enu ‘bode ogo ni
Ese ko le de ‘be lai

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Bi o ba nin’ese, titi d’opin emi re
‘wo o jin sin’okunkun
Iwo yo padanu ayeraye pelu Krsiti
Ese ko le de ‘be lae

yorubaTitle: A ki yoo si mi nidi

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
I shall not be, I shall not be moved.
I shall not be, I shall not be moved;

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Like a tree planted by the water,
I shall not be moved, be moved.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
When my cross is heavy, I shall not be moved,
When my cross is heavy, I shall not be moved.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
The church of God is marching, I shall not be moved,
The church of God is marching, I shall not be moved;

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
King Jesus is our Captain, I shall not be moved,
King Jesus is the Captain, I shall not be moved;

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics:
Come on and join the army, I shall not be moved,
Come on and join the army, I shall not be moved;

english.title: Verse 6
english.lyrics:
Fighting sin and Satan, I shall not be moved,
Fighting sin and Satan, I shall not be moved;

english.title: Verse 7
english.lyrics:
When my burden's heavy, I shall not be moved,
When my burden's heavy, I shall not be moved;

english.title: Verse 8
english.lyrics:
Don't let the world deceive you, I shall not be moved,
Don't let the world deceive you, I shall not be moved;

english.title: Verse 9
english.lyrics:
If my friends forsake me, I shall not be moved,
If my friends forsake me, I shall not be moved;

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ogo alleluya, emi yoo duro
Mo sinmi le Jesu, emi yoo duro
Bi ‘gi t’a gbin, s’eti ipado omi (iye)
Emi yoo duro

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
L’agbara Re, emi yoo duro/2x
Bi ‘gi ta gbin s’eti ipado omi (iye)
Emi yoo duro

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ninu ife Jesu, emi yoo duro
Ngo di gbeke mi le, emi yo duro
Bi ‘gi t’a gbin, s’eti ipado omi (iye)
Emi yoo duro

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
B’esu gb’ogun ti mi, emi yoo duro
Jesu yo di mi mu, emi yoo duro
Bi ‘gi t’a gbin, s’eti ipado omi (iye)
Emi yoo duro

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Bi iji tile nja, emi yoo duro
L’abe abo Jesu, emi yoo duro
Bi ‘gi t’a gbin, s’eti ipado omi (iye)
Emi yoo duro

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
I hear the Savior say,"Thy strength indeed is small,Child of weakness, watch and pray,Find in Me thine all in all.
Refrain:Jesus paid it all,All to Him I owe;Sin had left a crimson stain,He washed it white as snow.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Lord, now indeed I findThy pow'r and Thine alone,Can change the leper's spotsAnd melt the heart of stone.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: For nothing good have IWhere-by Thy grace to claim;I'll wash my garments whiteIn the blood of Calv'ry's Lamb.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: And when, before the throne,I stand in Him complete,"Jesus died my soul to save,"My lips shall still repeat.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Gbogbo ‘gbese ese tan, yipada de b’okan mi
Nisiyi mow a l’aye, o m’ese mi lo
S/T: Ng ko le san gbese na, Enikan l’o ku fun mi
All: O mu gbese na kuro, Krist’ san gbogbo re

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
BASS:
Jesu san gbogbo…… re; l’ori ‘gi fun gbogbo wa
O m’okan apata, nipa iku Re,
O ku ‘ku ‘banuje, l’or’igi fun gbogbo wa
O san gbogbo gbese, Krist’ san gbogbo re
SAT:
Je-su ku o san gbo-gbo re, l’o-r’a-gbe-le-bu Kal-fa-ri
O m’o-kan a-pa-ta ku-ro, ni-pa i-ku oro Re
O ku i-ku i-ba-nu-je l’o-ri i-gi fun gbo-gbo wa
O mu gbo-gbo gbe-se ku-ro,
Krist’ san gbo-gbo gbese na

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Nisiyi mo fe mu ki, ayo re han l’oju mi
Mo wole lab’ese re, mo wa l’ailewu
S/T: Gbese mi ti di tiRe, o so mi d’ominira
All: Mo nk’orin li ona mi, sile mi l’oke

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Kii se n’tori mi nikan, l’om’ Olorun s’etutu
O san gbese ese mi, l’or’igi oro
S/T: Ko ese re to O wa, ki O le fo fun bi sno
All: ‘wo yo ni ‘gbala pipe, ‘wo yo si l’ayo

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
On the resurrection morning
When all the dead in Christ shall rise
I’ll have a new body,
Praise the Lord I’ll have a new life
Sown in weakness, raised in power,
Ready to live in paradise I’ll have a new body,
Praise the Lord I’ll have a new life (O, yes)

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Glory, glory never sad
(I’ll have a new home of love eternal with the redeemed of God to stand)
There’ll be no more sorrow,
No more pain there’ll be no more strife (no strife)
In His likeness, I’ll be glad
(Yes, raised in the likeness of my Savior, ready to live in glory land)
I’ll have a new body, Praise the Lord I’ll have a new life (O,yes)

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
What a hallelujah morning when the last rump of God shall sound
I’ll have a new body,
Praise the Lord I’ll have a new life Graves all bursting,
Saints a shouting, heavenly beauty all around
I’ll have a new body, Praise the Lord I’ll have a new life

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
O happy day that fixed my choiceOn Thee, my Savior and my God!Well may this glowing heart rejoice,And tell its raptures all abroad.
Refrain:Happy day, happy day,When Jesus washed my sins away!He taught me how to watch and pray,And live rejoicing every day;Happy day, happy day,When Jesus washed my sins away!
2 O happy bond, that seals my vowsTo Him who merits all my love!Let cheerful anthems fill His house,While to that sacred shrine I move.
3 'Tis done, the great transaction's done;I am my Lord's and He is mine;He drew me and I followed on,Rejoiced to own the call divine.
4 Now rest, my long-divided heart,Fixed on this blissful center, rest;Here have I found a nobler part,Here heavenly pleasures fill my breast.
5 High heaven that hears the solemn vow,That vow renewed shall daily hear;Till in life's latest hour I bow,And bless, in death, a bond so dear.

englishTitle: I WILL NEVER FORGET THE DAY

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Long years ago when out in sin
I had no hope no peace within
Down on my knees in agony
I prayed to Jesus and He gladly set me free

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
I never shall forget the day
And all the burdens of my soul were rolled away
It made me happy, be glad and free
I'll sing and shout it, God means everything to me

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Now I can feel, him at my side
My fewer steps, he comes to guide
When trials come, he comforts me
To faith in him or sin I have a victory

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Oh, sinner come to Jesus now
At His dear feet just humbly bow
Confess to Him your every sin
He'll save and cleanse you, give you peace and joy within

number: 106. I WILL NEVER FORGET THE DAY

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: While Jesus whispers to you,Come, sinner, come!While we are praying for you,Come, sinner, come!Now is the time to own Him,Come, sinner, come!Now is the time to know Him,Come, sinner, come!

english.title: Verse  2
english.lyrics: Are you too heavy laden!Come, sinner, come!Jesus will bear your burden,Come, sinner, come!Jesus will not deceive you,Come, sinner, come!Jesus can now redeem you,Come, sinner, come!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Oh, hear His tender pleading,Come, sinner, come!Come and receive the blessing,Come, sinner, come!While Jesus whispers to you,Come, sinner, come!While we are praying for you,Come, sinner, come!

english.title: Verse 1
Chorus
english.lyrics:
Go into the field, gather in the yield,
Labor for the Lord, gain the great reward;
Reapers, the hours are speeding,
Jesus your help is needing Shall He call in vain?
Go into the field, reap the golden yield,
Heed His loving plea, true to Jesus be,
Love for the Master showing,
Work while the sun is glowing,
Gather now the grain. golden grain.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
There to shield and help you He will be
Fruitage of your labors you shall see;
His dear voice shall cheer you thru the day,
Singing a carol, O speed away.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Jesus will reward for what you do,
Life’s fair crown of glory give to you,
Perfect rest when ends life’s little day;
Reapers, get ready and speed away.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mase duro l’airi se ara,
E dide e sise fun Jesu
Ikore po osise ko to
Dide, e sise, ojo mbuse

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
S/A: E lo so itan, ti irapada,
Waasu ‘hinrere, na j’ake j’ado
Pe asako wa sodo Jesu, o npe o loni ojo nsure lo
E lo so ‘tan na, itan ‘hinrere
So ‘tan ife na…. ti Jesu Kristi
Se ise nigbati orun nran , pe elese wa si odo Jesu
Tenor: Lo……………………..
Pe asako wa sodo Jesu, o npe o loni ojo nsure lo (O npe o)
Lo………………………..
So ‘tan ife na…. ti Jesu Kristi
Se ise nigbati orun nran , pe elese wa si odo Jesu
Bass: E lo so itan na, so itan irapada ti Jesu Kristi,
Waasu ihinrere...
Pe asako wa sodo Jesu, o npe o loni ojo nsure lo (O npe o)
E lo so itan na, so itan ihinrere
So itan na loni, Jesu pe loni
Sise gbati orun nran pee lese wa si odo Jesu Kristi

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Jesu yo fun O lere pipe
Yo fi ade fun o ni ‘kehin
‘Wo yo ni isinmi nikehin
Sise, gbadura ojo mbuse

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
May my walk and my talk be pleasing to Thee,
Pleasing to Thee, pleasing to Thee;
May my walk and my talk be pleasing to Thee
Help me, Lord, to be pleasing to Thee.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
While I’m walking in Thy way, be with me, Lord, I pray,
Ever keep me in Thy will, and help me to obey.
May my walk and my talk be pleasing to Thee
Help me, Lord, to be pleasing to Thee.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
May the tho’ts that I think be pleasing to Thee,
Pleasing to Thee, pleasing to Thee;
May the tho’ts that I think be pleasing to Thee
Help me, Lord, to be pleasing to Thee.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
While I’m walking in Thy way, be with me, Lord, I pray,
Ever keep me in Thy will, and help me to obey.
May the tho’ts that I think be pleasing to Thee
Help me, Lord, to be pleasing to Thee.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
May the places I go be pleasing to Thee,
Pleasing to Thee, pleasing to Thee;
May the places I go be pleasing to Thee
Help me, Lord, to be pleasing to Thee.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
While I’m walking in Thy way, be with me, Lord, I pray,
Ever keep me in Thy will, and help me to obey.
May the places I go be pleasing to Thee
Help me, Lord, to be pleasing to Thee.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
May the things that I do be pleasing to Thee,
Pleasing to Thee, pleasing to Thee;
May the things that I do be pleasing to Thee,
Help me, Lord, to be pleasing to Thee.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
While I’m walking in Thy way, be with me, Lord, I pray,
Ever keep me in Thy will, and help me to obey.
May the things that I do be pleasing to Thee,
Help me, Lord, to be pleasing to Thee.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Jeki gbogbo irin mi je ‘tewogba
Je ‘tewogba, niwaju Re
Je ki gbogbo oro mi je ‘tewogba
Ran mi lowo ki nte O l’orun
Bi mo ti nrin l’ona Re, Oluwa pelu mi
Pa mi mo n’nu ife Re, ki ngboran s’ase Re
Jeki gbogbo oro mi je ‘tewogba,
Ran mi lowo ki nte O l’orun

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Je ki gbogbo ero mi je ‘tewogba
Je ‘tewogba mi waju Re
Je ki gbogbo ero mi je ‘tewogba
Ran mi lowo ki nte O l’orun
Bi mo ti nrin l’ona Re, Oluwa pelu mi
Pa mi mo n’nu ife Re, ki ngboran s’ase Re
Jeki gbogbo ero mi je ‘tewogba,
Ran mi lowo ki nte O l’orun

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Je ki gbogbo ona mi je ‘tewogba
Je ‘tewogba. Niwaju Re
Je ki gbogbo ona mi je ‘tewogba
Ram mi lowo ki nte O l’orun
Bi mo ti nrin l’ona Re, Oluwa pelu mi
Pa mi mo n’nu ife Re, ki ngboran s’ase Re
Jeki gbogbo ona mi je ‘tewogba,
Ran mi lowo ki nte O l’orun

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Je ki gbogbo ise mi je ‘tewogba
Je ‘tewogba niwaju Re
Je ko gbogbo ise mi je ‘tewogba
Ran  mi lowo ki nte O l’orun
Bi mo ti nrin l’ona Re, Oluwa pelu mi
Pa mi mo n’nu ife Re, ki ngboran s’ase Re
Jeki gbogbo ise mi je ‘tewogba,
Ran mi lowo ki nte O l’orun

englishTitle: WHEN I’VE GONE THE LAST MILE OF THE WAY
yorubaTitle: Nigbati Mo ba de Opin Irin Ajo mi

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
If I walk in the pathway of duty,If I work till the close of the day,I shall see the great King in His beautyWhen I've gone the last mile of the way.
Refrain:When I've gone the last mile of the way,I will rest at the close of the day,And I know there are joys that await meWhen I've gone the last mile of the way.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: If for Christ I proclaim the glad story,If I seek for His sheep gone astray,I am sure He will show me His gloryWhen I've gone the last mile of the way

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Here the dearest of ties we must sever,Tears of sorrow are seen ev'ry day,But no sickness, no sighing foreverWhen I've gone the last mile of the way.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: And if here I have earnestly striven,And have tried all His will to obey,'Twill enhance all the rapture of heavenWhen I've gone the last mile of the way.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Gba mo ba de opin ‘rin ajo mi
Gba mo ba s’eru wuwo ka ‘le
N go wo inu ogo Oba mi
Ngo f’ade dipo agbelebu
Ngo gbagbe gbogbo ibanuje mi
Yo je oro ayo ailopin
Ngo k’orin iyin Olugbala mi
‘Gba mob a d’opin ‘rin ajo mi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Gba mo ba…….. d’opin ajo mi
(Gba mo de, opin ajo mi)
Ngo r’Orun si sile
(Ngo ri Orun/2x)
Ngo si r’Olugbala
(Olugbala, Jesu Oba)
T’o gba mi to di pa mi mo
(….gba mi…. to pa mi mo)
‘Lekun orun yo si sile
(‘lekun orun yo si sile)
Yo ki ….
(…..kabo sile)
Yo wipe kaabo
(……………ayo titi)
ALL: Wo ‘nu ayo Oluwa Re
Gbat’o d’opin irin ajo Re (mimo s’orun)

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Opo ‘gba ‘banuje te ‘ri mi ba
Opo igba l’okan mi saare
Mo mo pe yo pa mi mo de opin
Ngo da ohun mi po m’awon t’orun
Ngo ko alleluya titi lai
Mo mo p’olugbala duro de mi
Gba mob a d’opin ‘rin ajo mi

number: 111. WHEN I’VE GONE THE LAST MILE OF THE WAY

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
O what a wonderful, wonderful day
Day I will never forget
After I'd wandered in darkness away
Jesus my Saviour I met
O what a tender, compassionate friend
He met the need of my heart
Shadows dispelling, with joy I am telling
He made all the darkness depart

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Heaven came down and glory filled my soul (filled my soul)
When at the cross my Saviour made me whole (made me whole)
My sins were washed away
And my night was turned to day
Heaven came down and glory filled my soul

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Born of the Spirit with life from above
Into God's fam'ly divine
Justified fully thru Calvary's love
O what a standing is mine
And the transaction so quickly was made
When as a sinner I came
Took of the offer of grace He did proffer
He saved me, O praise His dear name

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Now I've a hope that will surely endure
After the passing of time
I have a future in heaven for sure
There in those mansions sublime
And it's because of that wonderful day
When at the cross I believed
Riches eternal and blessings supernal
From His precious hand I received
Coda:
Heaven came down and glory filled my soul (filled my soul)

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
A! ojo iyanu ni ojo na
T’emi ki yo gbagbe lai
Bi mo ti sako lo n’nu okunkun
Mo pade olugbala
A! ore tooto abanidaro
O te okan mi l’orun
O le okunkun mi lo
Mo f’ayo k’orin pe o fun mi nu ‘segun

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Orun sokale, ogo k’okan mi (ogo kun okan mi)
Nib’agbelebu Jesu we mi mo (Jesu we mi mo)
O ko ese mi lo
O s’okun mi di ‘mole
Orun sokale, ayo k’okan mi

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
A tun mi bi nipa Emi Mimo
Sinu ebi Olorun
Igbala pipe nipa ife Re
Ife iyebiye ni
Etutu ti Jesu f’eje Re se
Bi mo ti wa s’odo Re
Mo r’owo etutu na alleluya
O gba mi o si da mi nde

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Mo n’ireti oye ainipekun
‘Gbat’aye yi ba koja
Ireti mi mbe li oke orun
Ni ile didan l’oke
Nitori Jesu f’eje Re ra mi
‘gba mo gba oro Re gbo
Mo r’opo ibukun gba lat’odo Re
Iyin f’eni mimo julo
Orun sokale, ayo k’okan mi

englishTitle: I’D RATHER BE AN OLD TIME CHRISTIAN

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: I’d rather be an old-time ChristianThan anything I knowThere’s nothing like an old-time ChristianWith a Christian love to showI’m walking in the grand old highwayAnd I’m telling ev’rywhere I goThat I’d rather be an old-time ChristianThan anything I know

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
In this world I’ve tried most ev’rythingAnd I’m happy now to sayThere is nothing like religionIn the good old fashioned wayI am walking in the old-time wayAnd I want the world to know that
I’d Rather be an old-time ChristianThan anything I know

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: There are many things I’d like to beAs my journey I pursueI have longed to be a leaderLike a mortal man would doI would like to be a millionaireWith a million to bestowBut I’d rather be an old-time ChristianThan anything I know

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: All the world is bright since I got rightNow I sing and pray and shoutAll my burdens have been liftedSince the Savior bro’t me outI will tell the world both far and nearAs I travel here belowThat I’d rather be an old-time ChristianThan anything I know

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Gbogbo ohun aye ti kuna ohun kan ko le kuna
Ko s’ohun to dun to ihinrere, igbagbo ayebaye yi
Mo nrin l’oju ona igbani, mo si fe k’aye mo pe
Mo yan lati je onigbagbo, ju ohun k’ohun lo

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ngo yan lati je onigbagbo (ju); Ju ohun aye lo
Ko s’ohun bi ‘gbagbo ayebaye
N’nu eyi ti ‘fe orun wa
Mo nrin l’oju ona igbani
Mo si so bi mo ti f’ayo lo
Pe mo yan lati je onigbagbo (ju)
Ju ohun k’ohun lo

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Opolopo ni aniyan mi, bi mo ti nrin ‘rin ajo yi
Mo fe lati je olori, bi awa eda ti nse
Emi nfe lati je oloro ti yo ni oro pupo
Sugbon mo yan lati j’onigbagbo, ju ohun aiye lo

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Bi Jesu ti gb’okan ese mi, ni mo ti nk’orin gbadua
Aniyan aye ti fo lo, b’Oluwa ti gb’okan mi
N go kede re fun araiye, bi mo ti nlo laye yi
Pe ngo yan lati je onigbagbo, ju ohun k’ohun lo.

number: 113. I’D RATHER BE AN OLD TIME CHRISTIAN

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Out of my bondage, sorrow and night,Jesus, I come, Jesus, I come;Into thy freedom, gladness, and light,Jesus, I come to thee.Out of my sickness into thy health,Out of my want and into thy wealth,Out of my sin and into thyself,Jesus, I come to thee.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Out of my shameful failure and loss,Jesus, I come, Jesus, I come;Into the glorious gain of thy cross,Jesus, I come to thee.Out of earth's sorrows into thy balm,Out of life's storms and into thy calm,Out of distress to jubilant psalm,Jesus, I come to thee.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Out of unrest and arrogant pride,Jesus, I come, Jesus, I come;Into thy blessed will to abide,Jesus, I come to thee.Out of my self to dwell in thy love,Out of despair into raptures above,Upward for aye on wings like a dove,Jesus, I come to thee.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Out of the fear and dread of the tomb,Jesus, I come, Jesus, I come;Into the joy and light of thy home,Jesus, I come to thee.Out of the depths of ruin untold,Into the peace of thy sheltering fold,Ever thy glorious face to behold,Jesus, I come to thee.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ninu ‘de ‘rora at’okunkun
Jesu mo de 2x
S’inu idande ‘mole ayo Re
Jesu mo w’odo Re
Ninu aisan mi si ‘lera Re
Ninu aini mi sin’ola Re
Lati ‘nu ese mo wa di tiRe
Jesu mo w’odo Re

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Lat’ nu itiju ainireti
Jesu mo de/2x
S’inu ogo ere agbelebu Re
Jesu mo wa odo Re
N’nu ‘rora aye si ‘tura Re
N’nu iji aye sinu isinmi Re
N’nu banuje si orin iyin
Jesu mo wa odo Re

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Lati ‘nu iberu ipo okuJesu mo de/2x
Sinu ogo ‘mole ile Re
Jesu mo wa odo Re
Ninu ogbun iparun jinjin
Sin’alafia l’abe iso Re
Ki nma w’oju ogo Re lailai
Jesu mo w’odo Re

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Thou Christ of burning, cleansing flame,Send the fire, send the fire, send the fire!Thy blood-bought gift today we claim,Send the fire, send the fire, send the fire!Look down and see this waiting host,Give us the promised Holy Ghost;We want another Pentecost,Send the fire, send the fire, send the fire!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: God of Elijah, hear our cry:Send the fire, send the fire, send the fire!To make us fit to live or die,Send the fire, send the fire, send the fire!To burn up every trace of sin,To bring the light and glory in,The revolution now begin,Send the fire, send the fire, send the fire!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: ’Tis fire we want, for fire we plead,Send the fire, send the fire, send the fire!The fire will meet our every need,Send the fire, send the fire, send the fire!For strength to ever do the right,For grace to conquer in the fight,For pow’r to walk the world in white,Send the fire, send the fire, send the fire!

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: To make our weak hearts strong and brave,Send the fire, send the fire, send the fire!To live a dying world to save,Send the fire, send the fire, send the fire!Oh, see us on Thy altar layOur lives, our all, this very day;To crown the off’ring now we pray,Send the fire, send the fire, send the fire!

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Kristi ina atunise, ran ina isoji sokale
Igbagbo wa ro mo eje Re, ran ina isoji sokale
Ijo nreti Olugbala, fun itujade Emi-mimo
A nfe pentikosti miran, ran ina isoji sokale

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Olorun Elijah gbo ‘gbe wa, ran ina isoji sokale
Ko mu wa soji fun ise Re, ran ina isoji sokale
Lati jo gbogbo ese wa, ko mu ‘mole Orun wole
Iyipade na ti bere, ran ina isoji sokale

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
A mbebe so wa ji l’oni, ran ina isoji sokale
Jo tan gbogbo ibanuje wa, ran ina isoji sokale
Agbara lati s’olotito, ore ofe lati segun
Pelu iwa mimo l’aye, ran ina isoji sokale
Da ‘na ‘soji Re si okan wa

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
So long I searched for life’s meaning
Enslaved by the world and my greed
But the door of my prison was opened by His light
For the ransom was paid I was freed

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
I’m free from the fears of tomorrow
I ‘m free from the guilt of my past
Oh oh I’ve traded my shackles for a glorious song
I’m free praise the Lord free at last

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
I am free from the guilt that I carry
From the dull empty life I’m set free
Fro when I met Jesus He made me complete
He forgot the foolish child I used to be

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mo ti nrin kiri n’nu ese
N’nu eru aniyan on owu
‘Gbaana ife Jesu gba okan mi
O san gbogbo gbese ese mi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Mo bo low’eru ati ‘foya
Mo bo lowo ebi ese
Mo k’orin ayo tori Jesu gba mi
Mo bo yin Oluwa, o gba mi

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Mo bo lowo eru aniyan
Jesu fun aye mi ni ‘tunmo
‘Gba mo pade Jesu o so mi d’otun
O gbagbe ‘rekoja mi atehinwa

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
If when you give the best of your service,Telling the world that the Savior is come;Be not dismayed when men don't believe you;He'll understand; and say, "Well done.
Refrain:Oh, when I come to the end of my journey,Weary of life and the battle is won;Carrying the staff and the cross of redemption,He'll understand and say, "Well done."

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Misunderstood, the Savior of sinners,Hung on the cross; He was God's only Son;Oh! hear Him call His Father in Heav'n,"Not my will, but Thine be done."

english.title: Verse  3
english.lyrics: If when this life of labor is ended,And the reward of the race you have run;Oh! the sweet rest prepared for faithfulWill be His blest and final, "Well done."

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: But if you try and fail in your trying,Hands sore and scarred from the work you've begun;Take up your cross, run quickly to meet Him;He'll understand; and say, "Well done."

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
‘Gba ti o ba nsise fun Oluwa
Ti o nkede pe Oluwa ti de
Mase foya bi a ko gba ihin na
Oluwa yo wipe “o seun” (omo mi)

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
‘Gba mo ba de opin irin ajo mi
Pelu ayo isegun l’okan mi
Ngo gba de ati opa isegun
Oluwa yo wipe “o seun” (omo mi)

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Nigbati ise wa l’aye ba ‘pin
Ao gba ere fun ise ti a se
‘sinmi didun mbe fun won asegun
Oluwa yo wipe “o seun” (omo mi)

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
I decided to leave home and family
and leave all the love I've known behind
never thinking of the heartaches I'll encounter
in search of the dream within my mind.
It didn't matter when I left whose heart was broken
I didn't care how many tears were cried
I was determined within my heart to have my way now
and seek for the wildest side of life.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Shattered dreams (2x)
Nothing I planned has turned out right
Shattered dreams (2x)
My life without Christ is shattered dreams.
Heading home now I need my father's mercy
I have sinned and I know I've brought disgrace
I will ask him to forgive me though unworthy
I'll be so glad just to look upon his face.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Heading home now, I need my father’s mercy
I have sinned and I know I‘ve brought disgrace
I will ask Him to forgive me though unworthy
I’ll be so glad just to look upon His face

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Asan ni, ofo ni
Gbogbo ‘hun mo gbekele kuna (kuna)
Asan ni, ofo ni
Aye ti ko ni Jesu ofo ni

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mo pinnu lati fi ‘le at’ona sile
Mo ko gbogbo ohun yi ko ti fe
Lai ‘ronu awon isoro ti mo ba pade
Mo wa ohun ti ko ‘nu kiri

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Nko fe mo bi mo ba enikan ninu je
Nko fe mo okan ti  mo pa l’ekun
Mo pinnu l’okan mi lati mase ohun ti mo fe
Ki nje igbadun aye d’opin

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Nisisiyi ti mo wa ‘le mo fe dariji
Mo ti se pupo mo si je alaiye
Mo mbebeb pe ko dariji emi elese
Mo l’ayo lati r’oju rere Re

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
He's still working on me
To make me what I need to be
It took him just a week to make the moon and stars
The sun and the earth and Jupiter and Mars
How loving and patient He must be
'Cause He's still workin' on me

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
There really ought to be a sign upon my heart
Don't judge him yet, there's an unfinished part
But I'll be better just according to His plan
Fashioned by the Master's loving hands

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
In the mirror of His word
Reflections that I see
Makes me wonder why He never gave up on me
But He loves me as I am and helps me when I pray
Remember He's the potter, I'm the clay

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Eri ti o daju wa l’okan mi sibe
Mase daa lejo yoo pari ise naa
Yo se mi pe gege bi gbogbo eto Re
Ife Jesu yo se l’aye mi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
O nsise l’ori mi….. k’emi le wulo f’ogo Re
O gba Olorun l’ose kan lati da osupa,
Irawo, ati gbogb’eda aye
Wo bi ‘seun ‘fe Re ti po to
O nsise l’ori mi

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
N’nu digi oro Re, Gbogb’ohun ti mo ri
O ya mi lenu pe k fi sile lo
Sugbon o f’eran mi o nran mi lowo n’nu adura
On yo se asepe aye mi
121 I’M WINGING MY WAY BACK HOME
(Mo Nfiye fo lo Ile)

items.lyrics:

englishTitle: I’M WINGING MY WAY BACK HOME

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Down deep in my soul (Down deep in my soul) a melody rings (a melody rings);I’m winging my way (I’m winging) back (my way back) home (home).A sinner is saved (a sinner is saved); my spirit now sings (my spirit now sings).I’m winging my way (I’m winging) back (my way back) home (home).

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: I’m climbing each day (Every day)  Since Jesus is mine (Truly mine);I travel the road (Narrow road)  To glory divine (To glory divine).The way is called straight (The way is called straight)that enters the gate (that enters the gate);I’m winging my way (I’m winging) back (my way back) home (home).

english.title: Verse  2
english.lyrics: A wonderful time (A wonderful time) is waiting ahead (is waiting ahead);I’m winging my way (I’m winging) back (my way back) home (home).I mean to be there (I mean to be there); from sin I have fled (from sin I have fled).I’m winging my way (I’m winging) back (my way back) home (home).

number: 121. I’M WINGING MY WAY BACK HOME

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
I was kneeling one day asking God to forgive me
I was deep in despair, had no peace within
I surrendered my all unto Jesus my savior
then the glory came down I was saved from sin

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
O the glory did roll, I was happy and free
I had heard a sweet voice speaking pardon to me
such a wonderful joy I was given within
when the savior in love saved me from all sin

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
I will praise his dear name for the wonderful victory
and with joy in my heart all along the way
I am longing see heaven's glorious city
and to hear the Lord call "Come and live for aye"

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
I'm a millionaire I'm a millionaire
My Father is rich in houses
And lands and I'm His heir I am His heir
I'm a millionaire I'm a millionaire
I'm a happy millionaire

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
I am now a child of God
I've been washed in Jesus' blood
Making me an heir
To wealth beyond compare
So while here I press along
Daily this shall be my song
I'm a happy millionaire

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
I had rather serve my Lord
Feast upon His holy Word
Than to own the world
With all its jewels rare
By His Spirit I am led
And on milk and honey fed
I'm a happy millionaire

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Lord I'd rather worship Thee
With the people who are free
Than the pleasures of this world
A season share
For my Father is the King
And His praise I'll ever sing
I'm a happy millionaire

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Since salvation now is mine
For the Lord I'll shout and shine
Tho' I have to go thru life
On meager fare
Rich in grace beyond recall
For my Father owns it all
I'm a happy millionaire

englishTitle: I JUST KEEP TRUSTING MY LORD

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
I just keep trusting my Lord
As I walk a long
I just keep trusting my Lord
And He gives me a song
Though the storm clouds darken the sky
O'er the heav'nly trail
I just keep trusting my Lord,
He will never fail

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
He's a faithful friend
such a faithful friend
I can count on Him
To the very end
Though the storm clouds darken the sky
O'er the heav'nly trail
I just keep trusting my Lord
He will never fail

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
I just keep trusting my Lord
On the narrow way
I just keep trusting my Lord
As He leads each day
Though the road is weary at times
And I'm sad and blue
I just keep trusting my Lord
He will see me through

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
I just keep trusting my Lord
As I walk along
I just keep trusting my Lord
And He gives me a song
Though the storm clouds darken the sky
O'er the heav'nly trail
I just keep trusting my Lord,
He will never fail.

number: 125. I JUST KEEP TRUSTING MY LORD

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
There's a sweet, sweet Spirit in this place,And I know that it's the Spirit of the Lord;There are sweet expressions on each face,And I know they feel the presence of the Lord.
Refrain:Sweet Holy Spirit, Sweet heavenly Dove,Stay right here with us, filling us with Your love.And for these blessings we lift our hearts in praise;Without a doubt we'll know that we have been revived,When we shall leave this place.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: There are blessings you cannot receiveTill you know Him in His fullness and believe;You're the one to profit when you say,"I am going to walk with Jesus all the way."

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: If you say He saved you from your sin,Now you're weak, you're bound and cannot enter in,You can make it right if you will yield,You'll enjoy the Holy Spirit that we feel.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Emi Olorun mbe nihinyi

Mo si mo pe Olorun mbe laarin wa

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: I heard the angels sing "Glory Hallelujah!"

english.title: chorus
english.lyrics:
way up high;
I heard the angels sing "Praise the name of Jesus!"
Singing in God's choir in the sky.
I heard a thousand trumpets sounding out His Glory,
Telling the story how He came to earth to die;
I heard a million voices praise the name of Jesus,
Singing in God's choir in the sky.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
I heard the glorious song coming out of Heaven,
The sweetest music ever heard;
I heard a mighty song sung by all the angels,
My soul thrilled at ev'ry loving word.
I heard a thousand trumpets sounding out His Glory,
Telling the story how He came to earth to die;
I heard a million voices praise the name of Jesus,
Singing in God's choir in the sky.

english.title: chorus
english.lyrics:
ended,
They shouted out a glad Amen!
I fell down on my knees, prayed that when in heaven,
I would hear that choir once again.
I heard a thousand trumpets sounding out His Glory,
Telling the story how He came to earth to die;
I heard a million voices praise the name of Jesus,
Singing in God's choir in the sky.

items.lyrics:
Mo gb’awon Angel’ ko O, ogo alleluya
Bi ‘ro ti dun l’oke kikan
Mo gb’awon Angel’ ko orin iyin l’oke
Yin oruko Jesu titi
