yorubaTitle: Orin Ti o dun Julo ti mo mo

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
I've heard them sing "He Paid The Price"
And "Jesus Bore It All"
I've heard them sing "I'm Coming Home"
And "Hear The Master's Call"
I've heard them sing the modern songs
And songs of long ago
But "Amazing Grace, How Sweet The Sound"
Is the sweetest song I know

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Amazing grace (Amazing grace, how sweet the sound)
How sweet the sound (Oh how sweet is the sound)
No sweeter song (sweeter song, sweeter song)
Could e'er be found (In this life could be found)
I've heard of a fountain (Heard of the dear Savior's blood)
Filled with blood (That washed us white, white as snow)
But "Amazing Grace" ("Amazing Grace, How Sweet The Sound")
Is the sweetest song I know

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
It was the song my mother sang
In sweet and humble voice
Like music from the world above
It made my soul rejoice
Its soothing words and melody
Like rippling waters flow
Oh, "Amazing Grace, How Sweet The Sound"
Is the sweetest song I know
Amazing grace (Amazing grace, how sweet the sound)
How sweet the sound (Oh how sweet is the sound)
No sweeter song (sweeter song, sweeter song)
Could e'er be found (In this life could be found)
I've heard of a fountain (Heard of the dear Savior's blood)
Filled with blood (That washed us white, white as snow)
But "Amazing Grace" ("Amazing Grace, How Sweet The Sound")
Is the sweetest song I know

Won ko l’Orun pe Jesu ku

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
There are some things
I may not know
There are some places
Oh Lord, I cannot go
But I am sure, Of this one thing
That God is real, For I can feel
Him in my soul

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Yes, God is real
Oh, He's real in my soul
Yes, God is real
For He has washed
And made me whole
Ooh, his love for me
Is just like pure gold, oh Lord
My God is real
For I can feel
Him in my soul

items.lyrics:
Ohun kan wa, ti nko le so
Ibi kan wa ti nko le lo
Sugbon mo mo ohun kan pe
Olorun mbe, mo mo daju nin’okan mi

‘fere si mi….. ju wura lo
Olorun mbe n’nu okan mi, mo mo daju

N ko le so iriri re
‘Gba Jesu we ese mi nu
Layi ‘gbana t’o ti gba mi
Emi le so ti agabara nla Re fun o

english.title: Verse  1
english.lyrics:
The things that I love and hold dear to my heart
Are just borrowed they're not mine at all
Jesus only let me use them to brighten my life
So remind me, remind me dear Lord.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Roll back the curtain of memory now and then
Show me where you brought me from and where I could have been
Just remember I'm a human and human's forget
So remind me, remind me dear Lord

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Nothing good have I done to deserve God's own Son
I'm not worthy of the scars in His hands
Yet he chose the road to Calv'ry to die in my stead
Why He loved me I can't understand.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Awon ohun ti mo fe, to dara, f’okan mi
Ki nse t’emi, won kii se t’emi
Sugbon Jesu je kin lo won fun didara mi
Ma wi fun mi, ma je ki ngbagbe

items.lyrics:
Ma wi, Oluwa lati wa fun ranti
B’o ti yo mi jade kuro ninu ese mi
Jo ranti eda mi, eda ma ngbagbe

Ese2:
Ko s’ohun ti mo se lati ye fun Jesu
Emi ko ye fun ife Re si mi
Sibe o lo si Kalfari lati ku fun mi

englishTitle: FAITH IN GOD CAN MOVE MOUNTAINS
yorubaTitle: Igbagbo Ninu Olorun Nsi Oke Nidi

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Have you prayers that seem to be unanswered?Anxious moments, trials hard to bear?Have faith in His promise unfailing God will hear,He will answer your prayer.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Faith in God can move a mighty mountain,Faith can calm the troubled sea;Faith can make a desert like a fountain,Faith can bring the victory.
Are there loved ones yet for whom you're burdened?Lonely nights spent bowed in fervent prayer?God sees ev'ry tear and your heartache,So just cast upon Him all your care.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Then keep faith, although the way be rugged.Do not doubt His deep, unfailing love.Sufficient each day for the trialIs His promise of grace from above.

items.lyrics:
Adura re ha ni idena bi?
Ni akoko isoro aye
Ro mo ileri Re ti ki iye
Olorun yo gbo

Igbagbo lo nsi oke ni ipo
O nm’okun riru dake
O nso asale d’orisun omi
Igbagbo l’o le segun

O ha ni ore t’o ni isoro
T’o ngbadura fun t’osan t’oru
Olorun ti ri omije re
Sako gbogb’aniyan re le

items.title: Ese 3

Sa gbogbo b’ona na tile soro
Mase siyemeji ife Re
O to fun gbogbo idanwo
Or’ofe Re lat’oke wa

number: 131. FAITH IN GOD CAN MOVE MOUNTAINS

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
On life’s pathway I am never lonely,My Lord is with me, my Lord divine;Ever present guide, I trust Him only,No longer lonely, for He is mine.
Refrain:No longer lonely, no longer lonely,For Jesus is the friend of friends to me;No longer lonely, no longer lonely,For Jesus is the friend of friends to me.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: I shall not be lonely in my sorrow,He will sustain me until the end;Darkest night He turns to brightest morrow,No longer lonely! He is my friend.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: I shall not be lonely in the valleyTho’ shadows gather, I will not fear;He has promised ever to uphold me,No longer lonely! He will be near.

items.lyrics:
O pelu mi ni ona ajo mi

yorubaTitle: Ore ofe ni yo ma je Orin Iyin mi

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Amazing grace shall always be my song of praise.
For it was grace that bought my liberty,
I do not know just why He came to love me so.
He looked beyond my fault and saw my need.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
I shall forever lift mine eyes to Calvary,
To view the cross, where Jesus died for me
How marvelous the grace that caught my falling soul
He looked beyond my fault and saw my need.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
If not for grace, my soul would be a drifting ship
With no safe harbor from the angry waves
But Calvary's cross shines brightly through the darkest storm
And just in time, His mercy rescues me!

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ore-ofe ni yo je orin iyin mi
Or’ofe l’o ra ominira mi
Nko mo ‘idi re ti o fi feran mi to be
O wo koj’ asise mi o r’aini mi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Emi yo gbe oju mi soke
Lati wo Jesu ti o ku fun mi
A! bi ore-ofe yi ti dun pupo to
O wo koj’asise mio r’aini mi

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ore-ofe iyanu, ife Olorun
O dun ju ohun t’aye le fun ni
O nfi ayo si okan mi l’ojojumo
O wo koj’asise mio r’aini mi

englishTitle: WHY WORRY WHEN YOU CAN PRAY
yorubaTitle: Eese ti o fi Se Aniyan Nigbati o le Gbadura

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Why worry when you can pray?
Trust Jesus, He’ll be your stay;
Don’t be a “doubting Thomas”,
Rest fully on His promise,
Why worry, worry, worry, worry, When you can pray.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Why worry when you can call?
Trust Jesus, He is your all. Don’t be a “doubting Thomas”,
Rest fully on His promise
Why worry, worry, worry, worry, When you can call.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Leekan rim o ni ‘damu
‘tori ohun gbogbo
Emi ko maa ngbadura
Tabi ki maa k’orin
L’ojo ti wahala mi dabi oke giga
Mo gb’ohun kan ninu mi
T’o f’okan mi bale

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ko si ‘soro fun mi mo
Bi wahala ba de
Ngo mu won to Jesu lo
Oun yo gbe gbogbo re
Ore ni ‘yonu ba de ba ninu aye
Lo asiri adurat’o wa fun gbogb’eda

number: 134. WHY WORRY WHEN YOU CAN PRAY

englishTitle: THERE’S NOTHING TOO HARD FOR GOD
yorubaTitle: Ko si Ohun ti o Soro fun Olorun

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
There is nothing too hard for my God to work out,
There is nothing too hard for Him.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
If you've got a problem that's too hard for you to solve,
And a burden that's to hard for you to bear;
The answer my friends is not your plan,
But it's when you place it in the Master's hand.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Sometimes the road you travel,
Seems like you're coming to a dead-end,
Cause you're trying to walk it without Him.
With Jesus you're a winner, because He steps right in on time
That's when He'll turn your dead-end into a finish line.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
‘Wo ha ni ‘soro ti enikan ko mo?
Gbe isoro re to Olugbala
K’yo ta o nu; gbe sile l’abe ese Re (o daju)

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
L’ori oke, ni petele O pelu re
Yo pelu re ni gbogb’ona re
Wa s’odo Re; on ki yo fi o sile (beeni)

number: 135. THERE’S NOTHING TOO HARD FOR GOD

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Is your burden heavy as you bear it all alone?
Does the road you travel, harbor dangers yet unknown?
Are you growin' weary in the struggle of it all?
Jesus will help you with all his name you call

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
He's always there hearing every prayer, faithful and true
Walking by our side, in his love we hide all the day through
When you get discouraged just remember what to do
Reach out to Jesus, he's reaching out to you

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Is the life you're living filled with sorrow and despair?
Does the future press you with its worry and its scare?
Are you tired and jealous, have you almost your way?
Jesus will help you, just talk to him today

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
O ngbo adura ni igba gbogbo, Olooto ni
Ninu ife Re ni o mba war in nigbagbogbo
‘Gbat’o so ‘reti nu, ranti ohun t’o le se
Ke pe Jesu oun yo si, ran o lowo

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Okan re ha wuwo, t’o sin da gbe eru re
Oma ti iwo nrin ha nba o ninu je bi?
Aare ha de ba o l’abe eru wuwo na
Jesu yo ran o lowo b’o ba ke pe E

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Aye re ha kun fun isoro ati ‘foya
O ha nse aniyan fun ojo ola re bi?
Aare ha m’okan re, ko si s’oluranlowo?
Jesu yo ran o lowo ke peE l’oni

englishTitle: GIVE OF YOUR BEST TO THE MASTER
yorubaTitle: Fi eyi ti o Dara Ju Fun Oluwa

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Give of your best to the master,
Give of the strength of your youth;
Throw your soul’s fresh, glowing ardor
Into the battle for truth.
Jesus has set the example
Dauntless was He, young and brave;
Give Him your loyal devotion,
Give Him the best that you have.
Refrain
Give of your best to the master,
Give of the strength of your youth;
Clad in salvation’s full armor,
Join in the battle for truth.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Give of your best to the Master,
Give Him first place in your heart;
Give Him first place in your service,
Consecrate every part.
Give, and to you shall be given –
God His beloved Son gave;
Gratefully seeking to serve Him,
Give Him the best that you have.

english.title: Verse 3

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
F’ohun t’o dara ju fun Jesu
F’agbarAa odo re Fun-UN
Fi gbogbo agbara re ja
Ija rere f’otito
Jesu Kristi ni aperet’o fi igboya ja d’opin
Sin-IN pelu okan otito
Fun l’ohun t’o dara julo

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
F’ohun t’o dara ju fun Jesu
F’agbara odo re fun-UN
Gbe ihamora ‘gbala wo
J’ija rere f’otito

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
F’ohun t’o dara ju fun Jesu
Je k’O leke okan re
Fi si waju n’nu isin re
Fi ohun gbogbo rubo
F’aye re fun yi o bukun
Baba f’omo Re fun wa
Wa oju Re lati ma sin
Fun l’ohun t’o dara ju-lo

number: 137. GIVE OF YOUR BEST TO THE MASTER

yorubaTitle: Fifi Ohun Gbogbo Sile Lati Tele Jesu

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Leaving all to follow Jesus,Turning from the world away,Stepping out upon his promise,All I have is his today

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Leaving all to follow Jesus,Turning from the world away,Stepping out upon his promise,All I have is his today.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Naught reserving, on the altarAll I lay, and wait the hourWhen the fire from heav'n descendingShall attest his glorious pow'r.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Taking up the cross for Jesus,Glad for him to suffer shame,All my gain I count but lossesFor the glory of his name.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Praise his precious name foreverThat his blood hath made me free;Now my soul shall joy to tell itThro' the long eternity.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ngo fi gbgogb’aye mi fun Jesu
Ngo fi ‘lep’aye sile
Ng di ile ‘yebiye Re mu
Tor’Oun l’ohun ti mo ni

items.lyrics:

items.lyrics:
Ngo f’ohun gbogbo l’ori pepe
Mo fi lele ni ‘teriba
‘Gbat’ina t’oke Orun bo sile
Mo fi ‘yin f’oruko Re

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Far in the depths and death nearing,
Nobody’s pray’rs I am hearing,
Now for my soul I am fearing,
O Lord please save me now (save me now).

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Jesus hear me (I am lone and sad),
Be thou near me (lost the joy I had),
Lord please save my poor, lost,
dying soul (Lord please save my dying soul);
Satan ever (Satan tempts me ever)
leaves me never (leaves me never more),
Wildly billows around me now roll (Wild the billows round me roll);
There is no other way to reach heaven ( There’s no other way to heaven),
‘Tis only thru Thy most blessed control (Only thru Thy blest control);
Lord I need Thee (Lord I need Thee now),
Master heed me (as I humbly bow),
Lord please save my poor, lost, dying soul ( Lord please save my dying soul).

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
In Thy great book’s precious pages,
I read of saints and the sages,
Lifted from sin thru the ages,
O Lord please save me now (save me now).

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Touch me, Thou canst, sin relieving,
Heal my sick soul, no more grieving,
Have mercy my soul receiving,
O Lord please save me now (save me now).
Coda:
Lord please save my poor, lost, dying soul (Lord please save my dying soul),
Dying, dying soul (My dying soul).

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
N’nu ogbon ni bebe iku
Nko gb’ohun ebe eni kan
Okan mi yo ha segbe bi?
Oluwa jo gba mi (l’oni yi)

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
A: ‘Banuje bo mi, jowo sun mo mi
Others: Jesu- gba- mi- wa sunmo mi
A: Jesu gb’okan osi mi la
Others: Jesu –gba- okan osi mi la

All: Oluwa wa mi – jo sun – mo mi – Jesu
Gba okan osi mi la.

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ninu iwe iye Re ni
T’a k’oruko asegun si
Won bo lowo ese aye
Won wo ‘nu ogo lo (titi aye)

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
F’owo to mi m’ese kuro
Wo mi san ki ‘rora fo lo
Fun mi l’aanu t’okan mi nfe
Oluwa jo gba mi (loni yi)

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Pleading to the blessed Savior please
Many years ago down on my knees
(I made a covenant) made a covenant with my Lord
Then I promised if He'd save my soul
I would serve Him while the Ages roll
I made a covenant, (made a covenant) with my Lord (with my Lord)

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
(I've made a) covenant with my Lord,
(made a) covenant with my Lord
(Yes, I) promised to obey His holy word (O glory hallelujah from my)
Troubled burdened soul, (all my) sin clouds He did roll
I made a covenant, (made a covenant) with my Lord

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
I should never fear those storms may beat,
I'll be refuged at my Savior's feet
(I made a covenant) made a covenant with my Lord
He's the master of the wind and wave,
He will own a power the soul to save
I made a covenant, (made a covenant) with my Lord (with my Lord)

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Lowly things of earth have bought and sold,
I have something here worth far than gold
(I made a covenant) made a covenant with my Lord
It has brought me freedom from my sin,
Peace and comfort joy and hope within
I made a covenant, (made a covenant) with my Lord (with my Lord)

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Back to the Bible, the true living word,
Sweetest old story that ever was heard;
Back to the joy life my soul longs to know,
Bethel is calling, and I must go.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Back to Bethel I must go,
Back where the rivers of sweet waters flow,
Back to the true life my soul longs to know,
Bethel is calling, and I must go.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Back to the beautiful path I once trod,
Back to the church and the people of God;
Out of the cold world of sin and its woe
Bethel is calling, and I must go.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Back to the giving of money and time,
Back to the life of contentment sublime,
Back to protection the world cannot know,
Bethel is calling, and I must go.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Back to the prayer life in Christ I once knew,
Back to its beautiful life cleansing dew,
Back to help others to conquer each foe,
Bethel is calling, and I must go.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Pada si Beteli or’Olorun
Oro Olorun at’ayebaye
Ngo pada s’aye ti mo ti ni ri
Beteli npe mi, em’o pada

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Pada s’odo Olorun
Pada s’orisun t’omi iye nsan
Pada si ‘gbes’aye iwa mimo
Beteli npe mi, em’o pada

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ngo pada s’ona didan atijo
S’odo awon eniyan Olorun
Mo ko aye ese sile lailai
Ngo lo gbadura ni Beteli

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ngo lo owo ati akoko mi
Ati aye mi fun ife Jesu
Ngo wa l’abe ipamo Olorun
Ngo lo gbadura ni Beteli

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Ngo pada si ‘gbes’aye adura
K’Emi Mimo le ma we mi mo lau
Ki nle ba elomii segun ota
Ngo lo gbadura ni Beteli

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
When I was drifting out in sin
I had no peace, no joy within
But Jesus came and made me glad
The dearest friend I ever had

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
He saved my soul; oh, bless His name
I'll never forget the day He came
He makes me glad when I am sad
The dearest friend I ever had

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
O sinner come to Jesus now
And at His feet just humbly bow
He'll save your soul and make you glad
The dearest friend you'll ever have

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Like the woman at the well, I was seeking
For things that could not satisfy.
And then I heard my Savior speaking—
“Draw from My well that never shall run dry.”

english.title: Chorus
Verse 2
english.lyrics:
There are millions in this world who are seeking
For pleasures earthly goods afford.
But none can match the wondrous treasure
That I find in Jesus Christ my Lord.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
So my brother if the things that this world gives you
Leave hungers that won’t pass away,
My blessed Lord will come and save you
If you kneel to Him and humbly pray—

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Bi obinrin l’eba kanga Jakobu
Okan mi npongbe fun ‘ranwo
Mo gbo ti Jesu Kristi nwipe
Wa mu ninu omi iye l’ofe

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Oluwa mi, jo gbo igbe mi
Jo tan oungbe okan mi l’oni
Ounje orun, ma to mi titi laelae
F’agbara Re kun mi kin di pipe

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Opo lo npongbe fun ohun aye yi
Eyi ti ki nteni l’orun
Sugbon okan mi nfe isura
Ti Jesu ti pese fun mi l’Orun

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ore afo kan ha mbe n’nu okan re
Ti ‘lepa aye ko le di
Olorun se tan lati gba o
Bi o ba le kepe fun iranwo
Tune: Ring Out the Merry Bells
Okan mi nyo n’nu olugbala mi
Enit’o je iye fun mi
Ohun ife Re dun pupo lati gbo
Adun ni lati r’oju Re

O gbe mi wa si ‘le l’ori apa Re

Or’ofe Re nsan bi odo
Emi Re nto mi o sin se itunu
O si mba mi gbe l’ojojo
Emi yi-o dabi Re ni ojo kan
Ngo s’eru wuwo mi kale
Titi di igbana ngo je oloto
Ni sise oso f’ade Re

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: My heart can sing when I pause to rememberA heartache here is but a stepping stoneAlong a trail that's winding always upwardsThis troubled world is not my final home

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: The things of earth will dim and lose its valueIf we recall they're borrowed for a whileAnd all the things of earth that cause a heart troubleRemember there will only be a smile

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: But until then, my heart shall go on singingBut until then, with joy, I'll carry onUntil my eyes behold the cityUntil that day God calls me home

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Okan mi le k’orin ‘gba mi ba ranti
Pe ;’soro aye yi wa fun ‘gba kan (die)
L’oju ona to lo si ile l’oke
Aye osi yi ki se ile mi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Titi ‘gbana okan mi yo ma k’orin
Ngo si ma f’ayo rin lo lona na
Titi ‘gbana ngo ma w’ona fun ‘lu na
T’Olorun yo pe mi wa ‘le

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Gbogbo ohun aye ni yi o segbe
Tori gbogbo won wa fun ‘gba di-e
Awon ohun ti o nba wa l’okan je
A o l’ayo ‘gba t’a ba ranti won

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Aye yi pelu opo wahala Re
Le mu aro ati ‘banuje wa
Okan wa yi sa wa fun igba di-e
Nigbose yo pada si ‘le l’oke
Option 2

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Titi ‘gbana, okan mi yo ma k’orin
Titi ‘gbana, ngo ma te siwaju
Tit ‘gbana ti won de ‘lu ologo
Ti Jesu yo mu mi re ‘le

englishTitle: MAKE ME A CHANNEL OF BLESSING

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Is your life a channel of blessing?Is the love of God flowing through you?Are you telling the lost of the Savior?Are you ready His service to do?

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Make me a channel of blessing today,Make me a channel of blessing, I pray;My life possessing, my service blessing,Make me a channel of blessing today.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Is your life a channel of blessing?Are you burdened for those who are lost?Have you urged upon those who are strayingThe Savior who died on the cross?

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Is your life a channel of blessing?Is it daily telling for Him?Have you spoken the word of salvationTo those who are dying in sin?

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: We cannot be channels of blessingIf our lives are not free from known sin;We will barriers be and a hindranceTo those we are trying to win.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Aye re ha j’orisun ibukun
Ife Olorun nhan l’aye re?
O ha nso f’asko nipa Jesu,
O ha s’etan lati sise fun Un

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Fi mi s’orisun ibukun l’oni
Fi mi s’orisun ‘bukun mo mbebe
Gba gbogb’aye mi, bukun isin mi
Fi mi s’orun ibukun l’oni

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Aye re ha j’orisun ibukun
O ha ni ‘gbogb’okan f’asako
O ti rohin fun awon ti nsegbe
Olugbala t’o ku l’or’igi

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Aye re ha j’orisun ibukun
O nso nipa Re lojojumo
O ha nso ohun ti igbala je
Fun awon t nku ninu ese

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
A ko le je orison ibukun
Ti aye wa ba kun fun ese
A o je oludena f’asako
At’awon ti a ba fe jere

number: 149. MAKE ME A CHANNEL OF BLESSING

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Jesus! what a Friend for sinners!Jesus! Lover of my soul;Friends may fail me, foes assail me;He, my Savior, makes me whole.Hallelujah! what a Savior!Hallelujah! what a Friend!Saving, helping, keeping, loving,He is with me to the end.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Jesus! what a Strength in weakness!Let me hide myself in Him;Tempted, tried, and sometimes failing,He, my Strength, my vict'ry wins.Hallelujah! what a Savior!Hallelujah! what a Friend!Saving, helping, keeping, loving;He is with me to the end.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Jesus! what a Help in sorrow!While the billows o'er me roll,Even when my heart is breaking,He, my Comfort, helps my soul.Hallelujah! what a Savior!Hallelujah! what a Friend!Saving, helping, keeping, loving;He is with me to the end.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Jesus! what a Guide and Keeper!While the tempest still is high,storms about me, night o'ertakes me,He, my Pilot, hears my cry.Hallelujah! what a Savior!Hallelujah! what a Friend!Saving, helping, keeping, loving;He is with me to the end.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics: Jesus! I do now receive Him,more than all in Him I find;He hath granted me forgiveness;I am His, and He is mine!Hallelujah! what a Savior!Hallelujah! what a Friend!Saving, helping, keeping, loving;He is with me to the end.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ore wo l’elese ni bi
Jesu oluf’okan mi
Awon ore mi le da mi
Olugbala mi yo gba mi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Alleluya! Olugbala
Ore wo l’o dabi Re
O gba mi, O ndabo bo mi
O wa pelu mi d’opin

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Jesu! agbara mi n’n’aare
Je ki nsala s’aya Re
N’nu ‘danwo bi mo ba kuna
On l’odi agbara mi

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Jesu ‘tunu n’nu ‘banuje
‘Gbati igbi ‘danwo de
‘Gbati okan mi poruru
On ni ‘tunu f’okan mi

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Jesu! Amona, abo mi
Nigba t’iji nfe s’oke
Ti ona mi ba s’okunkun
Amona mi, gbogbo mi

items.title: Ese 5
items.lyrics:
Mo gba Jesu nisisinyi
N’nu Re mo r’ohun gbogbo
O ti dari ese ji mi
Emi je tiRe titi

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Jesu or’awon elese, Jesu oluf’okan mi
Awon ore mi le da mi, olugbala mi yo gba mi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Halleluyah Olugbala! Ore wo lo dabi Re?
O gba mi, o nso mi, o dabobo mi
O wa pelu mi d’opin

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Jesu! Agbara mi ninu are, je ki nsala s’aya Re
Ninu danwo bi mo ba kuna, oun l’odi agbara mi

items.title: Ese 5
items.lyrics:
Mo ngba Jesu nisisinyi, ninu re mo r’ohun gbogbgo
O ti dari ese ji mi, emi je tire nikan

yorubaTitle: Bi Olorun Ba Wa Fun Wa

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Rejoice in the Lord! O let His mercy, cheer,He sunders the bands that enthral;Redeemed by His blood, why should we ever fear,Since Jesus is our “all in all?
Refrain:“If God be for us, if God be for us,If God be for us,Who can be against us,Who, who, who?Who can be against us, against us?”

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Be strong in the Lord! Rejoicing in His might,Be loyal and true day by day;When evils assail, be valiant for the right,And He will be our strength, our stay.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Confide in His Word, His promises so sure;In Christ they are “yea, and amen”;Tho’ earth pass away, they ever shall endure,‘Tis written o’er and o’er again.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Abide in the Lord, secure in His control,‘Tis life everlasting begun;To pluck from His hand the weakest, trembling soul,It never, never can be done!

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
E yo ‘nu Oluwa, e so ti aanu Re
Bi o se tu onde sile
O f’eje ra wa, awa o se beru
Nigbati Jesu nbe fun wa

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
B’Olorun wa fun wa/3x
T’a si jeti Jesu
Ao(Ao)…….ao (ao)……. Ao (Awa ni yo segun)
A-o segun gbogb’ogun esu

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
E j’alagbara, e yo n’nu ipa Re
Jesu j’Olooto l’ojojo
‘Gbati ‘danwo de ti igbi nyi lu o
Oun yo je agbara fun O

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Gbekele Jesu ileri Re daju
Gboran si gbogbo ase Re
B’are nfe mu o, t’oan re fe damu
Ro mo Jesu, wo yo segun

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mo mo pe Baba mi orun
Mo ‘soro t’o wa l’ona mi
On le si le mu won kuro
Mo si le s’okun di ‘mole

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
O mo…………. O mo
Isudede t’yo dena mi
O mo ………….o mo
O ma nmu iji lile ro.

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Mo mo pe Baba mi orun mo
Mo ororo fun ogbe mi
Owo ife Re mimo mi
O wo ogbe okan mi san

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Mo mo pe Baba mi orun mo
Nko le ko ota ni loju
Sugbon yo ma gbe mi ni ‘ja
Yo gbe mi ro titi d’opin

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Mo mo pe Baba mi orun
Mo opin irin ajo mi
Olufe mi je k’igba na
Ba mi lailewu l’odo Re

englishTitle: JESUS I MY CROSS HAVE TAKEN

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Jesus, I my cross have taken,all to leave and follow you;destitute, despised, forsaken,You on earth once suffered, too.Perish ev'ry fond ambition,All I've ever hoped or known;Yet how rich is my condition,God and heav'n are still my own!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Let the world despise and leave me;they have left my Savior, too.Human hearts and looks deceive me;You are not, like them, untrue.And, since you have smiled upon me,God of wisdom, love, and might,Foes may hate and friends may shun me;show your face, and all is bright.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Go, then, earthly fame and treasure!Come, disaster, scorn, and pain!In your service pain is pleasure,With your favor loss is gain.I have called you Abba, Father;You my all in all shall be.Storms may howl, and clouds may gather,All must work for good to me.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Haste, my soul, from grace to glory,armed by faith and winged by prayer;All but heav'n is transitory,God's own hand shall guide you there.Soon shall end this earthly story,Swift shall pass the pilgrim days,Hope soon change to heav'nly glory,Faith to sight and prayer to praise.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Jesu mo gb’agbelebu mi
Ki nle ma to o lehin
Otosi at’eni egan
‘Wo l’ohun gbogbo fun mi
Bi ini mi gbogbo segbe
Ti ero mi gbogbo pin
Sibe olor ni mo je
T’emi ni krist’ at’orun

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Eda le ma wahala mi
Yo mu mi sun mo O si
Idanwo aye le ba mi
Orun yo mu sinmi wa
Ibanuje ko le se nkan
Bi ‘fe Re ba wa fun mi
Aye ko si le dun mo mi
B’Iwo ko si ninu re

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Okan mi gba igbala Re
B’ori ese at’esu
F’ayo wa ni ipokipo
Ma s’ise si ma j’iya
Ro t’emi to wa ninu re
At’ife baba si o
W’olugbala t’o ku fun o
Omo Orun mase kun

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Nje koja lat’ore s’ogo
N’nu adura oun igbagbo
Ojo ailopin wa fun O
Baba yo mu o de be
Ise re l’aye fere pin
Ojo aye re buse
Ireti yo pada s’ayo
Adura s’orin iyin

number: 153. JESUS I MY CROSS HAVE TAKEN

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Come and listen in to a radio station,
Where the mighty host of Heaven sing,
Turn your radio on (turn your radio on),
Turn your radio on (turn your radio on),
If you want to want to hear the songs of Zion,
Coming from the land of endless spring,
Get in touch with God (get in touch with God)
Turn your radio on (turn your radio on).

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Turn your radio on (turn your radio on)
And listen to the music in the air,
Turn your radio on (turn your radio on)
And glory to share (glory share)
Turn the lights down low (lights down low)
And listen to the Master's Radio,
Get in touch with God (get in touch with God)
Turn your radio on.

english.title: chorus
english.lyrics:
,
Listen to the glad hosannahs roll,
Turn your radio on (turn your radio on)
Turn your radio on (turn your radio on)
Get a little taste of joys awaiting,
Get a little Heaven in your soul,
Get in touch with God (get in touch with God)
Turn your radio on.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Listen to the songs of the fathers and the mothers,
And the many friends gone on before,
Turn your radio on (turn your radio on),
Turn your radio on (turn your radio on),
Some eternal morning we shall meet them,
Over on the Hallelujah Shore,
Get in touch with God (get in touch with God),
Turn your radio on (turn your radio on).

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
When my life work is ended,
and I cross the swelling tide,
When the bright and glorious morning I shall see
I shall know my Redeemer when I reach the other side,
And His smile will be the first to welcome me.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
I shall know Him, I shall know Him
And redeemed by His side, I shall stand.
I shall know Him, I shall know Him,
By the print of the nails in His hand.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Oh, the soul thrilling rapture
when I view His blessed face
And the luster of His kindly beaming eye;
How my full heart will praise Him for the mercy, love, and grace
That prepared for me a mansion in the sky.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Oh, the dear ones in glory,
how they beckon me to come,
And our parting at the river I recall;
To the sweet vales of Eden
they will sing my welcome home,
But I long to meet my Saviour first of all.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Thro' the gates of the city in a robe of spotless white,
He will lead me where no tears will ever fall;
In the glad song of ages I shall mingle with delight,
But I long to meet my Saviour first of all.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
‘Gbat’ise mi ba pari, t’emi si koja iku
T’emi si ri owuro ogo didan
Emi yo mo Oluwa, gbati emi ba de ‘be
Oju Re li emi yo si tete ri

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Emi yo…………. mo-on
Emi yo mo-on
‘Gbati emi ba duro l’odo Re
Emi yo mo-on/2x
‘Tori apa iso ti owo Re

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ohun iyanil’enu ‘gbati mo ri oju Re
Ti o l’ewa ti a ko le f’enu so
Okan mi yo yin-In tori anu at’ore-ofe
T’o pese ile kan fun mi l’ok’Orun

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Awon ara mi l’ohun nwon nfe k’emi na ko wa
Mo ranti ojo t’emi t’awon pinya
Ni ‘le didan l’oke nwon yo ki mi ku abo
Pelu aso t’o funfun l’emi o wo ilu na

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Pelu aso funfun l’emi o wo ilu nla
On yo sin mi de ‘bit’omije ko si
Pelu ayo kikun l’emi o k’orin titi lai
Sugbon mo fe tete ri Oluwa mi

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
.
They bound the hands of JesusIn the garden where He prayedThey led Him thro' the streets in shameThey spat upon the SaviorSo pure and free from sinThey said crucify HimHe's to blame

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: He could have called ten thousand angelsTo destroy the world and set Him freeHe could have called ten thousand angelsBut He died alone for you and me

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Upon His precious headThey placed a crown of thornsThey laughed and said behold the KingThey struck Him and they cursed HimAnd mocked His holy nameAll alone He suffered ev'rything

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: When they nailed Him to the crossHis mother stood nearbyHe said woman behold thy SonHe cried I thirst for waterBut they gave Him none to drinkThen the sinful work of man was done

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: To the howling mob He yieldedHe did not for mercy cryThe cross of shame He took aloneAnd when He cried it's finishedHe gave Himself to dieSalvation's wondrous plan was done

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Awon ota mu Jesu
B’o ti ngbadura n’n’ogba
Gbogbo eniyan nfi se eleya
Won tuto si Krist’ l’oju
Jesu Eni mimo
Won kigbe pe kan m’agbelebu

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Jesu le pe, egbe-gberun awon Angel’
Fun ‘dasile Re, ko si p’aye run
Jesu le pe, egbe-gberun awon Angel’
Sugbon Kristi ku fun ‘wo at’emi

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Won fi ade egun de Olugbala lori
Won se eleya pe mo Oba eniyan
Won bu, won gba l’oju
Won kegan oruko re
Fun ‘gbala iwo at’emi

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
A kan Jesu m’agbelebu
Iya nibe o wipe iya wo omo re
O kigbe ongbe ngbe mi
Sugbon won ko fun l’omi
Ise awon eni ‘bi pari

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
O fi ara Re fun ‘ya
Ko tile toro aanu
O nikan ru agbelebu
O ke wipe “o pari”
O f’emi Re le ‘le
I-se igbala ti pari

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
When on the cross of Calv’ryThe Lord was crucified;The mob stood ’round about HimAnd mocked until He died.Two thieves were nailed beside HimTo share the agony,But one of them cried out to Him,"O Lord, remember me.
Refrain:Will the Lord remember meWhen I am called to go?When I have crossed death’s chilly sea,Will He His love there show?O yes, He heard my feeble cries,From bondage set me free.And when I reach the pearly gatesHe will remember me.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Oh, what a shame to kill HimThere on that rugged cross;But such a death was neededTo rescue all the lost.His blood was made a ransomTo set the captives free;I know that I’m included,and He will remember me.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: At His dear feet I’m kneeling.My sins I now confess;I bow in deep repentance,My soul He’ll surely bless.My blinded eyes He opensSo that the light I see,And when I reach the pearly gates,He will remember me. [Refrain]

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Lori oke Kalfari, l’Oluwa mi ti ku
A fi Oluwa s’esin titi d’oju iku
A kan ole meji pelu lati jiya oro
Sugbon okan so fun Oluwa wipe
“Oluwa, ranti mi”

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
SA: Jo Oluwa ranti mi gbati a ba pe mi
TB: Jo Oluwa ranti mi gbat’a ba pe mi (l’aye)
SA: ‘Gba mo ba re odo koja, ki ‘fe Re han si mi
TB: ‘Gba mo ba re odo koja k’ife Re han si mi (nibe)
SA: Jo gbo adura ebe mi k’o da okan mi nde
TB: Jo gbo adura ebe mi k’o da okan (ese) mi nde
SA: Gba moba de ‘bode Pearli, Jesu yo ranti mi
TB: ‘Gba mo ba de ‘bode Pearli Jesu yo ranti an’emi

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
O ku ‘ku egan lori igi agbelebu
O je dandan lati ku lati gb’elese la
Eje ti o ta sile lo nso ni d’ominira
Mo mop e eje na wa fun mi yo si ranti mi

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Mo kunle l’or’ekun mi, mo njewo ese mi
Mo si ronupiwada yo sa gba mi dandan
O ti si mi li oju ki emi le reran
‘Gba mob a de ‘bode Pearli On yo si ranti mi

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
There's no hidin' place down here,
There's no hidin' place down here.
Oh, I went to the rock to hide my face,
The rock cried out, "No hidin' place";
There's no hidin' place down here.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Oh, de rock cried, "I'm burnin' too,"
Oh, de rock cried, "I'm burnin' too,"
Oh, de rock cried out, "I'm burnin' too,
I want-a go to heaven as well as you."
There's no hidin' place down here.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Oh, de sinner-man he gambled an' fell,
Oh, de sinner-man he gambled an' fell,
Oh, de sinner-man gambled, he gambled an' fell,
He wanted to go to heaven, but he had to go to hell.
There's no hidin' place down here.

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Nihin, laye
Ko si ‘bi ‘sadi nihin
Mo sa to Jesu ko gba mi la
Mo pamo l’abe ‘sadi ni
Ko si ‘bi ‘sadi l’aye

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Elese f’ese sile/2x
Elese ronupiwada
Tori ‘dajo mbo wa sori re
K’yo si ‘bi ‘sadi fun o.

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Elese yo kabamo/2x
On fe k’o le D’orun rere
Sugbon ko le lo si ‘be
Ko si ‘bi ‘sadi f’elese

yorubaTitle: Nibi ti Ododo re Kii Sa

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
I am going to a city,
Where the streets with gold are laid,
Where the tree of life is blooming,
And the roses never fade.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Here they bloom but for a season;
Soon their beauty is decayed.
I am going to a city,
Where the roses never fade.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
In this world we have our troubles,
Satan snares we must evade.
We'll be free from all temptations,
Where the roses never fade.

english.title: Verse  3
english.lyrics:
Loved one's gone to be with Jesus,
In their robes of white arrayed.
They are waiting for my coming,
Where the roses never fade.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mo nlo si ‘lu ologo kan
Ti ita re je wura
Nibi ti igi iye wa
‘bi ti ododo re kii sa

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Nihin won l’ewa fun ‘gba die
Sugbon won nri ibaje
Mo nlo si ‘lu ologo kan
‘bi ti ododo re kii sa

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Idamu wa po n’nu aye
Agbara esu si nja
Ao bori gbogbo idanwo
Ni ‘lu t’ododo kii sa

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Awon olufe wa nibe
Niu aso funfun won
Won si nduro de mi l’Orun
‘bi ti ododo kii sa

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Some glad morning when this life is o'er
I'll fly away
To a home on God's celestial shore
I'll fly away

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
I'll fly away O glory
I'll fly away (in the morning)
When I die hallelujah by and by
I'll fly away

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
When the shadows of this life have grown
I'll fly away
Like a bird from prison bars has flown
I'll fly away

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Just a few more weary days and then
I'll fly away
To a land where joys shall never end
I'll fly away

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
‘Gbat’ojo aye mi ba d’opin
Ngo fi ‘ye fo (lo s’Orun)
Si ilu Olorun didara
Ngo fi ‘ye fo (lo s’Orun)

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ngo fi ‘ye fo lo s’Orun
Ngo fi ‘ye fo (lo s’Orun)
‘Gba mba ku, alleluya nigbose
Ngo fi ‘ye fo

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
‘Gba ‘sudede aye yi ba pin
Ngo fi ‘ye fo (lo s’Orun)
Si ilu Olorun didara
Ngo fi ‘ye fo

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ojo aye mi fere d’opin
Ngo f’iye fo ( lo s’Orun)
Si ilu t’ayo re ko l’opin
Ngo fi ‘ye fo (lo s’Orun)

englishTitle: WHAT WILL YOU GIVE IN EXCHANGE?
yorubaTitle: Kini Iwo Yo Fi Se Pasiparo?

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Brother afar from the Savior today,Risking your soul for the things that decay,Oh, if today God should call it away,What would you give in exchange for your soul?

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: What would you give? What would you give?What would you give in exchange for your soul?Oh, if today God should call it away,What would you give in exchange for your soul?

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Mercy is calling you, won’t you give heed?Must the dear Savior still tenderly plead?Risk not your soul, it is precious indeed;What would you give in exchange for your soul?

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: More than the silver and gold of the earth,--More than all jewels thy spirit is worth!God, the Creator, has given it birth!What would you give in exchange for your soul?

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: If, when you stand at the bar by and by,When you are weighed in the balance on high,You should be sentenced forever to die!What would you give in exchange for your soul?

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ara ti jina s’Oluwa l’oni
Won f’emi won s’ohun ti segbe
A! ti iku bad de si o l’oni
Kini ‘wo yo fi paro emi re?

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Kini iwo, yo fi paro?
Kini ‘wo yo fi paro emi re?
A! ti iku ba de si o l’oniki ni ‘wo yo fi paro emi re?

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Aanu wa ntosi se ‘wo ko ni gba
Wo bi Jesu ti npe o s’odo Re?
Gbo ipe nla t’o se iyebiye
Kini ‘wo yo fi paro emi re?

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Jesu ju wura oun fadaka
O san ju ohun gbogbo t’okan re fe
F’okan re fun eleda ayeraye
Kini ‘wo yo fi paro emi re?

number: 166. WHAT WILL YOU GIVE IN EXCHANGE

englishTitle: I WON’T HAVE TO CROSS JORDAN ALONE

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Brother afar from the Savior today,
Risking your soul for the things that decay,
Oh, if today God should call it away,
What would you give in exchange for your soul?

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
What would you give? What would you give?
What would you give in exchange for your soul?
Oh, if today God should call it away,
What would you give in exchange for your soul?

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Mercy is calling you, won’t you give heed?
Must the dear Savior still tenderly plead?
Risk not your soul, it is precious indeed;
What would you give in exchange for your soul?

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
More than the silver and gold of the earth,--
More than all jewels thy spirit is worth!
God, the Creator, has given it birth!
What would you give in exchange for your soul?

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
If, when you stand at the bar by and by,
When you are weighed in the balance on high,
You should be sentenced forever to die!
What would you give in exchange for your soul?

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Gba ‘se mi l’aye pari, ti mo de odo
‘Gbati ‘ponju mi l’aye pari
Enikan duro lati f’ona han mi
Ng ko ni koja Jordani nikan

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
S: Ng ko ni nikan koja Jordan’
Others: Ngo ni koja Jordan’ nikan
All: Jesu ti san gbogbo gbese mi
Solo: ‘Gbat’ona mi bas u, o wa nitosi mi
Others: hmmmmm…………………….
All: Ng ko ni nikan koja Jordan’

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
‘Gba gbogbo l’okan mi saare,
Ko s’atilehin
Ero kan so jade n’nu okan mi wipe
N ko ni nikan koja Jordan’

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
‘Gba igbi idanwo yi mi kakiri
Jesu yo pa awon tiRe mo
Ti o pa okan mi mo n’nu ‘rin ajo mi
Nko ni nikan koja Jordan’

number: 167: I WON’T HAVE TO CROSS JORDAN ALONE

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Walk with me
Walk with me
Lest mine eyes no longer see
All the glory
All of the story of your love
Talk to me
Talk to me
As you spoke so tenderly
As you walk there, as you talk there
By the sea

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Let me follow in the footsteps
That trod the shores of galilee
And let me learn to pray as he prayed
In the garden of Gethsemane

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Take my hand
Take my hand
Teach me, lord, to understand
All the beauty
All the duty
Of your love

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Jo Jesu, ba mi rin
K’oju mi mase kuro
Lara ogo Re, ati itan ‘yanu Re si mi
Jo Jesu, ba mi soro li ohun jeje Re
Bo ti soro li eti okun nla ni

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Je kin ma to ipase Re
B’O ti rin l’eti Galili
Je ki ngbadura bi tiRe
B’O ti se l’ogba Getsemane
Di mi mu, di mi mu
Oluwa jowo to mi
K’oju mi mase kuro ni ewa (ewa Re)

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Jo Jesu ba mi rin
K’eti mi maa gb’ohun Re
T’ise ‘yanu ati ewa ogo Re si mi
Ba mi rin, ba mi rin
B’O ti rin ni igbani
B’O ti rin l’eti okun nla Galili

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Dark is the road that lies before me,
How can I find my way?
Tangled the path that beckons to me,
Lead me, O Lord, I pray.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Lead me, O lead me
Never will I go astray or roam
Lead me, O lead me
Lead me ’till I reach my heavenly home

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Dangers are lurking, foes are threat’ning,
Satan his pow’r has shown
Stay by my side, protect and guide me
I dare not walk alone.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ona iwaju mi s’okunkun
Ng o se m’ona mi
Ona ti mo nrin yi ko ye mi
Jesu jowo to mi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
To mi , jo to mi
Emi ki yi o tun sako mo
To mi, jo to mi
Titi ngo fi de ibugbe l’oke

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Opo ewu lo wa yi mi ka
Agbara esu ga
Duro ti mi ko si pa mi mo
Jo ma fi mi sile

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
A Christian band from far and near,
We meet to learn of Jesus here;
To read His Word, whose every line
Is full of hope and joy divine.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
This blest Endeavour Band,
From o'er all this broad land,
Is gathered in His name,
To grasp the friendly hand;
Our thoughts are one in Thee,
Our prayer shall ever be,
That God may bless and ever keep
This Christian band.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
A Christian, where all may sing
Glad songs of praise to God our King:
And youthful hearts may find the way,
To perfect peace and endless day.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Each willing hand and thankful heart,
Is bound again before we part
As sheaves on earth are bound with twine,
His word shall bind as cords divine.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
The Master’s work we’ll still pursue,
And once again our pledge renew,
To Him who saves us by His love,
Till gathered home with Him above.

englishTitle: JESUS I BELIEVE WHAT YOU SAID
yorubaTitle: Jesu mo Gba Ohun ti o wi Gbo

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Though the world should all forsake me,
I will never fear or dread.
For you said that you'd go with me,
And Jesus I believe what you said.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Though the sky is gray above me,
Though I cannot see ahead,
Yet, you promised you'd protect me,
And Jesus I believe what you said.
I believe you really love me,
I believe you really care,
I believe you died to save me,
And at death's crossing you'd be there, oh oh.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
When my eyes by tears were blinded,
You took my hand and gently led,
Oh how sweet it is to trust you,
Cause Jesus I believe what you said,
Yes, Jesus, I believe what you said,
And, Jesus I believe what you said.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:

‘tori mo di ‘leri Re mu
Mo gba Jesu gbo ko s’ewu fun mi

items.lyrics:

‘gbati ‘ji ku ba de yo gba mi
‘Gba omije gb’oju mi kan

Mo ni Jesu ko s’ewu fun mi

items.lyrics:
Bi oju orun tile su

Mo mo Jesu ko s’ewu fun mi mo

number: 172: JESUS I BELIEVE WHAT YOU SAID

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
God is calling the prodigal, come without delay,
Hear, O hear Him calling, calling now for thee;
Tho’ you’ve wandered so far from His presence, come today,
Hear His loving voice calling still.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Calling now for thee, O weary prodigal, come;
Calling now for thee, O weary prodigal, come.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Patient, loving and tenderly still the Father pleads,
Hear, O hear Him calling, calling now for thee;
Oh! return while the Spirit in mercy intercedes,
Hear His loving voice calling still.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Come, there’s bread in the house of thy Father, and to spare,
Hear, O hear Him calling, calling now for thee;
Lo! the table is spread and the feast is waiting there,
Hear His loving voice calling still.

englishTitle: I HAVE SET WATCHMAN UPON THY WALLS
yorubaTitle: Mo ti Fi Aloore Si Ori Odi Re

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
I have set watchmen upon thy walls,
O Jerusalem! which shall never hold their peace, day nor night.
Go through the gates, prepare ye the way, prepare ye the way of the people.
Cast up the highway, cast up the highway, cast up the highway, and gather out the stones.
Lift up a standard, lift up a standard,
lift up a standard among the people.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Hallelujah! Hallelujah!
Hallelujah! Amen!
Hallelujah! Hallelujah!
Hallelujah! Amen!
Amen! Amen! Amen! Amen!

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Have you stood by the ocean on a diamond-hard morning
And felt the horizon stir deep in your soul?
Watched the wake of a steamer as it cut thru blue water
And been gripped by a fever you just can't control?
O to throw off the shackles and fly with the seagulls
To where green waves tumble before a driving sea wind
Or to lie on the decking on a warm summer evening
Watch the red sun fall burning beneath the earth's rim

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
But to every sailor comes time to drop anchor
Haul in the sails and make the lines fast
You deep water dreamer, your journey is over
You're safe in the harbor at last (2x)

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Some men are sailors, but most are just dreamers
Held fast by the anchors they forge in their minds
Who in their hearts know they'll never sail over deep water
To search for a treasure they're afraid they won't find
So in sheltered harbours they cling to their anchors
Bank dow their boilers & shut down their steam
And wait for the sailors to return with the bright treasures
That will fan the dull embers & fire up their dreams

englishTitle: GOD IS GREAT GOOD AND MERCIFUL
yorubaTitle: Olorun Tobi, O dara, O je Alaanu

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
God is great, God is good, God is merciful
Unto all who will call on His name
Yesterday and today and forever more
He abides and He's always the same

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
(God is) great, (God is) good, (God is merciful) He’s merciful
(And He) seeks (for the) soul (gone astray) gone astray
(God is) great, (God is) good, (God is merciful) He’s merciful
(And He) sees (from His) throne (day by day) throne each day
He is waiting (He will bless every soul) to bless every troubled soul
Through His Son (Son) Who on (on) Calvary died (calvary died)
(God is) great, (God is) good, (God is merciful) He’s merciful
With the (arms) of His love (now) opened wide (open wide)

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
He would save all the lost by His grace divine
He is tender in mercy and love
By the death of His Son on the cruel cross
There is pardon and peace from above

items.lyrics:

number: 182: GOD IS GREAT GOOD AND MERCIFUL

yorubaTitle: Ki nse Ona ti o Rorun

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
It's not an easy road
We are traveling to heaven,
For many are the thorns on the way;
It's not an easy road,
But the Savior is with us,
His presence gives us joy every day.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
No, no, it's not an easy road,
No, no, it's not an easy road;
But Jesus walks beside me
And brightens the journey,
And lightens every heavy load.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
It's not an easy road
There are trials and troubles
And many are the dangers we meet;
But Jesus guards and keeps
So that nothing can harm us,
And smooths the rugged path for our feet.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Though I am often footsore
And weary from travel,
Though I am often bowed down with care,
Well a better day is coming
When home in the glory
We'll rest in perfect peace over there.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ki ns’ona t’o rorun
Ni awa nrin lo s’orun
Tor’opo egun lo wa l’ona
Ki ns’ona t’o r’orun
Sugbon Jesu pelu wa
O si fun wa l’ayo b’a ti nlo

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Nda o, nda o, ona na ko rorun
Nda o, nda o, o kun fun isoro
Sugbon Jesu pelu wa
O tan ‘mole fun wa
O si mu k’eru wuwo fuye

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ki ns’ona t’o rorun
Opo idanwo lo mbe
Opo si l’ewu t’a nko l’ona
Sugbon Jesu nso wa
On gba wa n’nu gbogbo re
O ns’oke ‘soro di petele

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
B’are tile nmu wa
Ti a ndaku loj’ona
T’eru aniyan nteri wa ba
Ojo ayo kan mbo
‘Gba ba de ‘le ogo ni
Ao sinmi nibe l’ayo titi

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Hear the blessed Savior calling the oppressed,
“O ye heavy-laden, come to Me and rest;
Come, no longer tarry, I your load will bear,
Bring Me every burden, bring Me ev'ry care.

english.title: Chorus
Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Are you disappointed, wand’ring here and there,
Dragging chains of doubt and loaded down with care?
Do unholy feelings struggle in your breast?
Bring your case to Jesus, He will give you rest.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Stumbling on the mountains dark with sin and shame,
Stumbling toward the pit of hell’s consuming flame;
By the pow’rs of sin deluded and oppressed,
Hear the tender Shepherd, “Come to Me and rest.”

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Have you by temptation often conquered been,
Has a sense of weakness brought distress within?
Christ will sanctify you, if you’ll claim His best,
In the Holy Spirit He will give you rest.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Gbo Olugbala npe awon t’eru npa

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
O ha ni ‘jatile, o si nrin kiri
Pelu eru aniyan on ‘yemeji
Ero aimo ha nyo okan re lenu
M’oran re to Jesu, yo fun o ni ‘sinmi

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Gbati isudede ese on ‘tiju
Ba nti o lo si inu orun egbe
‘Gba agbara ese ban se o n’ise
Gbo t’Olusaguntan to ni “wa sinmi”

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
O ha mbo sinu ‘danwo nigba gbogbo
Ailera re ha mba o ninu je bi?
Krist’ yo so o di mimo b’o f’oakn re fun
N’nu emi mimo re yo fun o ni ‘sinmi

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Far away the noise of strife upon my ear is falling,
Then I know the sins of earth beset on every hand;
Doubt and fear and things of earth in vain to me are calling,
None of these shall move me from Beulah Land.

english.title: Chorus
Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Far below the storm of doubt upon the world is beating,
Sons of men in battle long the enemy withstand;
Safe am I within the castle of God’s word retreating,
Nothing there can reach me, ’tis Beulah Land.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Let the stormy breezes blow, their cry cannot alarm me,
I am safely sheltered here, protected by God’s hand;
Here the sun is always shining, Here there’s naught can harm me,
I am safe forever in Beulah Land.

english.title: Verse 4

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mo ngbo irokeke ogun l’ona jinjin rere
‘Gbana mo mo p’ogun ese wa yika aye
Ifoya at’oro aye si npe mi pe ki nwa
Won k’yo fa mi kuro n’ile Beulah

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Emi ngbe l’ori oke, ninu ile imole
Mo sin mu ninu isun ti ko le gbe lailai (mo yo)
O daju pe mo nje ‘nu Manna eyi ti ko l’osuwon
Toripe mo ngbe ni ‘le Beula

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Iji iyemeji nja kikan l’ori ‘le aiye
Awon eniyan doju ko esu pe titi
Mo ngbe ‘nu oro Olorun mo si wa l’ailewu
Ibi ko le ba mi , ni ‘le Beula

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Iji ti nja pel’ariwo ko le ba mi l’eru
Owo Olorun lo nse abo mi ko s’ewu
Mo ngbe ni ‘le ‘mole orun, mo wa l’alafia
Mo l’abo t’o daju, ni ‘le Beula

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
‘Gba mo ise Olorun, okan mi ns’asaro
‘Gbati mo gbo ohun Re, oro Re han si  mi
Emi Re ngbe ‘nu okan mi, mo ni ‘gbala kikun
Ngo fi ayo duiro ni ‘le Beula

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Christian, walk carefully; danger is near!
On in thy journey with trembling fear;
Shares from without, and temptations within,
Seek to entice thee once more into sin.
Christian, walk carefully,
Christian, walk carefully,
Christian, walk carefully,
Danger is near!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Christian, walk cheerfully through the fierce storm,
Dark though the sky with it’s threats of alarm;
Soon will the clouds and the tempest be o’er,
Then with thy Saviourthou’lt rest evermore.
Christian, walk cheerfully
Christian, walk cheerfully
Christian, walk cheerfully
Through the fierce storm.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Christian, walk prayerfully; Oft wilt thou fall,
If thou forget on thy Saviour to call;
Safe thou shall walk through each trial and care,
If thou art clad in the armour of prayer.
Christian, walk pray’rfully
Christian, walk pray’rfully
Christian, walk pray’rfully
Fear lest thou fall.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Christian, walk hopefully; sorrow and pain
Cease when the haven for rest thou shalt gain;
Then from the lips of the Judge, thy reward:
Enter thou into the joy of thy Lord.
Christian, walk hopefully
Christian, walk hopefully
Christian, walk hopefully
Rest thou shalt gain.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Onigbagbo s’ora tor’ewu mbo
Fi ‘beru rin pelu Olorun re
Ewu l’ode ati ‘danwo ninu
Nfe lati fa o lo sinu ese
Chorus:
Onigbagbo sora/3x
To r’ewu mbo

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Sora gbadura ko ma ba subu
Ranti lati ke p’Olugbala re
Wo yo bori gbogbo igbi ‘soro
Bo ba wa ‘nu ‘hamora adura

items.title: Ese 5
items.lyrics:
Jesu l’eni na to nfun mi l’ayo
‘fe Re ko l’egbe ore Re kii tan
L’ojo, l’erun tabi nigbakugba
‘fe Re kii pada bakanana ni lai

items.title: Ese 6
items.lyrics:
Wo nfe ni ‘bukun ti Jesu nfun ni
‘gbala ofe dipo egun ese
Wa s’od’Olugbala n’b’agbelebu
Eje Re nsan sibe yo we ‘se re nu

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Many are happy in Jesus tonight,
Why not you? Why not you?
Sure of a home in the mansions of light,
Why not you?

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Daily His wonderful mercy they prove,
Singing, rejoicing, as onward they move;
Safe in His keeping they rest in His love,
Why not you?

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Many were snatch’d from the brink of despair,
Why not you? Why not you?
Now in the joys of the Righteous they share,
Why not you?

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Many a prodigal child has returned,
Why not you? Why not you?
Blessings to find in the home they had spurned,
Why not you?

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Many are close to the brink of the grave,
Why not you? Why not you?
Fully persuaded that Jesus can save,
Why not you?

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics:
Many are now on their journey to heav’n,
Why not you? Why not you?
Knowing thro’ faith that their sins are forgiv’n,
Why not you? 189: WHOSOEVER WILL

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Pupo lo l’ayo n’nu Jesu loni
Iwo nko?/2x
Won ni ‘daniloju ‘bugbe l’orun
Iwo nko?

items.lyrics:
Aanu Jesu ti wonm l’ojojo

Won sinmi l’abe ipamo Jesu
Iwo nko?

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:

Won pin ninu ayo olododo
iwo nko?

items.lyrics:
Opo asako ti pada wa’le
Iwo nko?/2x
Won ri ‘bukun ni ‘le ti won ti gan
Iwo nko?

items.lyrics:

Iwo nko?

englishTitle: MAY THE LORD DEPEND ON YOU

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
In the warfare that is raging
For the truth and for the right,
When the conflict, fierce, is raging
With the powers of the night,
God needs people brave and true:
May He then depend on you?
Chrous:
May the Lord depend on you?
Loyalty is but His due;
Say, O spirit, brave and true,
That He may depend on you.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
See, they come on sable pinions,
Come in strong, Satanic might,—
Powers come, and dark dominions,
From the regions of the night;
God requires the brave and true:
May He then depend on you?

english.title: Verse 3

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ninu ogun ti o gbona,
Fun ooto ati eto
Nigbati ‘ji si le kikan,
Pel’agbara okunkun
Olorun nfe akoni ,
O ha le gbekele o?

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Olorun ha le lo o?
O nfe ko je oloto
Wi pel’okan igboya
Pe O le gbekele o

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Wo won mbo wa l’ori keke,
Pelu agbara ese
Agbara ise okunkun
Gbinle lati owo won
Olorun nfe akinkanju
O ha le gbekele o?

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Baba nwo wa l’ori ‘te Re
Angeli nran wa lowo
Oga ogun wa ni Jesu (Jesu si ogagun wa)
Awa ko ni le kuna
Isegun je t’akoni
O ha le gbeke le o?

number: 190: MAY THE LORD DEPEND ON YOU

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Here among the shadows (living) in a lonely land (with strangers)
We're a band of pilgrims on the move;
(Through dangers) burdened down with sorrows (and we’re)
Shunned on every hand (but we are)
Looking for a city built above.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
(O yes we’re) Looking for a city
(looking here and there, looking for a city yonder)
Where we'll never die,
(where will never die, never die no never)
There the sainted millions,
(and up there with al the saints, there with all the millions)
Never say good-by,
(we will never say goodby, say goodby no never)
There we'll meet our Savior,
(glory, when we gather there, we’ll Christ our saviour glory)
And our loved ones too,
(and we know we’ll meet, friends and all our loved ones)
Come O Holy Spirit, all our hopes renew.
(now we pray thee quickly come, come thee come o spirit
(Come o come on thee we call, all our hopes renew)

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Here in disappointment (often) we so sadly roam (and earthly)
Friends no longer speak One word of love;
(but truly) we have found contentment,
(Jesus) promised us a home,
(so we are) looking for a city built above.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
In this land of dangers (we are)
Going here and there (we’re simply)
Trusting in the blessed saviour’s love
(and mercy) though we may be strangers
(living) in this world of care (we’re always)
Looking for a city built above

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Tenderly guide us, O Shepherd of Love,
To the green pastures and waters above,
Guarding us ever by night and by day,
Never from Thee will we stray.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Never, never,
Never, oh, never for Thou art the way;
Never, never,
Never from Thee will we stray.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
What tho’ the heavens with clouds be o’ercast,
Fearful the tempest and bitter the blast;
What tho’ the river of death bar the way,
Never from Thee will we stray.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Over our weakness Thy strength hath been cast,
Keep us in meekness, Thine own till the last;
Then, safely folded, where Thou art the day,
Never from Thee will we stray.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Jesu wa fi ‘fe Re s’amona wa
Si ipa omi iye l’atoke
Maa so wa nigba osan at’oru
A k’yo kuro l’odo Re

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
A k’yo……. Sako…..
(Titi aye tiRe l’awa yo je)
Tit aye tire l’awa o je
A k’yo……. Sako
(Titi aye tiRe l’awa yo je)
A k’yo kuro l’odo Re

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Agbara Re b’ori ailera wa
Je k’a wa ni ‘rele titi d’opin
‘Gba t’a ba si de ‘le ayo l’oke
A k’yo kuro l’odo Re

englishTitle: A SHELTER IN THE TIME OF STORM

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
The Lord's our rock, in Him we hide,
A shelter in the time of storm;
Secure whatever ill betide,
A shelter in the time of storm.
Mighty Rock in a weary land,
Cooling shade on the burning sand,
Faithful guide for the pilgrim band-
A shelter in the time of storm.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
A shade by day, defense by night,
A shelter in the time of storm;
No fears alarm, no fears affright,
A shelter in the time of storm.
Mighty Rock in a weary land,
Cooling shade on the burning sand,
Faithful guide for the pilgrim band-
A shelter in the time of storm.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
The raging storms may round us beat,
A shelter in the time of storm;
We'll never leave our safe retreat,
A shelter in the time of storm.
Mighty Rock in a weary land,
Cooling shade on the burning sand,
Faithful guide for the pilgrim band-
A shelter in the time of storm.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
O Rock divine, O Refuge dear,
A shelter in the time of storm;
Be Thou our helper ever near,
A shelter in the time of storm.
Mighty Rock in a weary land,
Cooling shade on the burning sand,
Faithful guide for the pilgrim band-
A shelter in the time of storm.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Oluwa li apata wa, ibi ‘sadi nigba iji
Ohunkohun t’o wu ko de
Oun ni ibi isadi wa

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Je…su ni apata l’aye osi yi
Aye osi, aye ise
Jesu ni apata l’aye osi yi
Ibi ‘sadi nigba iji

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Iji l’osan, abo l’oru,
Ibi ‘sadi nigba iji
Ota ko le d’aya fo wa
Kristi ni ‘bi isadi wa

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Igbi le ma ja yi wa ka

Ibi ‘sadi nigba iji

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:

Ibi ‘sadi nigba iji
Iwo lo je iranwo wa
Ibi ‘sadi nigba iji

number: 193: A SHELTER IN THE TIME OF STORM

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
My precious Savior suffered pain and agony,
He bore it all that I might live;
He broke the bonds of sin and set the captive free,
He bore it all that I might live.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
He bore it all that I might see His shining face,
He bore it all that I might live;
I stood condemned to die but Jesus took my place,
He bore it all that I might live.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
They placed a crown of thorns upon my Savior’s head.
He bore it all that I might live;
By cruel man with spear His side was pierced and bled,
He bore it all that I might live.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Up Calv’ry’s hill in shame the blessed Savior trod,
He bore it all that I might live;
Between two thieves they crucified the Son of God,
He bore it all that I might live.

englishTitle: I’LL BE A FRIEND TO JESUS

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
They tried my Lord and Master,
With no one to defend;
Within the halls of Pilate
He stood without a friend.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
I’ll be a friend to Jesus,
My life for Him I’ll spend;
I’ll be a friend to Jesus,
Until my years shall end.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
The world may turn against Him,
I’ll love Him to the end,
And while on earth I’m living,
My Lord shall have a friend.

english.title: Verse 3
Verse 4
english.lyrics:
To all who need a Savior,
My Friend I’ll recommend;
Because He brought salvation,
Is why I am His friend.

items.title: Ese 1

A dan Oluwa mi wo, l’aisi agbejo ro

Ngo je ore fun Jesu, tit’aye mi o pin

number: 195: I’LL BE A FRIEND TO JESUS

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
I’ve enlisted for life in the army of the Lord,
Though the fight may be long, and the struggle fierce and hard;
With the armor of God and the Spirit’s trusty sword,
At the front of the battle you will find me.

english.title: Chorus
Verse 2
english.lyrics:
With the banner of love and of holiness unfurled,
Full salvation proclaim to a sinful, dying world;
Though the darts thick and fast from the enemy be hurled,
At the front of the battle you will find me.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Is your name, friend, enrolled with the loyal ones and true?
Will you dare now to stand with the Savior’s faithful few?
Will you join with me now and the covenant renew?
At the front of the battle you will find me.

items.title: Ese 1

L’emi yo duro niwaju ogun naa

yorubaTitle: Jesu Yo fun O ni Isinmi

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Will you come, will you come, with your poor broken heart,
Burdened and sin oppressed?
Lay it down at the feet of your Saviour and Lord,
Jesus will give you rest.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
O happy rest, sweet happy rest!
Jesus will give you rest;
O why won’t you come in simple, trusting faith?
Jesus will give you rest.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Will you come, will you come?
There is mercy for you,
Balm for your aching breast;
Only come unto Him, and believe on His name,
Jesus will give you rest.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Will you come, will you come?
You have nothing to pay;
Jesus, who loves you best,
By His death on the Cross purchased life for your soul,
Jesus will give you rest.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Will you come, will you come?
How He pleads with you now!
Fly to His loving breast,
And whatever your sin or your sorrow may be,
Jesus will give you rest.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:

Yo si fun o ni ‘sinmi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:

Jesu yo fun o ni ‘sinmi

Yo si fun o ni ‘sinmi

‘wo ko ha gbagbo b’O ti npe o l’ohun jeje

Yo si fun o ni ‘sinmi

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
I'll tell the world that I'm a Christian
I'm not ashamed His name to bear
I'll tell the world that I'm a Christian
I'll take Him with me anywhere
I'll tell the world how Jesus saved me
And how He gave me a life brand new
And I know that if you trust Him
That all He gave me He'll give to you
I'll tell the world that He's my Savior
No other one could love me so
My life my all is His forever
And where He leads me I will go

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
I'll tell the world that He is coming
It may be near or far away
But we must live as if His coming
Would be tomorrow or today
For when He comes and life is over
For those who love Him there's more to be
Eyes have never seen the wonders
That He's preparing for you and me
O tell the world that you're a Christian
Be not ashamed His name to bear
O tell the world that you're a Christian
And take Him with you ev'rywhere

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
There’s a peace in my heart that the world never gave,
A peace it cannot take away;
Tho' the trials of life may surround like a cloud,
I’ve a peace that has come there to stay!

english.title: Chorus
Verse 2
english.lyrics:
All the world seemed to sing of a Savior and King,
When peace sweetly came to my heart;
Troubles all fled away and my night turned to day,
Blessed Jesus, how glorious Thou art!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
This treasure I have in a temple of clay,
While here on His footstool I roam:
But He’s coming to take me some glorious day,
Over there to my heavenly home!

items.lyrics:
Okan mi kun f’ayo t’aye ko le fun ni

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Low in the grave he lay, Jesus my Savior,
Waiting for the coming day, Jesus my Lord!

english.title: Chorus
Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Vainly they watch his bed, Jesus my Savior,
vainly they seal the dead, Jesus my Lord!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Death cannot keep its prey, Jesus my Savior;
he tore the bars away, Jesus my Lord!

items.lyrics:

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
We are bound for Canaan land,
Tenting by the way;
Who shall lead us on the road?
Choose your king today.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Dare to stand like Joshua,
Dare to say the word;
As for me and for my house,
We will serve the Lord.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Many trials we have seen,
Thus far on our way;
He hath led us safely thro’,
Shall he lead today?

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
When the dark Red sea of doubt,
Billow’d in our way;
Then he parted ev’ry wave—
So he will today.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Can we safely trust a guide
Who knows not the way;
God hath traveled ev’ry foot,
Shall he lead today?

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics:
Just before us Jordan rolls,
Right across the way;
We can safely trust the Lord,
He shall lead today.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ni ajo wa si Kenaan’
A np’ago l’ona
Tani yo s’amona wa
E yan oba yin

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Mu ‘duro bi Josua
Se ipinnu pe
B’o s’emi ati ‘le mi
Ao sin Oluwa

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
A ti la ‘danwo koja
L’ona ajo wa
O ti sin la won ja
Wa  to wa l’oni

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Bi ‘danwo ti nyi lu wa
L’oju ona wa
A le gbeke l’Oluwa
Yo mu wa la ja

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Ao la Jordani koja
L’agbara Oluwa
A gbekele anu Re
Yo to wa l’oni

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Oh! the sowing time seems weary
And full oft the workers cry,
To the Lord who rules the harvest,
For the reaping by and by.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
What a reaping, reaping,
What a reaping it will be by and by.
Every sorrow we have known,
Every tear that we have sown,
What a reaping it will be by and by!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
In the sorrow and the suffering,
When each breath is but a sigh;
Though we sow in tears, remember
There’s a reaping by and by.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
When our hearts are strained to breaking,
Comfort other sufferers nigh;
And our harvest will be doubled
In the reaping by and by.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
For the love of Christ is flowing
In a stream that’s never dry;
He will water all our sowing,
For the reaping by and by.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Igba ‘fun rugbin kun
Awon osise nf’ekun gbadura
Nwon kigbe s’Oluwa ‘kore
Fun ikore nigbose

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ao nikore pupo
(Ao ni ‘kore, ao ni ‘kore ao ni ikore pupo)
Ikore pupo la o ni nigbose (ni gbose)
Irugbin t’a f’ekun gbin pelu opo omije
Ao f’ayo kore wole nigbose

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ibanuje le po fun wa
Ki ise pon wa l’oju
B’a f’omije fun irugbin
Mo pe ‘kore mbo laipe

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Gbati ‘banuje de,
k’ohun wa je ‘tunu f’elomiran
ere kikun yo je ti wa
n’nu ikore nigbose

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Ife Jesu n’nu okan wa
Je isun ti ko le gbe
Yo b’omirin irugbin wa
Fun ikore nigbose

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Sometimes the shadow gather,
And mists obscure the way;
Sometimes, the clouds grow heavy,
And darken all the day.
How precious to remember Our Father’s loving care,…
That He still loves His children , And He answers prayer.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Keep on believing, God will answer prayer;
Keep on believing, never despair Tho’ you be heavy laden,
And burdened down with care,
Remember God still loves you and He answers prayer.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Sometimes, the way is dreary,
We seem to walk alone,
Forgetting that the Father Keeps watch above His own.
How many needless sorrows The faithless have to bear,
For, God still loves His children, And He answers prayer.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
O soul, weighed down with sorrow,
Beneath a heavy load,
Remember God will help you,
However rough the road.
His grace is still sufficient For every load of care,
God ever loves His children, And He answers prayer.”

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Aisedede yi o ka ikuku bo ona
Oju orun sudede t’ona re si s’okun
O dun lati ma ranti itoju Baba wa
Pe o nfe awon omo Re o si ngbo adura

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Sa ni igbagbo, O ngbo adura
Sa ni igbagbo ma so ‘reti nu
Bi wahala re po t’o si soro fun o
Ranti pe o feran re o si ngbo adura

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
O ha dabi enipe o ku awa nikan
Sugbon Baba wa orun se ‘toju wa sibe
Opolopo ‘banuje ni aigbagbo mu wa
Olorun nfe awib tire o si ngbo adura

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Iwo okan t’aare mu l’abe  eru wuwo
Ranti pe iranwo mbo bi ‘soro tile pe to
Ore-ofe Re to fun o, yo m’eru re fuye
Olorun f’awon tire o si ngbo adura

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Years I spent in vanity and pride,
Caring not my Lord was crucified,
Knowing not it was for me He died on Calvary.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Mercy there was great and grace was free,
Pardon there was multiplied to me,
There my burdened soul found liberty–
At Calvary.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
By God's Word at last my sin I learned–
Then I trembled at the Law I'd spurned,
Till my guilty soul imploring turned to Calvary.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Now I've giv'n to Jesus ev'rything,
Now I gladly own Him as my King,
Now my raptured soul can only sing of Calvary.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
O the love that drew salvation's plan!
O the grace that brought it down to man!
O the mighty gulf that God did span at Calvary.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mo ti lo opo odun s’ofo
Lai ro t’Oluwa t’o ku fun mi
Nko mo pe tori mi l’O se ku
Ni Kalfari

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Anu at’or’fe wa nibe
‘dariji t’a ko le f’enu so
Nibe ni eru ese mi bo
Ni Kalfari

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Or’Olorun f’ese mi han mi
‘Gbana mo wariri f’ofin Re
Titi okan mi fi ‘rele wa
Si Kalfari

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Njee mo fi ‘gbogbo re fun Jesu
Nisiyi mo f’ayo gba l’Oba
Okan ‘dande mi si le k’orin
Ti Kalfari

englishTitle: GOD CAN DO ANYTHING BUT FAIL
yorubaTitle: Olorun Le Se Ohun Gbogbo, Kii Kuna

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
God can do anything, anything, anything,
God can do anything but fail

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
He can save,
He can keep, He can cleanse, and He will,
God can do anything but fail.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
He’s the Alpha and Omega, the beginning and the end,
He’s the fairest of ten thousand to my soul;
God can do anything, anything, anything,
God can do anything but fail.

Oun ni ore ti okan mi fe julo

english.title: Song
english.lyrics:
Cry out and shout
Thou inhabitants of Zion
Cry out and shout
Thou inhabitants of Zion
For great is the Holy one
For great is the Holy one
For great is the Holy one in the midst of thee
Beautiful for situation ×2 (is Zion ×4)

Joy of the earth
Beautiful (is Zion)

Walk about Zion and go round about her

items.title: Song
items.lyrics:
E ho f’ayo enyin olugbe Sioni/2x
Nitori titobi ni Eni Mimo Israeli
