number: 306: SHOW A LITTLE BIT OF LOVE AND KINDNESS

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: If the world from you withhold of its silver and its gold,And you have to get along with meager fare,Just remember, in His Word, how He feeds the little bird,Take your burden to the Lord and leave it there.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: :Leave it there, leave it there,Take your burden to the Lord and leave it there.If you trust and never doubt, He will surely bring you out,Take your burden to the Lord and leave it there.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: If your body suffers pain and your health you can’t regain,And your soul is almost sinking in despair,Jesus knows the pain you feel, He can save and He can heal,Take your burden to the Lord and leave it there.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: When your enemies assail and your heart begins to fail,Don’t forget that God in heaven answers prayer;He will make a way for you and will lead you safely through,Take your burden to the Lord and leave it there.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: When your youthful days are gone and old age is stealing on,And your body bends beneath the weight of care,He will never leave you then, He’ll go with you to the end,Take your burden to the Lord and leave it there.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ti o ba ni wura ati fadaka l’aye
T’o si gbodo rin ona yi la’arin ye
Sugbon se iranti pa, oun se itoju eye
Ko gbogbo wahala re to Jesu wa

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ko gbogbo … isoro re to Olugbala (fun iranlowo)
Gbagbo lai siyemeji
Oun yo si mu o lja
Ko gbogbo aniyan re to Jesu wa(Jesu wa)

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Bi o ban je irora ninu okan re loni
Ti oko igbagbo re si fere ri
Jesu mo irora re
Oun yo si tan ‘soro re
Ko gbogbo wahala re to Jesu wa

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Gbat’awon ota ba yi o ka ni gbogbo ona
Ke pe Jesu yo si gbo adura re
Yo la ‘na iye dun o,
Ouin yo si mu o laja
Ko gbogbo aniyan re to Jesu wa

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Nigba t’ojo re ban lo ti o si ndi arugbo
Ti awon ore si ti ko o sile
Jesu ko ni gbagbe re
Yo mu o de ‘le ogo
Ko gbogbgo aniyan re to Jesu wa

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Kneel at the cross,Christ will meet you there,Come while He waits for you;List to His voice,Leave with Him your careAnd begin life anew.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: :Kneel at the cross,Leave ev'ry care;Kneel at the cross,Jesus will meet you there.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Kneel at the cross,There is room for allWho would His glory share;Bliss there awaits,Harm can ne'er befallThose who are anchored there.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Kneel at the cross,Give your idols up,Look unto realms above;Turn not awayTo life's sparkling cup;Trust only in His love.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Kunle gbadua, Krist’ yo pade re
Wa o duro de o
Gbo ohun Re, f’aniyan re fun
Bere aye otun

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Kunle gbadura, ma s’aniyan/2x
Kunle gbadura, Jesu yo pade re/2x

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Kunle gbadura, Jesu ma npe o
Mu omi iye ni ayo si mbe
F’awon t’a gbala mbe li oke orun

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Kunle gbadura, fese re sile
Ma wa bugbe l’oke mase pada
Si ohun aye, gbekele ife Re

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: They who know the Savior shall in Him be strong,Mighty in the conflict of the right ’gainst wrong;This the blessed promise given in God’s Word,Doing wondrous exploits, they who know the Lord.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: :Victory! victory! Blessed, blood-bought victory!Victory! victory! Vict’ry all the time!As Jehovah liveth, strength divine He givethUnto those who know Him—vict’ry all the time!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: In the midst of battle be thou not dismayed,Though the pow’rs of darkness ’gainst thee are arrayed;God, thy Strength, is with thee, causing thee to stand,Heaven’s allied armies wait at thy command.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Brave to bear life’s testing, strong the foe to meet,Walking like a hero midst the furnace heat,Doing wondrous exploits with the Spirit’s sword,Winning souls for Jesus, praise, oh, praise the Lord!

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Awon t’o mo Jesu, yo j’alagbara
Lati doju ‘ja ko ese at’esu
Ileri t’o daju, ‘nu or’ Olorun
Awon t’o mo Oluwa yio ni ‘segun

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Isegun (beeni) isegun , Isegun t’a f’eje ra
Isegun, Isegun, ‘segun ngbagbogbo
Gbigbe inu Jesu, yio fun wa l’agbara
F’awon t’o mo Oluwa ‘segun daju

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Bi ogun ti ngbona, e mase beru
B’ogun orun apadi tile t’egun
Oluwa wa ntosi yio dun O l’agbara
Gbogbo ogun orun wa nitosi re

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Awon t’o mo Jesu, yio doju k’ota
Won o la ‘na koja ki yo ran won
Won ngbale fun Jesu, pelu ‘da emi
Won jere okan fun Jesu yin Oluwa

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: They who know the Savior shall in Him be strong,Mighty in the conflict of the right ’gainst wrong;This the blessed promise given in God’s Word,Doing wondrous exploits, they who know the Lord.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Victory! victory! Blessed, blood-bought victory!Victory! victory! Vict’ry all the time!As Jehovah liveth, strength divine He givethUnto those who know Him—vict’ry all the time!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: In the midst of battle be thou not dismayed,Though the pow’rs of darkness ’gainstthee are arrayed;God, thy Strength, is with thee, causing thee to stand,Heaven’s allied armies wait at thy command.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Brave to bear life’s testing, strong the foe to meet,Walking like a hero midst the furnace heat,Doing wondrous exploits with the Spirit’s sword,Winning souls for Jesus, praise, oh, praise the Lord!

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
L’eba ona eleruku l’ojokan
Alagbe na ko le ri imole
O joko n’nu osi ati egan re
Gba Jesu de o fun mi ni imole

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
‘Gba Jesu de, o p’agbara ese run
Gba Jesu de, o s’okun wa dayo
O mu ‘banuje at’osi wa kuro
Jesu yo s’ohun gbogbo di otun

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
A le kuro larin ilu alaye
O ngbe larin awon isa oku
Awon em’esu si nd’okunrin na l’oro
Sugbon gba Jesu de, o da ni ‘de

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Igbe aimona ‘dete nke n’nu ‘banuje
Awon odi at’aditi nwa ‘ranwo
Awon eniyan njoro ninu aisan
Gba Jesu de o ko gbogb’eru lo

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Ninu aye, Jesu to fun soro wa
Agbara wa ko le ran wa lowo
Ijatile ati banuje la nri
Sugbon Jesu le tan wahala wa

yorubaTitle: Je Ki Ina Ti Orun Sokale

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Lord, I would be wholly Thine,I would do Thy will divine,From the world and sin and self I would be free;On the altar now I lie,And with all my heart I cry,Let the holy fire from heaven fall on me.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: :Let the fire fall on me,Let the fire fall on me;The fire of Pentecost,Consuming sin and dross,Let the holy fire from heaven fall on me.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: I would have sufficient graceEvery foe to bravely face,And an overcomer evermore to be;That I well may fill my place,And that I may win the race,Let the holy fire from heaven fall on me.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Holy Spirit from above,Fill my longing soul with love,Till the Master’s image all in me may see;Make me gentle, true, and kind,Meek of heart, and humble mindLet the holy fire from heaven fall on me.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: In the kingdom I would stay,There to labor night and day,Any way and anywhere Thy will may be;But that I may do my best,And that others may be blest,Let the holy fire from heaven fall on me.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Bi won ti pejo si yara oke
B’olorun ti palase fun won
Fun ileri, ti Baba se
Ni won wa pelu ‘sokan
Gba t’Emi Mimo t’orun sokale,
bi efufu at’ela ahan
jo Oluwa a nfe bukun Re
f’Emi Mimo Re kun okan wa

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ran agbara, ina Emi
Agbara lat’orun wa
Awa nduro, awa nreti
N’nu gbagbo Olorun wa
Ran agbara, ina Emi
A gbekele ‘leri Re
Lati ‘nu ogo iwaju re
Ran agbara nla Pentikosti

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Bi Elijah lao gbe ogo Re ga
Fun eri otito Re si wa
Olugbala, Oluwosan
Oluwa baptisi wa (a alleluia)
Or’ofe ati ‘gbala ailopin
T’o ti pese f’aiye osi yi
Fun iran ologo yi ati
Oro Re li ao duro fun

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ibukun mjaemu t’a fi fun wa
F’opo aowonj t’Oluwa yo pe
F’awon baba at’omo won
Fun gbogbo enia Re (A Alleluya)
Pel’ayo ‘n’oro Re ti ko le ye
La nsunmo O lati gb’agbara
Wa! Iwo ina Emi mimo
M’okan wa gbina fun ‘soji

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
I'm only human, I'm just a woman
Help me believe in what I could be and all that I am
Show me the stairway I have to climb
Lord, for my sake, teach me to take one day at a time

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
One day at a time, sweet Jesus
That's all I'm asking from You
Just give me the strength to do everyday
What I have to do
Yesterday's gone, sweet Jesus
And tomorrow may never be mine (Ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh)
Lord, help me today, show me the way
One day at a time

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Do You remember when You walked among men?
Well Jesus, You know, if You're looking below, it's worse now than then
Cheating and stealing, violence and crime (Ah-ah-ah-ah)
So for my sake, teach me to take one day at a time

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Nko l’agbara, mo je alailera
Ran mi lowo lati je ohun ti o fe kin je
Fi ona han mi, t’O fe ki ngba
Jowo Oluwa, to isise mi nmi ojojumo

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Isise kookan….. Oluwa
Eyi sa ni ebe mi
Fun mi l’agbara lati se ohun ti o fe ki nse
Ano ti lo… Oluwa
Ng ko m’ohun t’ola le mu wa
Jowo ran mi lowo, farahan mi
Ni ojojumo

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ranti Oluwa, Gbat’o rin nin’aye
Jesu o ranti bi o ti nwole pe ‘ja naa ko rorun
Fun mi lagbara, kin le bori
Jowo Oluwa, to isise m I ni ojojumo

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Central’s never “busy,” always on the line;You may hear from heaven almost any time;’Tis a royal service, free for one and all;When you get in trouble, give this royal line a call.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Telephone to glory, oh, what joy divine!I can feel the current moving on the line,Built by God the Father for His loved and own,We may talk to Jesus through this royal telephone.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: There will be no charges, telephone is free,It was built for service, just for you and me;There will be no waiting on this royal line,Telephone to glory always answers just in time.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Fail to get the answer, Satan’s crossed your wire,By some strong delusion, or some base desire;Take away obstructions, God is on the throne,And you’ll get your answer through this royal telephone.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: If your line is “grounded,” and connection trueHas been lost with Jesus, tell you what to do:Prayer and faith and promise mend the broken wire,Till your soul is burning with the Pentecostal fire.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics: Carnal combinations cannot get controlOf this line to glory, anchored in the soul;Storm and trial cannot disconnect the line,Held in constant keeping by the Father’s hand divine.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
O le ranse s’Orun, nipa adura
O si le ri ‘dahun gba nigbakugba
Enikeni t’o fe, l’anfani wa fun
‘Gba wahala ba de ranti lati gbadura

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Pe Jesu fun ‘ranwo, ‘wo yo si l’ayo
Mo mo pe agabara wa n’nu adura
Olorun lo lana yi f’awon tiRe
Ke pe Jesu fun iranwo ninu adura

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ofe l’ohun gbogbo, ‘wo ko ni sanwo
Anfaani si sile, fun ‘wo at’emi
Adura re yo si lo taara s’Orun
Olorun yo dahun adura re loni yi

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Bi ‘dahun ko ba de, t’esu nse ‘dena
Boya nipa etan, tabi ‘fekufe
Olorun mbe lori ite Re sibe
Mu idiwo kuro, idahun ayo yoo de

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Gbogb’agbara ese, nwon ko le bori
Agbara adura ninu okan wa
Olorun lo fi agbara yi sibe
Lakoko idanwo, a le f’adura segun

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: You have heard of little Moses in the bulrush,You have heard of fearless David and his sling;You have heard the story told of dreaming Joseph,And of Jonah and the whale you often sing.There are many, many others thru the Bible,I should like to meet them all, I do declare!By and by the Lord will surely let us meet themAt the meeting in the air.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: There is going to be a meeting in the air,In the sweet, sweet by and by;I am going to meet you, meet you thereIn that home beyond the sky,Such singing you will hear, never heard by mortal ear'Twill be glorious, I do declare!And God's own Son will be the leading OneAt the meeting in the air.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Many things will there be missing, in that meeting,For the mourner's bench will have no place at all;There will never be a sermon preached to sinners,For the sinner had refused to heed the call.There will be no mourning over wayward loved ones,There will be no lonely nights of pleading prayer;All our burdens and our anguish will be liftedAt the meeting in the air.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: There the doubters will be missing altogether,All the skeptics will be absent on that day;There will be no grumblers present to disturb us,And the Achans will be busy far away.There the saints will have His "Seal upon their foreheads",Dressed in raiment none but ransomed ones can wear;All who have the wedding garments will be presentAt the meeting in the air

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
A ti gbo nipa Mose n’nu igbe ti njo
Ati Dafidi pelu kannakanna
A gbo itan Josefu t’o je alala
Ati Jona t’eja nla gbe mi
Pupo apeere ni Bibeli toka si
Mo fe darapo mo won laipe ojo
Nigbose Olorun yo je ka pelu won
Ni ‘pade l’awosanmo

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ipade kan yoo wa ni awosanmo
L’ojo t’o logo julo
Emi yio fe lati ri o nibe
‘le didan to wa loke
Awa yo gbo orin ti eti ko igbo ri
Ojo ologo julo ni
Jesu Kristi ni yio je olori
Ni ‘pade la’awosanmo

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Opolopo nkan ni ko ni si ni ‘pade
Ko ni si pepe adura lohun mo
A ko ni wasu fun awon elese mo
Anfani fun elese ko ni si mo
Ko ni si banuje lori olufe wa
Akoko f’adura gbigba yoo d’opin
Ibanuje ati irora yo dopin
Ni ‘pade l’awosanmo

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ko ni si aye fun awon oniyemeji
Awon opnija ko nib a wa pejo
Ko ni si idarudapon lok’orun
Ole bi Akani ko ni le de ‘be
Awon eni ‘rapada yo ni ododo
Ao wo won ni aso igunwa funfun
Awon to ni aso ‘yawo ni yo wa n’be
Ni ‘pade l’awosanmo

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: :Living in Thee, Lord, and Thou in me;Constant abiding, this is my plea;Grant me Thy power, boundless and free:Power with men and power with Thee.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Power in prayer, Lord, power in prayer,Here 'mid earth's sin and sorrow and care;Men lost and dying, souls in despair;O give me power, power in prayer!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: My weakened will, Lord, Thou canst renew;My sinful nature Thou canst subdue;Fill me just now with power anew,Power to pray and power to do!

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Teach me to pray, Lord, teach me to pray;Thou art my pattern, day unto day;Thou art my surety, now and for aye;Teach me to pray, Lord, teach me to pray.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ko mi  ba ti ngbadura Oluwa
Eyi l’ebe mi nigbagbogbo
Mo fe mo ‘fe Re at’ona Re
Ko mi b’a ti ngbadura Oluwa

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ki ngbe ‘nu Oluwa, at’Oun ninu m i
Ki nma gbe n’nu Re, gbo ebe mi
Fun mi l’agbra lekunrere
Agbara lati se ife Re

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Fun mi l’agbra lati gbadura
Lye ese yi on ‘banuje
Lati yo okan to nku nu ese
Jo fun mi ni agbara adura

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
‘wo le so agbara mi d’otrun
‘wo le pa agbara ese run n’nu mi
Fi agbara otun re kun mi
Agbara lati se ife Re

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Ko mi b’a ti ngbadura Oluwa
‘wo ni lana mi lojojumo
‘wo ni ‘dakoro mi l’aye yi
Ko mi ba ti ngbadura Oluwa

yorubaTitle: Ao Ma Sise Titi Jesu yo fi De

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: O land of rest, for thee I sigh!When will the moment comeWhen I shall lay my armor byAnd dwell in peace at home?

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
We’ll work till Jesus comes,We’ll work till Jesus comes,We’ll work till Jesus comes,And we’ll be gathered home.
No tranquil joys on earth I know,No peaceful, shelt’ring dome;This world’s a wilderness of woe,This world is not my home.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: To Jesus Christ I fled for rest;He bade me cease to roam,And lean for comfort on His breastTill He conduct me home.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: I sought at once my Savior’s side;No more my steps shall roam;With Him I’ll brave death’s chilling tideAnd reach my heav’nly home.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ile ‘sinmi mo nreti re
‘gba wo nigba yio de
Ti ngo bo ‘hamora sile
Ti ngo wa pelu Kristi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ao…………… sise Jesu
……………….Ao sise
Tit ‘Wo yo fi de
Ao……………..sise
Ao …………………….sise
Lati mu wa lo sile

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ko s’ayo ti mo mo l’aye
Ko si ‘bi isinmi
Aginju egbe l’aye
Aye ki se ‘le mi

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Mo to Jesu wa fun ‘inmi
O ni kin ye kiri
Ki nsa s’aya Oun fun ‘ranwo
Oun yio to mi de ‘le

englishTitle: HIS LOVE IS WONDERFUL TO ME

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: 1 Love divine! Oh, sing the wondrous story,Far and near the glorious news proclaim;How for us God’s only Son was given,Bringing life to all who trust His name.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: :His love is wonderful to me,His love is wonderful to me;For Jesus loved me so,He did to Calv’ry go;His love is wonderful to me.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Love divine, ‘twas manifest in JesusAs He walked and talked by Galilee;He who knew no sin became my Saviour,On the cross He “paid it all” for me.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Love divine, the balm for ev’ry heartache,Love divine, the refuge of my soul;Take my life, possess my inmost nature,Over all my being have control.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ha! Ife orun so tan ‘yanu na
Jakejado orile ede
B’Olorun ti fi Jesu f’araye
To f’iye fun eni to gbagbo

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ife re je’yanu fun mi/2x
O ku iku oro fun mi ni Kalfari
Ife re je ‘yanu fun mi

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ife orun abo fun okan mi
Ife orun abo fun araye
Gba gbogbo aye ati okan mi
F’okan mi se ‘bugbe re titi

number: 318: HIS LOVE IS WONDERFUL TO ME

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Just lean upon the arms of Jesus,He’ll help you along, help you along;If you will trust His love unfailing,He’ll fill your heart with song.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Lean on His arms, trusting in His love;Lean on His arms, all His mercies prove;Lean on His arms, looking home above,Just lean on the Savior’s arms!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Just lean upon the arms of Jesus,He’ll brighten the way, brighten the way;Just follow gladly where He leadeth,His gentle voice obey.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Just lean upon the arms of Jesus,Oh, bring every care, bring every care!The burden that has seemed so heavy,Take to the Lord in prayer.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Just lean upon the arms of Jesus,Then leave all to Him, leave all to Him;His heart is full of love and mercy,His eyes are never dim.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Sa gbeke re le apa Jesu
On yo di o mu titi dopin
B’o ba gbekele ‘fe Re ti ki ye
Yo f’okan re layo

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
ST: Gbeke re le tori ife re ki ye
Gbeke re le, ko si dan anu re wo
Gbeke re le gbpju re soke
Sa gbeke re le Jesu

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Sa f’okan re fun yo gba o la
Jesu kun fun ife at’anu
Fun gbogbo awon t’o gbekele
Ife re ki ye lai

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Knocking, knocking, who is there?Waiting, waiting, O how fair!'Tis a Pilgrim, strange and kingly,Never such was seen before;Ah! my soul, for such a wonderWilt thou not undo the door?Wilt thou not undo the door?

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Knocking, knocking, still He's there,Waiting, waiting, wondrous fair;But the door is hard to open,For the weeds and ivy vineWith their dark and clinging tendrilsEver round the hinges twice,Ever round the hinges twice.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Knocking, knocking what! still there?Waiting, waiting, grand and fair;Yea, the wounded hand still knocketh,And beneath the thorn-wreath'd hairBeam the patient eyes, so tender,Of thy Savior waiting there;Wilt thou keep him waiting there?

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Enikan nduro, o nkankun okan re
Yo ti duro pe to l’ode, laije ko wole
Dide ko si pe E wole, yo fun o l’alafia
Oun ni Olugbala, Oba, se E l’Oluwa re

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Je ki Jesu wole, o ti nkankun tip e
Ma je ko fi o sile lai tun pada mo (lai bukun fun o)

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ojo mbo ti wo yo duro lehin ilekun
L’ojo na ‘wo yo kan lekun sugbon yo pe ju
Nisiyi je ki Jesu ko gba okan re la
O ni lojo itewogba, pe jesu wole

yorubaTitle: Bawo ni Orun Yo ti Dun to

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: We read of a place that’s called heaven,It’s made for the pure and the free;These truths in God’s Word He hath given,How beautiful heaven must be.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: How beautiful heaven must be,Sweet home of the happy and free;Fair haven of rest for the weary,How beautiful heaven must be.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: In heaven no drooping nor pining,No wishing for elsewhere to be;God’s light is forever there shining,How beautiful heaven must be.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Pure waters of life there are flowing,And all who will drink may be free;Rare jewels of splendor are glowing,How beautiful heaven must be.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: The angels so sweetly are singing,Up there by the beautiful sea;Sweet chords from their gold harps are ringing,How beautiful heaven must be.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
A gbo pe orun rere kan wa
F’awon to bo lowo ese
Bibeli mimo o so fun wa
Pe orun je ibi ayo

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
A! orun yo ti dara to
‘bugbe awon alabukun
Orun rere, orun isinmi
A! orun yo ti dara to

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ko sekun tabi ibanuje
Ni ‘lu dara julo yi
Ogo Olorun ni ‘mole Re
Ilu awon ta rapada

englishTitle: BE YE DOERS OF THE WORD

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Out of James one twenty-two
Comes a call for Juniors true.Who will live for Christ the risen Lord:Listen to this trumpet callRinging out to one and all
Be ye doers of the word

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Be ye doers of the Word/4xAnd not hearers, not hearers only,Be ye doers of the Word

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
We would strive for Christ to live;
Time and talents we would give;We would follow Jesus all the way:Tithes and offerings we would bring;We would work and pray and singFor the Master every day.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Kind to others we would be,Jesus likeness they would see;We would keep our bodies cleanand strong:We would strive in school and playTo learn lessons and obey,Live for right and conquer wrong.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Let us serve with all our might;Let us stand for truth and right,Always living for the risen Lord:Come and join our happy throng;Sing with us our joyous song,Be ye doers of the Word.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ka Jakob’ ori kinni
Ese kejilelogun
Ipe fun gbogbo awon odo
T’o fe sin Jesu l’aye
F’eti s’ohun ipe yi
Je oluse oro na

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
E je oluse oro na
Je oluse oro na
E j’oluse oro na
Ma s’olugbo, olugbo nikan
E j’oluse oro na

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ao sa gbogbo ipa wa
Ebun at’akoko wa
Idamewa, ore, lao mu wa
Ao fi gbogbo aiye wa sise
K’orin, gbadura
Fun oba wa lojojo

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Je ka fi gbogbo ‘pa wa
Duro fun otito yi
Je ‘mole fun Jesu t’o jinde
Wa dapo m’egbe wa yi
Wa ba wa korin ayo
Je oluse oro naa

number: 323: BE YE DOERS OF THE WORD

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: The Gospel bells are ringing,Over land, from sea to sea:Blessèd news of free salvationDo they offer you and me.For God so loved the worldThat His only Son He gave;Whosoe’er believeth in HimEverlasting life shall have

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Gospel bells, how they ring;Over land from sea to sea;Gospel bells freely bringBlessèd news to you and me.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: The Gospel bells invite usTo a feast prepared for all;Do not slight the invitation,Nor reject the gracious call.I am the Bread of life;Eat of Me, thou hungry soul;Tho’ your sins be red as crimson,They shall be as white as wool.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: The Gospel bells give warning,As they sound from day to day,Of the fate which doth await themWho forever will delay.Escape ye, for thy life;Tarry not in all the plain,Nor behind thee look, oh, never,Lest thou be consumed in pain.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: The Gospel bells are joyful,As they echo far and wide,Bearing notes of perfect pardon,Thro’ a Savior crucified.Good tidings of great joyTo all people do I bring,Unto you is born a Savior,Which is Christ the Lord and King.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ipe ihinrere Re ndun jakejado ile
Ti ‘gbala fun gbogb’enia, fun ‘wo ati emi
Olorun f’araye o fi omo Re fun wa
Ki gbogbo enit’oba gbnagbo , le ni iye ainipekun

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Gbo ipe……. ‘hinrere
B’o tin dun jakejado
Gbo ipe…… ‘hinrere
T’a mu wa fun gbogb’aye

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Jesu si npe gbogbo wa sibi ase iyawo
Jowo mase aibikita si bi ase iyawo
Jesu ounje iye, je ninu re ki o si ye
B’ese re pon bi ododo, yio fo won fun bi sno

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Gbo bi ipe na ti ndun, mase jafra ore
Ipe naa nso ti idajo fun awon alaigbagbo
Sa asala fun emi re, mase bojuwo ehin
Mase duro ni petele ki o maa ba segbe

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Ipe Alafia ni li o ndun ka gbogb’aye
O nso ti idariji Jesu ti a kan m’agbalebu
Ipe ayo didun fun gbogbo araye
A bi olugbala fun o; Jesu Oba awon oba

englishTitle: BE YE STRONG IN THE LORD

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: “Be ye strong in the Lord and the power of His might!”Firmly standing for the truth of His Word;He shall lead you safely through the thickest of the fight,You shall conquer in the name of the Lord!

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: :Firmly stand for the right!On to vict’ry at the King’s command!For the honour of the Lord,and the triumph of His Word,In the strength of the Lord firmly stand.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: “Be ye strong in the Lord and the power of His might!”Never turning from the face of the foe;He will surely by you stand, as you battle for the right:In the power of His might onward go!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: “Be ye strong in the Lord and the power of His might!”For His promises shall never, never fail;He will hold thy right hand, while battling for the right,Trusting Him thou shalt for evermore prevail.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
J’alagbara ninu Kristi ati ‘pa agbara Re
Durp sinsin f’otito oro Re
Yo mu o koja lo laarin ogun to gbona
‘wo yo segun l’oruko Oluwa

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Duro gboin f’otito
Lo si segun li ase Oba
Fun Ola Oluwa re
Duro gboin l’agbara Oluwa

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
J’alagbara ninu Krist’ ati ‘pa agbara Re
Ma pehinda niwaju ota
Ti o duro ti o b’o ti nja fun otito
Te siwaju ninu ‘pa agbara Re

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
J’alagbra ninu Krist’ ati ‘pa agbara Re
Tori ileri Re ki yo ye lae
Yio di owow re nu, gbat’o nja fun otito
Gbekele Jesu ‘wo yo si segun

number: 326: BE YE STRONG IN THE LORD

englishTitle: WHEN I CAN READ MY TITLE CLEAR
yorubaTitle: Gbati Mo Le Ka Apele Na

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: When I can read my title clearTo mansions in the skies,I'll bid farewell to every fear,And wipe my weeping eyes.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Should earth against my soul engage,And fiery darts be hurled,Then I can smile at Satan's rage,And face a frowning world.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Let cares like a wild deluge come,Let storms of sorrow fall!May I but safely reach my home:My God, my heaven my all.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: There shall I bathe my weary soulIn seas of heavenly rest,And not a wave of trouble rollAcross my peaceful breast.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
‘Gba mo le oye mi re
Ni ibugbe l’oke
Mo dagbere f’eru gbogbo
Mo n’omije mi nu

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
B’aye koju ija s’okan mi
Ta nso oko sii
Gbana mo le r’erin satani
Ki nsi doju ko aye

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
K’aniyan de ti ‘kun omi
K’iji ‘banuje ja
Ki nsa de ‘le Alafia
Olorun gbagbo mi

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Nibe l’okan mi yo luwe
Ninu okan isinmi
Ko si wahala to le de
Si ‘bale aya mi

number: 327: WHEN I CAN READ MY TITLE CLEAR

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
1 There's a city that looks o'er the valley of death,
And its glories can never be told;
There the sun never sets, and the leaves never fade,
In that beautiful city of gold.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
There the sun never sets,
and the leaves never fade;
And the eyes of the faithful our Saviour behold,
In that beautiful city of gold.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
There the King, our Redeemer, the Lord whom we love,
All the faithful with joy shall behold:
There the righteous forever shall shine as the stars,
In that beautiful city of gold.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Every soul we have led to the foot of the cross,
Every lamb we have brought to the fold--
Shall be there as bright jewels, our crowns to adorn,
In that beautiful city of gold.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
There we'll tell how he loved and redeemed us from sin,
But the half even there can't be told;
There we'll sing the new song with the blood-washed at home,
In that beautiful city of gold

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Aka nipa ilu ologo ni
Bi t’awon oloto yo pejo
A ti gbo nipa ona ologo na
Bi ti ita re je wura

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Mo fe lo si ilu (ilu Olorun)
T’a fi Jasperi se loso (se loso)
Nko ni y’ese lae/2x
Lona si ilu ologo naa

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Johannu ri l’erekusu Patmo
O ri isipaya ilu naa
Okuta Jasperi l’ogiri Re
Ilu ti ‘ta re je wura

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
A ko ni wa orun tab’osupa
Ogo Olorun yo gba be kan
Olorun ni yo je imole re
Wura la fi se ‘be loso

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Mo nsaferi lati de ilu naa
Ki nle lo ayeraiye nibe
Mo fe gbe pelu olugbala mi
Ni ‘lu ti ‘ta re je wura

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
From God's heaven to a manger
From great riches to the poor
Came the Son of God to seek and save
From the azure halls of heaven
To a rough and rugged cross
Jesus came, and there His life for all He gave

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Redeeming love, a love that knows no limit
Redeeming love, a love that shall not die
My soul shall sing throughout the endless ages
With choirs extolling this great love on high

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
From a loving, Heavenly Father
To a world that knew Him not
Came the man of sorrows, Christ the Lord
In my wanderings He found me
Bought my soul with His own blood
Gave to me a peace this world could not afford

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Jesu fi ‘te ogo Re sile
O di otosi tori re
Ki o le gba ‘won ti o nu la
O f’ola nla orun sile
O jiya lori ‘gi oro
O si fi aye re rubno f’ese wa

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ife orun, ife ti ko l’egbe ni
Ife orun, ife ti ko le ku
Okan mi yo ma korin ‘fe titi lae
Pelu egbe akorin loke orun

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Lat’orun si aye osi yi
Kristi eni ‘banuje
Mo ti sako lo, o w mi ri
O f’eje Re setutu fun mi
O si fun mi li Alafia
Ti aye ko si le fi fun mi

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Life is easy, when you're up on the mountain
And you've got peace of mind, like you've never known
But when things change and you're down in the valley
Don't lose faith, for you're never alone

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
And the God on the mountain is still God in the valley
When things go wrong, He'll make them right
And the God of the good times is still God in the bad times
The God of the day is still God in the night

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
We talk of faith when we're up on the mountain
But talk comes so easy when life's at its best
But in the valley of trials and temptations
That's when faith is really put to the test

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
‘Gba wa lori oke, aye wa yi o r’orun
‘Gba ni Alafia ti a ko mo ri
Sugbon ‘yipada de, Gba wa l’afonifoji
Sa ni ‘gbagbo, tori Jesu wa n’be

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Olorun ori oke, li Olorun petele
O m’ohun to wo, bo sipo
Olorun nigba ayo, l’Olorun ‘gba ‘banuje
Olorun nigba osan, Oun l’Olorun oru

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
A nsoro igbagbo, Gbat’a wa lori oke
O si nrorun pelu, Gb’ohun gbogbgo nlo dede
Sugbon nigba ‘danwo, ati iyiriwo
Ni ao mo bi ‘gbagbo wa ti jinle to

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Great is Thy faithfulness, O God my Father;there is no shadow of turning with Thee;Thou changest not, Thy compassions, they fail not;as Thou hast been, Thou forever wilt be.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Great is Thy faithfulness!Great is Thy faithfulness!Morning by morning new mercies I see;all I have needed Thy hand hath provided:great is Thy faithfulness, Lord, unto me!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Summer and winter, and springtime and harvest;sun, moon, and stars in their courses abovejoin with all nature in manifold witnessto Thy great faithfulness, mercy, and love.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Pardon for sin and a peace that endureth,Thine own dear presence to cheer and to guide;strength for today and bright hope for tomorrow:blessings all mine, with ten thousand beside!

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Titoi l’aanu re, Oluwa mi
Ko si ayidayida lodo Re
Ko yi pada aanu re duro laelae
Wo t’o ti wa ti yo si wa titi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Titobi l’aanu re
Titobi l’aanu re
Ojojumo ni mo nr’aanu re gba
Gbogbo ohun ti mo fe lowo re fun mi
Tibobi l’owo Re Oluwa mi

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
‘Darijii fun ese at’alafia
Ifarahan re lati ma to wa
Agbara ati ‘reti fun ojo ola
Egbegberun ‘bukun re je ti wa

englishTitle: I JUST FEEL LIKE SOMETHING GOOD
yorubaTitle: Mo Ni Idaniloju Pe Ohun Titun Yo Sele

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
I just feel like something good is about to happen
I just feel like something good is on its way
He has promised that he'd open all of heaven
And brother, it could happen any day
When God's people humble themselves and call on Jesus
And they look to heaven expecting as they pray
I just feel like something good is about to happen
And brother, this could be that very day

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
I have learned in all that happens just to praise Him
For I knew he's working all things for my good
Every tear I shed is worth all the investment
For I know He'll see me through, He said He would
He has promised eye nor ear can hardly fathom
All the things He has in store for those who pray
I just feel like something good is about to happen
And brother, this could be that very day

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Yes, I've noticed all the bad news in the paper
And it seems like things get bleaker every day
But for this child of God it makes no difference
For it's bound to get much better either way
I have never been more thrilled about tomorrow
Sunshine's always bursting through the skies of gray
I just feel like something good is about to happen
And brother, this could be (my brother)
Brother, this could be (my sister)
Brother, this could be that very day

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mo ni daniloju p’ohun titun kan yo sle
Mo ni ‘daniloju p’ohun titun mbo l’ona
O ti seleri pe oun yo si ‘bu orun
Arakunrin o le sele ngbakugba
T’awon om’Olorun ba fi ‘rele pe Jesu
Ta nsi ndigba w’orun f’esi adura
Mo ni ‘daniloju p’ohuin titun kan yoo sele
Arakunrin o le je nisiyi

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Mo nwoye ohun buburu ninu iwe
Ta nsi ri pe nkan buru si lojojo
Sugbon eyi ko ri be f’om’Olorun
nitoripe nkan yo ma dara si
nko se aniyan nipa ojo ola
toripe ‘mole o jade ninu ikuku
mo ni ‘daniloju p’ohun titun kan yo sele

items.title: Coda
items.lyrics:
Arakunrin o le je
Arabinrin o le je
Gbogbo eniyan o le je nisisiyi

number: 332: I JUST FEEL LIKE SOMETHING GOOD

englishTitle: I WANT TO BE A WORKER

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: I want to be a worker for the Lord,I want to love and trust His holy word,I want to sing and pray, and be busy ev'ry day,In the vineyard of the Lord.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: I will work, I will pray,In the vineyard, in the vineyard of the Lord;I will work, I will pray, I will labor ev'ry day,In the vineyard of the Lord.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: I want to be a worker ev'ry day,I want to lead the erring in the wayThat leads to heav'n above, where all is peace and love,In the kingdom of the Lord.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: I want to be a worker strong and brave,I want to trust in Jesus' pow'r to save,All who will truly come shall find a happy homeIn the kingdom of the Lord.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: I want to be a worker, help me, Lord,To lead the lost and erring to Thy wordThat points to joys on high, where pleasures never die,In the kingdom of the Lord.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mo fe osise fun Oluwa mi
Ngo ni igbekele n’nu oro re
Ngo koring ngo gbadura
Ngo sise lojojumo
Ninu ogba Oluwa

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ngo sise ngbadura
Ninu ogba, ninu ogba Oluwa
Ngo sise ngo gbadura
Ngo sise lojojumo
Ninu ogba Oluwa

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Mo fe je osise lojojumo
Lati to asako si ona
To lo tara s’orun
Nib’alafia ati ‘fe
Ninu ogba Oluwa

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Mo fe osise t’o ni ‘gboya
Ngo gbekele Jesu to ngba ni la
Awon t’o f’ooto wa
Yo ni ile ayo kan
Ninu ‘joba Oluwa

number: 333: I WANT TO BE A WORKER

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Let me touch Him, let me touch Jesus
Let me touch Him as He passes by
So when I shall reach out to others
They shall know him
They shall live and not die

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Oh to be His hand extended,
Reaching out to the oppressed.
Let me touch Him, let me touch Jesus,
So that others may know and be blessed.

english.title: Verse  2
english.lyrics:
I was straying so far from Jesus
I was lonely, had no peace within
Then the hand of my savior touched me
Now I'm reaching to others in sin

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
There's a river, a river flowing
From within and to cleanse my soul
And the flow sets my heart to glowing
Holy spirit, more than silver or gold

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ki nsa le f’owo mi kan Jesu
Ki nf’owo kan b’o ti nkoja lo
‘Gba o ba d’odo elomiran
Won o mo Jesu , won o si sin Jesu

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
B’o ti n’owo agbara Re
D’odo awon alailera
Ki nsa le f’owo mi kan Jesu
K’aye le mo, ki won si le ye

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Oodo kan nsan ninu okan mi
Odo ayo, odo Alafia
‘yanu sele ninu aye mi
Eje Jeu we okan mi mo

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Elijah made a sacrificeTo offer to Jehovah;It had been wet with water thrice,Baal’s sacrifice was over.Elijah prayed: the fire came downAnd licked the water all around;So doubting ones believed, and foundElijah’s God was living.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Elijah’s God still lives today,To take the guilt of sin away;And when I pray my heart’s desire,Upon my soul He sends the fire.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Elijah’s God still lives todayAnd answers still by fire;My friend, just let Him have His way;He’ll grant your heart’s desire.Consume the sacrifice you make,And bid your slumbering soul awake;The chains of inbred sin will break;Elijah’s God is living.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Elijah’s God still lives todayAnd answers still by power,As when Elijah prayed for rain,God answered with a shower.If you would have your soul refreshedWith rain that falls from Heaven,You must pray through like all the rest,And showers shall be given.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
A ka nipa okunrin kan
Eelijah ni ooko re
Nitori ese gbinle kan
O gbadura s’Olorun
A ka pe fun odun meta
Ko si ojo fun won
Tori Olorun gbo adura Elijah
Lat’orun wa
Chorus:
Olorun Elijah mbo loni
Ogo f’oruko re
B’awon omo re ha gbadura
O dahun ebe won
O nsakoso aye
Gbogbo eda nteriba fun un
B’awa ba ti fi ‘gbagbo bere
Yo dahun adura wa

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
O pe gbogbo woli Baali
Won ke pe Olorun won
Won ke pe Baali fun ‘ranwo
Sugbon ko le f’ohun
Sugbon Elijah kigbe pe Olorun alaye
Olorun si fi ‘na dahun adura Elijah

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Wooli Olorun alaye lo sori oke Karmel’
O tun gbadura s’Olorun
Wipe ko si orun
O so edun re f’Olorun
Olorun gb’ohun re
Olorun fi ojo dahun adura Elijah

yorubaTitle: Fun mi ni Isepo Agbara Meji

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Give Me Lord A Double PortionLong ago in days of old, stood a man of God we’re told,As he talked to Elijah that day;His request he did repeat, standing at Elijah’s feet,“A double portion” I can hear him say.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Give me, Lord, a double portion, pour Thy Spirit on me,Thru eyes of faith Thy wondrous works I can see,But I need Thy helping hand, in this troubled, sinful land,Give me, Lord, a double portion from Thee.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: As Elijah stood that day, to Elisha he did say,“Ask me what I shall do unto thee,”And Elisha then replied, walking at Elijah’s side,“A double portion, let it fall on me.”

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Lord, I always to Thee, pray, just for strength from day to day,But I see there’s so much to be done,That I have to kneel anew and this favor ask of you,A double portion — this fight must be won.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Nigba aye atijo
Enia Olorun kan wa
Bi o ti mba Elijah soro
O tenuop ibere re
Fun Elijah lojojo
Ilopo meji ni o mbebe fun

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Fun mi ni agbara re
Da emi Re le mi
Ki ri ‘se iyanu Re laye mi
Fun mi l’ore ofe Re
Ninu aye osi yi
Fun mi ni ilopo meji agbara re

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Bi Elijah ti duro
O wi fun Elisa pe
Bere ohun t’o fe kin se fun o
Elisa si dahun pe
Ninu agbara Olorun
Ilopo meji, je ko ba le mi

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Oluwa mi mo mbebe
Fun agbara lojojo
Fun iranwo lati gbadura
Ki nwa lori ekun mi
Ki nsi bere lowo Re
Fun ilopo meji
Lati ja ajasegun

englishTitle: IN THE HOLLOW OF HIS HANDS

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: In the hollow of His hand He will hide meWhen doubt and sin draw near,Though no earthly friend may walk beside me,I rest secure from fear.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: I know whate’er betide me,His hand will safely guide me,His love will ever hide meIn the hollow of His hand.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: In the hollow of His hand He will hide meWhen the storm is on the deep,And I know whatever may betide me,His vigil He will keep.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: In the hollow of His hand He will hide meWhen the storms of life sweep by,To the harbor safe He will guide me,Where His blessed islands lie.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Tori Jesu je amona fun mi
Ko s’ewu ohunkohun to le je
Yo gba mi lowo iji ati irumi
L’abe ojiji owo Re

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
L’abe ojiji owo Re (3x)
(L’ab’ojiji owo ojiji owo Re)
Olugbala pa mi mo titi lae
L’abe ojiji owo Re

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
O fi owo ife Re pa mi mo
Oro Alafia lo nso fun mi
Ko s’ewu Olorun ti di mi mu
L’abe ojiji owo Re

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Yo pa mi mo ko ni fi mi sile
Aye ki yo le gba mi lowo Re
Mo mo pe yo to mi titi d’opin
L’abe ojiji owo Re

number: 337: IN THE HOLLOW OF HIS HANDS

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
I've told all my troubles goodbye,
Goodbye to each tear and each sigh.
This world where I roam
cannot be my home,
I'm bound for that home in the sky.
I walk and I talk with my Lord,
I feast every day on His word,
Heaven is near and I can't stay here
Goodbye world, goodbye.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
I won't have the blues anymore
When I step across to that shore.
And I'll never pine
for I'll leave behind
My heartaches and cares ever more.
A day maybe two then goodbye,
Goodbye to each sorrow and sigh.
Heaven is near and I can't stay here,
Goodbye world, goodbye.
Bridge:
Now don't you weep for me when I'm gone
For I won't have to leave here alone.
And when I hear that last trumpet sound
My feet won't stay on the ground.
I'm gonna rise with a shout, gonna fly,
Gonna rise with my Lord in the sky.
Heaven is near and I can't stay here,
Goodbye world, goodbye.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
O digbose fun aye yi, ‘banuje, wahala ti tan
Aye osi yi k’yo je ile mi, Emi nlo si ile l’oke
Emi ti ba Oluwa rin, mo pese Re mo lojojo
Emi ko ;e duro nihin mo; aye o digbose

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Mase sokun fun mi ‘gba mba lo
Toripe Jesu yo pelu mi
Gba ‘pe ikehin ba si dun
Ese mi yo kuro nile
Emi yo kuro nile
Emi o fo lo soke orun
Ngo pade Jesu l’awosanmo
Emi ko le duro nihin mo
Aye o digbose

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ko si ‘soro fun mi mo, ‘Gba mo ba de ‘bode orun
‘banuje dopin ise ti pari, ati nu omije mi nu
Ojo na ko nip e de mo; ti a o pade l’awosanmo
Emi ko le duro nitori mo, aye o digbose

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Thy Saviour calls! oh, come and seeWhat things he hath prepared for theeLife, love, and joy, from God on high,By Christ himself to thee brought nigh.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: "Him that cometh, him that cometh, no wise,I will in no wise cast out;Him that cometh, him that cometh,Him that cometh to me,I will in no wise, I will in no wise,I will in no wise cast out."

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Thy Saviour calls! oh, can it beThat call has no sweet charm for thee!Wilt thou not turn and give him heed?Wilt thou not think while he doth plead?

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Thy Saviour calls! he knows thy sin:But trust him now, he'll enter in:And he thy heart will purify,And ev'ry needed grace supply.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Olugbala yin npe, e wa
Wo ‘hun to ti pese fun yin
Iye, ife ati ayo;
Ti Jesu mu wa lat’oke

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
SA: Enit’o ba wa, enikan, eni to ba to mi wa
TB: Enit’o ba wa, enikeni ti o ba to mi wa
All: Emi k’yo ta nu /2x
SA: Enit’ o ba wa, enikeni, eni ti o ba to mi wa
TB: Enit’ o ba wa, enikeni ti o ba to mi wa
All: Emi k’yo ta nu, Emi ki yo ta nu
Emi ki yo ta nu

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Olugbala mo ese yin
Gbagbo on yo si gba yin la
On yo si we okan yin mo
Yo si f’ore ofe gba yin la

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Songs of praise the angels sang,heaven with alleluias rang,when creation was begun,when God spake and it was done.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Songs of praise awoke the mornwhen the Prince of peace was born;songs of praise arose when hecaptive led captivity.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Heaven and earth must pass away;songs of praise shall crown that day:God will make new heavens and earth;songs of praise shall hail their birth.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: And shall we alone be dumbtill that glorious kingdom come?No, the church delights to raisepsalms and hymns and songs of praise.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics: Saints below, with heart and voice,still in songs of praise rejoice;learning here, by faith and love,songs of praise to sing above.

english.title: Verse 6
english.lyrics: Hymns of glory, songs of praise,Father, unto thee we raise,Jesu, glory unto thee,with the Spirit, ever be.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Jesu ti so ‘hun pupo fun mi
O tara re ji ni Kalfari
Ngo gboran si ase ati itoiju Re (ati ‘toni Re)
Ngo sangbese ‘fe ti mo je
Fun ohun to ti se fun mi
Lojojumo ng o korinj yin si Oluwa mi (orin iyin)
A: Ngo yin oJesu
STB: Ngo o yin Jesu
A: Ng o wole fun o
STB: Wole fun Jesu
A: Lojo ologo kan oju mi yo ri o
B: Ng o fi more mi han
STA: Fun o Jesu
B: Ng o gbe o ga
STA: Titi a….ye
All: Ngo ma ko orin iyin si o
Titi ojo aye mi yo dopin

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Mo feran Re si lojojumo
O si nda ‘bukun Re le mi
Tori Jesu rin pelu mi, onto sise (o je mo le mi)
Emi ko ni ‘se kan to pe, tin go fi fun Oluwa mi
Sugbon emi yo ma korin ‘yin re lojojo (si Oluwa mi)

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
The Lord told Joshua to go to Jericho,
And to march sev’n times a round;
He followed faithfully the blessed Lord’s command,
And the walls came tumbling down.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
If you are trusting in the power of the blood,
And you hope to wear a crown;
Go forward quickly, and obey the holy word,
Walls of doubt will tumble down.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
The Lord is calling, sinner, come to Him today,
Turn from this vain world’s renown;
If you will follow Him in faith, like Joshua,
Walls of sin will tumble down.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Yes, the walls (yes the walls….)came tumbling down;
Joshua, (Joshua) marched seven times ’round,
Then the walls (then the walls, mighty walls) came tumbling down,
And the walls came tumbling down.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Oluwa ran Joshua lo si Jeriko
Lati yika l’emeje
Josua mu gbogbo ase Oloun se
Odi na si wo lu ‘le

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ipe dun (ipe dun) odi wo lu ‘le
Josua (Josua) segun Jeriko
B: Odi na……………. wo lu ‘le beere
A: ……….odi na …….. wo lu ‘le beere
S: ………………….odi na---- wo lu ‘le beere
T: ……………………gbogbo re wo lu ‘le beere
All: Odin a si wo lu ‘le

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Bi o ba gbekele agbara eje na
Ti o si nfe ni ‘segun
Ji giri, mu gbogbo oro Olorun se
Iyemeji yo fo lo

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Olorun npe elses, je ‘pe na loni
F’aye asan yi sile
Bi o ba ni igbagbo bi ti Josua
Ide ese re yo tu

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Helping the widows and Orphans in their need.
Healing the Sick ones and bind the heart that bleed.
Feeding the hungry concerns the Lord above.
By this we serve him and demonstrate His Love.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
:
Cups of cold water given in Jesus name,
Cups of cold waters are never given in vain.
Someday in Heavens when we meet the Lord,
Each deed of kindness will bring a rich reward.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Sharing the Gospel with sinners gone astray,
Holding the light up so they can find their way.
Lifting up the fallen, this we must surely do,
If is our calling as Christians we are through.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
J’oluranlowo f’awon to s’alaini
Si je itunu f’eni t’o banuje
Olorun l’orun yoo b’awon t’abi npa
Bayi la nfi ‘fe Olorun han si won

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ago omi tutu, ti a fi fun mi
Ni oruko Jesu, ki yo si lo lasan
L’ojo kan l’Orun,
Ngo r’Oluwa mi
Ngo si gba ere ise ti mo ti se

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Tan ihinrere laarin awon asako
Si tan imole si oju ona won
Gb’eni subu ro, ojuse re l’eyi
Si je olooto ai ‘pe t’a pe wa si

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: The King is coming in gloryTo catch His bride away,It may be in the morningIt may be at midday,At the even or midnight;The trump will sound so clear,The dead in Christ, and we that live,His voice shall hear.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: The King is coming, hallelujah!He’s coming in the air,The fig tree is budding,The signs are everywhere,The King is coming, hallelujah!He’s coming in the air,He’s coming, hallelujah!To catch His bride away.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Behold! He cometh, and leaping,And skipping o’er the hills;Like the young roe, like the young hart,My soul with rapture thrills;Thru the window He’s looking,Thru the lattice work is seen,The winter’s past, the rain is o’er,The figs are green.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: The King is coming,Be ready, To meet Him on that day;With your heart right, with your robes white,And in this holy way;Like the lightning that flashesIn the twinkling of an eye,Our Lord shall come to claim His own,He’s drawing nigh.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: The saints are looking ever upwardWhile journ’ing on their way.He’s coming, hallelujah!To catch His bride away.The saints are looking ever upwardWhile journ’ing on their way.He’s coming, hallelujah!To catch His bride away.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Oba wa mbo wa ‘nu ogo Lati m’ayanfe lo
O le je ni owuro tabi ni asale, ni osan, ni oru
Ipe na yio si dun, oku at atilaye ‘nu Kristi yoo gbo ipe

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Jesu Oluwa mbo Halleluya
O mbo l’awosanmi, awon amin l’ayika
Fihan pe ki yoo pe de
Ayanfe reti l’ojojumo fun ipadabo Re
O mbo wa Halleluyah lato m’ayanfe lo

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Wo O de tan, ni kanakan o mbio l’atoke wa
Gege bi itansan orun, okan mi kun f’ayo
Mo kiyesi l’atoke awon amin fihan,
Oko ti pon tan, Akoko ikore ri de

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Oba naa mbo wa, Nje o setan lati lo pade Re?
S’okan re pe, s’aso re mo, l’ona iwa mimo yi
Bi itansan ti mole ni iseju aaya
Oluwa de tan lati m’ayanfe Re lo.

englishTitle: LEAD ME TO SOME SOULS TODAY

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Lead me to some soul today;O teach me, Lord, just what to say;Friends of mine are lost in sin,And cannot find their way.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Lead me to some way-ward soul,To one who's wandered from the fold;Help me turn him unto Thee,Thy blessings to behold.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Lead me from self-righteousness,May Christ always be seen in me;How can I do anything less,Than lead more souls to Thee?

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Open hearts of those I love,To hear and heed the gospel call;May they start to heav'n above,And may they never fall.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics: Few there are who seem to care,And few there are who pray;Melt my heart and fill my life;Give me one soul today.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
To mi sokan kan l’oni
Ko mi lohun tin go so
Won ko fe m’ona
Die l’awon ti ngbadura
B’okan mi soro l’oni
Ki pe ‘sako wa ‘le

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Pea won asako wa ‘le
Ti won ko ti m’ona igbala
Won ko olumoran sile
Won kegan oro ‘lorun
Be won wa sori pepe
Ki won le ri ‘gbala

number: 345: LEAD ME TO SOME SOULS TODAY

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: There’s no disappointment in Heaven,No weariness, sorrow or pain;No hearts that are bleeding and broken,No song with a minor The clouds of our earthly horizonWill never appear in the sky,For all will be sunshine and gladness,With never a sob or a sigh.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: I’m bound for that beautiful city,My Lord has prepared for His own;Where all the redeemed of all agesSing Glory! around the white throne;Sometimes I grow homesick for Heaven,And the glories I there shall behold;What a joy that will be when my Savior I see,In that beautiful city of gold.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: We’ll never pay rent for our mansion,The taxes will never come due,Our garments will never grow threadbare,But always be fadeless and new,We’ll never be hungry or thirsty,Nor languish in poverty there,For all the rich bounties of HeavenHis sanctified children will share.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: There’ll never be crepe on the doorknob,No funeral train in the sky;No graves on the hillsides of glory,For there we shall nevermore die.The old will be young there forever,Transformed in a moment of time;Immortal we’ll stand in His likeness,The stars and the sun to outshine.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ijatile ko si li orun
Ko si aare tabi ‘rora
Ki yo si ibanuje mo
Orin k’yo d’apo m’aro mo
Gbogbo ‘sudede wa yi
Ki yo f’arahn l’ohun mo
Tori ayo ni yo wa l’orun
Ekun ko le r’aye  nibe

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ilu t’o dara yi ni mo nlo
Ti Krist’ pese f’awon tiRe
Nibi t’awon eni ‘rapada
Nko ogo yi ‘te funfun ka
Okan mi nwona fun ‘le orun
At’ogo tin go ri ni ‘lu na
Ayo mi yo po gba mo r’olugbala mi
Ni ‘lu ti ita re je wura

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
A k’yo sanwo ile lohun mo
Owow ori ko ni si mo
Aso wa ki yi o gbo mo lae
Won o funfun nigbagbogbo
Ebi at’ongbe ko ni si mo
Osi oun are yo d’opin
Nitori gbogbo oro orun
Ni yo je t’awon omo Re

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Watch the wind blow your cigarette smoke
Through my window and out to the sky
This message sent, drilled into your heart
But now the ink will fade
Before the night is through my dear

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Where were you when the cracks were forming
Where were you when it all caved in
You were sleeping safe that morning
Holding insecurities that burrowed underneath your skin
And fade away

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
All alone - another twisted moment's gone
That will never pass this way again
And through it all i thought there'd be some shred of hope
But faith i've found will do you in
And all the words that build into
A bridge of love between me and you
Will stumble, crack and fail to fly
And now my only one, where have you gone
Are you another heart that i must sing goodbye my dear

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Where were you when the cracks were forming
Where were you when it all caved in
You were sleeping safe that morning
Holding insecurities that burrowed underneath your skin
And fade away

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
F’opo odun ni mo ngbe ti nko naani olugbala
Laini ‘reti ni mo nrin ati n’nu ewu
Sugbon l’ojo kan mo r’agbelebu
Mo kepe olugbala, o dariji, o gb’okan mi la

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
N’nu ekun mo r’Olugbala
N’nu ekun mo r’Oluwa
Gba mo gbadua mo ri ‘lekun orun t’o si
Nigba naa ti ko ni si ekun mo

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Nikehin l’orekun mi, mo gbadura s’Olugbala
Eese ti ‘kuku bo mi t’o su dudu
‘Gbana o gbo adura mi b’o ti se ‘leri ninu oro Re
O dariji mi o re mi lekun

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: God sent His son, they called Him Jesus;He came to love, heal and forgive;He lived and died to buy my pardon,An empty grave is there to prove my Savior lives!

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Because He lives, I can face tomorrow,Because He lives, all fear is gone;Because I know He holds the future,And life is worth the living,Just because He lives!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: How sweet to hold a newborn baby,And feel the pride and joy he gives;But greater still the calm assurance:This child can face uncertain days because He Lives!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: And then one day, I'll cross the river,I'll fight life's final war with pain;And then, as death gives way to victory,I'll see the lights of glory and I'll know He lives!

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Olorun f’araye o f’omo Re
Se etutu f’aye ese
O wa o lu fun ‘dariji wa
Iyemeji ko si, Olugbala jinde

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
O mbe l’aye, mo mo p’ola daju
O mbe l’aye, ko s’ewu mo
Tori on lo nsakoso ojo ola
Aibale okan mi sinmi
Jesu mbe laye (o mbe laye)

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Bee l’ojo kan, ngo rekoja odo
N’nu iwaya ijakadi
Gbana ngo gbe ‘ku mi ni ‘segun
Ngo f’ayo ri olugbala mi n’nu ogo

englishTitle: JUST OVER IN THE GLORY LAND

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: I’ve a home prepared where the saints abide,Just over in the gloryland;And I long to be by my Savior’s side,Just over in the gloryland.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Just over in the gloryland,I’ll join the happy angel band,Just over in the gloryland;Just over in the gloryland,There with the mighty host I’ll stand,Just over in the gloryland.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: I am on my way to those mansions fair,Just over in the gloryland;There to sing God’s praise, and His glory share,Just over in the gloryland.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: What a joyful thought that my Lord I’ll see,Just over in the gloryland;And with kindred saved, there forever be,Just over in the gloryland.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: With the bloodwashed throng I will shout and sing,Just over in the gloryland;Glad hosannas to Christ, the Lord and King,Just over in the gloryland.

yorubaTitle: Olorun Fun Wa ni Ile Onigbagbo

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: God, give us Christian homes!Homes where the Bible is loved and taught,Homes where the Master's will is sought,Homes crowned with beauty Your love has wrought;God, give us Christian homes;God, give us Christian homes!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: God, give us Christian homes!Homes where the father is true and strong,Homes that are free from the blight of wrong,Homes that are joyous with love and song;God, give us Christian homes;God, give us Christian homes!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: God, give us Christian homes!Homes where the mother, in caring quest,Strives to show others Your way is best,Homes where the Lord is an honored guest;God, give us Christian homes;God, give us Christian homes!

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: God, give us Christian homes!Homes where the children are led to knowChrist in His beauty who loves them so,Homes where the altar fires burn and glow;God, give us Christian homes;God, give us Christian homes!

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: I will sing of my Redeemer,And His wondrous love to me;On the cruel cross He suffered,From the curse to set me free.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Sing, oh, sing of my Redeemer,With His blood He purchased me;On the cross He sealed my pardon,Paid the debt, and made me free.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: I will tell the wondrous story,How my lost estate to save,In His boundless love and mercy,He the ransom freely gave.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: I will praise my dear Redeemer,His triumphant pow’r I’ll tell,How the victory He givethOver sin, and death, and hell.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: I will sing of my Redeemer,And His heav’nly love to me;He from death to life hath brought me,Son of God with Him to be.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Savior, lead me lest I stray,Gently lead me all the way;I am safe when by Thy side,I would in Thy love abide.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Lead me, lead me, Savior,lead me, lest I stray;Gently down the stream of time,Lead me, Savior, all the way.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Thou the refuge of my soul,When life's stormy billows roll;I am safe when by Thy side,All my hopes on Thee rely.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Savior, lead me, then at last,When the storm of life is past;To the land of endless day,Where all tears are wiped away.

englishTitle: I CAN TELL YOU THE TIME

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
I remember the time…….. when in darkness I wandered (farther from home)
On the mountain of sin…… I had traveled so long, (I had traveled so long;)Like the prodigal son……. all my goods I had squandered (sadly I'd roam)But the Savior came in and He gave me a song, ('twas a beautiful song.)
I can tell you now the time (I can tell you the time)I can take you to the place  (I can show you the place)Where the Lord saved me (Where the Lord saved me)by His wonderful grace (by His wonderful grace)But I cannot tell you how (For I know not the how)and I cannot tell you why (and I know not the why)
But He'll me all about it (He will tell me all about it)
in the by and by, (in the by and by)

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Just a sinner was I………far away from my Saviour (going alone)With no hope of reward…… at the end of the way (at the end of the way)But the Savior came down……and He gave me his favour (all for my own)Now I'm singing His praise….. for He saved me that day, (truly saved me that day)

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: I can never forget….. when He spoke to me gently ("Follow thou Me")In the fountain of life…. there's a balm for your soul (there's a balm for your soul)So, I heeded His voice….. He was speaking intently, (gladly I see)Thru His marvelous grace… I am happy and whole, (I am happy and whole)

number: 354: I CAN TELL YOU THE TIME

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
I′ve been traveling here in this life, with its heartaches troubles and strife
Sometimes Satan tries to tell me to turn aside
I say, "Satan, get thee behind, no returning in me, you'll find
I′m too near my heavenly home where I'll abide"

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
I'm too near home with my Lord
Too near home and heaven′s reward
I am not returning to sin, I′ve made my vow
There's nothing to go back to, oh Praise the Lord, sweet heaven′s in view
I'm too near my heavenly home to turn back now

There is joy in going this way, it gets sweeter everyday
My dear Lord is leading the way to realms above
He′ll be with me until the end
Be my Savior, Guide and my Friend
I'll arrive in heaven, my home of perfect love
