items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
(Laipe ojo) laipe ojo, isoro yo dopin
(wahala k’yo si loke orun) ni oke orun ni ile wa
(Lohun ni le l’oke emi yo pade) awon baba n’nu gbagbo
(ngo ri) awon t’o ti lo saju
(o daju pen go) joko pelu Jesu mi
(lorun ngo) Joko sinmi lodo Oluwa

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Awon ore nduro de mi, laipe ngo ri oju won
(laipe ojo)laipe ojo wahala yo d’opin (wahala yo d’opin)
Gbogbo wa ni pejo ni ‘le t’o dara l’oke
(emi yo si) Joko pelu Jesu mi
(Aemi yo) sinmi lodo Oluwa mi

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Emi yo r’oju didan Re, nipa ore’ofe Re
(laipe ojo) laipe ojo wahala yo d’opin
(wahala yo d’opin) ayo mi yo po
Gba ba de ‘le ife mi l’oke
(emi yo si) joko pelu Jesu mi
(A! emi yo) Sinmi l’odo Oluwa mi

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Many times my soul is over burdened,
Many times I'm prone to disobey,
But to Thee dear Jesus I am praying,
Leep me in the straight and narrow way;
Precious Jesus, ever linger near me,
Help me stem the battles that are met,
Keep me ever in Thy blessed keeping,
Precious Jesus, don't forget.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
(Alto)
Don’t forget me precious Jesus, lest I wander away
Be my saviour and companion every hour of the day
Lead me safely through the valley
Through the shadows of night
Don’t forget me, precious Jesus
Keep me ever in thy sight
Others:
Don't forget…..don't forget,
Lest I wander far away; Savior dear,be Thou near,
Ev'ry hour and ev'ry day; Lead the way ev'ry day,
Thru the shadows of the night,
Don't forget, don't forget, Keep me ever in Thy sight.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
There are times when I am disappointed,
Sorely tempted by a wicked race
But I love the precious name of Jesus
And I cling to Thy protecting grace;
Don't forget me, Jesus, don't forget me,
Be my light thru sorrow and regret,
Keep Thy spirit daily watching o'er me,
Precious Jesus, don't forget.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Be my guide thru life's uneven journey,
Lead me safely to the journey's end,
There's no other One so true and faithful,
None on whom, in need, I can depend;
I would ever labor in Thy harvest
Till at last the harvest sun is set,
And when I walk that lonesome valley,
Precious Jesus, don't forget.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ni opo igba ni eru npa mi
Opo ‘gba ni mo nfe saigboran
Si O ore tooto mo ngbadura
Jo pa mi mo l’ona tooro yi
Jesu owon sunmo mi titi lae
Ba mi segun gbogbo isoro
Pa mi mo l’abe abo re titi
Jesu owon ma gbagbe

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
A: Ma gbagbe mi Jesu owon
Others: Ma gabgbe/2x
All: Boya mo le sako lo
A: Olugbala at’ore mi
Others: Jesu mi, sunmo mi
All: Ni wakati ko-okan
A: Mu mi la ogbun naa l’alafia at’ewu aye ja
Others:To mi ni ojojo, la ewu aye koja
All: Ma gbagbe mi, ma gbagbe mi
Pa mi mo lodo re lae

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Nigba miran  mo ni ijatile
Mo si ni idanwo kikoro
Sugbon mo fe oruko Jesu owon
Mo si ro ro m’abe ore-ofe Re
Ma gbagbe mi, Jesu ma gbagbe mi
Je imole mi n’nu banuje
Je k’emi Re so mi lojojumo
Jesu awon na gbagbe

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Samona mi ninu ajo aye
To mi de opin ‘rin ajo na
Ko s’elomiran t’o je olooto
Ti mo le gbekele fn ‘ranwo
Ngo sise ninu ogba re titi
Titi orun ikore yo wo
Gba mo si nlo lese ko gb’eji
Jesu owon ma gbagbe
359:MY SAVIOUR FIRST OF ALL
(Olugbala mi Saaju Ohun Gbogbo)

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: When my lifework is ended and I cross the swelling tide,When the bright and glorious morning I shall see;I shall know my Redeemer when I reach the other side,And His smile will be the first to welcome me.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: I shall know Him, (I shall know Him,) I shall know Him,And redeemed by His side I shall stand;I shall know Him, (I shall know Him,) I shall know HimBy the print of the nails in His hand.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Oh, the soul thrilling rapture when I view His blessed face,And the luster of His kindly beaming eye;How my full heart will praise Him for the mercy, love and graceThat prepared for me a mansion in the sky.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Oh, the dear ones in glory, how they beckon me to come,And our parting at the river I recall;To the sweet vales of Eden they will sing my welcome home,But I long to meet my Savior first of all.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Thro' the gates to the city in a robe of spotless white,He will lead me where no tears will ever fall;In the glad song of ages I shall mingle with delight,But I long to meet my Savior first of all.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Gbati ‘se mi ba pari, ti mo si koja odo
Ti ngo si ri owuro ologo ni
Ngo mo oludande mi gbati mo ba de ohun
Erin ni on yo si fi ki mi kabo

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Emi o mo O (emi o mo) emi o mo O
B’eni ‘rapada ngo duro ti
Emi o mo O (emi o mo) emi o mo O
Nipa ami iso l’owo re

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ayo na ti po to ‘gba mo ba r’oju Re
Ati imole oju Re ti o ntan
Gbogb’okan mi ni ngo fi yin
F’aanu at’or’ofe
T’o pese ile didan fun mi l’oke

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Awon mimo n’nu ogo , won npe mi kin ma bo
Mo ranti ipinya wa nibi odo
Nwon o korin pade mi
‘Gba mo ba f’aye sile
Ona mi nfa lati r’Olugbala mi

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Y’o mu mi la ‘bode ilu na ja
N’nu aso funfun
Yo mu mi de ibiti ko s’omije
Ngo dapo mo won lati ma k’orin ti igbani
Okan mi nfa lati r’Olugbala

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: I am a stranger here, within a foreign land;My home is far away, upon a golden strand;Ambassador to be of realms beyond the sea,I’m here on business for my King.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: This is the message that I bring,A message angels fain would sing:“Oh, be ye reconciled,”Thus saith my Lord and King,“Oh, be ye reconciled to God.”

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: This is the King’s command: that all men, everywhere,Repent and turn away from sin’s seductive snare;That all who will obey, with Him shall reign for aye,And that’s my business for my King.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: My home is brighter far than Sharon’s rosy plain,Eternal life and joy throughout its vast domain;My Sov’reign bids me tell how mortals there may dwell,And that’s my business for my King.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Atipo ni mo je, ni ile ajeji
Ile mi wa l’Orun ni ile wura ni
Mo je iko Jesu, lari afin Oba
Mo wa fun ise Oba mi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Eyi ni ‘se ti mo mu wa
Ise t’o s’owon pupo ni
Joo b’Olorun laja, ni Oluwa mi nwi
Joo wa ba Olorun laja

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Eyi l’ase Oba, fun gbogbo eniyan
E ronuoiwada, kuro n’nu ese yin
Enit’o ba gbagbo, yoo ba joba laelae
Eyi ni ise Oba mi

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
For years I traveled
Down a long and lonely road
Sorrow and pain my lot to bear
But then I met the Christ
Who took my heavy load
And since then
I hear singing in the air

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
There's joy in the camp
A sinner has come home
There's joy in the camp
Rejoicing 'round the throne
Singing and shouting
The great redemption song
There's joy wondrous joy in the camp

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
The angels in heaven
Are rejoicing round the throne
Filling the lofts with chords so grand
They'rе singing because
Of one lost sheep who just camе home
I know there must be joy in the camp

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
There's joy in the camp
A sinner has come home
There's joy in the camp
Rejoicing 'round the throne
Singing and shouting
The great redemption song
There's joy wondrous joy in the camp

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
F'opolopo odun ni mo nda rin kiri
Pelu ‘banuje ati ‘rora
Sugbon mo pade Jesu t’O da mi nide
Mo si gbo orin ayo bayi pe

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
A layo pupo p’elese kan wa ‘le
A layo pupo, ayo na gb’orun kan
Orin rapada ni awon Angeli nko
Orin rapada ni awon Angeli nko
Lati ‘nu okunkun sinu imole
Lati ‘nu f’oju sinu ‘riran
Lati ‘banuje sinu atyo orun
Ayo, ayo nla k’okan wa

items.title: Coda
items.lyrics: Ayo kun okan wa

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Awon Angeli nkorin yi ‘te ogo ka
Won nko orin ayo kikan
Tori elese kan t’o pada wa sile
O daju pe orin ayo gb’orun kan

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: To the regions beyond I must go, I must goWhere the story has never been told;To the millions that never have heard of His love,I must tell the sweet story of old.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: To the regions beyond I must go, I must go,Till the world, all the world,His salvation shall know.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: To the hardest of places He calls me to go,Never thinking of comfort or ease;The world may pronounce me a dreamer, a fool,Enough if the Master I please.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Oh, you that are spending your leisure and pow'rsIn those pleasures so foolish and fond;Awake from your selfishness, folly and sin,And go to the regions beyond.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: There are other “lost sheep” that the Master must bring,And to them must the message be told;He sends me to gather them out of all lands,And welcome them back to His fold.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mo ni lati waasu ihinrere Jesu
Fun awon okan ti ko gbo ri
Ki gbogbo awon ti ko mo ife Jesu
Le gbo nipa adun igbala

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Emi yo lo waasu
Ihinrere ti Jesu
Ki gbogbo agbaye
Le ri ‘dariji gba (l’ofe)

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Bi o ba ran mi lo sibi t’o soro
Tayotayo l’emi yio lo (o lo)
Emi ko bere fun faaji tabi ‘rorun
Ki nsa le se ife ti Jesu

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Eyin ti nfi akoko yin sofo
Ninu adun ati ‘fekufe
E ji ninu orun ese yin loni
Ke si lo waasu ihinrere

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Opo aguntan ni nsako kakiri
Nwon ko mo nipa ife Jesu
Iwo at’emi ni iko fun Kristi
Lati mu won ba Jesu laja

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: I shall wear a golden crown,When I get home;I shall lay my burdens down,When I get home;Clad in robes of glory,I shall sing the storyOf the Lord who bought me,When I get home.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: When I get home, When I get home,All sorrow will be over, When I get home;When I get home, When I get home,All sorrow will be over, When I get home.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: All the darkness will be past,When I get home;I shall see the light at last,When I get home;Light from heaven streaming,O'er my pathway beaming,Ever guides me onwardTill I get home.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: I shall see my Saviour's face,When I get home;Sing again of saving grace,When I get home;I shall stand before him;Gladly I'll adore him;Ever to be with him,When I get home.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Emi yo d’ade wura, gba nba de ‘le
Ngo so eru mi kale, gba mba de ‘le
Ngo wo aso ogo, ngo korin iyanu
T’Oluwa t’o ra mi, ‘gba mba de ‘le

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Gba  mba…….de …….. le/2x
Gbogbo ‘banuje y’o tan, gba mba de ‘le
Gba mba…………. de………….. le/2x
Gbogbo banuje yo tan, ‘gba mba de ‘le

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Okunkun yo rekoja gba mba de ‘le
Ngo ri ‘mole nikehin, gba mba de ‘le
‘mole lat’orun way o ma samona mi
Yio ma to mi titi ngo fi de ‘le

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ngo r’oju Oluwa mi, ‘gba mba de ‘le
Ngo korin t’ore ofe, gba mba de ‘le
Ngo duro niwaju Re, ngop f’ayo se l’Oba
Ngo ma baa gbe titi, gab mba de ‘le

yorubaTitle: Bi o Ba Se Pe Loni Ni?

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Jesus is coming to earth again--What if it were today?Coming in power and love to reign--What if it were today?Coming to claim His chosen Bride,All the redeemed and purified,Over this whole earth scattered wide--What if it were today?

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Glory, glory! Joy to my heart 'twill bring;Glory, glory! When we shall crown Him King.Glory, glory! Haste to prepare the way;Glory, glory! Jesus will come someday.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Satan's dominion will then be o'er--O that it were today!Sorrow and sighing shall be no more--O that it were today!Then shall the dead in Christ arise,Caught up to meet Him in the skies;When shall these glories meet our eyes?What if it were today?

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Faithful and true would He find us hereIf He should come today?Watching in gladness and not in fear,If He should come today?Signs of His coming multiply,Morning light breaks in eastern sky;Watch, for the time is drawing nigh--What if it were today?

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Jesu yo tun pada wa s’aye
B’o ba je l’oni nko?
O mbo n’nu agabara ati ‘joba
B’o ba je loni nko?
O mbo lati k’ayanfe Re lo
Eni rapada ati mimo
Ni gbogb’aye nibi ti won wa
B’o ba je l’oni Nko?

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
SB: Ogo!/2x ayo yo k’okan mi
A: …………. Ayo yo k’okan mi
SB: Ogo!/2x Gbat’a ba see l’Oba
Others: ……….. gbat’a ba see l’Oba
ALL: Ogo!/2x tete tun ona se
ALL: Ogo!/2X O mbo wa l’ojo kan

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ijoba Satani yo si fo, Iba le je l’oni
‘banuje at’edun yo fo lo, iba le je loni
Awon oku n’nu Kristi yo jinde
Lati pade Re l’awosanmo
Gbana ao ri ninu ogo
B’o ba le je loni nko?

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: I met a Stranger fair to see,As walked I down life’s rugged way;He spoke so sweet, so tenderly,He won me to Himself that day.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: It was the Man of Galilee,Who whispered words of joy to me:Thy many Sins be all forgiven thee,Thy sins be all forgiven thee.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: And when that Stranger spoke to me,My heart threw off its guilty load;I felt at once that I was free;I left my burdens by the road.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: I love that Stranger since the hourHe talked to me in tender tone;A joy is mine, I feel its pow’r,And Him as Lord I’m glad to own.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mo pade alejo nla kan
Lona ajo mi l’aye yi
O soro itunu fun mi
O si fa okan mi mora

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Eni rere…… ti Galili
Lo soro a---yo s’okan mi
A dari gbogbo ese re ji o
A dari e…ese re ji o
TB: A dari ese re ji o, A dari
Gbogbo ese re t’o po ji o

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Nigbati mo gb’ohun Jesu
Ebi ese mi bo kuro
Mo mo pe mo d’ominira
Mo bo lowo ebi ese

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Okan mi fe alejo na
Lati ‘gba t’O ba mi soro
Agbra Orun je t’emi
Mo gba Jesu l’Oluwa mi

yorubaTitle: Yo Ha Se Iwo, Yo Ha Se Emi?

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Someone will enter the pearly gateBy and by, by and by,Taste of the glories that there await,Shall you? shall I? Shall you? shall I?Some one will travel the streets of gold,Beautiful visions will there behold,Feast on the pleasures so long foretold:Shall you? shall I? Shall you? shall I?

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Someone will gladly his cross lay downBy and by, by and by,Faithful, approved, shall receive a crown,Shall you? shall I? Shall you? shall I?Some one the glorious King will see,Ever from sorrow of earth be free,Happy with Him thro' eternity:Shall you? shall I? Shall you? shall I?

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Someone will knock when the door is shutBy and by, by and by,Hear a voice saying, "I know you not,"Shall you? shall I? Shall you? shall I?Some one will call and shall not be heard,Vainly will strive when the door is barred,Someone will fail of the saint's reward:Shall you? shall I? Shall you? shall I?

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Someone will sing the triumphant songBy and by, by and by,Join in the praise with the blood-bought throng,Shall you? shall I? shall you? shall I?Some one will greet on the golden shoreLoved ones of earth who have gone before,Safe in the glory for evermore:Shall you? shall I? Shall you? shall I?

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Awon kan yo w’ona Pearli ni
Nigbose/2x
Won yo to wo ninu ogo re
Yo ha se wo? Yo ha se ‘mi?
Awon kan yo rin l’ona wura
Didan ni ‘ran ri won yio ri
Won yo to wo ninu ogo re
Yo ha se wo? Yo ha se ‘mi?

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Awon kan yo fid a won le ‘le
Nigbose/2x
Won yio si gba ade ogo
Yo ha se wo? Yo ha se ‘mi?
Awon kan yo ri Oba ogo
Won yio bo lowo ‘banuje
Won yio si wa pelu Re laelae
Yo ha se wo? Yo ha se ‘mi?

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Awon kan yo kankun ti a ti
Nigbose/2x
Jesu yo wipe nko mo yin ri
Yo ha se wo? Yo ha se ‘mi?
Won yo pe nigbat’a ki yo gbo
Lasan ni igbe won yio je
Won yo kuna ere awon mimo
Yo ha se wo? Yo ha se ‘mi?

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: O my loving’ brother, when the world’s on fire,Don’t you want God’s bosom to be your pillow?Hide me over in the Rock of Ages,Rock of Ages, cleft for me.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
O the judgment day is coming
What an awful day twill be
Christ forever is my refuge
Rock of ages cleft for me

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
At the sounding of the trumpet
At the dawning of the day
Worldly pleasures with their treasures
Shall forever pass away

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Poor lost sinners will be crying
For that home they’ll never see
But the ransomed will be singing
Rock of ages cleft for me

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Arakunrin mi nje, gbat’aye yo gbina
Wo ha nfe f’Olorun se ‘bi ‘sadi re
Pa mi mo ‘nu apata ayeraiye
Se ibi isadi mi 			 2x

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ha! Ojo idajo mbo wa
Ojo ti o l’eru ni
Kristi ni ‘bi isadi mi
Apata ayeraiye

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ipe yoo dun, ara yo san
Nigbat’ojo ‘dajo de
Aye pelu ifekufe
Yo koja lo titi lae
O ha setan/2x
O setan fun ojo idajo?		2x

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ojo nla mbo wa
Ojo nla kan mbo wa nigbose
T’awon eniyan mimo at’elese yo pinya
Iwo ha setan fun oko naa
O ha setan/2x
O setan fun ojo idajo?		2x

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: When judgment day is drawing nigh, Where shall I be?When God the works of men shall try, Where shall I be?When east and west the fire shall roll, Where shall I be?How will it be with my poor soul; Where shall I be?

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Oh, where shall I be when the first trumpet sounds,Oh, where shall I be when it sounds so loud?When it sounds so loud as to wake up the dead?Oh, where shall I be when it sounds?

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: When wicked men His wrath shall see, Where shall I be?And to the rocks and mountains flee, Where shall I be?When hills and mountains flee away, Where shall I be?When all the works of men decay, Where shall I be?

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: When heav'n and earth as some great scroll, Where shall I be?Shall from God's angry presence roll, Where shall I be?When all the saints redeemed shall stand, Where shall I be?Forever blest at God's right hand, Where shall I be?

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: All trouble done, all conflict past, Where shall I be?And old Apolyon bound at last, Where shall I be?When Christ shall reign from shore to shore, Where shall I be?And peace abide forevermore, Where shall I be?

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Gba t’ojo idajo ba de, nibo ngo wa
T’Olorun ba ndan ise wa wo, nibo ni ngo o wa
Gba ti’bi gbogbo yo gbina, nibo ni ngo wa
Yo ha ti ri f’okan  osi mi , nib’ ngo wa

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ha! Nibo ni ngo wa nigba ti ‘pe ba dun
Ha! Nibo ni ngo wa t’o ba dun kikan
T’o ban dun kikan to le j’oku dide
Ha! Bo ni ngo wa t’o ba dun

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Gba t’elese ba ngba idajo, nibo ngo wa
Ti won o ma sa sori oke nibo ni ngo wa
Gbat’awon oke nla ba nfo lo, nibo ngo wa
Ti ‘se eniyan yo segbe nibo ni ngo wa

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Gba t’aye at’orin ban ka nibo ngo wa
Kuro ni ‘binu Olorun, nibo le o wa
T’awon eni mimo ba napade nibo ni ngo wa
Lati gba ere ainipekun, nibo ngo wa

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: I long ago left Egypt for the promised land,I trusted in my Savior, and to His guiding hand;He led me out to vict’ry through the great Red Sea,I sang a song of triumph, and shouted, I am free!

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: You need not look for me, down in Egypt’s sand,For I have pitched my tent far up in Beulah land.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: I followed close beside Him, and the land soon found,I did not halt or tremble, for Canaan I was bound;My Guide I fully trusted, and He led me in,I shouted, Hallelujah! my heart is free from sin.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: I started for the highlands where the fruits abound,I pitched my tent near Hebron, there grapes of Eshcol found,With milk and honey flowing, and new wine so free;I have no love for Egypt, it has no charms for me.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: My heart is so enraptured as I press along,Each day I find new blessings which fill my heart with song;I’m ever marching onward to that land on high,Some day I’ll reach my mansion that’s builded in the sky.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mo ti fi Egypt’ sile fun ‘le ileri
Mo gbeke l’Olugbala to nto isise mi
Mo koja okun pupa pelu isegun
Orin ayo ni mo nko, tori mo d’om’nira

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Jowo mase wa mi, ‘nu ere Egypt’
Tori mo ti p’ago mi si oke Beula	2x

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Mo nrin nsunmo Oluwa mi lojjumo
Nko bery ibi kan, Kenanio ni mo nlo
Mo gbekele amona t’yo mu mi de ‘le
Emi nko Alleluyah mo bo lowo ese

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ayo kun okan mi bi mo ti nte siwaju
Mo ri ibukun otun, to mu okan mi yo
Lojojumo ni mo nsunmo ‘le mi loke
Lojo kan ngo de ‘bugbe ti Jesu ko fun mi

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: In the resurrection morning,When the trump of God shall sound,We shall rise, Hallelujah! we shall rise!Then the saints will come rejoicingAnd no tears will e’er be found,We shall rise, Hallelujah! we shall rise.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: We shall rise, Hallelujah! we shall rise!Amen! We shall rise! Hallelujah!In the resurrection morning,When death’s prison bars are broken,We shall rise, Hallelujah! We shall rise.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: In the resurrection morning,What a meeting it will be,We shall rise, Hallelujah! we shall rise!When our fathers and our mothers,And our loved ones we shall see,We shall rise, Hallelujah! we shall rise!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: In the resurrection morning,Blessèd thought it is to me,We shall rise, Hallelujah! we shall rise!I shall see my blessèd Savior,Who so freely died for me,We shall rise, Hallelujah! we shall rise!

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: In the resurrection morning,We shall meet Him in the air,We shall rise, Hallelujah! we shall rise!And be carried up to glory,To our home so bright and fair,We shall rise, Hallelujah! we shall rise!

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
L’owuro ojo ajinde, ti ‘pe Oluwa yo dun
Ao jinde (halleluya) Ao jinde
Awon mimo yo si jinde ao n’omije gbogbo nu
Ao jinde (halleluya) Ao jinde
…………………..halleluya l’owuro na ao jinde

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ao jinde (halleluya) Ao jinde (amin)
Ao jinde (halleluya)
l’owuro ojo ajinde
ao gbe iku mi ni ‘segun
Ao jinde (halleluya) Ao jinde
…………………..halleluya l’owuro na ao jinde

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
L’owuro ojo ajinde, ao pade l’awosanmo
Ao jinde (halleluya) Ao jinde
Ao gba wa si inu ogo, si ‘lu wa didian l’oke
Ao jinde (halleluya) Ao jinde
…………………halleluya l’owuro na ao jinde

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Tempted and tried we’re oft made to wonder,Why it should be thus all the day long;While there are others living about us,Never molested though in the wrong.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Farther along we’ll know all about it,Farther along we’ll understand why;Cheer up, don't worry, live in the sunshine,We’ll understand it all by and by.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: When death has come and taken our loved ones,It leaves our home so lonely and drear;Then do we wonder why others prosper,Living so wicked year after year.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Faithful till death said our loving Master,A few more days to labor and wait;Toils of the road will then seem as nothing,As we sweep through the beautiful gate.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: When we see Jesus coming in glory,When He comes from His home in the sky;Then we shall meet Him in that bright mansion,We'll understand it all by and by.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
‘Danwo ati ‘soro to nde ba wa
L’ojojumo nje ‘yanu fun wa
Gbat’awon miran wa ninu ‘tura
Bi o tile se pe won nd’ese

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ba ti ntesiwaju yo ma ye wa
Eredi re ti o fi ri be
Tujuka ara, e tesiwaju
Yi o ma ye wa si nigbose

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Jesu olugbala nki wa laiya
Lati j’olooto titi dopin
Gbat’a ba f’oju kan Olugbala
Ao gbagbe gbogbo isoro wa

englishTitle: WHEN WE SING AROUND THE THRONE
yorubaTitle: Nigbati a Ba Nkorin Yi Ite Naa Ka

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Won't it be a happy, happy day,
When we gather on the other shore,
Over on the other shore, Over on the golden shore;
Ev'ry earthly care shall pass away,
We'll be happy there forevermore,
When we sing around the throne eternal,
On that wonderful day.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: When we sing around the throne eternal,

english.title: chorus
english.lyrics:
supernal,
Sing heaven's sweet story;
With the saints we'll ever be happy,
O what a glad morning,
When we sing around the throne eternal,
On that wonderful day.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
With our friends we'll join a mighty throng,
Over yonder in the promised land, Over in the promised land,
Yonder in the promised land;
With the saved we'll sing a happy song,
In the morning at the Lord's right hand,
When we sing around the throne eternal,
On that wonderful day.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: When we sing around the throne eternal,

english.title: chorus
english.lyrics:
supernal,
Sing heaven's sweet story;
With the saints we'll ever be happy,
O what a glad morning,
When we sing around the throne eternal,
On that wonderful day.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics:
O the joy and rapture that will be,
When we march along the streets of gold,
March along the streets of gold, March along the streets of gold;
We shall live thru all eternity, And the glory of the Lord behold,
When we sing around the throne eternal
On that wonderful day.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ojo ayo l’ojo na je, ‘gbat’a ba pejo l’oke Orun
Ni ebute didan ni, ni oke Orun l’ohun
Aniyan aiye yo si fo lo, ayo wa ki yo si nipekun
Gbat’aba nkorin yi ‘te Oba wa, l’ojo ologo na

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
B: Gbat’a ba nkorin yi ‘te Oba wa
All: Ni oke Orun l’ohun
B: Nigba t’a ba nkorin ‘segun
All: L’ayo lao k’orin na
B: Awon mimo yi o ba way o
All: Ojo ayo ni yo je
Gbat’a ba nkroin yi ‘te Oba wa,
l’ojo ologo na

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
B’awo l’ayo wa yo ti po to, nigbat’a ba de Orun l’ohun
Ao ma korin ayo, ni ‘ta wuro didan na
Nibe lao wa titi aiyeraiye, ninu ogo Olugbala wa
Gbat’a ba nkorin yi ‘te Oba wa, l’ojo ologo na

number: 377: WHEN WE SING AROUND THE THRONE

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
I heard about a man one day who wasted not his time away
He prayed to God every morning noon and night
He cared not for the things of man he trusted one who would not fail
Oh, Daniel prayed every morning, noon, and night

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Oh, Daniel served the living God while here upon this earth he trod
He prayed to God every morning noon and night
He cared not for the kings decree he trusted God to set him free
And he prayed to God every morning, noon, and night

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
They cast him in the lion's den because he would not honor men
He prayed to God every morning noon and night
The jaws were locked and it made him shout, and God soon got them
Safely out
Oh, Daniel prayed every morning, noon, and night

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Now brother, let us watch and pray like Daniel did from day to day
He prayed to God every morning noon and night
We too can gladly daring do the things that God will take us through
Oh, Daniel prayed every morning, noon, and night

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mo ka nipa okunrin kan ti ko f’akoko re s’ofo
O ngbadura l’emeta lojojumo
Ko ka ase oba si, o ngbeke l’Olorun fun ‘ranwo
O ngbadura, l’emeta lojojumo

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
ST: Daniel’sin Olorun
AB: Danieli sin Olorun alaye ninu aye yi
All: O ngbadura, l’emeta lojojumo
ST: O gbeke le Olorun
AB: Ko ka orisa Baali si, sugbon o gbeke l’Olorun
All: O ngbadura, l’emeta lojojumo

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Won ju sinu ‘ho kiniun, nitori ko sin enia
O ngbadura l’emeta lojumo
A di kiniun l’enu, Olorun si yo Danieli jade
O ngbadura, l’emeta lojojumo

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Arakunrin sora gbadura, bi Danieli lojojumo
O ngbadura, l’emeta lojumo
Awa na le sin Olorun , Jesu yo toju wa dopin
O ngbadura l’emeta, lojojumo

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: I have heard the voice of JesusCalling clearly follow MeNo one else could ever promiseLife eternal and so free

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: All to Thee I give my all to TheeAll to Thee Thine only will I beAll to Thee O Christ of CalvaryMy prayer shall ever be My all to Thee

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Tho' unworthy of salvationJesus sought me for His ownOn the cross He died to save meNow I long to make Him known

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Only Jesus is the answerFor the happiness men seekHe alone can lift life's burdenAnd give strength unto the weak

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Jesu a fi okan wa fun O
TA: Tire ni…….gbogbo re

english.title: Verse  1
english.lyrics: Once I was bound by sin’s galling fetters,Chained like a slave, I struggled in vain;But I received a glorious freedom,When Jesus broke my fetters in twain.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Glorious freedom, wonderful freedom,No more in chains of sin I repine!Jesus the glorious Emancipator,Now and forever He shall be mine.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Freedom from all the carnal affections,Freedom from envy, hatred and strife;Freedom from vain and worldly ambitions,Freedom from all that saddened my life.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Freedom from pride and all sinful follies,Freedom from love and glitter of gold;Freedom from evil, temper, and anger,Glorious freedom, rapture untold.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Freedom from fear with all of its torments,Freedom from care with all of its pain;Freedom in Christ, my blessed Redeemer,He who has rent my fetters in twain.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mo ti wa ninu ide ese ri
Bi eni ti ko ni ireti
Sugbon mo d’ominira l’ojo ti
Jesu ti ja ide mi wewe

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
‘Dande t’o logo, ‘dande iyanu
Nko si l’abe ide ese mo
Jesu oludande tu mi sile
Oun yo si je t’emi titi lae

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Mo bo lowo ifekufe ara
Ati ‘ja ‘korira pel’owu
Mo bo lowo ‘lepa asan aye
Ese t’o mba mi ‘nu je dopin

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Mo bo lowo ese igberaga
Ati ‘fe ohun oso aiye
Mo bo lowo ibinu kikoro
‘dande ologo yi ga pupo

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Mo bo lowo eru ninu l’ode
Lowo aniyan ati ‘rora
Mo dom’nira ‘nu Krist’ Olugbala
Enit’o tu mi sile nu ‘de

englishTitle: SHADOW THE WORLD WITH THE CROSS
yorubaTitle: Fi Agbelebu Se Abo Aye Yi

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
In a land forgotten in time
An army awakes
Forged in shadows of the cross
Warriors rise up
Our ranks swell as we conquer
Enslaved as they fall
In the name of our god
Warriors fight on

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
On the edge of a foreign land
Fire lights the sky
They awake to the sound of steel
The sounds of dying
The scream of a broken race
Echoes in the night
As the sun breaks the horizon
Warriors fight on

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
We ride for our country
We fight for our land
We march through the chaos
And fall on the battlefields
We fight 'till our last breath
And die with a heart of steel
We're soldiers born for battle
Forged in the shadow of the cross

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ninu ise ta nse fun Oba wa
Kede ‘hinrere f’aye
Ipe ndun fun awon ayanfe Re
Kede ‘hinrere f’aye

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
B: Kede ‘hinrere f’aye
All: Gbe opagun na soke (soke)
Men: Kede ‘hinrere f’aye
All: Titi Gbogb’oju yo rI
ni ile to kun fun ese
lo pelu emi pipe, gbogb’aye di ti Jesu
jo kede ihinrere

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
So ihinrere nibi gbogbo
Kede ‘hinrere f’aye
Fun ‘rapada ‘fe at’anu
Kede ihinrere f’aye

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Gbati ‘lekun si fun ikore
Kede ‘hinrere f’aye
Ji giri toripe o fere de
Kede ‘hinrere f’aye

number: 386: SHADOW THE WORLD WITH THE CROSS

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: I serve a risen Savior,He’s in the world today;I know that He is living,Whatever men may say;I see His hand of mercy,I hear His voice of cheer,And just the time I need HimHe’s always near.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: He lives! He lives!Christ Jesus lives today!He walks with me, and talks with meAlong life’s narrow way.He lives! He lives, salvation to impart!You ask me how I know He lives:He lives within my heart!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: In all the world around me,I see His loving care,And though my heart grows wearyI never will despair;I know that He is leadingThrough all the stormy blast,The day of His appearingWill come at last!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Rejoice, rejoice, oh Christian,Lift up your voice and singEternal hallelujahs toJesus Christ the King!The hope of all who seek Him,The help of all who find,None other is so loving,So good and kind!

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mo nsin Jesu t’o jinde
O wa laiye l’oni
Mo mo pe o mbe l’aye
Ohun t’aiye le wi
Mo ri owo anu Re
Mo gbo ohun ‘fe Re
Lakoko ti mo si nfe E
On wa n’tosi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
O mbe (O mbe) o mbe (O mbe)
Krist’ Jesu wa sibe
O mba mi soro, O pelu mi,
Lona ajo mi
O mbe (O mbe) o mbe (O mbe)
Lati wa gba wa la,
O ha fe mo p’O mbe l’aye
O mbe n’nu okan mi

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ni ayika mi laye
Mo nr’owo ife Re
B’okan mi tile saare
Ng ko so ‘reti nu
Mo mo pe o nsin mi la
Gbogbo igbi aye
Ojo ‘farahan Re yo de nikehin

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
E yo, eyo onigbagbo
E ko orin s’oke
E ke Halleluya si
Kristi Oba ogo
Ireti awon to nwa
‘Ranwo awon t’o ri
Ko si oninu rere t’o dabi Re

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Fairest Lord Jesus,ruler of all nature,O thou of God and man the Son,Thee will I cherish,Thee will I honor,thou, my soul's glory, joy, and crown.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Fair are the meadows,fairer still the woodlands,robed in the blooming garb of spring:Jesus is fairer,Jesus is purerwho makes the woeful heart to sing.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Fair is the sunshine,fairer still the moonlight,and all the twinkling starry host:Jesus shines brighter,Jesus shines purerthan all the angels heaven can boast.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Beautiful Savior!Lord of all the nations!Son of God and Son of Man!Glory and honor,praise, adoration,now and forevermore be thine.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Jesu Oluwa , alakoso eda
Om’Olorun at’eniyan
Em’o feran Re, Ngo b’ola fun O
‘wo ogo, ayo ade mi

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Papa li ewa, igbo tun dara ju
Won wo itanna li a so
Jesu l’ewa ju, oun lo si mo ju
Oun m’okan ‘banuje k’orin

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Orun nran daadaa
Osupa si t’ayo
Awon ‘rawo oju orun
Jesu mo le ju, orun lo si mo ju
Ju gbogbo angeli orun

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
What a happy time some glad tomorrow
When we lay these heavy burdens down In this lonesome valley,
no more to roam Having labored
all through toil and sorrow Hoping to receive a golden crown
It will all be glory in that sweet home

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
In the beautiful city Of the sweet forever
Where the River of Life Goes ebbing by
We’ll look upon the beauty That fades no never
And happy we’ll be While the ages fly

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Many precious loved ones will be waiting Just across the river,
deep and wide In this lonesome valley no more to roam
Through eternity no separating
Every heart will then be satisfied It will all be glory in that sweet home

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Years of time have come and gone
Since I first heard it told
How Jesus would come again someday
If back then it seemed so real
Then I just can't help but feel
How much closer His coming is today

english.title: Chorus
Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Wars and strife on every hand
And violence fills our land
Still some people doubt He'll ever come again
Oh, but the Word of God is true
He'll redeem His chosen few
Don't lose hope, for soon Christ Jesus will descend!

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Odun pupo ti koja, gba mo ko gbo ‘tan na
Pe Jesu olugbala pada bo, opo onigbagbo lo sun
Opo si ti rewesi, ipada bo Jesu Kristi sunmo ‘le

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Amin pupo lo farahan, Ifarahan Jesu sunmo tosi
Tejumo Jesu, o npada bo, Gbori soke, ‘rapada sunmo ‘le

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Idanwo l’ode ninu, Ibanuje ti wa ka
Opo okan si ti rewesi, sugbon oro ‘lorun daju
Yio gba awon tire, mase b’ohun Jesu Kristi pada bo

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Nobody knows of the work it makesTo keep the home together,Nobody knows of the steps it takes,Nobody knows but mother;Nobody listens to the childish woes,Which kisses only smother,Nobody’s pain’d by the mighty blow,Nobody,—only mother.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Nobody knows of the sleepless careBestowed on baby brother,Nobody knows of the tender pray’r,Nobody knows but mother;Nobody knows of the lessons taught,Of loving one another;Nobody knows of the patience sought,Nobody,—only mother.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Nobody knows of the anxious fears,Lest darlings may not weather,Storms of this life in the coming years,Nobody knows but mother;Nobody knows of the tears that start,The grief she gladly smother,Nobody knows of the breaking heart,Nobody,—only mother.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Nobody clings to the wayward child,Tho’ scorn’d by ev’ry other,Leads it so gently from pathways wild,Nobody can but mother;Nobody knows of the hourly pray’r,For him, our erring brother,Pride of hear heart, once so pure and fair,Nobody,—only mother.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ko s’eru mo t’o mo ‘toju ile
Bi iya onigbagbo
Ko s’eni to mo itoju re
Ko s’eni, afi iya

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
O nse itoju awon omo
O si nseso lori won
Nigbati wahala ba si de
Ko s’eni afi iya

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ko s’eni to m’opo wahala
Ti ya se lori omo
O f’opo wakati gbadura
A iya onigbagbo

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Once from my poor sin-sick soulChrist did ev'ry burden roll,Now I walk redeemed and whole,Hand in hand with Jesus.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Hand in hand we walk each day,Hand in hand along the way;Walking thus I cannot stray,Hand in hand with Jesus.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: In my night of dark despair,Jesus heard and answered prayer,Now I’m walking free as air,Hand in hand with Jesus.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: From the strait and narrow way,Praise the Lord, I cannot stray,For I'm walking ev'ry day,Hand in hand with Jesus.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: When the stars are backward rolled,And His Home I shall behold,I will walk those streets of gold,Hand in hand with Jesus.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Nigba kan n’nu aye mi
Jesu tan ‘banuje mi
Nisiyi mo di tire
Lese se pelu Re

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Lese se lojojumo
Ni mo nrin pelu Jesu
Bi mo ti nrin pelu re
Nko ni sako mo

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ni oru ‘banuje mi
Jesu gbo adura mi
Nisiyi mo d’omnira
Lese re pelu re

yorubaTitle: Igbesi aye wa Kun fun Ise

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Lifetime is working time, spend no idle days;Jesus is calling thee on the harvest ways;Working with a willing hand, sing a song of praise;Work, ever work for Jesus!

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Swiftly the hours of labor fly,Freighted with love let each pass by!There is joy in labor for the struggling neighbor,Work, ever work for Jesus!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Lifetime is working time, learn where duty lies;Grasp ev'ry passing day as a precious prize;Glad to help the sorrowing, glad to sympathize;Work, ever work for Jesus!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Lifetime is working time, do thy honest part;Tho' in discouragements, bear a cheerful heart;Trusting Jesus as thy friend, ne'er from Him depart.Work, ever work for Jesus!

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Igbesi aye wa kun fun ‘se pupo
Jesu npe wa sinu oko ikore
Fi tayotayo sise ko orin iyin
Sise fun Jesu titi
……. Akoko nsure koja lo
S: Fi ife sise nitori
Ise ti a se fun Oluwa ki yo jasan
Sise fun Jesu titi

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
‘Nu gbesi aye was a ipa tire
Ma je k’okan re damu nigba isoro
Gbeke re le Jesu mase ko sile
Sise fun Jesu toto

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Why do you wait, dear brother,O why do you tarry so long?Your Savior is waiting to give youA place in His sanctified throng.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Why not, why not,Why not come to Him now?Why not, why not,Why not come to Him now?

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: What do you hope, dear brother,To gain by a further delay?There’s no one to save you but Jesus,There’s no other way but His way.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Do you not feel, dear brother,His Spirit now striving within?O why not accept His salvationAnd throw off your burden of sin?

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Why do your wait, dear brother?The harvest is passing away;Your Savior is longing to bless you,There's danger and death in delay.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
O se duro olufe
O si nfi akoko sire
Olugbala re fe fun o ni
Aye kan n’nu egbe mimo

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Mase duro
Wa sodo Re nisiyi
Mase duro

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
O se duro olufe

Ijafara l’ewu pupo

Lati f’akoko d’ola

Ko sona miran si iye

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: I have a Savior, He’s pleading in glory,A dear, loving Savior, though earth-friends be few;And now He is watching in tenderness o’er me,But O, that my Savior were your Savior, too!

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: For you I am praying,For you I am praying,For you I am praying,I’m praying for you.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: I have a Father; to me He has givenA hope for eternity, blessed and true;And soon will He call me to meet Him in heaven,But O, that He’d let me bring you with me, too!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: I have a robe, ’tis resplendent in whiteness,Awaiting in glory my wondering view;O, when I receive it all shining in brightness,Dear friend, could I see you receiving one, too!

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: When He has found you, tell others the story,That my loving Savior is your Savior, too;Then pray that your Savior may bring them to glory,And prayer will be answered- ’twas answered for you!

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mo n’olugbala t’o mbebe ni n’ogo
On na ko ni b’ore aye sa

Mo fe ki won a ri okan gba pelu

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Would we be joyful in the Lord?Thee count the riches o’er,Revealed to faith within His Word,And note the boundless store.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: There is pardon, peace, and pow’r.And purity and Paradise;With all of these in Christ for me,Let joyful songs of praise to Him arise!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: For every sin, by grace divine,A pardon free bestowed;And with the pardon peace is mine,The peace in Jesus’ blood.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Of grace to break the pow’r of sin;He gives a full supply;The Holy Ghost, the heart within,From sin doth purify.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: 4 The power to win a soul to God,The Spirit too imparts;And He, the gift of Christ our Lord,Dwells now in all our hearts.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics: These blessings we by faith receive,By simple child-like trust;In Christ, ‘tis God’s delight to give:He promised, and He must.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Oft within a little cottage,As the shadows gently fall,While the sunlight touches softlyOne sweet face upon the wall,There the lonely loved ones gatherAnd in hushed and tender toneAsk each other’s full forgivenessFor the wrong that each had done.
As I wondered why this custom,At the closing of the day,“Tis because,” they sweetly answered,“It was once our mother’s way.”

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: If our home be bright and cheery,If it holds a welcome true,Op’ning wide its door of greetingTo the many—not the few;If we share our Father’s bounty,With the needy day by day,‘Tis because our hearts remember,“This was ever mother’s way.”Gentle mother, loving mother,Sainted mother, fond and true;Resting now in peace with Jesus,Loving hearts remember you.

english.title: Verse  3
english.lyrics: Sometimes when our hearts grow weary,Or our task seems very long,When our burdens look too heavy,And we deem the right all wrong,Then we gain anew fresh courage,As once more we rise to say,“Let us do our duty bravely,This was our dear mother’s way.”Gentle mother, loving mother,Sainted mother, fond and true;Resting now in peace with Jesus,Loving hearts remember you.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Oh, how oft it comes before us,That sweet face upon the wall;And her mem’ry seems more precious,As we on her Saviour call;That at last, when ev’ning shadowsMark the closing of life’s day,They may find us calmly waitingTo go home our mother’s way.Gentle mother, loving mother,Sainted mother, fond and true;Resting now in peace with Jesus,Loving hearts remember you.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Redeemed, how I love to proclaim it!Redeemed by the blood of the Lamb;Redeemed through His infinite mercy,His child, and forever, I am.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: :Redeemed, redeemed,Redeemed by the blood of the Lamb;Redeemed, how I love to proclaim it!His child, and forever, I am.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: I think of my blessed Redeemer,I think of Him all the day long;I sing, for I cannot be silent;His love is the theme of my song.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: I know I shall see in His beautyThe King in whose law I delight,Who lovingly guardeth my footsteps,And giveth me songs in the night.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
One thing I of the Lord desire
For all my path hath miry been
Be it by water or by fire
O make me clean/2x

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
So wash me now
Without , within
Or purge with fire
If that must be
No matter how if only sin
Die out in me/2x

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
I watch to shun the miry way
And staunch the springs of guilty thoughts
But watch and struggle as I  may
Pure am I not/2x

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
If clearer visions thou impart
Grateful and glad my soul shall be
But yet to have a purer heart
Is more to me/2x

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Yea only as this heart is clean
May larger vision yet be mine
For mirror’d in the depths are seen
The things divine/2x

english.lyrics: Jordan River, chilly and cold,it chills the body, but not the soul.There ain’t but one train that’s on this track,it runs to heaven and runs right back.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: There’s a blessed time that’s coming, coming soon, coming soon,It may be evening, morning or at noon,The wedding of the bride, united with the Groom,We shall see the King when He comes.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: We shall see the King, We shall see the King,We shall see the King when He comes;He is coming in pow’r, we’ll hail the blessed hour,We shall see the King when he comes.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Are you ready should the Savior call today?Would Jesus say, Well done or Go away?My home is for the pure, the vile can never stay,We shall see the King when He comes.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Oh, my brother, are you ready for the call?To crown your Savior king and Lord of all?The kingdoms of this world shall soon before Him fall,We shall see the King when He comes.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
To be the one the Lord's calling for in these last and evil days
The one called to be a witness to some souls who's lost their way
Then to be used as His instrument so men may see and know
That He's faithful to His promise, He made long time ago

english.title: Chorus

He's coming back again
Yes, He's coming back again
Glory hallelujah, bless His name and lift Him up;
Praise God, He's coming back again

english.lyrics:
He told us not worry, but that He had to go away
And while He was away, He would be building us a place
When the time was right, might be morning, noon, or night
He would come back and He's gonna take us there

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: O safe to the Rock that is higher than I,My soul in its conflicts and sorrows would fly;Alone I would perish, undone would I be;Thou blest “Rock of Ages,” I’m hiding in Thee.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Hiding in Thee, hiding in Thee,Thou blest “Rock of Ages,” I’m hiding in Thee.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: In the calm of the noontide, in sorrow’s lone hour,In times when temptation casts o’er me its pow’r;In the tempests of life, on its wide, heaving sea,Thou blest “Rock of Ages,” I’m hiding in Thee.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: How oft in the conflict, when pressed by the foe,I have fled to my Refuge and breathed out my woe;How often, when trials like sea billows roll,Have I hidden in Thee, O Thou Rock of my soul.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ni sisadi apata t’o ga ju mi

items.lyrics:

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Calvary covers it allMy past with its sin and stainMy guilt and despairJesus took on Him thereAnd Calvary covers it all

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Far dearer than allThat the world can impartWas the message that came to my heartHow that Jesus aloneFor my sin did atoneAnd Calvary covers it all

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: The stripes that He boreAnd the thorns that He woreTold His mercy and love evermoreAnd my heart bowed in shameAs I called on His nameAnd Calvary covers it all

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: How matchless the graceWhen I looked on the faceOf this Jesus my crucified LordMy redemption completeI then found at His feetAnd Calvary covers it all

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: How blessed the thoughtThat my soul by Him boughtShall be His in the glory on highWhere with gladness and songI'll be one of the throngAnd Calvary covers it all

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: A wonderful Savior is Jesus my Lord,a wonderful Savior to me.He hideth my soul in the cleft of the rock,where rivers of pleasure I see.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: :He hideth my soul in the cleft of the rockthat shadows a dry, thirsty land.He hideth my life in the depths of his love,and covers me there with his hand,and covers me there with his hand.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: A wonderful Savior is Jesus my Lord;he taketh my burden away.He holdeth me up, and I shall not be moved;he giveth me strength as my day.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: With numberless blessings each moment he crowns,and filled with his fullness divine,I sing in my rapture, “Oh, glory to Godfor such a Redeemer as mine!”

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: When clothed in his brightness, transported I riseto meet him in clouds of the sky,his perfect salvation, his wonderful love,I’ll shout with the millions on high.

englishTitle: JUST A LITTLE TALK WITH JESUS

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: I once was lost in sinBut Jesus took me inAnd then a little lightFrom heaven filled my soulIt bathed my heart in loveAnd wrote my name aboveAnd just a little talk with JesusMade me whole

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Now let us have a little talk with JesusLet us tell Him all about our troublesHe will hear our faintest cryAnd He will answer by and byNow when you feel a little pray'r wheel turningAnd you know a little fire is burningYou will find a little talk with JesusMakes it right (it makes it right)

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Sometimes my path seems drearWithout a ray of cheerAnd then a cloud of doubtMay hide the light of dayThe mists of sin may riseAnd hide the starry skiesBut just a little talk with JesusClears the way

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: I may have doubts and fearsMy eyes be filled with tearsBut Jesus is a friendWho watches day and nightI go to Him in pray'rHe knows my ev'ry careAnd just a little talk with JesusMakes it right

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Lekan mo j’elese, sugbon Jesu gba mi
O tan ‘mole lat’Orun sinu okan mi
O ko oruko mi si ‘we iye l’oke
Gba mo ba Jesu soro, mo ni isegun

items.lyrics:
(E jeka) Ba Jesu soro nisinyi
(Jeka) so gbogbo wahala wa fun
(On yo) Gb’ohun ebe wa
(On yo si) dahun adura
(bi ‘wo ba) Ni ‘misi lati gbadura
(ti o) mo pe ina adura njo
(iwo) le ba Jesu soro ko ni isegun (ni isegun)

englishTitle: THY WORD HAVE I HID IN MY HEART
yorubaTitle: Mo Pa Oro Re  Mo Laya Mi

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Thy Word is a lamp to my feet,a light to my path alway,to guide and to save me from sin,and show me the heav'nly way.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Thy Word have I hid in my heartThat I might not sin against thee;That I might not sin, that I might not sin,Thy Word have I hid in my heart.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Forever, O Lord, is thy Wordestablished and fixed on high;thy faithfulness unto all menabideth forever nigh.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: At morning, at noon, and at nightI ever will give thee praise;for thou art my portion, O Lord,and shall be through all my days!

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Through him whom thy Word hath foretold,the Savior and Morning Star,salvation and peace have been broughtto those who have strayed afar.

‘Mole s’ona mi gbogbo

Lati f’ona ‘run han mi

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
O sotele ‘nu Ooro Re
Jesu irawo ooro
Lo nmu ‘gbala at’ayo wa
Fun awon t’o ti sako

number: 412: THY WORD HAVE I HID IN MY HEART

english.title: chorus
english.lyrics: of high-sounding notes to his praise.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Yes, music, sweet music with gladness we’ll bring,Yes music, sweet music with gladness we'll bring,And lay on the altar, and lay on the altar of Jesus, of Jesus, our King,We’ll laud and extol his adorable name,We'll laud and extol his adorable name,And shout to his honor, and shout to his honor,With joyful, with joyful acclaim.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: For Jesus is worthy all praise to receive,He came in his mercy our woes to relieve;He died to redeem us from sin and from hell,That we with the angels in glory might dwell.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: For us he was tortured, and wounded, and slain,For us he was subject to anguish and pain;In love and compassion he pour’d out his blood,And laid down his life, a rich ransom to God.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Hosanna si Jesu, Olugbala wa
Iku ati segun Re ni orin wa
Pel’ayo ati ohun ope wa
A gbohun wa soke
Lati yin Oluwa

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Titobi ni Jesu lati fi iyin fun
O wa pelu aanu lati gba wa la
Iku Re lo gba wa kuro ninu egbe
Ka le pelu awon Angeli ninu Orun

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Jesu jiya fun wa o ku ‘ku oro
Fun wa O gba ‘tiju O si je ‘rora
O t’eje Re sile pelu ife ‘yanu
Omo Olorun ku ki awa le yo

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Oh, the joy of sins forgiv’n,Oh, the bliss the blood-washed know,Oh, the peace akin to Heav’n,Where the healing waters flow.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Where the healing waters flow,Where the joys celestial glow,Oh, there’s peace and rest and love,Where the healing waters flow!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Now with Jesus crucified,At His feet I’m resting low;Let me evermore abideWhere the healing waters flow.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: O, this precious, perfect love!How it keeps the heart aglow,Streaming from the fount above,Where the healing waters flow.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Oh, to lean on Jesus’ breast,While the tempests come and go!Here is blessed peace and rest,Where the healing waters flow.

english.title: chorus
english.lyrics: Where the healing waters flow.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ayo orun to ndariji
Fun eje ti o we mi mo
A! mo ni ‘fokanbale
Nibiti omi ‘wosan nsan

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Nib’omi iwosan nsan/2x
Nib’ayo Orun sokale (Nibi t’ayo wa titi)
Alafia ‘fokanbale (Alafia ati ‘fe)
Nib’omi iwosan nsan (omi iwosan nsan)
Nib’omi iwosan nsan/2x

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Pelu Jesu lori igig
Sinmi wa ni ese Re
Ngo ma gbe ibe titi
Nibi t’omi ‘wosan nsan

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ayo Orun ti ko l’egbe
Oun lo npa okan mi mo
Isun omi ti ki ngbe
Nibi t’omi iwosan nsan

englishTitle: I AM BOUND FOR THE PROMISED LAND

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: 1 On Jordan's stormy banks I stand,and cast a wishful eyeto Canaan's fair and happy land,where my possessions lie.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: :I am bound for the promised land,I am bound for the promised land;oh, who will come and go with me?I am bound for the promised land.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: O'er all those wide extended plainsshines one eternal day;there God the Son forever reigns,and scatters night away.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: No chilling winds or poisonous breathcan reach that healthful shore;sickness and sorrow, pain and death,are felt and feared no more.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: When I shall reach that happy place,I'll be forever blest,for I shall see my Father's face,and in his bosom rest.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mo duro leti bebe Jordan’
Mo gb’oju mi soke
Si ile Kenaani t’o dara
Nibi ti ‘sura mi wa

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Emi nlo si ‘le ileri /2x
Tani o nfe ba mi ka lo
Emi nlo si ‘le ileri

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
I-mole ntan yika gbogbo
ile na lojojo nibe
L’om’Olorun njoba lae
‘Tori ko si oru nibe

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
‘Gba wo ni ngo de ile ayo yi
Ti ngo d’eni bukun
‘Gbawo ni ngo r’oju Baba mi
Ti ngo sinmi l’aya Re?

number: 416: I AM BOUND FOR THE PROMISED LAND

englishTitle: JESUS IS THE FRIEND OF SINNERS

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Jesus, Friend of sinners,Hast Thou love for me?Son of God the Holy,Man of mystery,Lover of the children,Teacher of the wise,Let me read the secretIn Thy friendly eyes.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Jesus, Friend of sinners,Thou hast read my heart,Searching its recessesWith a lover’s art;Naught have I withholden,Nothing hid from Thee.Waste, or want, or folly,Things that should not be.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Jesus, Friend of sinners,Thou hast touched my soul,Not with scornful pity,Not with beggar’s dole;Thou hast not despisedMen that faint or fall,Tenderer than brother,For Thou knowest all.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Jesus, Friend of sinners,Bid me follow Thee,O’er the rugged highways,E’en to Calvary;Let me know Thy Spirit,Sweet and strong and wise;I would win the friendshipIn Thy loving eyes.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics: Jesus, Friend of sinners,Hold me by Thy side,Till the shadows deepenTow’rd the eventide:To Thy strength and beautyI would ever bend,Till, in dawn eternal,Friend shall be as friend!

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Jesu ni /2x
Jesu ni ore elese
To nda ni ni ‘de

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
B’o ba gbagbo yo gba o la
Yo gba o la/2x
B’o ba gbagbo yo gba o
Yo s’aye re d’otun

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Yo ma rin pelu re ni gbogbo ona re
Gbogb’ona re/2x
To ma rin pelu re
Yo ma to O lojojumo

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Yo s’amona re de ‘nu ogo
De ‘nu ogo/2x
Yo samona re de ‘nu ogo
Ile ayeraye

number: 417: JESUS IS THE FRIEND OF SINNERS

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Do not wait until some deed of greatness you may do,Do not wait to shed your light afar;To the many duties ever near you now be true,Brighten the corner where you are.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Brighten the corner where you are!Brighten the corner where you are!Someone far from harbor you may guide across the bar;Brighten the corner where you are!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Just above are clouded skies that you may help to clear,Let not narrow self your way debar;Though into one heart alone may fall your song of cheer,Brighten the corner where you are.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Here for all your talent you may surely find a need,Here reflect the bright and Morning Star;Even from your humble hand the Bread of Life may feed,Brighten the corner where you are.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Je ki imole Jesu tan ninu aye re
Mase gbe fitila re sile
Fun gbogbo awon ise ti Jesu fi dun o
Je ‘mole nibi to t’o wa

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Je ‘mole nibi t’o ba wa/2x
K’awon to wa ‘nu okunkun le ni imole
Je ‘mole nibi t’o ba wa

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Fun gbogbo ebun t’Olorun fi ta o l’ore
O ha nlo gbogbo won f’Oluwa
Lati’odo re awon miran le ri imole
Je ‘mole nibi t’o ba wa

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: In country, town or city some people can be foundWho spend their lives in grumbling at ev’rything around,O yes, they always grumble, no matter what we say,For these are chronic grumblers and they grumble night and day.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: O they grumble on Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, grumble on Thursday too,Grumble on Friday, Saturday, Sunday, grumble the whole week thru.O they grumble on Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, grumble on Thursday too,Grumble on Friday, Saturday, Sunday, grumble the whole week thru.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: They grumble in the city, they grumble on the farm,They grumble at their neighbors, they think it is no harm;They grumble at their husbands, they grumble at their wives,They grumble at their children; but the grumbler never thrives.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: They grumble when it’s raining, they grumble when it’s dry,And if the crops are failing, they grumble and they sigh.They grumble at low prices and grumble when they’re high,They grumble all the year ‘round and they grumble till they die.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: They grumble at the preacher, they grumble at his prayer,They grumble at his preaching, they grumble ev’rywhere;They grumble at God’s people and say ‘tis all display;But holy folks don’t grumble, they have only time to pray.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics: They stay away from meeting because it’s hot or cold,Or else it looks like raining, a headache or a cold;And when the off’rings taken they’re sure to pout or sighAnd say they feel so sorry always money is the cry.

english.title: Verse 6
english.lyrics: If you don’t quit your grumbling and stop it now and here,You’ll never get to heaven, no grumblers enter there.Repent and be converted, be saved from all your sin;You know that grumbling Christians find it hard a crown to win.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ni gbogbo agbegbe wa
Awon eniyan kan wa
Won fi gbogb’aye won kun
Si gbogo ‘hun ta ri
Beni, won ko le sai kun
Won kun l’osan at’oru

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
A! won kun ni Monday, Tuesday, wedsday
Ati lojo Thursday
Won kun ni Friday, Saturday, Sunday
Ati lojo gbogbo
TB: kun/4x

items.lyrics:
Won kun ninu ilu won
Won kun ninu oko
Won nkun s’aladugbo won
Won ro pe ko se bi
Won kun s’awon aya won
Won nkun s’awon omo won
Sugbon won ki yo l’ayo

items.lyrics:
Won nkun si oniwaasu
Won nkun s’adura re
Won nkun si iwasu re
Won nkun nibi gbogbo
won nkun s’eniyan Olorun
won so pe asan ni
sugbon om’Olorun kin kun
won f’akoko gbadura

englishTitle: FOR GOD SO LOVED THE WORLD
yorubaTitle: Olorun Fe Araye To Be e

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
God so loved the world.God so loved the world,that He gave His only begotten Son,that whoso believeth, believeth in Himshould not perish, should not perishbut have everlasting life.
For God sent not His Son into the worldto condemn the world.God sent not His Son into the worldto condemn the world;But that the world through Him might be saved.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: God so loved the world.God so loved the world,that He gave His only begotten Son,that whoso believeth, believeth in Himshould not perish, should not perishbut have everlasting life, everlasting life,everlasting, everlasting life.

number: 421: FOR GOD SO LOVED THE WORLD

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Fade, fade, each earthly joy,Jesus is mine.Break every tender tie,Jesus is mine.Dark is the wilderness,Earth has no resting place,Jesus alone can bless,Jesus is mine.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Tempt not my soul away;Jesus is mine.Here would I ever stay,Jesus is mine.Perishing things of clay,Born but for one brief day,Pass from my heart away;Jesus is mine.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Farewell, ye dreams of night;Jesus is mine.Lost in this dawning bright,Jesus is mine.All that my soul has triedLeft but a dismal void;Jesus has satisfied;Jesus is mine.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Farewell, mortality;Jesus is mine.Welcome, eternity;Jesus is mine.Welcome, O loved and blest,Welcome, sweet scenes of rest,Welcome, my Saviour’s breast;Jesus is mine.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Down in the valley with my Saviour I would go,where the flowers are blooming and the sweet waters flow,everywhere he leads me I would follow, follow on,walking in his footsteps till the crown be won.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Follow, follow, I would follow Jesus,anywhere, everywhere, I would follow on.Follow, follow, I would follow Jesus.Everywhere he leads me I would follow on.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Down in the valley with my Saviour I would go,where the storms are sweeping and the dark waters flow,with his hand to lead me I will never, never fear;danger cannot fright me if my Lord is near.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Down in the valley or upon the mountain steep,close beside my Saviour would my soul ever keep.He will lead me safely in the path that he has trod,up to where they gather on the hills of God.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ngo ba Oluwa mi lo si eba odo
Nibiti omi tutu yoyo nsun jade
Ibikibi ti o ba to mi si ni ng o lo
Ngo ma tele ipase re de opin

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Tele, tele, ngo ma tele Jesu
‘bikibi ti O nlo, l’emi o tele
Tele, tele ngo ma tele Jesu
Bi t’O ba to mi si l’emi o ba lo

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ngo ba Oluwa mi lo si eba odo
Nibiti iji nja ti okunkun si su
Gbati owo Re nto mi eru ko le ba mi,
Ko si ewu bi Jesu ba wa ntosi

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ngo ba Oluwa mi lo si ibikibi
L’eba Oluwa mi ni okan mi nfe gbe
Yo ma s’amona mi ni ona ti Oun ri rin
Titi d’oke giga ilu Olorun

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: O serve the Lord with gladness,And come before His throne;He is the great Creator,And He is God alone;The heavens declare His glory,The earth His power displays;While millions without numberTo Him glad anthems raise.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: O serve the Lord with gladness,And come before His throne;He is our great Redeemer,And He is God alone.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: O serve the Lord with gladness,And glad hosannas bring,To Him the sovereign ruler,The universal King;Forever through the agesHis truth unchanging stands;Let all the nations fear Him,And reverence His commands.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: O serve the Lord with gladness,His love to all proclaim;Exalt Him in the highest;And spread abroad His fame;All majesty, dominion,All power and glory beTo Him who reigns in triumph,Through all eternity.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Fi ayo sin Oluwa, n’nu ‘se ati ‘sin Re
E wa si waju Re, pel’orin iyin
S’Olorun eleda wa, lao j’eje otun (otun)
Ifararubo nla isin tooto

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
F’ayo sin Oluwa, w’agbala Re pel’orin (ope)
Si Eleda wa ni iyin ye fun (ye fun)
Anu Re tobi, iyanu l’Oko Re
Ao sin pel’ayo kede ‘fe nla Re (kede)

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Fi ayo sin Oluwa, eyi ni orin wa
Bi a se rin po, ninun ‘fe nla
Ti a nfeti s’ohun kelekele ni (kele)
Ife Re ‘yebiye l’awa o yan

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Blessed assurance, Jesus is mine!Oh, what a foretaste of glory divine!Heir of salvation, purchase of God,born of his Spirit, washed in his blood.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: This is my story, this is my song,praising my Savior all the day long.This is my story, this is my song,praising my Savior all the day long.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Perfect communion, perfect delight,visions of rapture now burst on my sight.Angels descending bring from aboveechoes of mercy, whispers of love.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Perfect submission, all is at rest.I in my Savior am happy and bless’d,watching and waiting, looking above,filled with his goodness, lost in his love.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Jesu fun mi ni ‘daniloju
Mo to wo ninu ogo Olorun
O ra mi, mo d’ajogun ‘gbala
A tun mi bi a f’eje we mi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Eyi l’eri mi, at’orin mi
Ogo f’Olorun lojo gbogbo
Eyi l’eri mi at’orin mi
Ogo fun Jesu t’O gba mi la
Ese 2
Mo f’aye mi fun Un patapata
A! ayo pipe Re si je t’emi
Awon Angeli lat’oke wa
Mu ‘hin ayo wa, ihin ife

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ni ‘fararubo isinmi de
Mo r’ayo pipe n’nu Olugbala mi
Mo nsona mo nduro d’Oluwa
Mo ri sinmi ibu ife Re

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Aye mi r’oju Jesu gba mi
Mo f’aye mi fun at’okan mi
Mo nsora mo nduro d’Oluwa
Ninu Emi Re ife nla Re

english.lyrics: When shall the voice of singingFlow joyfully along?When hill and valley, ringingWith one triumphant song,Proclaim the contest ended,And Him who once was slain,Again to earth descended,In righteousness to reign?Again to earth descended,In righteousness to reign.
