english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Wonderful, wonderful
My Lord is wonderful
I have found a deep peace
That I never had known
And a joy this world could not afford
Since I yielded control of my body and soul
To my wonderful,wonderful Lord.
My wonderful Lord, my wonderful Lord
By angels and seraphs in Heaven adored
I bow at Thy shrine
My Savior divine
My wonderful, wonderful Lord
All the talents I have I have laid at Thy Feet
Thy approval shall be my reward.
Be my store great or small
I surrender it all
To my wonderful, wonderful Lord.
Thou art fairer to me than the fairest of earth
Thou omnipotent, life-giving Word
O Thou Ancient of Days,
Thou art worthy all praise,
My wonderful, wonderful Lord.
My wonderful Lord, my wonderful Lord
By angels and seraphs in Heaven adored!
I bow at Thy shrine
My Savior divine
My wonderful, wonderful Lord.
Wonderful, wonderful
My Lord is wonderful

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mo ni Alafia ti nko ri ‘ru re
Ati ayo t’aiye kii fun ni
Gbati mo jowo okan at’ara mi fun
Jesu Kristi, Oluwa mi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Olugbala mi eni ‘yanu
Eni t’awon Angeli juba l’orun
Mo wole fun o, omo Olorun
Oluwa mi, eni iyanu

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Mo fe ko je alakoso gbogbo aiye mi
K’okan mi yan ife pipe Re
Ki nsi le gboran si gbogbo ase Re
Oluwa mi, eni ‘yanu

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Mo fi  gbogbo talenti mi lele fun o
Ki nwon sa je ‘tewogba fun O
Bi won tile kere mo fi le ‘le fun o
Oluwa mi, eni ‘yanu

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Oh, how sweet the glorious message simple faith may claim:Yesterday, today, forever, Jesus is the same;Still He loves to save the sinful, heal the sick and lame,Cheer the mourner, still the tempest—glory to His name!

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Yesterday, today, forever, Jesus is the same,All may change, but Jesus never—glory to His name!Glory to His name! Glory to His name!All may change, but Jesus never—glory to His name!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: He who was the friend of sinners seeks the lost one now:Sinner, come, and at His footstool penitently bow;He who said, “I’ll not condemn thee, go and sin no more,”Speaks to thee that word of pardon as in days of yore.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Oft on earth He healed the suff’rer by His mighty hand:Still our sicknesses and sorrows go at His command;He who gave His healing virtue to a woman’s touchTo the faith that claims His fullness still will give as much.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: As He walked once to Emmaus, with them to abide,So through all life’s way He walketh ever near our side;Soon again we shall behold Him—hasten, Lord, the day—But ’twill still be this same Jesus as He went away.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Li ana, l’oni titi lae
Jesu si wa bakanna
Yo ru gbogbo ‘banuje re
Jesu si wa bakanna
O ri opo ti Naini ninu ofo re
O so oku omo re di alaye
Yi o fi ayo ireti s’okan re
Jesu si wa bakanna

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Li ana, l’oni titi lai
Jesu wa bakanna lai
Yo ru gbogbo ‘banuje re
Jesu wa bakanna lai
O ri ara Gadara ninu were re
O ja ‘de re o fun ni Alafia
Yo k’ese ati ‘banuje re lo
Jesu wa bakanna lai

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Li ana l’oni titi lae
Jesu si wa bakanna
Yo ru gbagbo ‘banuje
Jesu si wa bakanna
O gbo igbe afoju Bartimeu ni
O laa loju, O fun ni iriran
Imole Re yo le okun re lo
Jesu si wa bakanna

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: How firm a foundation, ye saints of the Lord,is laid for your faith in God's excellent Word!What more can be said than to you God hath said,to you who for refuge to Jesus have fled?

english.title: Verse  2
english.lyrics: "Fear not, I am with thee, O be not dismayed,for I am thy God, and will still give thee aid;I'll strengthen thee, help thee, and cause thee to stand,upheld by my righteous, omnipotent hand.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: "When through the deep waters I call thee to go,the rivers of sorrow shall not overflow;for I will be near thee, thy troubles to bless,and sanctify to thee thy deepest distress.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: "When through fiery trials thy pathway shall lie,my grace, all sufficient, shall be thy supply;the flame shall not hurt thee; I only designthy dross to consume, and thy gold to refine.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics: "The soul that on Jesus hath leaned for repose,I will not, I will not desert to its foes;that soul, though all hell should endeavor to shake,I'll never, no, never, no, never forsake."

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ipile igbagbo na ti dara to
Ti awon enia mimo ti fi le ‘le
Ki lo tun le so ju eyi ti o so
Fun ryin to fi Jesu se abo nyin
Ki lo tun le so ju eyi ti o so?

items.title: Coda
items.lyrics:
Ki lo tun le so ju eyi ti o so/3x
Choir:
Ipinle igbagbo na ti dara to
Choir:
Mo duro, mo duro , mo duro beni mo nduro
Duro lori ‘leri, ileri ti ki ye
N’nu oro Olorun ti yo wa lailai
Mo nduro lori ileri, ile Olorun

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: When the hosts of Israel, led by God,Round the walls of Jericho softly trod,Trusting in the Lord, they felt the conqu’ror’s tread,By faith they saw the victory ahead.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: :Victory ahead! Victory ahead!Through the blood of Jesus, victory ahead;Trusting in the Lord, I hear the conqu’ror’s tread,By faith I see the victory ahead!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: David with a shepherd’s sling and five stones,Met the giant on the field all alone,Trusting in the Lord, he knew what God had said,By faith he saw the victory ahead.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Daniel prayed unto the Lord thrice each day,Then unto the lion’s den led the way,Trusting in the Lord, he did not fear or dread,By faith he saw the victory ahead.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Often with the carnal mind I was tried,Asking for deliverance oft I cried,Trusting in the Lord, I reckoned I was dead,By faith I saw the victory ahead.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics: When like those who’ve gone before to that land,By death’s river cold and dark I shall stand;Trusting in the Lord, I will not fear or dread,By faith I see the victory ahead.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Nigbati Olorun to Israeli
Lati yi ogiri Jeriko ka
Ni ‘gbekele re won rin ‘rin asegun
Won fi ‘gbagbo ri ‘segun niwaju

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Isegun niwaju, isegun niwaju
Nipa ase Jesu a ni ‘segun
Ni gbekele re mo gb’orin isegun
Nipa gbagbo mo ri ‘segun ‘waju

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Dafidi pelu okuta marun
Pade omiran ni loj’ogun
O gbeke l’Oluwa, o mo oro re
Nipa gbagbo o ri segun lookan

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
A gbe Peteru so sinu tubu
Awon omo ehin gbadura kikan
Angeli Oluwa lo ji loganjo
Ide irin tu l’ekun irin si

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Oh, how well I remember in the old-fashioned days,When some old-fashioned people had some old-fashioned ways;In the old-fashioned meetings as they tarried there,In the old-fashioned manner, how God answered their pray'r.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: 'Twas an old-fashioned meeting, in an old-fashioned place,Where some old-fashioned people had some old-fashioned grace:As an old-fashioned sinner I began to pray,And God heard me, and saved me in the old-fashioned way.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: There was singing, much singing, of those old-fashioned airs!There was power, such power in those old-fashioned pray'rs,An old-fashioned conviction made the sinner pray,And the Lord heard and saved Him, in the old-fashioned way.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Well, they say it is better, "Things have changed, don't you know,"And the people in gen'ral, seem to think it is so;And they call me old-fashioned when I dare to say,That I like it far better in the old-fashioned way.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: If the Lord never changes, as the fashions of men,If He's always the same, why, He is old-fashioned, then!As an old-fashioned sinner saved thro' old-time grace,Oh, I'm sure He will take me to an old-fashioned place.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
A mo ranti ipejopo awon igbani
Gba t’awon mimo si nrin l’ona ti igbani
Ni ipade igbani bi won ti gbadura
Ti Olorun si da won l’ohun bi ti ‘gbani

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
O je ipade igbani , ni ibi igbani
Bi t’awon igbani ti l’ore’ofe igbani
Bi elese igbani bo se gbadura
Olorun gbo o si gb’okan mi la bi ‘gbani

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Opolopo orin didun bi orin igbani
Agbara nla mbe ninu adura igbani
‘Daniloju yo mu elese gbadura
Olorun ngbo o si gbokann la bi ti ‘gbani

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Awon kan wipe ohun gbogbo ti yipada
Gbogbo eniyan lappop ro pe bee lo ri
Won si npe mi ni onigbagbo igbani
Gba mo wipe mo feran igbagbo igbani

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Have you wandered along
On life's pathway
Have you lived without love
A life of tears
Have you searched for that
Great hidden meaning
Or is your life
Filled with long wasted years

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Wasted years, wasted years
Oh, how foolish
As you walk on in darkness and fear
Turn around, turn around
God is calling
He's calling you
From a life of wasted years

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Search for wisdom and seek understanding
There is one who always cares and understands
Give it up, give it up
The load you're bearing you can't go on
With a life of wasted years
Wasted years, wasted years
Oh, how foolish
As you walk on in darkness and fear
Turn around, turn around
God is calling
He's calling you
From a life of wasted years
Turn around, turn around
God is calling
He's calling you
From a life of wasted years

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
O ha ti nrin kiri ninu ogbun ese
O ha nwa isinmi fun okan re
O hati fi gbogbi aye re sofo
Jesu pe o, yo s’aye re d’otun

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Maser in ninu ‘gbes’aye ese mo
Mase rin ninu okunkun mo
Yipada, yipada jesu npe o
Jowo je ipe Olugbala loni

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Jowo wa, olugbala p’alare
O se tan lati nu omije re nu
Jowo wa, nisiyi mase fale
Yo gba o la yo si di o mu d’opin

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Wa ogbon ati imo Olorun
Enikan wa t’O mo ero re
Fi fbogbo aniyan re fun Jesu
O ko le lo igbesi aye re lofo

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: When a sinner comes, as a sinner may,There is joy, there is joy;When he turns to God in the Gospel way,There is joy, there is joy.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: There is joy among the angels,And their harps with music ring,When a sinner comes repenting,Bending low before the King.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: When a soul is born in the kingdom bright,There is joy, there is joy;When it walks by faith in the Gospel light,There is joy, there is joy.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: When a pilgrim comes to the river wide,There is joy, there is joy;When he dwells secure on the other side,There is joy, there is joy.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Gbat’elese wa fun idariji
Yo l’ayo, ayo igbala
Gbat’elese ko ese re sile
Yio layo, ayo kikun

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ayo mbe larin awon Angeli
Won nfi harpu won korin
F’elese kan to yipada
Won yo ayo igbala

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Gba ti okan kan ba di atunbi
Yo l’ayo, ayo igbala
Gbat’o ba rin ninu mole ‘hinrere
Yo l’alafia pipe

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Lopin irin ajo wa laye yi
Ao niye ainipekun
Gbat’a ba de bugbe ologo ni
A o layo ayeraiye

englishTitle: YOU NEVER MENTIONED HIM TO ME
yorubaTitle: Iwo Ko So Nipa Re Fun Mi

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
When in the better land before the bar we stand,
How deeply grieved our souls may be;
If any lost one there should cry in deep despair,
“You never mentioned Him to me.”

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
O let us spread the word where’er it may be heard,
Help groping souls the light to see,
That yonder none may say, “You showed me not the way,
You never mentioned Him to me.” “You never

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
A few sweet words may guide a lost one to His side,
Or turn sad eyes on Calvary;
So work as days go by, that yonder none may cry,
“You never mentioned Him to me.”

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
You never mentioned Him to me,
You helped me not the light to see;
You met me day by day and knew I was astray,
Yet never mentioned Him to me.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Je ka tan ihinrere naa
Jakejado aye ka
Ran okan t’o foju lowo
K’enikan mase wipe
Iwo ko so fun mi
Iwo ko fi Jesu han mi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Iwo ko fi Jesu han mi
Iwo ko fi ‘mole han mi
Ojojumo lo ri mi pe emi ti sina
Iwo ko fi Jesu han mi

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
To Jesu wa ‘wo elese
Ko s’olugbala miran
Yoo mu o wo nu ogo Re
Gbati ‘re-ije re ba pin
Ki won mase wipe
Iwo ko fi Jesu han mi

number: 437: YOU NEVER MENTIONED HIM TO ME

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: I’m in love with my Savior and He’s in love with me,He is with me from day to day, what a friend is He,Watches over me while I sleep, hears me when I pray,I’m as happy as I can be, and I now can say:

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Somebody loves me, answers my prayers,I love Somebody, I know He cares;Somebody tells me not to repine,That Somebody is Jesus, and I know He’s mine.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: You’ll be happy if you will let Jesus have His way,He has work for us all to do every passing day;Feed the hungry and cheer the sad, for the sinner pray;You’ll have joy that you never had, and you then can say:

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Then at last when our work is done, He will call us homeTo a mansion He has prepared, nevermore to roam;We’ll sit down by the riverside, cares all passed away,And with never a pain to bear, what a happy day.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mo wa ‘nu ‘fe pel’Oluwa, Oun si feran mi
O wa pelu mi lojojo, ore nla lo je
O nso mi nigba ti mo ba sun, O ngb’adura mi
Mo layo pupo ninu Re, mo le so wipe

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Enikan feran mi,to ngbadura
Mo ni fe s’Eni na, to ntoju mi
Enikan so fun mi , ki ma foya
Eni naa ni Jesu Krist’ ore ooto ni

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Owo yo l’ayo to ba gba Jesu Oluwa
O ni ‘se fun wa lati se lojojumo
Oun boa won ti ebi npa o si gbadura
‘wo yo layo lekunrere ti ‘wo ba gba A

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
‘Gbat’a ba pari ise wa, ao pe wa s’ile
S’ile ologo t’O pese laisi wahala
Ao joko leb’omi didan aniyan yo lo
A ko ni je ‘rora mo lae, ojo ayo ma ni

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Wonderful grace of Jesus,Greater than all my sin;How shall my tongue describe it,Where shall its praise begin?Taking away my burden,Setting my spirit free,For the wonderful grace of Jesus reaches me.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Wonderful the matchless (the matchless grace of Jesus) grace of Jesus,Deeper than the mighty rolling sea (the rolling sea)Higher than the mountain, sparkling like a fountain,
(wonderful grace all sufficient for me, for even me)All sufficient grace for even meBroader than the scope of my transgressions, (sing it!)Greater far than all my sin and shame (my sins and shame)O magnify the precious name of Jesus, praise his name!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Wonderful grace of Jesus,Reaching to all the lost,By it I have been pardoned,Saved to the uttermost.Chains have been torn asunder,Giving me liberty,For the wonderful grace of Jesus reaches me.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Wonderful grace of Jesus,reaching the most reviled,by its transforming powermaking me God’s dear child,purchasing peace and heavenfor all eternity,for the wonderful grace of Jesus reaches me

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ore-ofe ti Jesu, tobi ju ese mi
Enu mi ko le rohin, ‘fe ‘yanu Re si mi
O ru eru ese mi, o da okan mi nde
Ore-ofe at’anu Jesu, gba mi la

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
SA: Ore-Ofe iyanu ti Jesu Oluwa wa
TB: Ore-ofe iyanu ti Je…..su
SA: Jinle ju ibu omi okun, omi okun
TB: Jinle ju ibu omi okun
SA: I…yanu ni ore-ofe na je, iye fun mi
TB: O ga ju orun lom alailabawon li ore-ofe Jesu je fun mi
SA: O tobi ju gbogbo ese mi, (ese mi lo)
TB: O tobi ju gbogbo ese mi lo
All: Gbe oruko mimo Olugbala ga, f’ogo fun

items.lyrics:
Ore-ofe ti Jesu fun awa asako
Nipa ore-ofe yi mo ni ‘gbala pipe
A tu ide ese mi, mo di ominira
Ore-ofe at-anu Jesu gba mi la

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ore-ofe ti Jesu, f’eni t’o buruju
Nipa agbara nla Re, yo so d’om’Olorun
Yo fun-un ni Alafia, titi aiye raiye
Ore-ofe at’anu Jesu yo gbala

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: What a fellowship, what a joy divine,leaning on the everlasting arms;what a blessedness, what a peace is mine,leaning on the everlasting arms.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Leaning, leaning,Safe and secure from all alarms;Leaning, leaning,Leaning on the everlasting arms.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: O how sweet to walk in this pilgrim way,leaning on the everlasting arms;O how bright the path grows from day to day,leaning on the everlasting arms.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: What have I to dread, what have I to fear,leaning on the everlasting arms?I have blessed peace with my Lord so near,leaning on the everlasting arms.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Idapo mimo wo lo dun bai
Gbat’a  ro m’apa ayeraiye
‘Bukun at’alafia je t’emi
Gbat’a ro m’apa ayeraiye

items.lyrics:
Ni ri….ro….mo
(Mo ro mo Jesu /2x)
Mo bo lowo eru on ‘foya
Ni ri….ro….mo
(Mo ro mo Jesu /2x)
Ni riro m’apa ayeraiya

items.lyrics:
O ti dun to lati rin l’ona yi
Gbat’a ro m’apa ayeraiye
Wo b’ona na ti nmo si lojojo
Gbat’a ro m’apa ayeraiye

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ngo ha se beru,  ngo ha se foya
Gba mo ro m’apa ayeraiye
Mo l’alafia pipe lodo Jesu
Gba mo ro m’apa ayeraiye

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Walking in sunlight, all of my journey,over the mountains, through the deep vale;Jesus has said, "I’ll never forsake thee,"promise divine that never can fail.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Heavenly sunlight, heavenly sunlight,flooding my soul with glory divine:hallelujah, I am rejoicing,singing His praises, Jesus is mine.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Shadows around me, shadows above me,never conceal my Savior and Guide;He is the light, in Him is no darkness;ever I’m walking close to His side.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: In the bright sunlight, ever rejoicing,pressing my way to mansions above;singing His praises gladly I’m walking,walking in sunlight, sunlight of love.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mo nrin ‘nu ‘mole l’ona ajo  mi
Lori oke ati petele
Jesu wipe emi ki yo da o
‘leri ife ti ki yo ye law

items.lyrics:
Imole orun, Imole orun
O nf’ayo orun kun okan mi
Halleluya mo l’ayo pupo
Mo nkorin iyin s’Oluwa mi

items.lyrics:
Inunibini ati idanwno
Ko le ya mi n’nu ife Jesu
Oun ni imole ‘nu re ko s’ookun
Emi yo ma to isise Re

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Once I wandered alone in blackness of night
Once I struggled along far from God and right
Then I saw I was lost and in my despair
I fell upon my knees in prayer

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
I was down on my knees
(way down on my knees)/2x
Down on my knees
Praying to my Lord ev'ry day
(Praying to my Lord everyday)
I was praying to Jesus
To hear me please
(Praying to my Lord, Jesus hear me please)
And take my heavy burden away
(take, all my burdens away)
Old Satan tried to tell me
(Satan tried to tell the Bible was a lie that Jesus)
The Bible was a lie
That Jesus did not love me
(Dis not love me and I will die)
And I was doomed to die
But I stayed at my knees
(Stayed down on my knee, way down on my knee)
Stayed on my knees
Jesus took my burden away
(He took my burdens away)

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
I had fallen so low in sin and in shame
That it seemed almost hopeless to trust His name
But I lifted my voice and cried in despair
And Jesus heard my humble prayer

items.lyrics:
Gb’okan mi sako sinu okun ese

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Out on the perilous deep
Where danger silently creeps
And storm's so violently sweeping
You're drifting too far from shore

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Drifting too far from shore
You're drifting too far from shore
Come to Jesus today
Let Him show you the way
You're drifting too far from shore

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Today, the Tempest rose high
And clouds o'ershadow the sky
Sure death is hovering nigh
You're drifting too far from shore

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Drifting too far from shore
You're drifting too far from shore
Come to Jesus today
Let Him show you the way
You're drifting too far from shore

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Why meet a terrible fate?
Mercies abundantly wait
Turn back before it's too late
You're drifting too far from shore

englishTitle: MUST I GO AN EMPTY HANDED?
yorubaTitle: Ngo Ha Lo Ni Owo Ofo?

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: “Must I go, and empty handed,”Thus my dear Redeemer meet?Not one day of service give Him,Lay no trophy at His feet?

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: “Must I go, and empty handed?”Must I meet my Savior so?Not one soul with which to greet Him:Must I empty handed go?

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Not at death I shrink or falter,For my Savior saves me now;But to meet Him empty-handed,Thought of that now clouds my brow.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: O the years in sinning wasted,Could I but recall them now,I would give them to my Savior,To His will I’d gladly bow.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: O ye saints, arouse, be earnest,Up and work while yet ’tis day;Ere the night of death o’ertake you,Strive for souls while still you may.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ngo ha lo ni owo ofo

Nko ti fun n’ise ojo kan
Ikogun fun Oun ko si

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:

So eso fun Oluwa

englishTitle: LET OTHERS SEE JESUS IN YOU
yorubaTitle: Je K’aye Ri Jesu N’nu Re

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: While passing through this world of sin,And others your life shall view,Be clean and pure without, within,Let others see Jesus in you.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Let others see Jesus in you,Let others see Jesus in you;Keep telling the story, be faithful and true,Let others see Jesus in you.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Then live for Christ both day and night,Be faithful, be brave, and true,And lead the lost to life and light;Let others see Jesus in you.

number: 445: LET OTHERS SEE JESUS IN YOU

englishTitle: YOU CAN’T DO WRONG AND GET BY
yorubaTitle: O ko Le Se Ibi Gbe

english.title: verse
english.lyrics: o’er;And He sees each mortal with a searching eye,You can’t do wrong and get by.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: You can’t do wrong and get by,No matter how much you may try;Nothing hidden can be, everything He doth see,You can’t do wrong and get by.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Out into the darkness you alone may go,And seeds for the wicked one sow;There’s an eye that’s watching from the throne on high,You can’t do wrong and get by.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Yes, He knows your secrets, everything you do,He knows that your life is untrue;You can ne’er deceive Him, there’s no use to try,You can’t do wrong and get by.

number: 446: YOU CAN’T DO WRONG AND GET BY

englishTitle: SUNSET IS COMING BUT THE SUNRISE WE’LL SEE
yorubaTitle: Orun Fere Wo Sugbon Ile Yo Mo

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Pilgrims for Jesus in a lowland of sin,
Hoping that we at last the life-crown may win,
Serving the Master through the morning are we,
Sunset is coming but the sunrise we’ll see.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Sunset is coming but the sunrise we’ll see,
Heavenly beauty make the shadows to flee,
Glory is waiting when the spirit is free,
Sunset is coming but the sunrise we’ll see.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Strangers, but happy in His vineyard today,
Trying to help our Lord and Savior alway,
Serving the Master through the noontime are we,
Sunset is coming but the sunrise we’ll see.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Weary and footsore ere the battle is won,
Trusting the promise that we’ll hear His “Well done,”
Serving the Master all the evening are we,
Sunset is coming but the sunrise we’ll see.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
A je alejo nihin, Orun ni ‘le
Awa yo de ‘le wa Orun nigbose

Ao tun pade l’ese Jesu nikehin

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
A: B’a tile pinya nihin ao tun pade
All: Ao tun pade l’ese Jesu nikehin
B: Orun fere wo, sugbon ile yo mo
All: Jesu fere de lati mu wa re ‘le

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Jesu fere de ibanuje yo pin
Oju t’o kun f’ekun ri yo  bu s’ayo
‘Gba Jesu ba de ao gb’ere ise wa
Orun fere wo sugbon ile yo mo

number: 448: SUNSET IS COMING BUT THE SUNRISE WE’LL SEE

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: We shall see the desert as the rose,Walking in the King’s highway;There’ll be singing where salvation goes,Walking in the King’s highway.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: There’s a highway there and a way,Where sorrow shall flee away;And the light shines bright as the day,Walking in the King’s highway.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: We shall see the glory of the Lord,Walking in the King’s highway;And behold the beauty of His Word,Walking in the King’s highway.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: There the rain shall come upon the ground,Walking in the King’s highway;And the springs of water will be found,Walking in the King’s highway.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: There no ravenous beast shall make afraid,Walking in the King’s highway;For the purified the way was made,Walking in the King’s highway.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics: No unclean things shall pass o’er here,Walking in the King’s highway;But the ransomed ones without a fear,Walking in the King’s highway.

englishTitle: IT COULD HAPPEN IN A MOMENT

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
It could happen in a moment! in the twinkling of an eye
It could happen in a moment he could split the eastern sky
Though our hearts will feel unworthy yea how happy we will be.
When the saviour comes from Heaven
When his blessed face we′ll see!

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
I am listening every moment,
For the mighty trumpet sound
What a time we'll have together
When the saints will leave the ground!
All our toiling will be over!
All our sorrow and its pain!
It could happen in a moment
Jesus Christ could come again!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
It could happen in a moment, any minute of the day!
He could call us home to Heaven there forevermore to stay!
Hold the fort a little longer in your struggle over sin!
Trust the Great Commander′s promise,
He will surely come again!

number: 450: IT COULD HAPPEN IN A MOMENT

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Sometimes I feel discouraged, and think my life in vain,I’m tempted then to murmur, and of my lot complain,But when I think of Jesus, and all He’s done for me,Then, I cry, O Rock of Ages,Hide Thou Me.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: O Rock of Ages,Hide Thou Me,No other Refuge, have I but Thee,When life’s dark vale I wander,Far, far from Thee;Then I cry, O Rock of Ages,Hide Thou me.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Sometimes it seems I dare not go one step farther on,And from my heart all courage has slipped away and gone;But, I remember Jesus, and all His love for me,Then, I cry, O Rock of Ages,Hide Thou Me.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: O what a Friend is Jesus, sure Anchor for my soul,So tender, true and gracious, I’m safe in His control.My help in time of danger, my strong defense is He,O Thou blessed Rock of Ages,Hide Thou Me.

english.lyrics:
O Thou blessed Rock of Ages
Trusting now dear Lord in Thee Keep me
‘til my journey’s ended ‘Til Thy blessed face I see

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Hide me, O blest Rock of Ages
‘Til Thy blessed face I see
When the storm around me rages
Rock of Ages hide Thou me

english.lyrics:
Keep me when the storm clouds gather
‘Til the sun comes shining through Keep me
‘til my work is over ‘Til I bid this world adieu

english.lyrics:
When my journey is completed
And there’s no more work to do
Savior guide my weary spirit
To that land beyond the blue

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: "Whosoever will!" "Whosoever will!"Hear, oh, hear that gracious, tender call!None refused shall be,Saving grace is free,In the Saviour's heart is room for all.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: There is room for all,There is room for all;There is room of all who come!Hear His welcome voice,Make Him now your choice;There is room for all who come.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Come just as you are, tho' you've wandered far,Tho your many sins your heart appall;Calv'ry's fount doth flow,Washing white a s snow;At the wondrous cross is room for all.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: In that city bright, where doth come no nightAnd no tears of sorrow ever fall,You may have a placeWith the saved by grace;In the Father's house is room for all.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: O do not let the word depart,And close thine eyes against the light;Poor sinner, harden not your heart;Be saved, O tonight.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: O why not tonight?O why not tonight?Wilt thou be saved?Then why not tonight?

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Tomorrow’s sun may never riseTo bless thy long deluded sight;This is the time, O then be wise,Be saved, O tonight.

english.title: Verse  3
english.lyrics: Our Lord in pity lingers still,And wilt thou thus His love requite?Renounce at once thy stubborn will,Be saved, O tonight.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Our blessed Lord refused noneWho would to Him their souls unite;Believe, obey, the work is done;Be saved, O tonight.

english.lyrics: While Jesus whispers to you,Come, sinner, come!While we are praying for you,Come, sinner, come!Now is the time to own Him,Come, sinner, come!Now is the time to know Him,Come, sinner, come!

yorubaTitle: Maa Gun Esin Lo Ni Olanla

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Ride on, ride on in majesty!Hear all the tribes hosanna cry;O Savior meek, pursue Your roadwith palms and scattered garments strowed.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Ride on, ride on in majesty!In lowly pomp ride on to die.O Christ, Your triumphs now begino’er captive death and conquered sin.

english.lyrics: Ride on, ride on in majesty!The host of angels in the skylook down with sad and wond'ring eyesto see th'approaching Sacrifice.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Ride on, ride on in majesty!Your last and fiercest strife is nigh.The Father on His sapphire throneawaits His own anointed Son.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics: Ride on, ride on in majesty!In lowly pomp ride on to die,bow Your meek head to mortal pain,then take, O Christ, Your pow'r and reign.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Christ our Re­deem­er died on the cross,Died for the sin­ner, paid all his due.All who re­ceive Him need ne­ver fear,Yes, He will pass, will pass ov­er you.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
When I see the blood, when I see the blood,When I see the blood,I will pass, I will pass over you.
Chiefest of sin­ners, Je­sus will save;As He has pro­mised, so He will do;Oh, sin­ner, hear Him, trust in His Word,Then He will pass, will pass ov­er you.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Judgment is com­ing, all will be there.Who have re­ject­ed, who have re­fused?Oh, sin­ner, hast­en, let Je­sus in,Oh, He will pass, will pass ov­er you.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: O great com­pas­sion! O bound­less love!Jesus hath pow­er, Je­sus is true;All who be­lieve are safe from the storm,Oh, He will pass, will pass ov­er you.

items.lyrics:
Gba mo ba (mo ba) r’eje na/3x
Ngo re o koja re o koja

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Jesu ngb’elese t’o buruju
Yo mu gbogbo ileri Re se
We ninu isun to nwe ‘se mo
Ngo re o koja, re o koja

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
‘Dajo mbo oju gbogbo yo pe
Ao gba ere ti o to si wa
Ri sinu eje ti nw’ese nu
Ngo re o koja, re o koja

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Anu titobi, ife ‘yanu
Seun ‘fe oto at’ododo
Wa Alafia n’nu eje na
Ngo re o koja, re o koja

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Low in the grave he lay, Jesus my Savior,waiting the coming day, Jesus my Lord!

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Up from the grave he arose;with a mighty triumph o'er his foes;he arose a victor from the dark domain,and he lives forever, with his saints to reign.He arose! He arose! Hallelujah! Christ arose!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Vainly they watch his bed, Jesus my Savior,vainly they seal the dead, Jesus my Lord!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Death cannot keep its prey, Jesus my Savior;he tore the bars away, Jesus my Lord!

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
O sun ni ‘sa oku, Olugbala mi
Duro d’ojo ti mbo, Oluwa mi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ni ‘boji l’o ji dide (O jinde)
Pelu ‘segun l’ori ota Re
O jinde o segun ‘joba okunkun
Lati joba lai pel’awon mimo Re
O jinde….. o jinde
Alleluya! Krist’ jinde

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Lasan la so ‘boji, Olugbala mi
Lasan la y’okuta d’Oluwa mi

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Iku ko le bori, Olugbala mi
O ja gbogbo ide, Oluwa mi

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Master, the tempest is raging
The billows are tossing high
The sky is o'er shadowed with blackness
No shelter or help is nigh
Carest Thou not that we perish?
How canst Thou lie asleep
When each moment so madly is threatening
A grave in the angry deep?

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
The winds and the waves shall obey my will, peace be still
Whether the wrath of the storm-tossed sea
Or demons or men or whatever it be
No water can swallow the ship where lies
The Master of ocean and earth and skies
They shall sweetly obey my will
Peace be still, peace be still
They all shall sweetly obey my will, peace, peace be still

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Master, with anguish of spirit
I bow in my grief today
The depths of my sad heart are troubled
Oh, waken and save, I pray
Torrents of sin and of anguish
Sweep o'er my sinking soul
And I perish, I perish, dear Master
Oh, hasten and take control

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Oluwa iji nfe s’oke, igbi omi nru kikan
Gbogbo oju orun su dudu, ko si ‘ranlowo ntosi
‘Wo ko bere b’awa segbe, bao ni ‘Wo se le sun
Gbati ‘seju Kankan nderu ba wa, pe omi ni ‘boji

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Afefe at’igbi yo se ‘fe Mi,
Sop: Da…ke je
Others: Dakeje/2x
Ibase ‘binu riru okun
Esu tabi ohunkohun t’o le je
Ko si omi t’o le ri oko naa
Ti Oluwa Orun at’aiye wa
Won yo fi ‘nu didun se ‘fe Mi,
Dakeje/2x				2x

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Oluwa pelu edun mi ni mo ngbadura l’oni
Okan osi mi fe damu tan, yara ko si gba mi la
Ese, irora , ibanuje, nf’agbara ro lu mi
Mo segbe Oluwa , ha mo nsegbe lo
Dide fun ‘ranlowo mi

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Oluwa ija na d’opin idake roro si de
Isudede, iberu fo lo, ogo si kun okan mi
Ma to mi, se amona mi, mase fi mi sile
Pelu ayo l’emi yo si gunle, si ‘le wura didan ni

englishTitle: WHO IS ON THE LORD’S SIDE
yorubaTitle: Tani Wan Ni Iha Ti Oluwa

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Who is on the Lord’s side? Who will serve the King?Who will be His helpers, other lives to bring?Who will leave the world’s side? Who will face the foe?Who is on the Lord’s side? Who for Him will go?By Thy call of mercy, by Thy grace divine,We are on the Lord’s side—Savior, we are Thine!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Not for weight of glory, nor for crown and palm,Enter we the army, raise the warrior psalm;But for love that claimeth lives for whom He died:He whom Jesus saveth marches on His side.By Thy love constraining, by Thy grace divine,We are on the Lord’s side—Savior, we are Thine!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Jesus, Thou hast bought us, not with gold or gem,But with Thine own lifeblood, for Thy diadem;With Thy blessing filling each who comes to Thee,Thou hast made us willing, Thou hast made us free.By Thy grand redemption, by Thy grace divine,We are on the Lord’s side—Savior, we are Thine!

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Fierce may be the conflict, strong may be the foe,But the King’s own army none can overthrow;’Round His standard ranging, vict’ry is secure,For His truth unchanging makes the triumph sure.Joyfully enlisting, by Thy grace divine,We are on the Lord’s side—Savior, we are Thine!

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics: Chosen to be soldiers, in an alien land,Chosen, called, and faithful, for our Captain’s band;In the service royal, let us not grow cold,Let us be right loyal, noble, true and bold.Master, wilt Thou keep us, by Thy grace divine,Always on the Lord’s side—Savior, always Thine!

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Tani nse t’Oluwa, ti yoo sin Jesu?
Tani yo ran lowo, lati gb’emi la?
Tani yo ko aiye, k’o doju k’ota?
Tani nse t’Oluwa ti yo jise sun?
Nipa ipe anu, nipa or’ofe
T’Oluwa l’awa nse, ti Olugbala

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Jesu ki se wura, li o fi ra wa
O f’emi Re ra wa, lati fi s’oso
Wo fi ‘bukun Re kun enit’o wa
‘wo fun wa ni ife, ati ominira
Nipa irapada, nipa or’ofe
T’Oluwa l’awa nse, ti Olugbala

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ija na le kikan, ota le segun
Ko s’eni le bori, ogun Oba wa
L’abe asia Re, isegun daju
Nitori oro Re, y’o bori dandan
Pel’ayo l’ao josin, nipa or’ofe
T’Oluwa l’awa nse, ti Olugbala

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
A yan wa s’om’ogun n’ile ajeji
A pew a s’oloto, fun Balogun wa
N’nu ise isin na, ma je k’a s’aare
Jek’a duro sinsin, k’a si ni ‘gboiya
Baba , wo o so wa, nipa or’ofe
T’Oluwa l’awa nse, ti Olugbala

number: 461: WHO IS ON THE LORD’S SIDE

englishTitle: IT IS WELL WITH MY SOUL

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: When peace like a river attendeth my way,when sorrows like sea billows roll;whatever my lot, thou hast taught me to say,"It is well, it is well with my soul.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: It is well with my soul;it is well, it is well with my soul.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Though Satan should buffet, though trials should come,let this blest assurance control:that Christ has regarded my helpless estate,and has shed his own blood for my soul.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: My sin oh, the bliss of this glorious thought!my sin, not in part, but the whole,is nailed to the cross, and I bear it no more;praise the Lord, praise the Lord, O my soul!

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: O Lord, haste the day when my faith shall be sight,the clouds be rolled back as a scroll;the trump shall resound and the Lord shall descend;even so, it is well with my soul.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Gbat’ayo bi odo sisan de b’okan mi
Gba ‘banuje teri mi ba
Ey’o wu ko je, ‘Wo ko mi ki nwi pe
O dara, o dara f’okan mi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Sop: O dara.. (o dara) f’okan mi (f’okan mi)
O dara, o dara f’okan mi

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
B’esu tile nhale ti ‘danwo nyi lu mi
Idakoro mi ko le ye
Tori Jesu ti mo gbogb’ailera mi
Eje Re ns’etutu f’okan mi

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ojo na ba yara de ti ngo r’oju Re
Ti ‘sudede yo rekoja
Ipe yo si sun, Oluwa mi yo de
Nigbana yo dara f’okan mi

number: 462: IT IS WELL WITH MY SOUL

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: O golden day, when light shall break,And dawn’s bright glories shall unfold,When He Who knows the path I takeShall open for me the gates of gold!Earth’s little while will soon be past,My pilgrim song will soon be o’er,The grace that saves shall time outlast,And be my theme on yonder shore.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Then I shall know as I am known,And stand complete before the throne;Then I shall see my Savior’s face,And all my song be saving grace.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Life’s upward way, a narrow path,Leads on to that fair dwelling place,Where, safe from sin, and storm, and wrath,They live who trust redeeming grace.
Sing, sing, my heart, along the way,The grace that saves will keep and guideTill breaks the glorious crowning day,And I shall cross to yonder side.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: I dimly see my journey’s end,But well I know Who guideth me;I follow Him, that wondrous Friend,Whose matchless love is full and free.And when with Him I enter in,And all the way look back to trace,The conqu’ror’s palm I then shall win,Through Christ and His redeeming grace.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ojo wura ti ‘le yo mo
T’ogo oro yo farahan
Gb’enit’O mona ti mo nto
Y’o si ‘lekun wura fun mi
Aiye gba d ie yio koja
Irin aho mi yo d’opin
Ore-ofe ti ngbani la
Yo j’orin mi l’ebute ni

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
‘Gbana ngo mo ba ti mo mi
Ngo si duro niwaju Re
‘Gbana ngo r’Olugbala mi
Ngo ma korin or’ofe Re
Ona iye, ona hiha

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
T’o lo si ‘bugbe didan ni
Nib’ese on ‘binu k’yo si
Awon t’a gbala yo wa lai
Ma korin lo, ‘wo okan mi
Ore-ofe t’o gba mi la
Yio pa mi mo tit’ojo ni
Ngo si koja s’apa keji

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Mo nr’opin irin ajo mi
O dun ti mo m’amona mi
Mo ntele E ore ‘yanu ni
Ife eniti ko l’egbe
Nigbati mo ba si wole
Ti mo si bojuwo ehin
Ngo gba im’ope asegun
Nipa ore-ofe Kristi

yorubaTitle: Fi Ona Re Le E Lowo

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Would you live for Jesus, and be always pure and good?Would you walk with Him within the narrow road?Would you have Him bear your burden, carry all your load?Let Him have His way with thee.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: His pow’r can make you what you ought to be;His blood can cleanse your heart and make you free;His love can fill your soul, and you will see’Twas best for Him to have His way with thee.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Would you have Him make you free, and follow at His call?Would you know the peace that comes by giving all?Would you have Him save you, so that you need never fall?Let Him have His way with thee.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Would you in His kingdom find a place of constant rest?Would you prove Him true in providential test?Would you in His service labor always at your best?Let Him have His way with thee.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
‘Wo ha wa fun Jesu ni pipe ati mimo?
‘Wo ha nfe rin l’ona tooro pelu Re?
Iwo ha nfe ko gbogbo aniyan re le be?
Fi ona re le l’owo

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Agbara Re le se o b’o ti ye
Eje Re si le we okan Re mo
Ife Re le k’okan Re wo yo si
P’o dara t’o f’ona re le E lowo

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Iwo ha nfe ki o so o di ominira
‘Wo nfe m’adun ifara eni-rubo
‘Wo ha nfe ki o gba o ki o si di o mu
Fi ona re le l’owo

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
O ha nfe ni ‘bi isinmi ni ijoba Re
O nfe danwo k’o si mo p’O j’olooto
O nfe sise n’n’ogba ‘jara Re nigbagbogbo
Fi ona re le l’owo

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: There’s a sweet and blessed storyOf the Christ who came from gloryJust to rescue me from sin and misery;He in loving-kindness sought meAnd from sin and shame hath brought me -Hallelujah! Jesus ransomed me.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Hallelujah! what a SaviorWho can take a poor, lost sinner,Lift him from the miry clay and set me free!I will ever tell the story,Shouting, "Glory, glory, glory!"Hallelujah! Jesus lifted me.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: From the depth of sin and sadnessTo the heights of joy and gladnessJesus lifted me in mercy full and free;With His precious blood He bought me,When I knew Him not He sought me,And in love divine He ransomed me.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: By and by with joy increasingAnd with gratitude unceasing,Lifted up to be with Christ eternally,I will join the hosts there singing,In the anthem ever ringing,To the King of Love who ransomed me.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mo m’oree kan t’o sowon fun mi
Ife Re ko l’egbe
Mo fe so b’O ti gba mi la
A ti pe o le gba o la

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
A…..gbara re gba mi
(Agbara Re gba mi O gba mi)
O ….. s’aye mi d’otun
(o s’aye ki d’otun, o d’otun)
Alafia at’ayo je t’emi
Tor’O gba mi la

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
O gba mi low’ese  on ewu
O si ndabobo mi
Mo simi le iye apa Re
Yo ma to mi lona gbogbo

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
mo wa nin’ise
N’nu ife o pe mi
Wa s’odo mi, ngo mu o de ‘le
Lati ma ba  mi gbe titi

englishTitle: ALL HAIL THE POWER OF JESUS’ NAME

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: All hail the power of Jesus' name!Let angels prostrate fall.Bring forth the royal diadem,and crown him Lord of all.Bring forth the royal diadem,and crown him Lord of all!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Ye seed of Israel's chosen racenow ransomed from the fall,hail him who saves you by his grace,and crown him Lord of all.Hail him who saves you by his grace,and crown him Lord of all!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Let every tongue and every triberesponsive to his call,to him all majesty ascribe,and crown him Lord of all.To him all majesty ascribe,and crown him Lord of all!

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Oh, that with all the sacred throngwe at his feet may fall!We'll join the everlasting songand crown him Lord of all.We'll join the everlasting songand crown him Lord of all.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Gbogbo aye gbe Jesu ga
Angel’ e wole fun/2x
E mu ade Oba Re wa

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
S: Se l’Oba… l’Oba, l’Ob’awon ‘ba
Others: …..l’Oba…. l’Oba….l’Oba ‘won ‘ba
All: Se l’Oba (l’Oba) awon Oba

items.lyrics:
Eyin iru omo Israel’
Ti a ti rapada
E ki eni t’o gba yin la
Se l’Oba awon oba

A ba le pel’awon t’Orun
Lati ma juba Re/2x
Ka ba le jo jumo k’orin

number: 466: ALL HAIL THE POWER OF JESUS’ NAME

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Christ the Savior came from Heaven’s glory,To redeem the lost from sin and shame;On His brow he wore the thorn-crown glory,And upon Calvary He took my blame.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: :He lives on high, He lives on high,Triumphant over sin and all its stain;He lives on high, He lives on high,Some day He’s coming again.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: He arose from death and all its sorrow,To dwell in that land of joy and love;He is coming back some glad tomorrow,And He’ll take all His children home above.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Weary soul, to Jesus come confessing,Redemption from sin He offers thee;Look to Jesus and receive a blessing,There is life, there is joy and victory!

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Krist’Olugbala t’Orun wa s’aiye
Lati gba awon elese la
A fi ade egun de E lori
Lor’agbelebu l’O ru itiju

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
O wa loke, O mbe l’Orun
O ti segun oro iku at’ese
O wa l’oke, O mbe l’Orun
Yo pada wa l’ojo kan

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
O jinde kuro ninu oku
Lati gb’ile a yo ati ‘fe
Yo pada wa lojo ologo kan
Lati ko awon ‘mo re lo si ‘le

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Jesu tun nfi ‘gbala ofe lo o
Wa jewo ese re fun Jesu
Wo Jesu, ‘wo yo d’eni ibukun
Iye mbe, ayo mbe ati ‘segun

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Jesus knocks; He calls to thee;"Weary one, O come to me;"He can save, and only He;Open wide the door.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Open wide the door,Open wide the door,He can save, and only He;--Open wide the door.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Jesus knocks, He comes to save,'Twas for thee His life He gave;He hath triumph'd o'er the grave;Open wide the door.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Jesus knocks, is knocking still;Yield to Him at once thy will;He with joy thy heart can fill;Open wide the wide.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Jesus knocks; the moments fly;While salvation yet is nigh;Ere the Saviour passeth by,Open wide the door.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Jesu nkankun O npe o
Wa s’odo mi alare
On nikan lo le gbala
Si ‘lekun okan re (fun)

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
S: Si ‘lekun okan re
A: Si ‘lekun paya fun
T/B: Si ‘lekun okan re paya fun l’oni
All: On nikan lo le gbala
S: Si ‘lekun okan re
A: Si ‘lekun paya fun loni
T: Si ‘lekun okan re paya fun l’oni
B: Si ‘lekun okan re fun

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Jesu wa gba o la ni
O ku fun o lor’igi
O jinde ninu oku
Silekun okan re (fun)

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Jesu nkan kun nisiyi
Igbala sunmo tosi
Maje ko fi o sile
Silekun okan re (fun)

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
E si ilekun sile
Eyin angel’ didan
Oba ogo lo mbo wa
E korin yin s’Olorun
Okuta yi kuro
Ireti ayeraye
Ntan lehin iboji

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
SA: Ko ogo halleluyah
TB: A re iku koja
All: oro ojo ajinde mole si wa l’oni
SA: Koo go halleluya
TB: A re iku koja
All: Oro ojo ajinde mole si wa loni

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
E si ilekun sile
Oju way o ri
Krist’ t’o feran wa l’Orun
B’o ti mbebe fun wa
Pelu orin isegun
Li ao kii Oba wa
Bi iro alleluya
Ti nla ‘ta wura lo

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: In tenderness He sought me,Weary and sick with sin,And on His shoulders brought meBack to His fold again.While angels in His presence sangUntil the courts of heaven rang.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: O the love that sought me!O the blood that bought me!O the grace that brought me to the fold,Wondrous grace that brought me to the fold!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: He washed the bleeding sin-woundsAnd poured in oil and wine;He whispered to assure me,“I’ve found thee, thou art Mine;”I never heard a sweeter voice;It made my aching heart rejoice!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: He pointed to the nail prints,For me His blood was shed,A mocking crown so thornyWas placed upon His head:I wondered what He saw in meTo suffer such deep agony.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: I’m sitting in His presence,The sunshine of His face,While with adoring wonderHis blessings I retrace:It seems as if eternal daysAre far too short to sound His praise.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics: So while the hours are passing,All now is perfect rest;I’m waiting for the morning,The brightest and the best,When He will call us to His side,To be with Him, His spotless bride.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ife l’O fi wa emi ti eru ese npa
Owo re fa mi mora pada s’agbo
Angeli nfi ayo korin pelu awon ogun orun

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
A! ife t’o wa mi
A! eje t’o ra mi
Suru pelu ore-ofe Re
T’o fa mi pada bo wa s’agbo

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
O w’ese mi nu kuro k’emi le di mimo
O so fun mi jeje pe “iwo sa je t’emi”
Ko si ohun to dun t’eyi to mu okan alare yo

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
A fi iso kan (an) mo ‘gi, o ta ‘je Re fun mi
A si fi ade egun de ori Re fun mi
Iru ife wo l’o to yi lati jiya iku oro

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
B’ojo aye ti nkoja, ‘sinmi mbe l’okan mi
Mo si nreti owuro ti o logo julo
Ti On yo pe wa s’odo Re bi ‘yawo odo aguntan

yorubaTitle: Jesu Ni Ohun Gbogbo Ti O Nilo

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Jesus is all I need
Jesus is all I need
I need no other friend
I need no other one
Jesus is all I need

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
When I’m tired and I’m weary, on my journey home
When the road is rough and long, and I feel so all alone
When my strength is all gone, and I can’t carry on
That’s when my Jesus is all that I need

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
When life has let me down, and peace cannot be found
When all my hopes and all my dreams, lie scattered on the ground
Or when my joy turns to sorrow, and there’s no hope for tomorrow
That’s when Jesus, he is all that I need

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Are nmu o, aye su o
Jesu l’okan re nfe
Bi wahala ngba o kiri
Jesu l’okan re nfe

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Jesu npe gbogbo okan elese
Je ipe Re si wa ko to pe ju
Jesu le m’eru wuwo re fuye
Ah! Jesu l’oakn re nfe

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Bi ‘damu on ‘danwo ba de
Jesu l’okan re nfe
Bi okan re nfe sinmi
Jesu l’okan re nfe

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
B’eru ese nwo o l’orun
Jesu l’okan re nfe
B’ongbe orun gbe okan re
Jesu l’okan re nfe

englishTitle: I KNOW THAT MY REDEEMER LIVETH
yorubaTitle: Mo Mo Pe Oludanded Mi Mbe

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: I know that my Redeemer liveth,And on the earth again shall stand;I know eternal life He giveth,That grace and power are in His hand.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: I know, I know that Jesus liveth,And on the earth again shall stand;I know, I know that life He giveth,That grace and power are in His hand.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: I know my mansion He prepareth,That where He is there I may be;Oh, wondrous thought, for me He careth,And He at last will come for me.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mo mo p’Oludande mi mbe
Itunu nla l’eyi fun mi
O mbe, enit’o ku l’ekan
O mbe, on ni iye mi lai

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
O mbe lati ma ‘bukun mi
O si mbebe fun mi l’oke
O mbe lati ji mi ni ‘boju
Lati gba mi la titi lai

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
O mbe, ore korikosun
Ti yo pa mi  mo de opin
O mbe, emi o ma korin
Woli, Alufa, Oba mi

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
O mbe, mo bo low’aniyan
O mbe, mo bo l’owo ewu
A! ayo l’ore yi fun mi
Mo mo p’oludande mi mbe

number: 471: I KNOW THAT MY REDEEMER LIVETH

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Christ is risen! Alleluia!Risen our victorious head!Sing his praises! Alleluia!Christ is risen from the dead!Gratefully our hearts adore himas his light once more appears,bowing down in joy before him,rising up from griefs and tears.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Christ is risen! Alleluia!Risen our victorious head!Sing his praises! Alleluia!Christ is risen from the dead!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Christ is risen! All the sadnessof our Lenten fast is o’er;through the open gates of gladnesshe returns to life once more;death and hell before him bendingsee him rise, the victor now,angels on his steps attending,glory round his wounded brow.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Christ is risen! All the sorrowthat last evening round him laynow hath found a glorious morrowin the rising of today.See the grave its first-fruits giving,springing up from holy ground;Christ was dead, but now is living;he was lost, but he is found.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Christ is risen! Henceforth neverdeath or hell shall us enthrall.We are Christ’s, in him foreverwe have triumphed over all.All the doubting and dejectionof our trembling hearts have ceased;hail the day of resurrection!Let us rise and keep the feast.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Alleluya/2x
E gb’ohun ayp ga
E ko orin inmu didun
Ke si yin Olorun wa
Enit’a kan m’agbelebu
T’o jiya fun ese wa
Jesu Kristi Oba ogo
Jinde kuro n’nu oku

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Kristi jinde, akobi ni
Ninu awon t’o ti sun
Awon yi ni yo ji dide
Ni abo Re ekeji
Ikore ti won ti pon tan
Won nreti Olukore
Eniti yo mu won kuro
Ninu isa oku won

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Alleluya/2x
Ogo ni fun Olorun
Alleluya f’Olugbala
Eniti o segun iku
Alleluya f’Emi mimo
Orisun ‘fe wa mimo
Alleluya/2x
F’Olorun Metalokan

englishTitle: I’LL GO WHERE YOU WANT ME TO GO
yorubaTitle: Ngo Lo Si Ibi Ti O Fe Ki Nlo

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: It may not be on the mountain’s heightOr over the stormy sea,It may not be at the battle’s frontMy Lord will have need of me;But if by a still, small voice He callsTo paths I do not know,I’ll answer, dear Lord, with my hand in Thine,I’ll go where You want me to go.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: I’ll go where You want me to go, dear Lord,O'er mountain or plain or sea;I’ll say what you want me to say, dear Lord,I’ll be what You want me to be.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Perhaps today there are loving wordsWhich Jesus would have me speak,There may be now, in the paths of sin,Some wand’rer whom I should seek;O Savior, if Thou wilt be my Guide,Tho dark and rugged the way,My voice shall echo the message sweet,I’ll say what You want me to say.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: There’s surely somewhere a lowly placeIn earth’s harvest fields so wide,Where I may labor thru life’s short dayFor Jesus the Crucified;So, trusting my all unto Thy care--I know Thoulovest meI’ll do Thy will with a heart sincere,I’ll be what You want me to be.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
O le sai je li ori oke
Tabi lor’igbi okun
O le sai je niwaju ogun
Ni Oluwa yo lo mi
Sugbon b’O pe mi l’ohun jeje
S’ona tie mi ko mo
Ngo fi ayo j’ipe na Oluwa
Ngo lo sibi t’O ba ran mi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ngo lo sibi t’O fe Oluwa mi
Lor’oke tab’ori okun
Ngo so ohun t’O fe kin so Jesu
Ngo je ohun t’O fe ki nje

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
L’oni boya oro ife mbe
T’Oluwa fe k’emi so
Tab’asako kan wa ninu ese
Ti mo gbodo wa kiri
Olugbala b’O s’oluto mi
S’odo asako na
Enu mi yo soro or’ofe Re
Ngo so ohun t’O fe kin so

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ibi kan wa, ibi t’o re le
Ninu oko aiye yi
Ti mo le sise loj’aye mi
Fun Jesu t’a kan mo ‘gi
Bi mo ti fi gbogbo re fun o
Mo mo p’O feran mi
Ngo se ife Re tokantokan
Ngo je ohun t’O fe ki nje

number: 473: I’LL GO WHERE YOU WANT ME TO GO

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Blessed be the tie that bindsOur hearts in Christian love;The fellowship of kindred mindsIs like that to that above.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Before our Father's throneWe pour our ardent prayers;Our fears, our hopes, our aims are oneOur comforts and our cares.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: We share each other's woes,Our mutual burdens bear;And often for each other flowsThe sympathizing tear.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: When we asunder part,It gives us inward pain;But we shall still be joined in heart,And hope to meet again.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics: This glorious hope revivesOur courage by the way;While each in expectation lives,And longs to see the day.

english.title: Verse 6
english.lyrics: From sorrow, toil and pain,And sin, we shall be free,And perfect love and friendship reignThrough all eternity.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
‘Bukun ni fun ife
T’o s’okan wa d’otun
Irepo larin awa wa
Bi dabi ti orun

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
O mu ebe wa wa
Siwaju baba wa
Ireti ati ‘runu wa
J’okan niwaju Re

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Edun wa je okan
A nreru ara wa
A si nba ara wa kedun
T’omije t’omije

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Gbati a ba pinya
Edun nkun okan wa
Sibe ireti wa s’okan
Pe a o tun pade

englishTitle: GIVE ME THE WINGS OF FAITH
yorubaTitle: Mba Le Fi Iye Igbagbo Fo

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Give us the wings of faith to risewithin the veil, and seethe saints above, how great their joys,how bright their glories be.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Once they were mourning here below,their couch was wet with tears;they wrestled hard, as we do now,with sins and doubts and fears.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: We ask them whence their victory came:they, with united breath,ascribe their conquest to the Lamb,their triumph to his death.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: They marked the footsteps that he trod,his zeal inspired their breast,and, following their incarnate God,possess the promised rest.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics: Our glorious Leader claims our praisefor his own pattern given;while the long cloud of witnessesshow the same path to heaven.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mba le f’iye igbagbo fo
Lo si oke orun
Ki nri ayo awon mimo
B’ogo won tip o to

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Pupo l’awon ore to nduro de wa
Pel’ayo ni ‘ta wura
Ohun didun awon mimo si nfa wa
Lati dapo mo won
Ohun won npe wa, ohun won pe wa
O npe wa sile ogo
Ohun won npe wa, ohun won npe wa
O npe wa sile ogo

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Awon na s’ofo nihin ri
Won si sokun pelu
Won ba ese jijakadi
B’a ti nse nisiyi

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Mo bere bi won se segun
Won f’ohun kan wipe
Agbara od’aguntan ni
Iku Re mu won segun

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Won kiyesi ipase Re
Won tele ona Re
Nipa gbigbo t’Oluwa won
Won j’ogun isinmi

number: 475: GIVE ME THE WINGS OF FAITH

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Are you weary, are you heavyhearted?Tell it to Jesus,Tell it to Jesus;Are you grieving over joys departed?Tell it to Jesus alone.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Tell it to Jesus, tell it to Jesus,He is a friend that's well known;You've no other such a friend or brother,Tell it to Jesus alone.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: 3 Do you fear the gath'ring clouds of sorrow?Tell it to Jesus,Tell it to Jesus;Are you anxious what shall be tomorrow?Tell it to Jesus alone.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Are you troubled at the thought of dying?Tell it to Jesus,Tell it to Jesus;For Christ's coming kingdom are you sighing?Tell it to Jesus alone.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Are mu o, okan re poruru
So won fun Jesu
Idanwo ha dipo ayo fun o
So won fun Jesu nikan

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
So won fun Jesu/2x
On l’ore ti o mo
Ko tun s’ore tabi ‘yekan bi Re
So won fun Jesu nikan

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ironu iku mu o damu bi?
So won fun Jesu/2x
Iwo ns’aniyan ojo ola bi?
So fun Jesu nikan

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Aare mu o, okan re poruru
So won fun Jesu/2x
Ibanuje dipo ayo fun o
So won fun Jesu nikan

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
So won fun Jesu/2x
Oun l’ore ti o mo
Ko tun s’ore tabi ‘ye kan bi Re
So fun Jesu nikan

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Asun dekun omije lo nsun bi
So fun Jesu/2x
Iwo l’ese ti enikan ko mo
So fun Jesu nikan

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Iwo nfoya ‘banuje ti mbo bi
So fun Jesu/2x
Iwo nsaniyan ojo ola bi
So fun Jesu nikan

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
‘Ronu iku mu o damu bi
So won fun Jesu/2x
Iso ns’aniyan ojo ola bi
So fun Jesu nikan

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: There is a home eternal,Beautiful and bright,Where sweet joys supernalNever are dimmed by night;White-robed angels are singingEver around the bright throne;When, O when shall I see thee,Beautiful, beautiful home?

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Home, beautiful home!Bright, beautiful home!Bright home of our Savior,Bright Beautiful home!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Flowers are ever springingIn that home so far;Little children singingPraises to Jesus there.How they swell the glad anthemEver around the bright throne;When, O when shall I see thee,Beautiful, beautiful home?

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Soon shall I join the ransomed,Far beyond the sky;Christ is my salvation,Why should I fear to die?Soon my eyes shall behold HimSeated upon the bright throne;Then, O then shall I see thee,Beautiful, beautiful home!

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ile ailopin kan wa
T’o dan t’o si dara
Nibit’ayo pipe wa
Ko si si oru n’ibe
Awon Angeli nkorin
Nigbagbogbo yi ‘te ka
‘Gbawo ni, ngo ri O
Ile didan yi?

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Nigbose, ngo ri o
Olugbala at’Oba mi
‘Gbati ogun ba pari
Ti ajo mi d’opin
Mo nreti ojo na
Ti jesu y’o tun pada
Lati k’ayanfe Re
T’o j’oloto d’oju iku
Lo si ‘bugbe (ile) ologo

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Itanna didun wa nibe
Ni ile didan yi
Awon omode nkorin
Iyin olugbala won
A! b’orin na ti dun to
Won yi ‘te funfun na ka
‘Gbawo ni ngo ri o
Ile didan yi

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Laipe ngo dapo m’awon
Egbe to ti segun
Kristi ni igbala mi
Ese ti ngo fi beru
Laipe oju mi yo ri
B’o ti joko lor’ite
‘Gbana emi o ri o
Ile didan yi

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Teach me, O LORD, Thy way of truth,and from it I will not depart;that I may steadfastly obey,give me an understanding heart.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: In Thy commandments make me walk,for in Thy law my joy shall be;give me a heart that loves Thy will,from discontent and envy free.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Turn now my eyes from vanity,and cause me in Thy ways to tread;O let Thy servant prove Thy wordand thus to godly fear be led.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Turn Thou away reproach and fear;Thy righteous judgments I confess;to know Thy precepts I desire,revive me in Thy righteousness.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ko mi Oluwa bi a ti
Je gbohungbohun oro Re
B’o ti wa mi, je k’emi wa
Awon omo Re t’o ti nu

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
To mi Oluwa kin le to
Awon asako si ona
Bo mi Oluwa, kin le fi
Manna  Re b’awon t’ebi npa

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Fun mi l’agbara,
Fi ese mi mule l’oru apata
Ki nle na owo igbala
S’awon t’o nri sinu ese

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Ko mi Oluwa
Ki nle fi eko rere re k’elomi
K’oro mi le f’iye Re fo
De ikoko gbogbo okan

items.title: Ese 5
items.lyrics:
F’isinmi didun Re fun mi
Ki nle mo, b’o ti ye
Lati fi pelepele s’oro Re
Fun awon ti are ti mu

items.title: Ese 6
items.lyrics:
Jesu, fi ẹkứn Re kun mi
Fi kun mi li opolopo
Ki ewo ati oro mi
Kun fun ife at’iyin Re

items.title: Ese 7
items.lyrics:
Lo mi, Oluwa an’emi
Bi o ti fe nigbakugba
Titi em’o fi r’oju Re
Ti ngo pin ninu ogo Re

englishTitle: BLESSED BE THE FOUNTAIN OF BLOOD

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Blessed be the Fountain of blood,To a world of sinners revealed;Blessed be the dear Son of God -Only by His stripes we are healed.Tho I’ve wandered far from His fold,Bringing to my heart pain and woe,Wash me in the blood of the Lamb,And I shall be whiter than snow.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Whiter than the snow/2xWash me in the blood of the Lamb,And I shall be whiter than snow.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Thorny was the crown that He wore,And the cross His body o’ercame;Grievous were the sorrows He bore,But He suffered thus not in vain.May I to that Fountain be led,Made to cleanse my sins here below;Wash me in the blood that He shed,And I shall be whiter than snow.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Father, I have wandered from Thee,Often has my heart gone astray;Crimson do my sins seem to me—Water cannot wash them away.Jesus, to the Fountain of Thine,Leaning on Thy promise, I go;Cleanse me by Thy washing divine,And I shall be whiter than snow.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
‘Bukun l’orisun eje na
T’a fi han f’aiye ese yi
Olubukun lom’Olorun
Ina Re nmu wa l’ara da
Bi mo sako lo l’agbo Re
Ti mo m’egbe ba okan mi
We mi nin’eje od’aguntan
Emi o si fun jus no lo

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ngo…. Fun ju sno lo
(Ngo fun ju sno lo/2x)		2x
We mi nin’eje od’agutan (‘d’aguntan)
Emi o si fun ju sno lo (ju sno)

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
A fi egun de E l’ade
O si tun ru agbelebu
O ru ‘banuje kikoro
Sugbon ko jiya na l’asan
Mu mi lo si orisun na
Ti nsan lati we ese mi nu
F’eje t’O ta sile we mi
Emi o si fun ju sno lo

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Mo sako kuro l’odo Re
Nigba pupo l’okan mi nse
Ese mi po, o pon koko
Omi ko si le we won mo
Jesu mo wa s’orisun ni
Mo gbekele ileri Re
Fi eje mimo Re we mi
Emio si fun ju sno lo

number: 480: BLESSED BE THE FOUNTAIN OF BLOOD

yorubaTitle: Nibiti A Ki I Di Arugbo

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: I have heard of a landOn the faraway strand,’Tis a beautiful home of the soul;Built by Jesus on high,There we never shall die,’Tis a land where we never grow old.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Never grow old,Where we'll never grow old,In a land where we’ll never grow old;Never grow old,Where we'll never grow old,In a land where we’ll never grow old.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: In that beautiful homeWhere we’ll nevermore roam,We shall be in the sweet by and by;Happy praise to the KingThrough eternity sing,’Tis a land where we never shall die.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: When our work here is doneAnd the life crown is won,And our troubles and trials are o’er,All our sorrows will end,And our voices will blendWith the loved ones who’ve gone on before.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mo gburo ile kan l’ona jinjin rere
Ile t’o dara fun okan wa
Ti Jesu ko l’oke nibe a ko ni ku
Ile t’a ki yo di arugbo

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Di arugbo (t’a ki) di arugbo
Nile t’a ki yo di arugbo	2x

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
N’ile didara yi, a ki yo sako mo
Laipe ao mo adun ‘le yi
Ogo fun Olorun lao ma ko titi
Ni ‘le ti awa ko ni ku mo

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
‘Gba ‘se wa laye tan, ta  si gb’Ade iye
Ti wahala, idanwo d’opin
Ibanuje yo tan, a o f’ayo k’orin
Pelu awon t’o lo siwaju

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
How often we look in God’s looking  glass book
And suppose we’re beholding another
The forms there we see, so disfigured may be
That we cry tis not I tis my brother

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
The word of our God, is the mirror we need
A reflector of truth in our lives
Then be not forgetful oh hearer take heed
Let God be your judge and be wise

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
How strange to behold how the word will unfold
What the heart from the Lord is concealing
For there in our sight it is all brought to light
And we see what the glass is revealing

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Our actions and ways are revealed to our gaze
As we constantly look in God’s mirror
Those graces we need are supplied as w e heed
And remain not a forgetful hearer

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Then when we have seen that there’s nothing between
And the joy of the Lord is our portion
We gaze without fear for the image is clear
Like the Saviour without one distortion

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Gbat’iwe mimo ba f’aiye wa han wa
A le ma toka si elomiran
Gbogbo abawon t’Olorun nfi han wa
Li a nda le ori elomiran

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Oro Olorun n’imole f’okan wa
O nf’aworan aiye wa han wa
Arakunrin sora, kiyes’ona re
Teriba f’oro Olorun

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Oro Olorun lo ntu gbogb’asiri
T’okan wa nfi pamo fun Olorun
Gbogbo asiri wa yohan kedere
L’abe imole oro Olorun

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Gbogbo iwa wa ni yo si sipaya
Bi a tin se asaro n’nu oro na
B’a ba si je olugbo at’oluso
Ao ma ndagba n’nu or’ofe Re

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
B’o ba si se pe, aye wa mo gaara
Ti ayo Olorun mbe l’okan wa
Pelu nigboya lao wo iwe mimo
Laini alebu kan bi ti Jesu

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Be still, my soul; the Lord is on thy side;Bear patiently the cross of grief or pain.Leave to thy God to order and provide;In every change He faithful will remain.Be still, my soul; thy best, thy heav'nly Friendthrough thorny ways leads to a joyful end.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Be still, my soul; thy God doth undertakeTo guide the future as He has the past.Thy hope, thy confidence let nothing shake;All now mysterious shall be bright at last.Be still, my soul; the waves and winds still knowHis voice who ruled them while He dwelt below.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Be still, my soul; when dearest friends depart,And all is darkened in the veil of tears,Then shalt thou better know His love, His heart,Who comes to soothe thy sorrow and thy fears.Be still, my soul; thy Jesus can repayfrom His own fullness all He takes away.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Be still, my soul; the hour is hast'ning onWhen we shall be forever with the Lord,When disappointment, grief, and fear are gone,Sorrow forgot, love's purest joys restored.Be still, my soul; when change and tears are past,All safe and blessed we shall meet at last.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Saa duro Jee! Jesu wa lodo Re
Fi suuru gbe ‘rora at’edun re
Je k’Olorun samona k’o pese
Nigbakugba Oun yo je olooto
Baba Orun l’ore to dara ju
Yo tona re tit dopin ayo

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Saa duro jee! Olorun seleri
Lati to o bi ti atehinwa
Fi igboya di ireti Re mu
Ohun gbogbo yo han gbangba l’orun
Saa duro jee! Igbi at’afefe
Yo dake jee lie se Oluwa

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Saa duro jee, akoko nsure lo
Laipe ao wa lodo Jesu laelae
Gbati eru ati aro yo pin
Ayo orun yo dipo ‘banuje
Saa duro jee! Gbat’ekun ba dopin
Pelu ayo lao pade li orun

yorubaTitle: Jesu Yo Ha Ba Wa Ka Ma Sona?

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: When Jesus comes to reward His servants,Whether it be noon or night,Faithful to Him will He find us watching,With our lamps all trimmed and bright?

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: O can we say we are ready, brother?Ready for the soul’s bright home?Say, will He find you and me still watching,Waiting, watching when the Lord shall come?

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: If, at the dawn of the early morning,He shall call us one by one,When to the Lord we restore our talents,Will He answer you, "Well done?"

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Have we been true to the trust He left us?Do we seek to do our best?If in our hearts there is naught condemns us,We shall have a glorious rest

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Blessed are those whom the Lord finds watching,In His glory they shall share;If He shall come at the dawn or midnight,Will He find us watching there?

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Gba Jesu de, lati f’ere fun wa
Yala osan tab’ale
Y’o ha ba wa ka ma f’ooto sona
Katupa wa si ma jp

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
A ha le wi pe a se tan, ara
Fun ‘le wa didan l’oke
Wi yo ha ba ‘wo at’emi ns’ona
Ns’ona, ns’ona ngb’Oluwa o de

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Nje b’o ba je oro kutukutu
T’o ba pe wa ni ‘kankan
Gbat’a ba da talenti wa pada
Yo ha wi fun o, “o seun”

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
A ha s’oto s’eyi t’o fi fun wa
Gbogbo ipa wa la nsa
Ti ko ba si ‘dalebi l’okan wa
‘sinmi ologo lao ni

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Bukun l’awon ti Kristi’ ri t’o nsona
Nwon o pin nin’ogo RE
Bi l’aro tabi oganjo oru
Yo ha ba wa be ns’ona

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Sound the battle cry!See, the foe is nigh,Raise the Standard highFor the Lord.Gird your armour on;Stand firm every one;Rest your cause uponHis holy word.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Rouse, then, soldiers, rally round the banner!Ready, steady, pass the word along;Onward, forward, shout aloud hosanna!Christ is captain of the mighty throng.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Strong to meet the foe,Marching on we go,While our cause we knowMust prevail.Shield and banner bright,Gleaming in the light,Battling for the right,We ne’er can fail.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: O thou God of all,Hear us when we call,Help us one and allBy thy grace!When the battle’s done,And the victory won,May we wear the crownBefore thy face.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ojo lala fere d’opin
Gba t’ese pel’ogun yo tan
Okan wa nfa s’ojo nla
Gba tao wa pelu Kristi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Pe wa, Jesu pe wa
Awa fe gb’ohun Re
Ayo lati sise Re
Iwo ni awa yan

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ipe yo dun ni eti wa
B’aguntan ti ngbo t’oluso
Ti won si f’okan kan pejo
Pel’ayo ohun ti won gbo

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Asotele na si se
T’o gb’okan at’ife awon
T’igbani ti ns’ona s’oke
Fun bibo ojo nlanla na

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Ogun ti de, san ida re
Gbe ‘hamora Or’Olorun
Lo lati segun l’ooko Krist’
Kede re p’okan na ni lai

items.title: Ese 5
items.lyrics:
Se giri, ranse na jade
Tit’okan ti ndaku yo gbo
P’Om’Olorun wa fun ‘gbala
Eni t’o ba fe anu Re

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: There are glories untold in that city of gold,On the brink of the beautiful river;Its wonderful light will burst on my sight,But what will it be to see Jesus?

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: What will it be to see Jesus?What will it be to see Him?There are glories untold in that city of gold,But what will it be to see Jesus?

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: There are some who have died that His name should abide,There are some who have lived for His glory;What bliss will it be, their faces to see,But what will it be to see Jesus?

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: When in wonder I stand with my hand in His hand,In the home with the ransomed forever,The sorrow all past, triumphant at last,Oh, what will it be to see Jesus?

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: When the love-light doth shine from His eyes into mine,While the face that was marred is uplifted,With rapture complete, His smile I shall meet,Oh, what will it be to see Jesus?

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Yo ti dun to ‘gba t’aye koja
T’Orun si sile ta ri oju Jesu
A gbagbe ehin, ayo d’otun
Okan wariri l’eba odo Kristali

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ibanuje ko si
Gba Kristi ba gba wa
Ife wa l’odo Re lai
Orun nile wa
A ko ni sako mo

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Yo ti dun to, okan wa np’ongbe
Yio ti dun to ‘gba ti ao ri Jesu
T’a dabi Re, airi di riri
Ao gba ere wa larin agbo t’orun

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Yo ti dun to gb’awon to saju
Ba duro lati f’ayo ki wa kabo
Idapo didun ta ni nihin
Yo tun wa l’oke l’arin agbo t’Orun

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Guide me, O my great Redeemer,pilgrim through this barren land;I am weak, but you are mighty;hold me with your powerful hand.Bread of heaven, bread of heaven,feed me now and evermore,feed me now and evermore.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Open now the crystal fountain,where the healing waters flow.Let the fire and cloudy pillarlead me all my journey through.Strong Deliverer, strong Deliverer,ever be my strength and shield,ever be my strength and shield.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: When I tread the verge of Jordan,bid my anxious fears subside.Death of death, and hell's Destruction,land me safe on Canaan's side.Songs of praises, songs of praisesI will ever sing to you,I will ever sing to you.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
‘Gba ti ona ba su dudu
Wo Jesu, On l’amona
A ko le sina ‘nu okun
Bi a na ngbe ‘nu Jesu

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Bi ona ba tile ha
Yo ran wa lowo d’opin
On na l’o ku ni Kalfari
Jesu Krist’ Or’elese

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
O dara lati wo Jesu
Gba t’iji lile ba nja
Lati mo p’o wa pelu wa
P’oju Re si nba wa lo

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
A fere d’odo Olugbala
T’o mbo wa m’awon tiRe
A ko ni mo ‘banuje mo
Tor’isegun je tiwa

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Now the Saviour standeth pleadingAt the sinner's bolted heart;Now in heaven he's interceding,Taking there the sinner's part.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Sinners, hear your God and Saviour,Hear his gracious voice to-day;Turn from all your vain behavior,Oh, repent, return, and pray!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Now he's waiting to be gracious,Now he stands and looks on thee:See what kindness, love, and pity,Shine around on you and me.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Come, for all things now are ready,Yet there's room for many more:O ye blind, ye lame and needy,Come to wisdom's boundless store!

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Elese Krsiti ma nro o
O duro l’enu ona
Pe wole yo dariji o
O le sai tun pe o mo
Wa l’oni, Jesu feran re
Ife to ju t’iya lo
Ife to j’iya oro fun o
Jesu ku fun elese

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
A! elese wa, elese wa
O wa l’enu ona
O npe l’ohun jeje
O si nro o jeje
S’ilekun okan re

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Nje o mo pe Jesu fe o?
o ti ku l’ori igi
l’ofe lo f’emi Re le ‘le
fun ‘rapada gbogbo wa
wa gba ebun t’o nfi fun wa
ayo nla dipo ebi
kunle nisii gba t’anu wa
a tun f’anu lo ‘kan re

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Gbo, ohun na si nfe dake
N’tor’okan re le sibe
Arakunrin ma k’egan Re
K’O ma ba fi o sile
O ki yo si ri anu Re
Ipe Re yo j’asan
Ki iwo ma ba k’abamo
Fun aije ‘pe ojo yi

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Elese Kristi ma nro O
O duro l’enu ona
Pe wole yoo dariji o
O le sai tun pe o mo
Wa l’oni Jesu feran re
Ife to ju t’iya lo
Ife t’o jiya oro fun o
Jesu ku fun elese

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
A! elese wa, wa elese wa
O wa l’enu ona
O npe l’ohun keke
O si nro o jeje
Silekun okan re

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Nje o mo pe jesu fe o
O ti ku lori igi
L’ofe l’o f’emi re le ‘le
Fun ‘rapada gbogbo wa
Wa gba ebun t’o nfi fun wa
Ayo nla dipo ebi
Kunle nisisyi gbat’anu wa
A tun s’anu f’okan re

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Gbo ohun naa si nfe dake
N’tor’okan re le sibe
Arakunrin ma kegan re
Ko ma ba fi o sile
O ki yoo si ri anu re
Ipe re yoo si jasan
Ki iwo ma ba ke abamo
Fun aije ‘pe ogo yi

yorubaTitle: Ife Iyanu Ti o Wa Mi Ri

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
In tenderness He sought me,
Weary and sick with sin,
And on His shoulders brought me
Into His flock again.
