While angels in His presence sang
Until the courts of heaven rang.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Oh, the love that sought me!
Oh, the blood that bought me!
Oh, the grace that brought me to the flock,
Wondrous grace that brought me to the flock!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
He washed the bleeding sin-wounds,
And poured in oil and wine;
He whispered to assure me,
“I’ve found thee, thou art Mine:”
I never heard a sweeter voice,
It made my aching heart rejoice.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
He pointed to the nail-prints,
For me His blood was shed;
A mocking crown so thorny,
Was placed upon His head:
I wondered what He saw in me,
To suffer such deep agony.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
I’m sitting in His presence,
The sunshine of His face,
While with adoring wonder
His blessings I retrace.
It seems as if eternal days
Are far too short to sound His praise.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics:
So while the hours are passing,
All now is perfect rest;
I’m waiting for the morning,
The brightest and the best,
When He will call us to His side,
To be with Him, His spotless Bride.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ife iyannu t’o wa mi
T’o yo mi kuro n’ese
Alafia, sinmi lo fun mi
‘Gba mo f’or’ofe wole

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Fa mi mora, mora Jesu
Titi ngo r’oju Re ‘nu ogo
Jo fa mi s’ookan aya Re
Titi ngo ba O rin l’orun

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
O f’or’ofe agbara han
Or’ofe nb’ese mole
Lati rin ‘nu ‘dapo didun
Lati m’alafia orun

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Laipe ngo r’eni t’o fe mi
Lai ngo ri I lojukoju
Laipe ngo ko orin Orun
Ti yo dip’orin t’aye

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
]
In my father's house are many mansions
If it were not true, he would have told me so
He has gone away to live in that bright city
He's preparing me a mansion there, I know

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
]
Jesus died upon the cross to bear my sorrow
Freely died that souls like you might have new life
But I know that soon there'll come a bright tomorrow
When the world will all be free from sin and strife

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
]
(Do not shun the Savior's love, from up in glory)
(Or you won't be there to sing the gospel story)
In my father's house are many mansions
If you're true, then to this land you'll surely go
.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mo sise pe ‘nu okunkun
N’ireti Alafia
Labe ese mo ja lasan
Ewon ese de mi sibe
Enikan ninu anu Re
N’owo Re t’a f’iso gun
O y’eru ese mi kuro
O f’ese mi le ona

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Mo sako pe titi ni Egypt’
Jinna s’ile at’ore
Mo je ounje ti ko le te
Okan ese mi l’orun
Tit’okan mi gboogbe ‘nu mi
‘Gbana ko s’alabaro
‘Gbana mo pada lo s’ile
Nibi t’a f’ayo gba mi

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Nisiyi, mo nsinmi ninu
Ile Baba mi l’oke
Mo nje manna, ounje t’orun
Ti nro s’ile lat’oke
Nisi okan mi yo ro m’O
Bi aye tile nfa mi
Mo bo ‘nu ese, mo feran Re
Ngo duro l’okun Kristal’

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
1 I have often heard the story of the Savior’s precious love,How it brought Him from the portals of the Paradise above;To atone for helpless sinners on the cross of Calvary,But the best of the sweet story is, that there He died for me.
Yes, there He died for me on the cross of Calvary,That He might my loving Savior be;I rejoice in His great mercy, so abundant, rich and free,But the best of the sweet story is, that there He died for me.
2 I have often read of Jesus, as He walked from day to day,With His faithful few disciples, how He cheered them on the way;What a feast of rich communion such a fellowship must be,But the best of the sweet story is, He walks and talks with me.Yes, the Savior is my friend, and communes with me each day,As we walk along the narrow way;Oh, my happy heart is thrilling with the purest ecstasy,As along my pilgrim journey Jesus walks and talks with me.
3 I shall meet with many trials, as I go my pilgrim way,Strong temptations will assail me to allure my feet astray;But there’s One who can deliver, and from sin can keep me free,And the best of all is, Jesus will be such a friend to me.He will be a friend to me and from sin will keep me free,And His love my help and strength shall be;He is mighty to deliver, yes, a strong defence is He,And the best of all is, Jesus will be such a friend to me.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
A! won so nipa Olugbala kan
T’o w’aye lati b’elese gbe
Ti o wa wo okan to gbogbe san
Lati gba won la l’owo egbe

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Beni won so nipa Olugbala
T’o ti oke orun wa s’aiye
Ko s’anfani bi mo gbo itan na
Ti nko ba gba ileri na gbo

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
A! won so nipa Eni t’o jiya
Ki nle di mimo nipa t’emi
Nipa igbagbo ‘nu eje Jesu
K’okan onigbagbo le mo lau

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
A! won fo sun mi pe Krist’ ‘nu ogo
Ran Emi Olutunu s’enia
Ela ahon bi ina l’o fun won
L’agbara lati so itan na

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
A! won so nipa Eni t’O mbo wa
Ni sanmo lati gba ‘yawo Re
Ao ha ka wa mo awon ayanfe
‘Gba t’Oluwa pe w ape “ma bo”

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Storms of life may beat around me,Hidden dangers may surround me,But no evil shall confound meIn the everlasting arms.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: :Safely sheltered in the Rock of Ages,Tho’ the tempest round about me rages;Shielded from all fear and harmIn the everlasting arms.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: In the riven Rock I’m hiding,In the Lord of hosts confiding;Safely He my soul is guidingBy His everlasting arms.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: How can I be sad and weary,Or my days be dark and dreary,Flooded by His sunlight cheery,In His everlasting arms.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Voices of the world are calling,Dangers may be fierce, appalling,But I shall be kept from fallingBy His everlasting arms.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mo wa ‘labe abo Oba ayeraye
Amona, Oluso tooto l’osan, l’oru
Bi mo ti ngbekele, o nru aniyan mi
Kini ngo fi san ife Re

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Didan, mimo, l’ewa ojo na
Isin Re nihin fun mi l’opo ayo
Ngo ma tesiwaju titi ngo fi
Ri Oluwa mi

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
O fi pipe aye Re gb’okan ‘sina mi
O d’okan mi n’ide l’ow’ese on ‘tiju
Eje Re l’ebe mi, mo fe ki ndabi Re
Ife Re da ‘na s’okan mi

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
‘Gba mi okun a ho, sugbon mo nla koja
Mo r’alafia pipe bori igbi aye
Oluwa mi nso mi, mo je TiRe lailai
‘Nu ‘sinmi yi o On je t’emi

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Wonderful Jesus! glorious friend!He will be with me unto the end,Cheering, upholding, keeping me strong,Fearless and loyal, shielding from wrong.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Wonderful Jesus! marvelous King!Ever His praise my spirit shall sing;When I behold His glorified face,How I shall praise His wonderful grace!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Wonderful Jesus! showing the wayInto the blessed kingdom of day;Guiding my footsteps, holding control,Making me happy, keeping me whole.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Wonderful Jesus! all thro’ the nightHe will enfold me, giving me light;Then when the morning breaks on the shore,This He will whisper, "Mine evermore."

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Korin iyanu ti Jesu
So bo ti f’irele wa (irele wa)
Lat’ile Re ‘nu ogo nla
Ko wa ola, okiki
Eni t’angeli nyin l’orun
Won ko lati yin l’aye (‘yin l’aye)
Sugbon nf’awon okan to gba
Ayo dipo okunkun

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Krist’ Eni ‘yanu, Olugbala
(Eni ‘yanu Olugbala)
A juiba Re Oba ogo (a juba)
Je k’aye at’orun da
Orin iyin po titi lai
(lai ati lailai)

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Korin iyanu ti Jesu
So b’O ti gbe larin enia (larin enia)
T’o nw’awon to nu, to subu
T’O si npe won , t’O nro won
O nfe gba wa, o nwo wa san
On na mo ‘banuje wa (‘banuje wa)
O mu ayo ‘gbala Re wa
Itura didun f’okan

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Korin iyanu ti Jesu
So gbigbe Re l’oke orun (l’oke orun)
Olor’Alufa on Oba
Ko tun ku f’elese mo
Lekan ri bi woli t’a ko
O t’eje Re fun ‘gbala (fun ‘gbala)
Nisi O jinde n’isegun
O bor’iku on ‘boji

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Not far away it lieth, the land of peace and rest;
The long-sought "better country" God's promise to the blest,
The home with joys eternal, with Eden beauty bright,
That hath no pain or sorrow, no shadow and no night
Not far away it lieth, the land of peace and rest.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Not far away it lieth, the city wondrous fair,
Whose walls and firm foundations are built of jewels rare,
With gates of pearl resplendent, with streets of shining gold,
With tree of life unfading, and glories still untold
Not far away it lieth, the city wondrous fair.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Not far away it lieth, 'tis nearing day by day,
The borders of the Home-land, end of the Pilgrim way.
Only the rolling Jordan seems now to intervene.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ni ojo kan
Awon olododo
T’o gbeke l’Oba Orun
Yo jinde ‘nu ekuru

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Awa nf’ayo duro de lati ki I
(A nja lati gb’ere)
Pel’awon asegun lao pade Re
Ao ji oku at’aye ‘nu Krist’

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Nje nib’ase
L’olori Alufa wa
Yo se ‘ranse f’awon to pa
Gbogbo oro Re mo

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ojo ayo ni
Ko jinn rere mo
Or’Olorun seleri Re
F’awon to ba gboran

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Okan! Kaanu
B’o ba si njafara
‘Gba iyawo ba lo, o rip e
Ko s’aye ‘yipada

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: I stood at the time-beaten portals,Where many a pilgrim had passedOut into the infinite future,To be with the pure and the blest;And, musing in silent devotion,Eternity seemed to draw near;And strains from the choir of the faithfulI seemed in my fancy to hear.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Oh, eternity! Long eternity!Hear the solemn footsteps of eternity.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: I lingered, and silently listenedTo the dull, heavy tread of the years,And thought of the fate of the guilty,When Christ in His glory appears;A shudder came over my spirit,As I thought what a moment might cost,For eternity’s stillness was brokenBy the groans and the sighs of the lost.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: I saw then the Judge in His splendor,As He stepped to His great judgment seat,And thought of the crashing of ages,When Time and Eternity meet;For Time, who has laid many millionsTo slumber in death’s silent shade,Shall reel at Eternity’s presence,And sleep in the tomb he has made.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Let us work while ’tis day, brother, sister,For soon shall the Master return,To garner the wheat that we harvest,The chaff in His fury to burn;Then in haste let us rush to the rescue,But few can we save at the most:Soon millions shall be at the judgment,Forever, eternally lost.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Odo ore-ofe Re nsan l’ofe
A ntuko n’nu re bow a s’odo Re
Ao de nu ibu ife Re nigbose
A ntuko lo si ayeraye

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
a ko le fi ayo aiye we ogo na
nigbati a ba f’oju kan O
ao  ni ‘dapo pelu Re titi lai
ninu ‘tansan ite ogo na

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Afefe ife Re si nfe l’ofe
Nwon nso t’ife Re si gbogbo eda
Nwon nkorin t’eje t’O ta ni Kalfari
Ti o nso ni di funfun laulau

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Emi re mbebe pe, wa ‘le l’oni
Wa Oluwa nigbati o le ri
‘Tori Jesu n’iye, oto  at’ona
Ti o lo  s’ilu Orun rere

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
There’s an ensign lifted to a world of woe
A royal standard a banner bright
For Christ is winning in the earth below
Though un-seen by human sight
All the hosts of satam fail to win the conflict
All his emissaries fall upon thw way
But the band of Christ though small Shall conquer all
And at the end of battle they shall win the day

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
There's an Ensign lifted high
For Heaven is our goal
And the battle draweth nigh
For ev'ry valiant soul;
In this conflict for the right
There are sodiers for the fray
Who will win with Christ their might
In the glorious King's Highway.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Onward, forward, comrades to the battle’s front
Put on the armous gird on the sword
And in the ranks of battle bear the brunt
We are winning with our Lord
Never faltering where the battle is the hardest
Never failing in the fiercest of the fray
But the band of Christ though small Shall conquer all
And at the end of battle they shall win the day

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Though the foe may rally in the bitter fight
Though satan’s armyseems fierce and strong
Keep pressing onwad with the Lord in sight
For the victory comes ere long
Don’t forget the precious promise he has given
Don’t forget to read the word and watch and pray
But the band of Christ though small Shall conquer all
And at the end of battle they shall win the day

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
A gb’opagun kan s’oke l’aye ese yi
Amona to daju, t’o si ndan
‘Tori Kristi nsegun ‘nu aye yi
B’araye ko tile ri
Gbogb’ogun esu ko le bori, won kuna
Awon ‘ranse re susbu l’oju ona
Sugbon om’ogun Jesu b’o tile kere
Yo segun nikehin y’o s’aseyori

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
A gb’opagun kan soke
Orun ni ile wa
Ogun na sunmo ‘tosi
Fun awon akoni
Ninu ogun mimo yi
Omo ogun pupo wa
Ti yo segun ‘nu Kristi
L’ona opopo Oba

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Akoni, e tewiwaju lo s’ogun
Gbe ‘hamora wo, mu ida re
‘Nu ogun na, iwo o f’arada
Oluwa nsegun fun wa
Mase sa nigba ti ogun na le kikan
Mase kuna lati ja titi d’opin
Gbana om’ogun Jesu bo tile kere
Yo segun n’ikehin , yo s’aseyori

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ota le ma fonnu ninu ogun na
Bi ogun esu tile nhale
Ma beru tewasiju ‘nu Oluwa
Isegun yo de laipe
Ma gbagbe ileri iyebiye t’o ti se
Ma gbagbe oro Re, sora, gbadura
Gbana om’ogun Jesu b’o tile kere
Yo segun n’ikehin, yo s’aseyori

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Beneath the cross of JesusI fain would take my stand,the shadow of a mighty Rockwithin a weary land;a home within the wilderness,a rest upon the way,from the burning of the noontide heatand the burden of the day.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Upon the cross of Jesusmine eye at times can seethe very dying form of Onewho suffered there for me:and from my stricken heart with tearstwo wonders I confess,the wonders of redeeming loveand my unworthiness.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: I take, O cross, thy shadowfor my abiding place:I ask no other sunshine thanthe sunshine of his face;content to let the world go by,to know no gain nor loss;my sinful self my only shame,my glory all the cross.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Lab’agbelebu Jesu
Ni ngo f’ayo ro
Tori apata bo
N’nu aye ise yi
Ibugbe ninu aginju
Ibi ‘sinmi f’okan
Kuro nin’orun osan gangan
Ati laalaa ojumo

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Lor’agbelebu Jesu
Oju mi le ma wo
Aworan enit’O jiya
Ti O si ku fun mi
Mo jew’ohun ‘yanu meji
Pel’ekun on kaanu
Iyanu ti ife nlanla Re
Ati ainilari mi

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Agbelebu mo fi O
Se ibi ‘sadi mi
Nko bere imole miran
Ju mole oju Re
O temilorun k’aye lo
Ki nwa n’ipokipo
Emi ko jamo ohunkohun
Agbelebu l’ogo mi

englishTitle: THE CHURCH OF GOD IS ONE

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: The Church of God is one:As brethren here we meet;For us salvation’s work is done,In Christ we stand complete.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: The Church of God is one, (in faith,)Is one in faith and love, (in faith and love,)Is one in the death by Jesus borne,One in His life above.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: The Church of God is one:One only Lord we know;We worship Jesus, God’s own Son,Who came God’s love to show.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: The Church of God is one:All, sinners saved by grace;Our plea, the precious blood alone;The cross, our meeting place.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: The Church of God is one:The Bible we revere;By it all saving truth is known,And God to man brought near.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics: The Church of God is one:One blessed hope have we;Our dear Redeemer’s sure returnHis saints to glorify.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Okan n’ij’Olorun
Nihin li a npejo
A ti s’ise ‘gbala fun wa
‘Nu Krist’ la nse w ape

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Okan n’ij’Olorun (n’ife)
‘Nu gbagbo on ife
(Ninu igbagbo on Ife)
Nwon je okan nipa iku Re
Okan ‘nu iye Re

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Okan n’ij’Olorun
Oluwa kan la mo
A wole fun Jesu t’O wa
F’ife Baba han wa

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Okan n’ij’Olorun
Elese ye l’ofe
Eje Re nikan l’ebe wa
Agbelebu l’abo

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Okan n’ij’Olorun
Bibeli l’a ngbega
On lo f’ona igbala han, o
Mu ni sunm’Olorun

number: 564: THE CHURCH OF GOD IS ONE

yorubaTitle: Ife Re Ko Le Ye Lai

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
I do not ask to see the wayMy feet will have to tread;But only that my soul may feedUpon the living Bread.'Tis better far that I should walkBy faith close to His side;I may not know the way I go,
But oh, I know my Guide.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: His love can never fail, His love can never fail,My soul is satisfied to know His love can never fail.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: And if my feet would go astray,They cannot, for I knowThat Jesus guides my falt'ring steps,As joyfully I go.And tho' I may not see His face,My faith is strong and clear,That in each hour of sore distressMy Savior will be near.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: I will not fear, tho' darkness comeAbroad o'er all the land,If I may only feel the touchOf His own loving hand.And tho' I tremble when I thinkHow weak I am, and frail,My soul is satisfied to knowHis love can never fail.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
N ko bere lati r’ona tie se mi yo to
Sugbon ki onje iye na, sa ma bo okan mi
O dara pupo ti mo ba le fi ‘gbagbo sunmo
Mo le sai m’ona ti mo nto, mo mo Amona mi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
‘Fe Re…… ko le ye lai/2x
(‘Fe Re ko le ye lai)/2x
O dun mo mi, lati mo pe, ife Re ki ye lai

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Bi mo ba si fe sako lo, ko le ri bee tori
Emi mo pe Jesu nto mi bi mo ti nf’ayo lo
Bi nko tile ri oju Re, igbagbo mi duro
Tobe ni akoko ‘soro, Jesu yo sunmo mi

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
N k’yo beru bi okun su, yi gbogbo ile ka
Ki emi sa ti le mo pe, On wa nitosi mi
Bi mo ba nfoya nigbati mo nro t’ailera mi
O dun mo  mi lati mo pe, Ife Re ki ye lai

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Wonderful love that rescued me,Sunk deep in sin,Guilty and vile as I could beNo hope within;When ev'ry ray of light had fled,O glorious day!Raising my soul from out the dead,Love found a way.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Love found a way to redeem my soul,Love found a way that could make me whole;Love sent my Lord to the cross of shame,Love found a way, O praise His holy name!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Love bro't my Saviour here to dieOn Calvary,For such a sinful wretch as I,How can it be?Love bridged the gulf 'twixt me and Heav'n,Taught me to pray;I am redeemed, set free, forgiv'n,Love found a way.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Love opened wide the gates of lightTo Heav'n's domain,Where in eternal pow'r and mightJesus shall reign;Love lifted me from depths of woeTo endless day,There was no help in earth below,Love found a way.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ife iyanu t’o gba mi kuro n’ese
Gbati mo jebi ti mo gbe, lainireti
Nigabti aye mi sokun A ojo nla
T’a gb’okan mi lowo iku, ife r’ona

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ife r’ona……. Lati da mi n’de
(Ife r’ona, ona lati da okan mi nide)
Ife r’ona……. Lati se mi pe
(ife r’ona, ona lati se lati se mi pe)
Ninu ife Kristi ku…… fun mi
(‘nu ife, Oluwa mi, Oluwa mi ku fun mi)
Ife r’ona, yin oko Re mimo

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ife lo mu ki Jesu ku ni Kalfari
F’otosi elese b’emi—Iyanu ni
O mu ‘soro kuro, o ko mi ki ngbadura
Oo fi gbogbo ese mi ji, ife r’ona

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ife si ilekun, ilu orun sile
Nibi ti Jesu yio joba titi lai
Ife yo mi ninu egbe sinu iye
Iranwo ko si l’aye yi, ife r’ona

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: 1 The blood of the Lamb covers every sin,And His will doth now control,My life is filled with His pow’r divine,There’s victory in my soul.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: :There’s victory in my soul,There’s victory in my soul,The conquering pow’r o’er the life of sinGives victory in my soul.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: By faith in His name, I shall overcome sin,And His glories I’ll behold,‘Gainst ev’ry foe I’ll the conflict win,There’s victory in my soul.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: By the power of life in our conquering King,I His face shall soon behold,And with Him dwell and His glory sing,There’s victory in my soul.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: O the joy and sweet peace from our Father above,When His pow’r doth take control,When His Spirit fills soul and heart with love,There’s victory in my soul.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mo fi igbagbo ko eru
Ese mi le Jesu
Nisiyi Alafia on
‘segun wa l’okan mi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Isegun mbe l’okan mi
(A…….. ‘segun l’okan mi)
‘Segun mbe l’okan mi
(A…… ‘segun l’okan mi)
Mo fi igbagbo ro m’oro Re
Isegun mbe…… ‘segun l’okan mi

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Mo mo pe ‘danwo mbe fun mi
Mo ni ja ajase
Olorun ki mi lay ape
Isegun mbe fun mi

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Larin ogun ni igbani
‘Gbati awon mimo nja
Nwon ko segun l’agbara won
Nwon gbekel’Oluwa

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Ni riro m’apa Re nikan
Emi ko le subu
Ogo yo je tiRe nikan
Lehin ‘segun pipe

items.title: Ese 5
items.lyrics:
Emi ko beru iku  mo
‘Tori Krist’ p’oro Re
N’nu afonifoji eru
On yo mu mi k’orin

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Impatient heart, be still!What tho’ He tarries long?What tho’ the triumph songIs still (is still) delayed?Thou hast His promise sure,And that is all secure;Be not afraid,Be not afraid!Be still! be still!Impatient heart be still!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: My eager heart, be still!Thy Lord will surely come,And take thee to His home,With Him (with Him) to dwell;It may not be today;And yet, my soul, it may;I cannot tell,I cannot tell.Be still! be still!My eager heart be still!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: My anxious heart, be still!Watch, work, and pray, and thenIt will not matter whenThy Lord (Thy Lord) shall come.At midnight, or at noon;He cannot come too soonTo take thee home,To take thee home.Be still! be still!My anxious heart be still.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Okan aiduro sinmi ‘bi on tipe pe de
B’orin isegun tile pe (sibe) sibe
Ileri Re to wa fun o daju, kii ye
Mase foya , mase foya

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Sinmi ………… Sinmi
(………sinmi, sinmi)
Aiduro okan……… sinmi (sinmi, sinmi)

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ma kanju, okan mi Oluwa re mbo wa
Yo si mu o re ‘le lati (lati) ba gbe
O le sai je l’oni, o si le je l’oni
Ngo ko le so, ng ko le so

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Sinmi ………… Sinmi
(………sinmi, sinmi)
Ma kanju okan……… sinmi (sinmi, sinmi)

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Aibale okan, sinmi, sona sise gbadura
Gbana ko di buru ‘gb’Oluwa (Jesu) de
L’osan, tabi l’oru, ko ni ya ju lati
Mu o re ‘le mu o re ‘le

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Sinmi ………… Sinmi
(………sinmi, sinmi)
Aibale okan……… sinmi (sinmi, sinmi)

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: "Everlasting life!" is the promise giv’nUnto him who loves the Savior dear."Everlasting life!" and a home in heav’n,If you will believe His name. (His name.)

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Then believe Him; O receive Him,Blessed Savior, Kingly favor.Give Him ever best endeavor,For with Him is everlasting life!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: "Everlasting life!" shout it far and wide,Blessed tidings of salvation free;"Everlasting life!" thro’ His blood applied,To the sinner in his woe. (his woe.)

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: "Everlasting life!" there is naught to doBut to take the words He gives you now;"Everlasting life!" precious gift for you,Thro’ the Savior crucified. (for thee.)

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Iye ailopin ni ileri na
Fun enit’o fe Olugbala
Iye ailopin ibugbe loke
Bi o ba gba oruko Re gbo

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Nje gba A…… gbo, f’okan are fun
(‘Je gbagbo…… f’okan fun)
Olugba………la onife….nla
(Olugbala, Alanu)
Fi ipa ……….. re gbogbo sin-In
(Gbagbogbo…… gbekele)
L’odo Re n’iye ailopin wa

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Iye ailopin kede re  kikan,
Ihin ayo igbala l’ofe
Iye ailopin nipa eje Re
Fun elese ninu egbe re

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
“Iye ailopin” ko s’ona miran
Bikose lati gb’oro Re gbo
“Iye ailopin” ebun iyebiye
Nipase Jesu t’a kan mo ‘gi

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: I was always the never-surrender typeThought falling down on my kneesWas giving up my fight

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: I was taught that surrenderWould cost my lifeNow I'm here at the altarAnd I know they're right

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: So I give up and I give inNo longer I but Christ who livesYour kingdom comeLet my kingdoms fallCross my heart I know You're in itThis surrender has no limits

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Agbelebu n’nu okan mi
Ami iya ti Kalfari
Ireti okan mi titi
Iwo se ‘yebiye fun mi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Agbelebu, Agbelebu
(Agbelebu ‘yanu, agbelebu)
Amin ogo ati’iye ni o
Gb’oju mi s’oke, Oluwa
Ki ma wo agbelebu Re

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Lori re, Agbelebu ni
Jesu t’eje Re f’ese mi
Fa okan mi s’oke kin le
Ma wo enit’o ku fun mi

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Agbelebu emi ba le
Ye fun jesu ti mo feran
L’ojona m’okan mi rele
Je ‘mole ti yo ma to mi

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Carry your Bible with you,Let all its blessings outflow;It will supply you each moment,Take it wherever you go.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Take it wherever you go,Take it wherever you go,God’s message of love,Sent down from above,O take it wherever you go.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Carry the word of pardon,Sweeter each day it will grow;Somewhere some heart will be waiting,Take it wherever you go.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Carry the wondrous story,Tell it to hearts plunged in woe;This word of gracious redemption,Take it wherever you go.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Carry the word of promise;Sinners unpardoned may knowGod’s path from sin unto safety,Take it wherever you go.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Gbe Bibeli re lowo
Wa gbogbo ibukun re
Ti o le ri nigbakugba
Gbe lo ‘bi gbogbo to nlo

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Gbe lo ‘bi gbogbo t’o nlo (to nlo)/2x
Oro ife t’a ran lat’oke wa
Jo gbe lo ‘bi gbogbo t’o nlo (to nlo)

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Kede oro ‘dariji
Yo ma dun si lojojo
Awon okan miran nfe gbo
Gbe lo ‘bi gbogbo to nlo

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Kede itan ‘yanu na
So fun okn ti nsegbe
Oro anu ti ‘rapada
Gbe lo ‘bi gbogbo t’o nlo

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Kede oro ‘leri na
Ki elese ba le mo
Ona  igbala Olorun
Gbe lo ‘bi gbogbo to nlo

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Why should I charge my soul with care?The wealth of ev'ry mineBelongs to Christ, God’s Son and Heir,And He’s a Friend of mine.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Yes, He’s a Friend of mine,And He with me doth all things share;Since all is Christ’s, and Christ is mine,Why should I have a care?For Jesus is a Friend of mine.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: The silver moon, the golden sun,The countless stars that shine,Are His alone, yes, ev'ry one,And He’s a Friend of mine.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: He daily spreads a glorious feast,And at His table dineThe whole creation, man and beast,And He’s a Friend of mine.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: And when He comes in bright array,And leads the conquering line,It will be glory then to say,And He’s a Friend of mine.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ese ti ngo fi s’aniyan
Gbogbo ‘sura aye
Je ti Kristi, omo Olorun
On si he ore mi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Beeni, ore mi ni
Mo j’alabapin oro Re
Niwon bi Krist’ ti je t’emi
Ngo se ma s’aniyan
‘Tori Jesu je ore mi
(Tori Jesu je ore fun mi)

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Osupa at’orun tin ran
Ainiye irawo
Gbogbo won mbe n’ikawo Re
On si je Ore mi

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Lojojumo l’O nse ase
Lati fib o gbogbo
Eniyan ati eranko
On si je ore mi

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Gba t’O ba de ;nu ogo Re
N’waju op’asegun
Yo je ogo lati wipe
On je Ore fun mi

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Friends all around us are trying to findWhat the heart yearns for, by sin undermined;I have the secret, I know where 'tis found:Only in Jesus true pleasures abound.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: All that I want is in Jesus;He satisfies, joy He supplies;Life would be worthless without Him,All things in Jesus I find.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Some carry burdens whose weight has for yearsCrushed them with sorrow and blinded with tears;Yet One stands ready to help them just now,If they with faith and in penitence bow.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: No other name thrills the joy chords within,And thro' none else is remission of sin;He knows the pain of the heart sorely tried,All of its needs will in Him be supplied.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Jesus is all this poor world needs today;Blindly men strive, for sin darkens the way.O to draw back the grim curtains of night--One glimpse of Jesus, and all will be bright.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Awon okan t’eru ese npa
Nfe wo ona lati le bo kuro
Mo mo ona ti a le gba bo
Ninu Jesu ni ayo toto wa

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Gbogb’aini mi mbe n’nu Jesu
(Gbogbo aini mi mbe ninu Jesu)
O fi ayo, f’ayo kun okan mi
(o fi ayo, f’ayo kun okan mi l’ofe)
Laise Re aiye ko je nkan
Mo r’o’hun gbogbo n’nu Jesu

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Awon miran ru eru wuwo fun
Opo odun pelu ibanuje
Enikan wa lati se irawo
Bi nwon o ba f’irele teriba

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Koo s’ooko miran ti fun ni l’ayo
Ko si igbala nibomiran mo
On mo irora okan to gbogbe
On ni yo tan aniyan okan na

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Jesu natn aini aiye osi yi
Eda nsa ‘pa lasan, ese dena
A ba ke ka ‘boju okun kuro
‘Mole Jesu yo mu gbogbo re dan

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Face to face with Christ, my Savior,
Face to face—what will it be,
When with rapture I behold Him,
Jesus Christ who died for me?

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Face to face I shall behold Him,
Far beyond the starry sky;
Face to face in all His glory,
I shall see Him by and by!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Only faintly now, I see Him,
With the darkling veil between,
But a blessed day is coming,
When His glory shall be seen.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
What rejoicing in His presence,
When are banished grief and pain;
When the crooked ways are straightened,
And the dark things shall be plain.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Face to face! O blissful moment!
Face to face—to see and know;
Face to face with my Redeemer,
Jesus Christ who loves me so.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
‘Gba mba ri Krist’ lojukoju
Bawo ni yo ti dun to
‘Gba mo ba ri ‘farahan Re
Jesu Krist’ to ku fun mi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Emi o r’ I lojukoku
Li oke orun didan
Lojukoju n’nu ogo Re
L’emi yo ri I nigbose

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Nisi mo nri I firifiri
‘boju wa laarin sibe
Sugbon ojo nla kan mbo wa
Ti away o r’ogo Re

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ayo wa yo si ti po to
‘Gba ko si arokan mo
Ti ona wiwo di tito
Ki yo s’ohun ‘koko mo

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Lojukoju yo ti dun to
Emi yo ri I ngo si mo
Ngo ri Olurapada mi
Jesu Krist’ to feran mi

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: He leadeth me: O blessed thought!O words with heavenly comfort fraught!Whate'er I do, where'er I be,still 'tis God's hand that leadeth me.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: He leadeth me, he leadeth me;By his own hand he leadeth me:His faithful follower I would be,For by his hand he leadeth me.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Sometimes mid scenes of deepest gloom,Sometimes where Eden's flowers bloom,By waters calm, o'er troubled sea,Still 'tis God's hand that leadeth me.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Lord, I would clasp thy hand in mine,Nor ever murmur nor repine;Content, whatever lot I see,Since 'tis my God that leadeth me.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: And when my task on earth is done,When, by thy grace, the victory's won,E'en death's cold wave I will not flee,Since God through Jordan leadeth me.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
O nto mi lo ero ‘bukun
Oro t’Orun ntu mi ninu
Ibikibi ti mo ba wa
Sibe Olorun nto mi lo

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
O nto mi lo/2x
Owo Re ni o nfi to mi
Lotito ni mo fe tele E
Nitori ti O nto mi lo

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Nigba miran ti ‘ponju wa
Nigba miran ninu ‘tura
N’nu ‘rumi on ‘dakeroro
Sibe Olorun nto mi lo

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Oluwa ngo d’odi Re mu
N ko ni kun, n’nu ‘banuje
F’ohun yow u ti mo le ri
Niwon ‘gbat’ Olorun nto mi

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Nigba ‘se mi laye ba pin
T’or’ofe Refun mi n’segun
Emi ko ni beru iku
Niwon ‘gba Olorun nto mi

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Love divine, all loves excelling,Joy of heav'n to earth come down,Fix in us Thy humble dwelling;All Thy faithful mercies crown!JESUS, Thou art all compassion,Pure, unbounded love Thou art;Visit us with Thy salvation;Enter every trembling heart.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Breathe, O breathe Thy loving SpiritInto every troubled breast!Let us all in Thee inherit,Let us find the promised rest.Take away our love of sinning;Alpha and Omega be;End of faith, as its beginning,Set our hearts at liberty.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Come, Almighty to deliver;Let us all Thy life receive;Suddenly return and never,Nevermore Thy temples leave.Thee we would be always blessing,Serve Thee as Thy hosts above;Pray, and praise Thee without ceasing,Glory in Thy perfect love.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Finish then, Thy new creation;Pure and spotless let us be;Let us see Thy great salvationPerfectly restored in Thee.Changed from glory into glory,Till in heav'n we take our place,Till we cast our crowns before Thee,Lost in wonder, love, and praise.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ife Olorun ailegbe
Ayo t’o t’orun w’aiye
Fiokan wa se ‘bugbe Re
F’anu Re se wa l’ogo
Jesu oniyonu julo
Ife ti ko l’osuwon
Jo f’igbala Re be wa wo
Wa sinu okan gbogbo

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Jowo mi Emi Mimo Re
Sinu okan t’o damu
Je k’a le jogun ogo Re
At’isinmi ailopin
Wa mu ife ese kuro
Se Alfa at’Omega
Ipilese ati ipin
S’okan wa d’ominira

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Wa gba ni Olodumare
Je k’a ri iye Re gba
Wa kan kan ki O ma si fi
Tempili Re sile mo
Iwo l’a o ma fi ‘yin fun
Bi awon ogun t’orun
Adua at’iyin k’yo dekun
Ao ma yo ‘nu ewa Re

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Pari ise Re Oluwa
K’o si so wa di mimo
Jeki a r’igbala nla Re
K’a le se w ape n’nu Re
Lati ogo de ‘nu ogo
Titi ao fi de Orun
Ti ao si f’ade wa le ‘le
Ti ao ma yin O titi

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Throw out the lifeline across the dark wave;There is a brother whom someone should save;Somebody’s brother, O who then will dareTo throw out the lifeline, his peril to share?

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Throw out the lifeline! Throw out the lifeline!Someone is drifting away;Throw out the lifeline! Throw out the lifeline!Someone is sinking today.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Throw out the lifeline with hand quick and strong;Why do you tarry, why linger so long?See, he is sinking, O hasten today;And out with the lifeboat, away, then, away!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Throw out the lifeline to danger-fraught men,Sinking in anguish where you’ve never been;Winds of temptation and billows of woeWill soon hurl them out where the dark waters flow.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Soon will the season of rescue be o’er;Soon will they drift to eternity’s shore;Haste then, my brother, no time for delay!But throw out the lifeline and save them today.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ju okun iye na s’inu ibu
Okan kan mbe ti o nfe igbala
Arakunrin kan ni, tani yo lo
F’emi re w’ewu lati j’okun ‘ye si

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ju okun ‘ye na/2x
Igbi ngbe enikan lo
Ju okun ‘ye na/2x
Okan kan nri lo l’oni

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Fi itura ju okun iye na
Esese ti iwofi duro pe be?
Wo bi o ti nri lo, yara loni
Si jade kankan pel’okun  iye na

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ju okun iye f’okan t’ewu nwu
T’o wa ninu arodun t’a ko mo
Igbi idanwo ati iparun
Fere gba won si inu omi jinjin

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Ojo igbala fere koja na
Nwon fere d’ebute ayeraye
Yara, arakunrin, mase lora
Ju okun iye lati gba won l’oni

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Hark! 'Tis the Shepherd's voice I hear,Out in the desert dark and drear,Calling the sheep who've gone astray,Far from the Shepherd's fold away.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Bring them in, bring them in,Bring them in from the fields of sin;Bring them in, bring them in,Bring the wandering ones to Jesus.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Who'll go and help this Shepherd kind,Help Him the wandering ones to find?Who'll bring the lost ones to the fold,Where they'll be sheltered from the cold?

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Out in the desert hear their cry,Out on the mountains wild and high;Hark! 'Tis the Master speaks to thee,"Go find My sheep where'er they be."

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Olus’guntan ni npe mi
Kuro nin’aginju ese
O np’aguntan t’o sako lo
Jinna rere sinu agbo

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Mu won wa/2x
Mu won wa kuro l’oko ese
Mu won wa/2x
M’asako wa s’odo Jesu

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ran Olus’aguntan lowo
Lati wa ‘guntan Re t’o nu
Mu awon t’o nu pada wa
Sin’agbo kuro l’otutu

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Gbo igbe won nin’aginju
Ati lori oke giga
Gb’Olusaguntan nwi fun o
Lo mu aguntan mi wole

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Redemption! oh, wonderful story—Glad message for you and for me;That Jesus has purchased our pardon,And paid all the debt on the tree.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Believe it, O sinner, believe it;Receive the glad message—’tis true;Trust now in the crucified Savior,Salvation He offers to you.

english.title: Verse  2
english.lyrics: From death unto life He has brought us,And made us by grace sons of God;A fountain is opened for sinners;Oh, wash and be cleansed in the blood!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: No longer shall sin have dominion,Though present to tempt and annoy;For Christ, in His blessèd redemption,The power of sin shall destroy.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Irapada itan iyanu
Ihin ayo fun gbogbo wa
Jesu ti ra ‘dariji fun wa
O san gbese na lori’ igi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ha! elese gba ihin na gbo
Jo gba ihin ooto na gbo
Gbeke re le Olugbala Re
T’o mu igbala fun o wa

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
O mu wa ti ‘nu ‘ku bo s’iye
O si so wa d’omo’Olorun
Orisun kan si fun elese
We nin’eje na ko si mo

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ese ki yo le joba wa mo
B’o ti wu k’o dan wa wo to
Nitori Kristi fi ‘rapada
Pa ‘gbara ese run fun wa

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Gba aanu t’Olorun fi lo o
Sa wa s’odo Jesu l’oni
‘Tori yo gb’enit’o ba to wa
Ki yio si da pada lai

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Saved saved savedI'm happy on the waySaved savedsavedI love Him more each daySaved savedsavedI know He's mine each hourHe saves and keepsAnd sanctifies meBy His pow'r

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Since the Savior found mePardoned all my sinsI have had the joyAnd living hope withinGone is all the shameAnd sorrow of the pastThey're underneathThe precious bloodOf Christ at last

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Since the Savior found meAll to Him I oweFor His precious bloodHas washed me white as snowNow no condemnationHappy as can beI'm glad that Jesus justifiesAnd sets me free

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Since the Savior found meI have perfect restLiving in the realmsOf joy and happinessLeaning on my SaviorLooking for that dayWhen He shall come to catchHis waiting bride away

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
‘Gbati Krist’ wa mi ri
To dariji mi
Mo l’ayo ati ireti l’okan mi
Gbogbo oru ibanuje fo lo
Eje ‘yeniye ti Ksristi bo won mole

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Mo ti d’atunbi ayo mi kun
O gba mi la mo feran Re si
On je t’emi ni igbagbogbo
Of’agbara gba mi, o so mi di mimo

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Gbati Krist’ wa mi ri
Mo f’aye mi fun
Nitori eje Re fo mi fun bi sno
Ko si ‘dalebi fun mi mo, layo
Inu mi dun, Jesu so mi d’ominira

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
‘Gbati Krist’ wa mi ri
Mo ni isinmi
Mo ngbe ibi ayo ati Alafia
Mo ro mo Krist’ mo nsaferi ojo na
Ti On yo wa gb’awon iyawo Re s’oke

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: The blood has always precious been,’Tis precious now to me;Through it alone my soul has rest,From fear and doubt set free.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Oh, wondrous is the crimson tideWhich from my Savior flowed,And still in Heav’n my song shall be,The precious, precious, blood.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: I will remember now no more,God’s faithful Word has said,The follies and the sins of himFor whom My Son has bled.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Not all my well-remembered sinsCan startle or dismay;The precious blood atones for allAnd bears my guilt away.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Iyebiye ni eje Jesu
Tori o gba okan mi la
O ta eje Re sile fun mi
Lati s’okan mi di mimo

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
‘Yebiye (‘yebiye) l’eje na (l’eje na)
Ju wura tabi fadaka
‘Yebiye (‘yebiye) l’eje na (l’eje na)
Eje t’o sowon pupo ni

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Iyebiye ni eje Jesu
O f’alafia f’okan mi
Mo ni ‘sinmi n’nu isin Jesu
O tan gbogbo wahala mi

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Iyebiye ni eje Jesu
Tori o fun mi  ni ‘segun
Mo segun nipa gbigbekele
Ninu Re mo d’omnira

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Christ Jesus hath the pow’r, the power to forgive,The pow’r to quicken whom He will,And make the sinner live.Christ Jesus hath the pow’r, o tell it far and near!O bring to Him your guilty heart,And grace shall banish fear!

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Christ Jesus hath the pow’r,The pow’r of God He wields!Christ Jesus hath the pow’r,My heart surrender yields!Christ Jesus hath the pow’r,I trust Him evermore!Christ Jesus hath the pow’r,I worship and adore!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Christ Jesus hath the pow’r, the power to renew,The pow’r to cleanse your heart from sin,And make you wholly true.Christ Jesus hath the pow’r for evermore to keep;O none can pluck you from His hand,Or rob Him of His sheep!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Christ Jesus hath the pow’r, the power to console,The pow’r to carry all your care—On Him your burdens roll.Christ Jesus hath the pow’r, to wipe the tear away;O place in Him your confidence!O trust Him, and obey!

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Christ Jesus hath the pow’r, the power to destroy,The pow’r to bruise your enemyWho would your soul annoy.Christ Jesus hath the pow’r,  when on your dying bed,To give your soul the victory,The pow’r to raise the dead!

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Jesu Krist’ lagbara, lati dariji ni
Agbara lati s’elese di alaye okan
Jesu Krist l’agbara, rohin re kakiri
M’okan ebi re wa ‘do Re, On yo l’eru Re lo

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Jesu Krist’ l’agbara, Olorun l’o fi fun
Jesu Krist’ lagbara, mo ter’okan mi ba
Jesu Krist’ lagbara, ngo gbekele titi
Jesu Krist l’agbara, mo wole mo si yin

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Jesu Krist’ lagbara, lati so ni d’otun
Lati we okan ese re, lati so di pipe
Jesu Krist’ lagbara, lati pa ni mo lai
Bi aguntan Re ko s’ohun, ti o le ja kuro

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Jesu Krist’ lagbara, lati tu ni ninu
Lati ru gbogb’aniyan re, gbe gbogb’eru re fun
Jesu Krist’ lagbara lati n’omije nu
Gbeke re le E patapata, sa gboran si gbagbo

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Jesu Krist’ lagbara, agbara lati pa
Lati pa ota emi run, t’yo ma ni o lara
Jesu Krist’ l’agbara, li akoko iku
Lati f’okan re ni ‘segun, lati j’oku dide

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Savior, more than life to me,I am clinging, clinging close to Thee;Let Thy precious blood applied,Keep me ever, ever near Thy side.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Ev'ry day, ev'ry hourLet me feel thy cleansing pow'r;May Thy tender love to meBind me closer, closer, Lord, to Thee.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Through this changing world below,Lead me gently, gently as I go;Trusting Thee, I cannot stray,I can never, never lose my way.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Let me love Thee more and more,Till this fleeting, fleeting life is o'er;Till my soul is lost in love,In a brighter, brighter world above.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Jesu ju ‘ye lo fun mi
Mo fi gbogbo okan mi ro mo
Jowo f’eje Re we mi
Fa mi mora, mora Oluwa

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Lojojo (lojojo) n’gba gbogbo (ni wakati gbogbo)
Jeki nmo agbara Re
Jeki ‘fe Re ‘yebiye
Mu mi sunmo O si Oluwa

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ninu ayida aye
Ma to  mi jeje bi mo tin lo
Ni gbigbeke mi le O
Nko le so ona mi nu lailai

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Jeki ntubo fe o si
Titi aye osi yi yo pin
T’ife Re yo k’okan mi
Ni ilu didan, didan l’oke

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: My soul is filled with joy and gladnessSince Jesus came to me,His love has banished all my sadness,From sin I am set free.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: He set me free, He set me free,I was blind, but hallelujah, now I see!I shall ne’er forget the dayWhen He washed my sins away,And He set, He set me free.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: The Comforter divine is dwellingWithin my soul today;His love to others I am tellingSince Jesus came to stay.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: The grace of Jesus hath aboundedFor all my sins I see,Salvation walls have me surrounded,From sin I am set free.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mo kun f’ayo at’inudidun
‘Gba ti imo mo Jesu
Ife re le ‘banuje mi lo
O gba mi low’ese

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
O da mi n’de (O da mi n’de)/2x
Mo ti f’oju, alleluya, mo riran (mo riran)
N k’yo gbagbe ojo na
‘Gbat’O we ese mi nu
Ti o si da mi nide (O da mi n’de)

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Olutunu lat’orun
Ngbe n’nu okan mi loni yi
‘Gba Jesu ti de ‘nu mi
Mo nso ‘fe Re f’enia gbogbo

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ore-ofe Jesu si npo si
O nfi aipe mi han
Odi igbala wa yi mi ka
O gba mi low’awawi

englishTitle: HE IS SO PRECIOUS TO ME

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: So precious is Jesus, my Savior, my King,His praise all the day long with rapture I sing;To Him in my weakness for strength I can cling,For He is so precious to me.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: For He is so precious to me, (so precious to me,)For He is so precious to me; (so precious to me;)'Tis heaven below, my Redeemer to know,For He is so precious to me.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: He stood at my heart's door in sunshine and rainAnd patiently waited an entrance to gain;What shame that so long He entreated in vain,For He is so precious to me.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: I stand on the mountain of blessing at last,No cloud in the heavens a shadow to cast;His smile is upon me, the valley is past,For He is so precious to me.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: I praise Him because He appointed a placeWhere, someday, through faith in His wonderful grace,I know I shall see Him, shall look on His face,For He is so precious to me.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Iyebiye ni Jesu Olugbala mi
Ngo korin iyin Re ni gbogb’ojo
Ninu ailera ngo ro mo f’agbara
‘toripe o sowon fun mi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Toripe o sowon fun mi  (O sowon fun mi)/2x
‘Gba mo gba Jesu, aye dabi Orun
‘Toripe O sowon fun mi

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Nigbakugba l’o nkan ‘lekun okan mi
O si nfi suuru duro lati wole
Itiju mi lati da duro pe be
‘Toripe o sowon fun mi

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Nikehin mo duro lor’oke ‘bukun
Isudede ko tun si l’ona mi mo
Nisisiyi mo r’owo ife rere Re
‘Toripe  O sowon fun mi

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Mo yin l’ogo fun ibit;o ti pese
Nibe nipa ore-ofe ‘yanu Re
Mo mo pe emi yo ri lojukoju
‘Toripe o sowon fun mi

number: 598: HE IS SO PRECIOUS TO ME

englishTitle: THERE IS POWER IN THE BLOOD

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Would you be free from the burden of sin?There’s pow’r in the blood, pow’r in the blood;Would you o’er evil a victory win?There’s wonderful pow’r in the blood.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: There is pow’r, pow’r, wonder-working pow’rIn the blood of the Lamb;There is pow’r, pow’r, wonder-working pow’rIn the precious blood of the Lamb.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Would you be free from your passion and pride?There’s pow’r in the blood, pow’r in the blood;Come for a cleansing to Calvary’s tide;There’s wonderful pow’r in the blood.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Would you be whiter, much whiter than snow?There’s pow’r in the blood, pow’r in the blood;Sin-stains are lost in its life-giving flow;There’s wonderful pow’r in the blood.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Would you do service for Jesus your King?There’s pow’r in the blood, pow’r in the blood;Would you live daily His praises to sing?There’s wonderful pow’r in the blood.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
O nfe lati bo l’owo ese bi?
Agbara nla mbe nin’eje na
O nfe n’isegun l’ori ese bi?
Agbara mbe nin’eje na

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Agbara mbe t’o nsise ‘yanu
N’nu eje (nin’eje) ‘daguntan (‘daguntan)
Agbara mbe (agbara) t’o nsise ‘yanu
Wa n’nu eje od’aguntan

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
O nfe bo l’owo iret’aye bi?
Agbara nla mbe n’nu eje na
Wa fun iwenumo ni Kalfari
Agbara mbe nin’eje na

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
‘Wo ha fe k’a we o mo ju sno bi?
Agbara nla mbe ninu eje na
Eje na le mu abawon kuro
Agabra mbe nin’eje na

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
O nfe  sise funJesu Oba re
Agbara nla mbe nin’eje na
O fe ma korin ‘yin Re lojojo
Agbara mbe nin’eje na

number: 599: THERE IS POWER IN THE BLOOD

yorubaTitle: Ore-ofe T’o po Ju Ese Wa Lo

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Marvelous grace of our loving Lord,Grace that exceeds our sin and our guilt!Yonder on Calvary's mount out-poured–There where the blood of the Lamb was spilt.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Grace, grace, God's grace,Grace that will pardon and cleanse within;Grace, grace, God's grace,Grace that is greater than all our sin!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Sin and despair, like the sea-waves cold,Threaten the soul with infinite loss;Grace that is greater– yes, grace untold–Points to the Refuge, the mighty Cross.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Marvelous, infinite, matchless grace,Freely bestowed on all who believe!All who are longing to see His face,Will you this moment His grace receive?

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Or’ofe ‘yanu t’Oluwa wa
Or’ofe t’o po j’ese wa lo
Ti a fifun l’oke Kalfari
Nibi ti Krist’ t’eje Re sile

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
O………re………. O……….fe
(Ore-ofe, iyanu ni)
Ti ndariji, t’o nw’ese wa nu
O………re………. O……….fe
(Ore-ofe, iyanu ni)
Or’Ofe t’o po j’ese wa lo

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ese bi igbi omi okun
F’oro ti okan mi sin’egbe
Ore-ofe nla ti ko l’egbe
Ntoka si ibi agbelebu

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Abawon t’a ko le fi pamo
Kil’o l’agbara lati we nu?
Wo isun kan wa t;o nsan f’eje
O le fo o fun ju sno l’oni

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Ore-ofe Re ti ko l’egbe
T’a fun gbogbo awon t’o gbagbo
Iwo ti o nfe ri oju Re
‘wo k’yo gb’or’ofe Re nisiyi

englishTitle: KEPT IN CHRIST, I AM SATISFIED
yorubaTitle: Ibi Ipamo Ninu Kristi, Mo Ni Itelorun

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Satisfied my soul's deep longing,When in Christ my soul doth hide,When the snares my footsteps thronging,I have Him, there's naught beside;Satisfied, O precious knowledge,Kept in Christ, I'm satisfied.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Kept in Christ, I'm satisfied,When in Him my soul doth hide;Ev'ry need by Him supplied,Kept in Christ, I'm satisfied.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: When life's cares perplex, distress me,Earthly friends all seem to go,Then in Jesus shall my trust be,For I know He loves me so.Satisfied, O blessed comfort,Kept in Christ, I'm satisfied.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: So through all life's varied pathway,Sweetest peace is ever mine;In communion with Him daily,He doth give me pow'r divine.Satisfied, He's mine forever,Kept in Christ, I'm satisfied

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mo ni ‘telorun l’okan mi
Tori Jesu  ngbe n’nu mi
‘Gbati ‘kekun wa l’ona mi
Mo ni Krist’ ko si nkan mo
Mo l’ayo lati mo pe
N’nu Kristi ni ‘telorun wa
Ese 2;
‘Gbati aniyan de ba mi
Ti ore ko mi sile
Krist’ ni yo je ‘gbekele mi
Tori mo mo p’O fe mi
Mo ni ‘tunu lati mo pe
N’nu Kristi ni ‘telorun wa

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
N’nu gbogbo ayida aye
Mo l’alafia pipe
Ninu idapo pelu Re
O f’agbra nla fun mi
Mo l’ayo pe On je t’emi
N’nu Krist’ ni ‘telorun wa

number: 601: KEPT IN CHRIST, I AM SATISFIED

englishTitle: SINCE THE FULLNESS OF HIS LOVE CAME IN

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Once my way was dark and dreary,For my heart was full of sin,But the sky is bright and cheery,Since the fullness of His love came in

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: I can never tell how much I love Him,I can never tell His love for me,For it passeth human measure,Like a deep, unfathomed sea;’Tis redeeming love in Christ my Savior,In my soul the heav’nly joys begin;And I live for Jesus only,Since the fullness of His love came in.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: There is grace for all the lowly,Grace to keep the trusting soul:Pow’r to cleanse and make me holy,Jesus shall my yielded life control.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Let me spread abroad the story,Other souls to Jesus win;For the cross is now my glory,Since the fullness of His love came in.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Nigbakan ona mi sokun
Tor’okan mi kun f’ese
Sugbon aye mi du, o si dan
Nigabti ekun ife re de

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Nko le so bi mo ti feran re to
Nko le so b’ife Re tit obi to
Tor’o ju oye enia lo
Okun awamaridi, (awamaridi ni)
Ife irapada ti Kristi Oluwa
Okan mi l’ayo Orun na ti wa
Mo si wa fun Jesu nikan
Lati ‘gbati ‘fe Re w’okan mi

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ore-ofe wa fun onirele
Eyi to npa ona mo
Agbara lati we ni mo
Jesu yo sakoso aye mi

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Je ki nro ihin na kale
Ki njere okan fun Jesu
Tor’agbelebu logo mi
Lati ‘gbati ife Re ti de

number: 604: SINCE THE FULLNESS OF HIS LOVE CAME IN

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Sing them over again to me,Wonderful words of life;Let me more of their beauty see,Wonderful words of life;Words of life and beautyTeach me faith and duty.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Beautiful words, wonderful words,Wonderful words of life;Beautiful words, wonderful words,Wonderful words of life.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Christ, the blessed one, gives to allWonderful words of life;Sinner, list to the loving call,Wonderful words of life;All so freely given,Wooing us to heaven

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Sweetly echo the gospel call,Wonderful words of life;Offer pardon and peace to all,Wonderful words of life;Jesus, only Savior,Sanctify forever.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
E tun won ko fun mi ki ngbo
Oro ‘yanu ti ‘ye
Je ki nsi tun ewa won ri
Oro ‘yanu ti ‘ye
Oro iye at’ewa
Ti nko ni n’igbagbo

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Oro didun, Oro ‘yanu
Oro ‘yanu ti ‘ye	2x

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Kristi nikan lo nfi fun ni
Oro ‘yanmu ti ‘ye
Elese gbo ‘pe ife na
Oro ‘yanu ti ‘ye
L‘ofe  la fifun wa
Ko le to wa s’Orun

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Gbo ohun ihinrere na
Oro ‘yanu ti ‘ye
F’igbala lo gbogbo enia
Oro ‘yanu ti ‘ye
Jesu Olugbala
We wa mo titi lae

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Tell what the Lord has done for you,Speak just a word, speak just a word;Stand for the right, be brave and true,Speak just a word for Jesus.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Speak just a word, speak just a word,Gladly His love proclaim;Tell what the Lord has done for you,Speak just a word for Jesus.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Early begin to bear the cross,Speak just a word, speak just a word;They who deny Him suffer loss,Speak just a word for Jesus.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Tell if the Lord has cleansed your sin,Speak just a word, speak just a word;It may to Him some others win,Speak just a word for Jesus.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Fear not the world, nor heed its frown,Speak just a word, speak just a word;They who endure shall wear the crown,Speak just a word for Jesus.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Soro ife ti Jesu
B’o ti se ku fun o
Ma so ‘tan na lojojo
Ihin ayo tooto

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
So……. Oro ife ti Jesu
(soro ife Jesu)
J’oloto si titi
So ……… sa soro ‘fe ti Jesu
(soro ife Jesu)
So t’ohun nla t’o se fun o

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Soro ife ti Jesu
B’o ti so o d’alaye
So t’agbara on ‘tunu
T’o nfi fun ni l’ofe

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Soro ife ti Jesu
Ma duro d’elomi
F’ayo rohin na kale
K’akoko to koja

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Soro ife ti Jesu
T’ife Re si enia
Oluponju le fe gbo
O le fe gbekele E

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Tho’ the angry surges rollOn my tempest-driven soul,I am peaceful, for I know,Wildly though the winds may blow,I’ve an anchor safe and sure,That can evermore endure.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: And it holds, my anchor holds:Blow your wildest, then, O gale,On my bark so small and frail;By His grace I shall not fail,For my anchor holds, my anchor holds.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Mighty tides about me sweep,Perils lurk within the deep,Angry clouds o’ershade the sky,And the tempest rises high;Still I stand the tempest’s shock,For my anchor grips the rock.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: I can feel the anchor fastAs I meet each sudden blast,And the cable, though unseen,Bears the heavy strain between;Thro’ the storm I safely ride,Till the turning of the tide.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Troubles almost ’whelm the soul;Griefs like billows o’er me roll;Tempters seek to lure astray;Storms obscure the light of day:But in Christ I can be bold,I’ve an anchor that shall hold.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
B’iji lile tile nja
T’o si ndamu okan mi
Mo mo pe Alafia ni
B’o tile ja ju be lo
Mo ni ‘dakoro t’o pe
T’o le farada iji

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Idakoro mi mule
Ma ja wayi iji nla (iji nla)
Lu oko mi kekere
N’nu ‘fe Re ng k’yo kuna
Mo ni dakoro…..(idakoro mi mule sinsin)
Idakoro

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Isan lile yi mi ka
Ewu si wa n’nu ibi
Ikuku b’oju orun
Igbi nru soke kikan
Sibe mo si nfarada
‘Tori mo ni ‘dakoro

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Mo mo p’o fidi mule
Bi ‘gbi na tin bi lu mi
Bi emi ko tile ri
O fidi mule sinsin
Mo nlo lori ‘gbi l’ayo
Titi wahala yio pin

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
‘Damu fe bori okan
‘Banuje nyi lori mi
Esu fe mu ni sina
Lati so ‘mole d’okun
Sugbon Kristi mbe dun mi
Idakoro mi daju

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: My trust I place now and everIn One my soul can deliver,A Refuge strong, failing never,For His word is sure.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: :I am Alpha and Omega,The beginning and the ending,Which is and which was,And which is to come.I am Alpha and Omega,The Beginning and the ending,The Almighty, the Almighty, saith the Lord.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: My heart with joy now is tellingOf Him who finds there a dwelling,Whose love is gently compellingOn His word to rest.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Jehovah, God! Still attend me,From doubt and fear still defend me,Faith to sustain ever send me,That my soul fail not.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mo fi gbogbo okan mi tan
Enit’o le gbe’emi mi la
Abo nla ti ki ye lailai
Oro Re daju

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Emi ni Alpha at’Omega
Ipilese ati opin
Ti o wa t’o ti wa
Ti o si mbo wa
Em’ ni Alfa at’Omega
Ipinlese ati Opin
Olodumare, Olodumare
L’Oluwa wi

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Okan mi nso pelu ayo
Ti eniti ngbe inu mi
If’eniti ntel’Oro Re
Lati mu duro

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Jehofa Olorun gba mi
Lowo ‘yemeji at’eru
Fi igbagbo gbigbona fun mi
K’okan mi duro

englishTitle: O MY SOUL BLESS THOU JEHOVAH

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: O my soul, bless your Redeemer;all within me bless His Name;bless the Father and forget notall His mercies to proclaim.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: He forgives all your transgressions,all diseases gently heals;God redeems you from destruction,and with you so kindly deals.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Far as east from west is distant,He has put away our sin;like the pity of a fatherhas the LORD's compassion been.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: As it was without beginning,so it lasts without an end;to their children's children evershall His righteousness extend.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics: Unto such as keep His cov’nantand are steadfast in His way;unto those who still rememberthe commandments and obey.

english.title: Verse 6
english.lyrics: Bless Jehovah  all you creatures,ever under His control,all thro'out His vast dominion;bless the LORD of all, my soul!

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Yin Jehofa ‘wo okan mi
Gbogbo ohun inu mi
Yin Jehofa mase gbagbe
Lati fi ore Re han

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Nitoripe b’oke Orun
Ti ga si ile aye
B’eeni anu Re tobi si
Awon ti o beru Re

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Enit’o f’ese Re ji o
T’o si tan gbogb’arun re
To gba o lowo iparun
T’o fi ‘fe de o l’ade

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
B’ila orun si ‘wo orun
Bee lo m’ese wa kuro
Bi baba ti nyonu s’omo
Beeni anu Re si wa

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Yin Jehofa gbogbo eda
L’aye ati li Orun
Nibi gbogbo ijoba Re
Yin Jehofa okan mi

number: 610: O MY SOUL BLESS THOU JEHOVAH

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Lift up your heads, pilgrims a-weary,See day’s approach now crimson the sky;Night shadows flee, and your Beloved,Awaited with longing, at last draweth nigh.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: He is coming again, He is coming again,The very same Jesus, rejected of men;He is coming again, He is coming again,With pow'r and great glory, He is coming again!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Dark was the night, sin warred against us;Heavy the load of sorrow we bore;But now we see signs of His coming;Our hearts glow within us, joy’s cup runneth o’er!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: O blessed hope! O blissful promise!Filling our hearts with rapture divine;O day of days! hail Thy appearing!Thy transcendent glory forever shall shine!

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Even so come, precious Lord Jesus;Creation waits redemption to see;Caught up in clouds, soon we shall meet Thee;O blessed assurance, forever with Thee!

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
E gb’orin yin s’oke alare
Ile mo imole si ti de
Olufe yin t’eti nduro de
Ti e si ns’aferi, ti wa nitosi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
On yo tun pada wa/2x
OAni Jesu kanna
Ti aiye ti ko
On yo tun pada wa/2x
Ninu ipa at’ogo
On yo tun pada wa
(yo tun pada wa)

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Okunkun sue se si njagun
Eru ‘banuje t’a ru wuwo
Nisiyi a r’ami bibo Re
Okan wa nyo n’nu wa, ayo wa si kun

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
‘Reti mimo, ‘leri alafia
‘t’o fi ayo nla kun okan wa
A nwona f’ojo nla na ti ‘wo
Yo farahan n’n’ogo, ninu ewa Re

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Beeni ma bo Jesu Oluwa
Eda nduro lati ri ‘dande
Laipe ao pade Re n’nu ‘fefe
Ireti yi daju, ao ba o gbe lai

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Hover o’er me, Holy Spirit,Bathe my trembling heart and brow.Fill me with Thy hallowed presence;Come, O come and fill me now.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Fill me now, fill me now,Jesus, come and fill me now;Fill me with Thy hallowed presence;Come, O come and fill me now.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Thou canst fill me, gracious Spirit,Tho' I cannot tell Thee how.But I need Thee, greatly need Thee;Come, O come and fill me now.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: I am weakness, full of weakness;At Thy sacred feet I bow.Blest, divine, eternal Spirit,Fill with pow’r and fill me now.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Cleanse and comfort, bless and save me;Bathe, O bathe my heart and brow.Thou art comforting and saving;Thou art sweetly filling now.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Wa ba le mi Emi Mimo
Mu ifoya mi kuro
Fi Emi owo Re kun mi
Wa kun mi nisisiyi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Kun mi nisisiyi
Jesu kun mi nisiyi
Fi Emi owo Re kun mi
Wa kun mi nisisyi

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
‘Wo le kun mi, Emi Mimo
L’ona t’emi ko le so
Sugbon emi nsaferi Re
Wa kun mi nisisiyi

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Mo kun fun ailera pupo
L’ese Re ni mo wole
Emi Mimo Olutunu
Wa kun mi nisisiyi

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Wa kun mi, si tu mi ninu
Ki ewa Re han n’nu mi
Iwo a ma tun ni ninu
Wa kun mi nisisiyi

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Savior, lead me lest I stray,Gently lead me all the way;I am safe when by Thy side,I would in Thy love abide.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Lead me, lead me, Savior,lead me, lest I stray;Gently down the stream of time,Lead me, Savior, all the way.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Thou the refuge of my soul,When life's stormy billows roll;I am safe when by Thy side,All my hopes on Thee rely.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Savior, lead me, then at last,When the storm of life is past;To the land of endless day,Where all tears are wiped away

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Olugbala ma to mi
Ma to mi ni gbogb’ona
Lodo Re ewu ko si
Ngo ma gbe n’nu ife Re

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
To mi/2x
Olugbala ma to mi
Jowo ma to mi titi (titi lai)
Ma to mi ni gbogb’ona (gbogb’ona)

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Iwo l’abo okan mi
‘Gbati ‘gbi aye ba de
Lodo Re ‘foiya ko si
N’nu Re ni ‘reti mi wa

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Olugbala ma to mi
Tit’igbi aye yo pin
S’ile ti ojo ki sa
Ti ao nu omije nu

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: There's within my heart a melody;Jesus whispers sweet and low,"Fear not, I am with you, peace, be still,"in all of life's ebb and flow.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Jesus, Jesus, Jesus,sweetest name I know,fills my every longing,keeps me singing as I go.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: All my life was wrecked by sin and strife,discord filled my heart with pain,Jesus swept across the broken strings,stirred the slumbering chords again.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Though sometimes He leads through waters deep,trials fall across the way;though sometimes the path seems rough and steep,see His footprints all the way.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Feasting on the riches of His grace,resting 'neath His sheltering wing,always looking on His smiling face,that is why I shout and sing.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics: Soon He's coming back to welcome mefar beyond the starry sky;I shall wing my flight to worlds unknown,I shall reign with Him on high.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Orin didun wa n;nu okan mi
Jesu nso l’ohun jeje
Pe ma beru mo wa pelu re
N’nu gbogbo ayida aye

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Jesu/3x
Ooko nla julo
O tan gbogb’aini mi
O f’orin kun okan mi

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ese aniyan b’aye mi je
Idamu d’okan mi ru
Jesu mu idamu na kuro
O si m’okan mi soji

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ni wiwa n’nu ore-ofe Re
Mo sinmi l’abe ‘ye Re
Ni wiw’oju Re nigbagbogbo
Ni mo se nkorin ayo

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
B’o tile mu mi koja ibu
Ti ‘danwo si yi mi ka
Bi ona nab a tile soro
Ngo ma to ‘pase Re lo

englishTitle: WHEN THE MISTS HAVE ROLLED AWAY

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: When the mists have rolled in splendorFrom the beauty of the hills,And the sunlight falls in gladnessOn the river and the rills,We recall our Father's promiseIn the rainbow of the spray:We shall know each other betterWhen the mists have cleared away.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: We shall know as we are known,Never more to walk alone,In the dawning of the morningOf that bright and happy day.We shall know each other better,When the mists have rolled away.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Oft we tread the path before usWith a weary, burdened heart;Oft we toil amid the shadows,And our fields are far apart:But the Savior's "come, ye blessed,"All our labor will repay,When we gather in the morningWhere the mists have rolled away.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: We shall come with joy and gladness,We shall gather round the throne;Face to face with those that love us,We shall know as we are known:And the song of our redemptionShall resound thro' endless day,When the shadows have departed,And the mists have rolled away.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
‘Gba ‘kuku ba ka kuro
Lati fi ewa oke han
Ti orun si nfi ayo ran
Si ori awon odo
A ranti ileri Baba
N’nu ewa osumare
Awa yo mo ara wa si
Gba ‘kuku ba ka kuro

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ao mo, b’a ti mo wa
(wa b’a ti mo wa)
(Ao…….. b’a ti mo wa)
A ki yo…… nikan rin mo
(A ki yo nikan rin mo,  nikan rin mo)
Ni owuro kutukutu ojo nla ologo ni
Awa y’o mo ara wa si
‘Gba ‘kuku ba ka kuro

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
‘Gba pupo l’o nrin ona na
Pelu oka t’eru npa
A nsise ninu isoro
Ise pupo wa fun wa
Ao si gb’ere ise wa
‘Gba Jesu wipe “o seun”
Nigbat’ a ba pejo looro
‘Gba ‘kuku ti ka kuro

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Awa yo si fi ayo wa
Ao ai yi ite na ka
Ao ri awon ti o few a
Ao mo bi a ti mo wa
Orin ti irapada wa
Y’o ma dun lojojumo
‘Gbat’ojiji ba ka kuro
Ti ‘kuku ko si si mo

number: 615: WHEN THE MISTS HAVE ROLLED AWAY

yorubaTitle: A Fere Yi Mi L’okan Pada

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: “Almost persuaded” now to believe;“Almost persuaded” Christ to receive;Seems now some soul to say,“Go, Spirit, go Thy way;Some more convenient dayOn Thee I’ll call.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: “Almost persuaded,” come, come today;“Almost persuaded,” turn not away;Jesus invites you here,Angels are lingering near,Prayers rise from hearts so dear;O wanderer, come.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: “Almost persuaded,” harvest is past!“Almost persuaded” doom comes at last!“Almost” cannot avail;“Almost” is but to fail!Sad, sad, that bitter wail,“Almost,” but lost!

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
“A fere yi mi l’okan pada”
Lati gba Jesu Oluwa gbo
Okan miran wipe
Ma lo Emi Mimo
Ni akoko t’o wo
“Ngo ke si O”

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
“A fere yi m l’okan pada”
Wa, gbagbo loni, ma salai wa
Jesu npe o wa ‘le
Angeli nsunmo o
Adura ngoke lo
Asako wa

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
“A fere yi mi l’okan pada”
Ikore koja, iparun de
Fere nikan ko tuo
O nfa ‘parun wa
Ijafara l’ewu
Ko l’atunse

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: I’ve seen the lightning flashingAnd heard the thunder roll,I’ve felt sin’s breakers dashing,which tried to conquer my soul;I’ve heard the voice of my Savior,He bid me still fight on:He promised never to leave me,Never to leave me alone.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: No, never alone/2x He promised never to leave me,Never to leave me alone.					2x

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: The world’s fierce winds are blowing–Temptation’s sharp and keen;I have a peace in knowingMy Savior stands between;He stands to shield me from dangerWhen all my friends are gone:He promised never to leave me,Never to leave me alone.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: When in affliction’s valleyI tread the road of care,My Savior helps me carryMy cross so heavy to bear;Though all around me is darknessAnd earthly joys are flown,My Savior whispers His promise:Never to leave me alone.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: He died on Calv'ry's mountain,For me they pierced His side,For me He opened that fountain,The crimson, cleansing tide;For me He’s waiting in gloryUpon His heavenly throne:He promised never to leave me,Never to leave me alone.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mo ri manamana nko, mo ri ara tin san
Mo mo ikoro ese, t’o fe bori okan mi
Mo gbo ohun olugbala, Ti o ni ki nma ja nso
O ti se ‘leri fun mi pe, On ki yo ko  mi sile

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
K’yo ko mi sile/2x
TB: K’yo…. ko mi sile/2x
A: k’yo ko mi sile, ani k’yo ko mi sile
All: On ki yo ko mi sile lai,
Yo se mi ni tiRe
K’yo ko mi sile/2x
TB: K’yo…. ko mi sile/2x
A: k’yo ko mi sile, ani k’yo ko mi sile
O ti se ‘leri fun mi pe
On ki yo ko mi sile

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Igbi aye nja kikan, on ‘danwo kikoro
Okan mi bale lati mo pe Olugbala duro
Lati pa mi mo ninu ewu ‘gbat’awon ore ko mi
O ti se ‘leri fun mi pe, On ki yo ko mi sile

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
‘Gbati mo wa n’ni ‘ponju t’aniyan gb’okan mi kan
Olugbala mi mba mi gbe, agbelebu wuwo na
B’okunkun tile yi mi ka, t’ayo aye fsi fo lo
Olugbala, se ‘leri pe, On ki yo ko mi sile

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
O ku loke Kalfari, a gun l’oko fun mi
O si orisun ni fun mi, orisun iwenumo
O nreti mi ninu ogo, o joko l’or’ite Re
O ti se ‘leri fun mi pe, On ki yo ko mi sile

englishTitle: WHEN I SURVEY THE WONDROUS CROSS

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: When I survey the wondrous crosson which the Prince of glory died,my richest gain I count but loss,and pour contempt on all my pride.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Forbid it, Lord, that I should boastsave in the death of Christ, my God!All the vain things that charm me most,I sacrifice them through his blood.

english.title: Verse  3
english.lyrics: See, from his head, his hands, his feet,sorrow and love flow mingled down.Did e'er such love and sorrow meet,or thorns compose so rich a crown?

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Were the whole realm of nature mine,that were a present far too small.Love so amazing, so divine,demands my soul, my life, my all.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
“ ‘Gbati mo ri agbelebu”
Ti a kan Oba ogo mo
Mo ka gbogbo oro s’ofo
Mo kegan gbogbo ogo mi

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
K’a mase gbo pe mo nhale
B’o ye n’ku Oluwa mi
Gbogbo nkan asan ti mo fe
Mo da sile fun eje na

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Wo lat’ori, owo, ese
B’ikanu at’ife tin san
‘Banuje at’ife papo
A f’egun se ade ogo

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Gbogbo aye ba je temi
Ebun abere ni fun mi
Ife nla ti nyanilenu
Gba gbogbo okan, emi mi

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: I must tell Jesus all of my trials;I cannot bear these burdens alone;In my distress He kindly will help me;He ever loves and cares for His own.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: I must tell Jesus!I must tell Jesus!I cannot bear my burdens alone;I must tell Jesus!I must tell Jesus!Jesus can help me, Jesus alone.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: I must tell Jesus all of my troubles;He is a kind, compassionate friend;If I but ask Him, He will deliver,Make of my troubles quickly an end.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Tempted and tried, I need a great Savior,One who can help my burdens to bear;I must tell Jesus, I must tell Jesus;He all my cares and sorrows will share.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: O how the world to evil allures me!O how my heart is tempted to sin!I must tell Jesus, and He will help meOver the world the vict'ry to win.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ngo so gbogbo ‘soro mi fun Jesu
Ng ko le nikan gbe wahala mi
N’nu wahala mi, yo ran mi lowo
On yo ma toju awon tiRe

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ngo so fun Jesu/2x
Ng ko le nikan gbe wahala mi
Ngo so fun Jesu/2x
Jesu nikan le ran mi lowo

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ngo so gbogbo ‘yonu mi fun Jesu
Ore alanu, olore ni
Bi mo ba bere, On yi o gba mi
Yo si f’opin si wahala mi

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
N’nu ‘danwo mo nfe Olugbala kan
Ti o le ba mi ru eru mi
Ngo so fun Jesu, ngo so fun Jesu
Yo ru gbogbo ibanuje mi

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Wo b’aiye ti nfa mi lati se ‘bi
O nfa okan mi lati d’ese
Ngo so fun Jesu, yo ran mi lowo
Lati ni ‘segun lori aye

yorubaTitle: Ao Gun Oke Isoro Fun Jesu

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: There’s a battle raging over the land and sea,True to Christ our captain we will be;Satan’s hosts are mighty, fighting for ruin and sin,But in this great conflict right is sure to win.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Over the top for Jesus bravely we will go:Over the top for Jesus, routing ev’ry foe,Never delaying when we hear the bugle blow,We’ll fight for right with all our might,As over the top we go.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: There’s a cry of sorrow rising from hearts oppressed,There’s a world in sadness and unrest;But the hope that thrills us, looking out into the night,Christ, the Lord of battles, leads me in the fight.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: When the pow’rs of earth before our Redeemer shall kneel,When the joy of triumph we shall feel;Then with Christ who conquered, into the realms of the blest,We shall march in vic’try to eternal rest.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ogun kan nja ka ori ile ati okun
Ao jolooto si Krist’ Balogun?
Satani at’ogun re nja lati p’okan run
Sugbon ninu ‘ja yi ooto ni yo bori

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Lori oke fun Jesu ao fi ‘gboya lo
Lori oke fun Jesu so tu ota ka
A k’yo jafara gbati a ba gbo ipe
Ao f’ipa wa ja f’otito ba ti ngor’oke lo

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Awon okan ti an nilara nke ‘rora
Aye kun f’aisimi at’aro
Sugbon n’nu okan ‘banuje a ni ‘reti
Kristi ogagun way o mu wa laaja

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
‘Gbat’ agbara aye ba wole fun Jesu
‘Gbat’ a ba mo ayo isegun
A o lo sile ‘bukun pelu Kristi asegun
Pelu isegun l’ao wo ibi ‘sinmi

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: King of my life I crown Thee now-Thine shall the glory be;Lest I forget Thy thorn-crowned brow,Lead me to Calvary.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Lest I forget Gethsemane,Lest I forget Thine agony,Lest I forget Thy love for me,Lead me to Calvary.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Show me the tomb where Thou wast laid,Tenderly mourned and wept;Angels in robes of light arrayedGuarded Thee whilst Thou slept.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Let me like Mary, thru the gloom,Come with a gift to Thee;Show to me now the empty tomb-Lead me to Calvary.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: May I be willing, Lord, to bearDaily my cross for Thee;Even Thy cup of grief to share-Thou hast borne all for me.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Oba iye mi mo de O
L’ade tiRe l’ogo
Ki nma gbagbe ade egun
To mi si Kalfari

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Kin ma gbagbe Getsemane
Kin ma gbagbe irora Re
Ki nma gbagbe ‘fe Re si mi
To mi si Kalfari

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Fi ‘boji t’a te O si han
T’a s’ofo t’a sokun
Awon Angel’ n’n’aso ala
Nso O nigbat’o sun

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ki nm’ebun mi wa l’owuro
Gege bi Maria
F’iboji ofo na han mi
To mi si Kalfari

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Mba le ru agbelebu mi
Fun O l’ojojumo
Ki npin n’n’ago ‘banuje Re
Ti o ti mu fun mi

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: There’s a sweet and blessed storyOf the Christ who came from glory,Just to rescue me from sin and misery;He in loving-kindness sought me,And from sin and shame hath brought me,Hallelujah! Jesus ransomed me.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Hallelujah! what a Savior,Who can take a poor, lost sinner,Lift me from the miry clay and set me free!I will ever tell the story,Shouting glory, glory, glory,Hallelujah! Jesus lifted me.

english.title: Verse 2
