english.lyrics: From the depth of sin and sadnessTo the heights of joy and gladnessJesus lifted me, in mercy full and free;With His precious blood He bought me,When I knew Him not, He sought me,And in love divine He ransomed me.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: From the throne of heav’nly glory—Oh, the sweet and blessed story!—Jesus came to lift the lost in sin and woeInto liberty all-glorious,Trophies of His grace victorious,Evermore rejoicing here below.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: By and by, with joy increasing,And with gratitude unceasing,Lifted up with Christ forevermore to be,I will join the hosts there singing,In the anthem ever ringing,To the King of Love who ransomed me.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Itan t’o si ‘bukun kan wa
Ti Krist’ t’o wa ninu ogo
Lati yo okan mi kuro n’nu ese
Ninu ‘fe Re l’O wa mi ri
O gba mi kuro n’nu ese

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Halleluya, Jesu da mi n’de
Halleluya, Olugbala
T’o ngb’elese t’o buruju
T’o nyo elese kuro n’nu eeri re (halleluya)
Ngo ma so itan na titi
Ngo ko ogo, ogo, halleluya
Jesu da mi nde

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Lat’inu ibu ‘banuje
Si ayo ti o ga julo
Jesu gbe mi ga n’nu opo aanu Re
Eje Re l’O si fir a mi
Nigbati nko mo O wa mi ri
N’nu ife Re o da mi nide

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Lat’ori ite ogo Re
A, itan ti o ni ‘bukun
Pe jesu wa gba otosi elese
S’inu om’nira ologo
N’nu ‘ranti ore-ofe Re
Li ao ma yo ayo nla nihin

englishTitle: TIS SO SWEET TO TRUST IN JESUS
yorubaTitle: B’o Ti Dun Lati Gba Jesu Gbo

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: 'Tis so sweet to trust in Jesus,and to take him at his word;just to rest upon his promise,and to know, "Thus saith the Lord.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Jesus, Jesus, how I trust him!How I've proved him o'er and o'er!Jesus, Jesus, precious Jesus!O for grace to trust him more!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: O how sweet to trust in Jesus,just to trust his cleansing blood;and in simple faith to plunge meneath the healing, cleansing flood!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Yes, 'tis sweet to trust in Jesus,just from sin and self to cease;just from Jesus simply takinglife and rest, and joy and peace.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
B’o ti dun lati gba Jesu
Gbo gege bi oro Re
K’a sinmi le ileri Re
“Sa gbagbo l’Oluwa wi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Jesu, Jesu, emi gbagbo
Mo gbekele n’gbagbogbo
JESU! o’oko iyebiye
Ki nle gbeke le O si

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
B’o ti dun lati gba Jesu
K’s gbekele eje Re
Ninu igbagbo k’a lo we
Nin’eje ‘wenumo na

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
B’o ti dun lati gba Jesu
Ki nko ‘se ara sile
Lat’odo Jesu kin le gba
Iye, ‘sinmi at’ayo

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Mo yo mo gbekele mi le o
Jesu ore ‘yebiye
Mo mo pe O wa pelu mi
Yo toju mi de opin
Option:

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Jesu, Jesu, mo gbekele
Tor’O j’oloto si mi
Jesu o’oko iyebiye
Ki nle gbeke le O si

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Mo l’ayo pe mo ti gbagbo
Jesu ore ‘yebiye
Mo mo pe o wa pelu mi
Y’o si ma ba mi gbe lai

number: 623: TIS SO SWEET TO TRUST IN JESUS

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Give me a passion for souls, dear Lord,A passion to save the lost;O that Thy love were by all adored,And welcomed at any cost.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Jesus, I long, I long to be winningMen who are lost, and constantly sinning;O may this hour be one of beginningThe story of pardon to tell.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Though there are dangers untold and sternConfronting me in the way,Willingly still would I go, nor turn,But trust Thee for grace each day.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: How shall this passion for souls be mine?Lord, make Thou the answer clear;Help me to throw out the old Life-lineTo those who are struggling near.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Fun mi, ni itara, Oluwa
Lati m’asako wa ‘le
Ki gbogbo wa le fi ‘fe sin O
Ki a le tewogba O

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Jesu mo nfe lati le ma jere
Awon okan t’o nmokun n’nu ese
Jeki nle bere ni wakati yi
Lati si ‘tan ‘dariji

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Bi ewu t’a ko le f’enu so
Ba wa yi mi ka kiri
Pelu ‘fe ngo ma tesiwaju
Ngo si ma gbekele O

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Emi yo se le ni ‘tara yi
Oluwa da mi l’ohun
Ran mi lowo lati f’ona han
Awon t’o nf’okan wa O

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: When you count the ones who love the Lord,Count me, count me;When you count up those who trust His Word,Count me, count me.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Count me with the children of the heav’nly King;Count me with the servants who would service bring;Count me with the ransomed who His praises sing;Count me, count me.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: When you count up those who’re saved by grace,Count me, count me;Who have found in Christ a hiding place,Count me, count me.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: When you count up those who do the right,Count me, count me;Who are walking in the Gospel light,Count me, count me.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: When you count up those who forward press,Count me, count me;Who shall gain the crown of righteousness,Count me, count me.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Gbat’O ba nka ‘won t’o f’Oluwa
Ka mi mo won (ka mi mo won)
‘Gbat’O ba nka ‘won t’o f’oro Re
Ka mi mo won (ka  mi mo won)

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ka mi mo awon omo Oba Orun
Ka mi m’awon ti yo ma se ‘ranse fun
Ka mi m’awon t’yo ma k’orin ‘rapada
Ka mi mo won (ka mi mo won)

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Gbat’ O ba nka ‘won ti a gbala
Ka mi mo won (ka mi mo won)
Awon t’o fi Kristi se abo
Ka mi mo won (ka mi mo won)

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Gbat’O ba nka awon oloto
Ka mi mo won (ka mi mo won)
T’o nrin n’nu ‘mole ihinrere
Ka mi mo won (ka mi mo won)

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Since Christ my soul from sin set free,This world has been a heaven to me;And ’mid earth’s sorrows and its woe,’Tis heaven my Jesus here to know.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: O hallelujah! yes, ’tis heaven,’Tis heaven to know my sin's forgiven;On land or sea, what matters where?Where Jesus is, ’tis heaven there.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Once heaven seemed a far-off place,Till Jesus showed His smiling face;Now it’s begun within my soul,’Twill last while endless ages roll.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: What matters where on earth we dwell?On mountain top, or in the dell,In cottage, or a mansion fair,Where Jesus is, ’tis heaven there.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Bi Krist’ ti da okan mi n’de
Aye mi ti dabi Orun
Larin ‘banuje at’aro
Ayo ni lati mo Jesu

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Alleluya, ayo l’o je
Pe mo ti ri ‘dariji gba
Ibikibi ti mo ba wa
Ko s’ewu jesu wa nibe

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Mo ti ro pe Orun jinna
Sugbon nigbati Jesu de
L’orun ti de ‘nu okan mi
Nibe ni yo si wa titi

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Nibo l’a ko le gbe l’aye
Lor’oke tabni petele
L’ahere tabi agbala
Ko s’ewu Jesu wa nibe

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: I’ve something in my heart that Jesus gave to me,It makes me feel like singing glory all the day;He found my captive soul and gave me liberty,And now I feel like singing glory!

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: He makes the path grow brighter ev’ry passing day;He makes the burden lighter all along the way;His Word is my delight, His will I now obey,And all the time I’m singing glory!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: My Savior loosed my tongue that I might speak His praise;Since then I have been singing glory all the day;I love to tell the lost of Jesus and His ways,And oh, it keeps me singing glory!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: My Savior took my feet from out the miry clay;Since then I have been singing glory all the day;He placed them on the Rock that shall not pass away—I cannot keep from singing glory!

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: O weary heart and sad, O heavy-laden soul,If you would feel like singing glory all the day;Just let the Savior in, and let Him take control;Then you will feel like singing glory!

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mo l’ohun kan l’okan
Ti Jesu fi fun mi
O mu mi korin ogo lojojumo
O ri mi n’nu ide o si da mi sile
Nisi mo fe ma korin ogo

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
O nmu ona mi mo gara lojojumo
O s’eru mi di fifuye bi mo tin lo
Ore  Re l’ayo mi, ife Re ngo se
Mo nkorin ogo ni ‘gbagbogbo

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Jesu yo ese mi, kuro ninu ore
Lati ‘gbana ni mo ti nko orin ogo
O f’ese mi le apata ti ko le ye
Ng ko le sai ma korin ogo

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Jesu tu ahon mi, ki nle korin
Lati ‘gbana ni mo ti nko orin ogo
Mo fe lati ma soo ‘tan Jesu f’asako
O si nmu ki nma korin ogo

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Okan ibanuje ti eu ese npa
Bi o fe ma korin ogo lojojumo
Je k’Olugbala wole lati ma to o
‘Gbana ‘wo o ma korin ogo

englishTitle: HAVE YOU READ THE STORY OF THE CROSS

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Have you heard the story of the cross,Where Jesus bled and died,When your doubt was paid by his precious bloodThat gushed from his wounded side.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: He died of a broken heart for thee,He died of a broken heart;O wondrous love! it was for thee,He died of a broken heart.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Have you heard how they placed the crown of thornsUpon his lovely brow,When he prayed, “forgive them, O forgive,They know not what they do?”

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Have you heard that he saved the dying thief,When hanging on the tree,Who looked with pitying eyes and said,“Dear Lord, remember me?”

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Have you heard that he looked to heav’n and said,“’Tis finished”—all for thee?Have you ever said, “I thank thee, Lord,For giving thy life for me?”

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
O ti ka itan agbelebu
Nibiti Jesu ku
Nibiti Eje Re iyebiye
Ti sna gbogbo gbese re

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
O ku iku ‘banuje fun o
O ku iku ‘banuje (fun o)
A! ife iyanu fun o
O ku iku ‘banuje

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
O ti ka b’a ti f’ade egun
de ori Re fun o
‘Gbati O gbadura pe ‘dariji won
Nwon nse laimokan sa ni”

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
O ti ka b’O ti gb’ole ni la
T’o nku lo lor’igi
Nigbati on fi ikanu wipe
“Oluwa mo ranti mi”

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
O ti ka b’O ti gb’oju s’oke
T’o wipe “O pari”
O ti so pe “mo dupe Oluwa
Nitori O ku fun mi?”

number: 628: HAVE YOU READ THE STORY OF THE CROSS

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: The fight is on, the trumpet sound is ringing out,The cry "To arms!" is heard afar and near;The Lord of hosts is marching on to victory,The triumph of the Christ will soon appear.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: The fight is on, O Christian soldier,And face to face in stern array,With armor gleaming, and colors streaming,The right and wrong engage today!The fight is on, but be not weary;Be strong and in His might hold fast;If God be for us, His banner o'er us,We'll sing the victor's song at last!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: The fight is on, arouse, ye soldiers brave and true!Jehovah leads, and vict'ry will assure;Go, buckle on the armor God has given you,And in His strength unto the end endure

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: The Lord is leading on to certain victory;The bow of promise spans the eastern sky;His glorious name in ev'ry land shall honored be;The morn will break, the dawn of peace is nigh.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ija mbe sibe ohun ipe ndun kikan
Ipe ndun pe “Gbe ‘hamora re wo”
Oluwa omo-ogun nlo si isegun
Ayo isegun Kristi fere de

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ogun mbe sibe, om’ogun Krist’
Mura doju ‘ja ko ota
Pelu ‘hamora at’asia ti nfe
Ire doju ‘ja ko ibi
Ogun mbe sibe mase saare
J’alagbara n’nu ipa Re
Bi Krist’ je tiwa (‘segun)
L’abe asia Re (‘segun)
Ao k’orin asegun ni-ke-hin

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ija mbe sibe dide om’ogun tooto
Jehofa saju ‘segun si daju
E gbe ihamora t’Olorun fun yin wo
Ninu agabara Re e ja d’opin

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Olorun nto ni lo si ‘segun t’o daju
Ami isegun han l’oju orun
Ao b’ola fun oruko Re nibi gbogbo
Ile ojo Alafia fere mo

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Holy Spirit, faithful Guide,Ever near the Christian’s side,Gently lead us by the hand,Pilgrims in a desert land;Weary souls fore’er rejoice,While they hear that sweetest voice,Whispering softly, “Wanderer, come!Follow Me, I’ll guide thee home.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Ever present, truest Friend,Ever near Thine aid to lend,Leave us not to doubt and fear,Groping on in darkness drear.When the storms are raging sore,Hearts grow faint, and hopes give o’er–Whisper softly, “Wanderer, come!Follow Me, I’ll guide thee home.”

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: When our days of toil shall cease,Waiting still for sweet release,Nothing left but heaven and prayer,Wondering if our names are there;Wading deep the dismal flood,Pleading naught but Jesus’ blood,Whisper softly, “Wanderer, come!Follow Me, I’ll guide thee home.”

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Emi mimo amona
Ti nsamona Kristiani
Jowo ma to wa jeje
Ero nin’aye ise
Okan alare si nyo
‘Gba won gb’ohun didun Re
T’o nwi jeje pe “pada
Asako, ngo sin o de ‘le”

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ore to wa nitosi
Lati se iranlowo
Ma fi wa sile n’nu eru
Okun on iyemeji
Nigba igbi nru soke
Ti ireti gbogbo pin
T’o nwi jeje pe, pada
Asako ngo sin o de ‘le

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
‘Gba ‘se wa l’aye ba pin
T’a si nfe gb’ohun ‘kehin
T’o ku adua at’orun
T’a fe mo ba l’o’oko nibe
T’a nrin n’nu ibanuje
T’eje Jesu j’ebe wa
T’o nwi jeje pe, pada
Asako ngo sin o de ‘le

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: The cross that He gave may be heavy,But it ne’er outweighs His grace;The storm that I feared may surround me,But it ne’er excludes His face.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: The cross is not greater than His grace,The storm cannot hide His blessed face;I am satisfied to knowThat with Jesus here below,I can conquer ev'ry foe.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: The thorns in my path are not sharperThan composed His crown for me;The cup which I drink not more bitterThan He drank in Gethsemane.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: The light of His love shineth brighter,As it falls on paths of woe;The toil of my work groweth lighter,As I stoop to raise the low.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: His will I have joy in fulfilling,As I'm walking in His sight;My all to the blood I am bringing,It alone can keep me right.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
B’agbelebu mo tile wuwo
Ko t’ayo or’ofe Re
Iji t’o l’eru le yi mi ka
Oju Re mbe l’ara mi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Agbelebu ko to ore Re
Iji ko le pa oju Re mo
O dun mo mi ki nso pe
Bi jesu wa pelu mi
Mo le segun gbogb’ota

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Egun t’o wa l’ona mi ko mu
Ju ade egun t’a de E
Ago ti mo mu ko koro ju
Eyit’Oluwa mi mu

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
‘Mole  ife Re ntan siwaju
B’o tin tan s’ona ese
Eru wuwo mi di fifuye
Bi mo ti nran ni lowo

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Mo l’ayo ni sise ife Re
Bi mo ti nrin n’nu ‘mole
Mo fi gbogb’aye mi f’eje na
On nikan l’o npa mi mo

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: 1 There is sunshine in my soul today,More glorious and brightThan glows in any earthly sky,For Jesus is my light.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: O there’s sunshine, blessed sunshine,When the peaceful happy moments roll:When Jesus shows His smiling face,There is sunshine in the soul.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: There is music in my soul today,A carol to my King,And Jesus, listening, can hearThe songs I cannot sing.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: There is springtime in my soul today,For when the Lord is near,The dove of peace sings in my heart,The flowers of grace appear.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: There is gladness in my soul today,And hope and praise and loveFor blessings which He gives me now,For joys "laid up" above.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Imole k’okan mi l’oni
O li ogo o si ndan
O ntan ju t’awosanmo lo
Jesu ni ‘mole ni

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
I…mole didan
(imole kun okan mi)/2x
Bi akoko ayo ti nsare lo
(b’o ti nsare lo)
‘Gba Jesu nf’oju ‘fe Re han
Imole kun okan mi

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Orun kun okan mi l’oni
Orin si Oba mi
Jesu t’eti sile, O ngbo
Orin ti nko le ko

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ayo kun okan mi l’oni
‘Gba Krist’ wa nitosi
Alafia mbe l’okan mi
Or’ofe  farahan

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Ayo kun okan mi l’oni
‘Reti, iyin , ife
‘Tori ‘bukun t’o fi fun mi
Ayo t’o wa l’oke

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Some glorious morning sorrow will cease
Some glorious morning all will be peace
Heartaches all ended, school days all done
Heaven will open--Jesus will come

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Some golden daybreak Jesus will come
Some golden daybreak, battles all won
He'll shout the vict'ry, break thro' the blue
Some golden daybreak, for me, for you.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Sad hearts will gladden, all shall be bright
Goodbye forever to earth's dark night
Changed in a moment, like Him to be
Oh, glorious daybreak, Jesus I'll see

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Oh, what a meeting, there in the skies
No tears nor crying shall dim our eyes
Loved ones united eternally
Oh, what a daybreak that morn will be

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ooro kan mbo ‘banuje y’o pin
Oro kan mbo, Alafia y’o de
Arokan pari, eko d’opin
Orun y’o si Jesu y’o si de

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
L’oro didan kan Jesu y’o de
L’oro didan na ogun y’o tan
Y’o fun ipe ‘segun lat’orun
L’oro didan na fun mi fun o

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Gbogbo okan ‘banuje y’o yo
Ao dagbere f’aye osi yi
Ao parade, ao si dabi Re
Ojo ologo, t’ao ri Jesu

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
A! ipade na y’o tidun to
Omije ki yo b’oju je mo
Ao wa pel’awon mimo titi
Oro ojo na y’o ti dun to

englishTitle: AT THE FOOT OF THE CROSS

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: I met Jesus at the foot of the crossWhen I was bound by sin;Jesus met me, cleansed my heart of its dross,He gave sweet peace within.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: I met Jesus at the foot of the cross,I met Jesus at the foot of the cross;All my sins were washed away;Sin’s dark night turned into dayWhen I met Jesus at the foot of the cross.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: I found pardon at the foot of the cross,Forgiveness full and free;Now I love Him only, all else is loss,His grace availed for me.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: I met Jesus when I needed Him most,Despair possessed my soul;I was under condemnation and lost,When Jesus made me whole.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mo pade Jesu nib’agbelebu
Nigbati ese de mi
Jesu gba mi O we okan mi mo
O fun mi ni ‘sinmi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Mo pade Jesu nib’agbelebu/2x
O we gbogbo ese mi
Okunkun mi di ‘mole
‘Gba mo pade Jesu nib’agbelebu

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Mo ri ‘dariji nib’agbelebu
Idariji lo
Nisisiyi On nikan ni mo fe
Ore Re to fun mi

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Mo pade Jesu nigbati mo fe
Are mu okan mi
Mo wa l’abe ‘dalebi on egbe
Jesu da mi nide

number: 634: AT THE FOOT OF THE CROSS

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: I once was loaded down with sin, but Jesus came along;Hallelujah, Hallelujah!Now I am free and in my heart I have a happy song;Hallelujah, praise His name!

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Hallelujah! Praise His holy name!Hallelujah! He’s ev’ry day the same;My sins are all forgiven,I’m on my way to Heaven,I’ll shout His name forever:Praise His name!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: How many times I stumbled, bearing such a heavy load;Hallelujah, Hallelujah!But Jesus took my burdens, led me to the narrow road;Hallelujah, praise His name!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: The grace of God is flowing from the Cross of Calvary:Hallelujah, Hallelujah!I’m happy, for I know that there is grace enough for me;Hallelujah, praise His name!

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mo ti kun f’ese pupo ri
Sugbon Jesu gba mi A
Alleluya/2x
Nisisiyi mo d’ominira
Orin didun gb’okan mi
Mo fi ogo f’oko Re

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Alleluya, ogo f’oko Re
Alleluya, bakanna ni titi
A dari ese mi ji, ona Orun ni mo nto
Ngo ma korin iyin Re titi lai

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Gba pupo ni mo ti subu l’abe eru wuwo
Alleluya/2x
Sugbon Jesu gb’eru mi
O to mi s’ona tooro
Mo fi ogo f’oko Re

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ore-ofe Olorun nsan lat’oke Kalfari
Alleluya/2x
Mo l’ayo lati mo pe or’ofe Re to fun mi
Mo fi ogo f’oko Re

englishTitle: I KNOW WHOM I HAVE BELIEVED

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: I know not why God’s wondrous graceTo me He hath made known,Nor why, unworthy, Christ in loveRedeemed me for His own.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: But “I know Whom I have believed,And am persuaded that He is ableTo keep that which I’ve committedUnto Him against that day.”

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: I know not how this saving faithTo me He did impart,Nor how believing in His WordWrought peace within my heart.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: I know not how the Spirit moves,Convincing men of sin,Revealing Jesus through the Word,Creating faith in Him.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: I know not what of good or illMay be reserved for me,Of weary ways or golden days,Before His face I see.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics: I know not when my Lord may come,At night or noonday fair,Nor if I walk the vale with Him,Or meet Him in the air.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Nko mo ‘di re t’Olorun fi
Or’ofe Re han mi
Bi mo se aiye to ni
Kristi da mi nide

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Sugbon mo m’eniti mo gbagbo
O da mi l’oju pe o lagbara
Lati pa ohun ti mo fun
Mo di ojo ikehin

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ngo mo bo ti igbagbo
T’o ngba ‘ni la fun mi
Bi o ti f’ala-fia fun mi
Ni gbigb’oro Re gbo

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ngo mo bi Emi Re ti se
Fi oye ese ye ni
Nfi Jesu han nip’oro Re
To nfi ‘gbagbo fun mi

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Nko m’ohun t’ola le mu wa
Ire tabi ibi
Ojo ‘damu tabi ayo
Ngo ma wo oju Re

items.title: Ese 5
items.lyrics:
Ngo mo ‘gbat’Oluwa le de
L’osan tabi l’oru
L’aye tabi nigba iku
Ki nsa wa pelu Re

number: 637: I KNOW WHOM I HAVE BELIEVED

englishTitle: I WILL SING THE WONDROUS STORY

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: I will sing the wondrous storyOf the Christ who died for me.How He left His home in gloryFor the cross of Calvary.I was lost, but Jesus found me,Found the sheep that went astray,Threw His loving arms around me,Drew me back into His way.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: I was bruised, but Jesus healed me;Faint was I from many a fall;Sight was gone, and fears possessed me,But He freed me from them all.Days of darkness still come o'er me,Sorrow's paths I often tread,But the Savior still is with me;By His hand I'm safely led.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: He will keep me till the riverRolls its waters at my feet;Then He'll bear me safely over,Where the loved ones I shall meet.Yes, I'll sing the wondrous storyOf the Christ who died for me,Sing it with the saints in glory,Gathered by the crystal sea.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ngo ko ‘rin itan ‘yanu na
Ti Jesu t’O ku fun mi
B’On ti fi ‘le ogo sile
Lati ku ni Kalfari

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ngo ko ‘rin………. Itan ‘yanu na
(Ngo ko ‘rin ‘yanu nla)
Ti Jesu…… t’O ku fun mi
(Ti Jesu …… t’O ku fun mi)
Ko ‘rin na…… pel’awon mimo
(ko ‘rin na pel’awon mimo)
Yi okun ……. Dian na ka
(yi okun didan na ka)

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Mo sako, Jesu wa mi ri
B’aguntan t’o ti sonu
O f’owo ‘fe gba mi mora
O fa mi wa s’agbo Re

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
‘Gba mo gba-gbo o wo mi san
Isubu mase ba mi
Kuro n’nu ‘beru on ‘foju
O so mi d’ominira
Ese 4Okunkun bo ile sibe
‘Banuje wa l’ona mi

O nfi owo Re to mi

items.title: Ese 5
items.lyrics:
Y’o pa mi mo tit’odo ni
Yo san koja l’ese mi
Y’o gbe mi koja lailewu
Ngo r’awon olufe mi

number: 638: I WILL SING THE WONDROUS STORY

englishTitle: THE TOUCH OF HIS HANDS IN MINE

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: There are days so dark that I seek in vainFor the face of my Friend divine;But tho' darkness hide, He is there to guideBy the touch of His hand on mine.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Oh, the touch of His hand on mine,Oh, the touch of His hand on mine!There is grace and pow’r, in the trying hour,In the touch of His hand on mine.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: There are times, when tired of the toilsome road,That for ways of the world I pine;But He draws me back to the upward trackBy the touch of His hand on mine.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: When the way is dim, and I cannot seeThro' the mist of His wise design,How my glad heart yearns and my faith returnsBy the touch of His hand on mine.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: In the last sad hour, as I stand aloneWhere the powers of death combine,While the dark waves roll He will guide my soulBy the touch of His hand on mine.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
‘Gba pupo l’ona mi sokun ti nko
Le r ‘oju ore mi owon
B’okun tile pa mo On yo to mi
Pelu owo itoni Re

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Nigbati owo ‘fe Re nto ni (nto ni)/2X
Ore-ofe ni nigba idanwo
B’owo ife Re ba nto ni

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
‘Gba miran b’are mu mi l’ona na
Ti mo fe te s’ona aye
On lo nfa mi pada s’ona Orun
Pelu owo itoni Re

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
‘Gbat’ona sokun ti nko le riran
Ti ikuku si bo ona
Okan mi yo, ‘gbagbo mi si duro
Nipa owo itoni Re

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
‘Gbat’o ba ku emi nikansoso
T’agbara iku d’imo po
T’odo iku nsa, on yo t’okan mi
Nipa owo itoni Re

number: 639: THE TOUCH OF HIS HAND IN MINE

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Man of Sorrows!” what a nameFor the Son of God, who cameRuined sinners to reclaim.Hallelujah! What a Savior!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Bearing shame and scoffing rude,In my place condemned He stood;Sealed my pardon with His blood.Hallelujah! What a Savior!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Guilty, vile, and helpless we;Spotless Lamb of God was He;“Full atonement!” can it be?Hallelujah! What a Savior!

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Lifted up was He to die;“It is finished!” was His cry;Now in Heav’n exalted high.Hallelujah! What a Savior!

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics: When He comes, our glorious King,All His ransomed home to bring,Then anew His song we’ll sing:Hallelujah! What a Savior!

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Olugbala ni Jesu
T’emi ni, mo je tiRe
O san gbese ti mo je
O s’etutu f’ese mi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Olugbala, Olugbala
(Olugbala ni, Olugbala ni)
Olugbala ni Jesu
(Olugbala ni, Olugbala ni Jesu)
Ngo yin l’ogo/2x
T’emi ni, mo je tiRe (mo je tiRe)/2x

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Fi iyin f’Olugbala
T’O wa s’aye nitori mi
O fi emi Re fun mi
Lati gba okan mi la

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Olugbala l’ona mi
O mba mi rin lojojumo
O nto mi ninu ife Re
O npa mi mo n’nu ewu

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Mo mo pe l’ojo kan ngo
R’oju Re l’orun l’ohun
Nipa ore-fe Re
Ngo si ri l’ojukoju

items.title: Ese 5
items.lyrics:
Olugbala t’O fe mi
Anu nla Re fi han be
Gbo ohun Re t’O nwipe
Gb’agbelebu, tele mi

yorubaTitle: Mo Ha Te E L’orun Bi?

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: I am satisfied with Jesus,But a question comes to meAs I ponder o’er His goodness:Is He satisfied with me?

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Is my Master satisfied,Is He satisfied with me?I am satisfied with Jesus;Is He satisfied with me?

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Am I kind in word, and tender,Am I all I ought to be,Am I always His defender:Is He satisfied with me?

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Do I tell the blessed storyOf the Christ on Calvary,Doing all for His own glory:Is He satisfied with me?

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mo ni ‘telorun n’nu Jesu
Sugbon mo nro l’okan mi
Bi mo ti nsiro ore Re
Mo ha te Jesu l’orun

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Mo ha te….. Krist’ l’orun bi
(mo ha te Krist’ l’orun bi?mo ha te l’orun)
Emi ha tel’orun bi?
Mo ni ‘tel’orun n’nu Jesu
Mo ha mu ‘nu Re dun bi?

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Mo ha ni iwa pele bi?
Mo ha wa ni pipe bi?
Emi ha nja s’ipa tiRe
Mo ha te Jesu l’orun

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Mo ha nso itan ‘yanu na
Ti Kristi ni Kalfari
Mo ha ngbe ogo re ga bi
Mo ha te Jesu l’orun?

yorubaTitle: Je Ki Ayo Na Kun Okan Wa

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: There’s a clear fountain flowingFrom the bright throne above,And its waters are glowingWith the sunshine of love;Take the blest consolation,Which the Lord will bestow,Take the cup of salvation -Let the joy overflow.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: O the joy!With this wondrous salvationBe our hearts all aglow;O the joy!Let the blessing run over,And joy overflow.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Many hearts need the story—Are athirst for His grace;Go to them with His gloryShining out from your face;Tell of Jesus your Savior!If His mercies you know,Show the light of His favor—Let the joy overflow.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Be our lives freely yieldedTo the Savior’s command;By His care ever shieldedAnd upheld by His hand;In the pathways of sadness,Sweetest lilies may grow;Let us sow seeds of gladness—Let the joy overflow.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Orisun mimo kan nsan
Lati or’ite l’oke
Omi iye na si ndan
Pelu ‘tansan ife
Gba ‘tunu to ni ‘bukun
T’Oluwa nfi fun ni
Wa mu ago igbala
Ki aye re le kun

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
A! ayo (a! ayo) jeki ayo igbala
Mu okan wa gbona
A! ayo (A! Ayo) jeki ‘bukun Re Orun
Wa kun okan wa

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Opo nfe gbo itan na
Nwon npongbe f’or’ofe
Lo, fi ewa Re han won
B’o ti han lara re
So ti Olugbala re
B’iwo mo anu Re
So f’elomiran pelu
Ki ayo re le kun

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Jeki a fi aye wa
Sin Olugbala wa
Apa Re yo gbe wa ro
Yo si dabobo wa
Gbat’a wa n’nu ‘banuje
On yo s’ona wa dan
Je ki a so eso ayo
Ki ayo re le kun

englishTitle: AT THE END OF THE WAY

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: The sands have been washed in the footprintsOf the stranger on Galilee’s shore,And the voice that subdued the rough billows,Will be heard in Judea no more.But the path of that lone Galilean,With joy I will follow today;And the toils of the road will seem nothing,When I get to the end of the way.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: There are so many hills to climb upward,I often am longing for rest,But He who appoints me my pathwayKnows just what is needful and best.I know in His word He hath promisedThat my strength, “it shall be as my day”And the toils of the road will seem nothing,When I get to the end of the way.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: He loves me too well to forsake me,Or give me a trial too much;All His people have been dearly purchased,And Satan can never claim such.By and by I shall see Him and praise Him,In the city of unending day;And the toils of the road will seem nothing,When I get to the end of the way.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: When the last, feeble step has been taken,And the gates of that city appear,And the beautiful songs of the angelsFloat out on my listening ear;When all that now seems so mysteriousWill be bright and as clear as the day,Then the toils of the road will seem nothing,When I get to the end of the way.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ilu didara kan wa l’ehin aye yi
L’odo’Olorun , l’odikeji odo
Ilekun re je pearli, ogo re ki si sa
Ogiri jasper re wa titi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Oluwa, ere kan mbe ni iwaju mi
Pa okan mi mo titi de popin
Jo gbe mi lori iye apa mimo Re
Titi ngo fi de ade isegun

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ade iye nduro de mi n’ilu orun
Ao fun mi ni im’ope asegun
Okan mi yo korin irapada  titi
L’ojo kan ngo d’ebute didan na

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ow’Olorun lo ko ‘bugbe didara yi
Ile yi wa fun awon asegun
Ireti lehin iku, ilu elewa
Mo n’ireti yi o wa fun o

number: 644: AT THE END OF THE WAY

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: When sorrow and storms are besetting my track,And Satan is whisp’ring, “You’d better turn back,”How oft I have proved it, tho’ dark be the way,A little believing drives clouds all away.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Lord, I believe, Lord, I believe!Savior, raise my faith in Thee,Till it can move a mountain;Lord, I believe, Lord, I believe!All my doubts are buried in the fountain.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: How easy when sailing the sea in a calm,To trust in the strength of Jehovah’s great arm;But somehow I find when the waves swamp the boat,It takes some believing to keep things afloat.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: “I’ll stand to the end,” I have heard people say,“I’ll fight till I die, and will ne’er run away;”But when by temptation so fiercely assailed,They left off believing, and terribly failed.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: And others there are full of courage and zeal,Who go to the battle like warriors of steel;But right in the heat of the conflict with sin,Instead of believing they faint and give in.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics: Then let us remember in running this race,That faith is not feeling, and trust is not trace;And when around us seems dark as the night,We’ll keep on believing, and win in the fight.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
O ha gba itan ‘hinrere gbo
O ha mo p’ooto lor’Olorun
O ha mo pe Jesu ti jiya
Lati fi ife Re han o
Sibe o nfe lati gba o
O si mbebe fun wa l’orun
Ko si f’ayo dahun bayi pe
Oluwa, emi ti gbagbo

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Mo mbo wa Oluwa
Oro mimo Re pe mi pe ki nwa
Nipa ore-ofe mo nw’oju Re
Le ‘yemeji mi lo
Mo gba ‘leri ‘yebiye Re gbo
Mo ti bo l’owo ese
Nisiyi mo f’ayo dahun pe
Oluwa, emi ti gbagbo (gbagbo)

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Igbagbo t’a nininu Jesu
L’o nfi ‘tura on ‘reti s’okan
O ha nfe lati tan ihin na
Ti Kirsti t’o da elese n’de
Afoju le wa ko si ri
Alare le ri anu gba
Won yo si fi ayo dahun pe
Oluwa, emi ti gbagbo

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Bere ‘dariji lod’Oluwa
Ko si ko gbogbo ese re sile
Baba nfe lati gba o sile
Oluwa nbe lor’ite anu
Ilekun orun si sile
‘Mole lat’orun ntan si wa
Bi o ti nf’ayo dahun pe
Oluwa, emi ti gbagbo

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
1 Lost and bewildered I wandered all alone
Then I heard about a fountain
That would my sins atone
Drench me Lord, I pray in its transforming flow
Wash me, make me, whiter than snow

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Oh, speak for me, yes speak for me
I will let the blood of Calvary speak for me
Tho I'm guilty, surely guilty
And mercy is my plea (humble plea )
I will let the blood of Calvary speak for me ( yes speak for me )

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
2 In a world full of conflict, there's peace to be found
Rest calmly and securely, Tho troubles all around
When the storm passes by, I shall have the victory
And I will let the blood of Calvary speak for me ( speak for me )

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mo gbo Olugbala mi npe
Ohun Re ti npe mi
Mo ti dahun pe mo mbo wa
Mo nbo wa s’odo Re

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ah! Eje t’oke Kalfari
O we okan mi mo (o ti we mi mo)
Bi mo si ti nwe ninu re
O so  mi di pipe (pipe)

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Bi mo ti ri ni mo jew
Ese wo mi l’orun
Oluwa jo, f’anu gba mi
Dari ese mi ji

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Mo ti nu gba mo sako lo
Mo nkiri ‘nu okun
Mo ti f’ohun ini sofo
To mi s’inu ‘mole

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Ngo wa oro ‘yebiye yi
Jo wa s’amona mi
Ngo fi adun ese sile
Ko mi li ona Re

items.title: Ese 5
items.lyrics:
Ko si ohun ti mo mu wa
Elese ni mo je
Nip’anu Re o je t’emi
Oba t’o ngbe l’oke

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Blessed are they in Jesus
Those that are children of God
Redeemed are they by His blood
They passed from death into life.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Thank God, I'm counted worthy
In this world and in the next.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Those who have been justified
By His good, abundant grace
Their sins are all washed away,
They shall be free from judgement.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
They bear fruits of the Spirit
In good works of righteousness,
The work of sin they abhor
The words of God dwell in them

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Thro' precious blood of the Lamb
They become co-heirs with God,
Through the Saviour's majesty
They wear robe of righteousness.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Aalabukun n’nu Jesu
Ni awon om’Olorun
Ti a fie je Re ra
Lati ‘nu iku s’iye

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ope a ka wa mo won
L’aye yi ati l’Orun

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Awon ti a da l’are
Nipa ore-ofe re
A we gbogbo ese won
Nwon o bo l’ojo ‘dajo

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Nwon s’eso ore-ofe
Ninu ise ododo
Irira l’ese si won
Or’Olorun ngbe ‘nu won

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Nipa ej’Odaguntan
Nwon mba Olorun k’egbe
Pelu olanla jesu
A wo won l’aso ogo

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: My Lord, what a morning;My Lord, what a morning;Oh, my Lord, what a morning,When the stars begin to fall,When the stars begin to fall

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: You’ll hear the trumpet sound,To wake the nations underground,Looking to my God’s right hand,When the stars begin to fall.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: You’ll hear the sinner cry,To wake the nations underground,Looking to my God’s right hand,When the stars begin to fall.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: You’ll hear the Christian shout,To wake the nations underground,Looking to my God’s right hand,When the stars begin to fall.

‘binu od’aguntan

englishTitle: IS THY HEART RIGHT WITH GOD?

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Have thy affections been nailed to the cross?Is thy heart right with God?Dost thou count all things for Jesus but loss?Is thy heart right with God?

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Is thy heart right with God,Washed in the crimson flood,Cleansed and made holy, humble and lowly,Right in the sight of God?

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Hast thou dominion o’er self and o’er sin?Is thy heart right with God?Over all evil without and within?Is thy heart right with God?

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Is there no more condemnation for sin?Is thy heart right with God?Does Jesus rule in the temple within?Is thy heart right with God?

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Are all thy powers under Jesus’ control?Is thy heart right with God?Does He each moment abide in thy soul?Is thy heart right with God?

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics: Art thou now walking in heaven's pure light?Is thy heart right with God?Is thy soul wearing a garment of white?Is thy heart right with God?

number: 653: IS THY HEART RIGHT WITH GOD

englishTitle: SINCE JESUS CAME INTO MY HEART
yorubaTitle: Gba Jesu Ti De Inu Okan Mi

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: What a wonderful change in my life has been wroughtSince Jesus came into my heart!I have light in my soul for which long I have sought,Since Jesus came into my heart!

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Since Jesus came into my heart,Since Jesus came into my heart,Floods of joy o'er my soul like the sea billows roll,Since Jesus came into my heart.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: I have ceased from my wand'ring and going astray,Since Jesus came into my heart!And my sins which were many are all washed away,Since Jesus came into my heart!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: I’m possessed of a hope that is steadfast and sure,Since Jesus came into my heart!And no dark clouds of doubt now my pathway obscure,Since Jesus came into my heart!

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: There's a light in the valley of death now for me,Since Jesus came into my heart!And the gates of the City beyond I can see,Since Jesus came into my heart!

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics: I shall go there to dwell in that city, I know,Since Jesus came into my heart!And I'm happy, so happy, as onward I go,Since Jesus came into my heart!

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Wo iru iyipada nla t’a se ‘nu mi
‘Gba Jesu de ‘nu okan mi
Mo ni imole ti mo ti nwa l’okan mi
Gba Jesu de ‘nu okan mi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Gba Jesu de ‘nu okan mi
(Gba Jesu ti de inu okan mi)		2x

number: 654: SINCE JESUS CAME INTO MY HEART

englishTitle: THE OLD ACCOUNT SETTLED LONG AGO

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: There was a time, I know,When in the book of heaven,An old account was standingFor sins yet unforgiven;My name was at the topAnd many things below,I went unto the Keeper,And settled long ago.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Long ago, long ago,
Yes, the old account was settled long ago;And the record’s clear today,For He washed my sins away,When the old account was settled long ago.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: The old account was large,And growing every day,For I was always sinning,And never tried to pay;But when I looked aheadAnd saw such pain and woe,I said that I would settle,And settled long ago.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: When at the judgment barI stand before my King,And He the book will open,He cannot find a thing;Then will my heart be glad,While tears of joy will flow,Because I had it settled,And settled long ago.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: O sinner, seek the Lord,Repent of all your sin;For thus He has commanded,If you would enter in;And then if you should liveA hundred years below,E'en here you’ll not regret it,You settled long ago.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Nigba kan ‘nu aye, ‘nu iwe Olorun
Ninu eyi ti a ko, ese gbogbo wa si
Oruko mi wa mbe, pelu gbogb’ese mi
Mo to Olugbala lo, mo yanju gbogbo re

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Gbogbo re (l’or’ekun mi)
Gbogbo re (ni mo ti yanju)
Gbogb’akosile atijo ti yanju (Alleluya)
Okan mi mo nisiyi
Jesu we ese mi nu
Gbogb’akosile atijo ti yanju

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ese mi p’apoju, o npo si l’ojojo
Nitori l’ojojumo ni mo nd’ese pupo
‘Gba ti mo ri ‘jiya, ti o nduro de mi
Mo gbadura si Jesu, o f’eje Re we mi

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Nib’ite idajo, ngo duro n’waju Re
Yo s’iwe akosile, ko ni r’ese nibe
Okan mi yo l’ayo, ao n’omije mi nu
L’ojo t’o ti pe s’ehin, mo yanju gbogbo re

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Ninu ile ayo, l’odo Olugbala
Ngo korin irapada ngo yin fun ife Re
Nko ni gbagbe ‘we na, ti o funfun bi sno
‘Tori mo ti gbadura, mo yanju gbogbo re

items.title: Ese 5
items.lyrics:
Elese wa Jesu, jewo gbogb’ese re
Olorun l’o pase yi, b’o ba fe de orun
B’o ba gbe ogorun odun ‘nu aye yi
Iwo ki yo  k’abamo pe Jesu gba o la

number: 655: THE OLD ACCOUNT SETTLED LONG AGO

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
What a glad thought some wonderful morning
I shall hear Gabriel's trumpet sound
When I wake up (when I wake up) to sleep no more (to sleep no more)
Rising to meet my blessed redeemer
With a glad shout I'll leave the ground
When I wake up (when I wake up) to sleep no more (to sleep no more)

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
When I wake up (on some glad morning)
To sleep no more (jewels adorning)
Happy I'll be (over in glory)
On heaven's bright shore (telling the story)
With the redeemed of all the ages
Praising the one whom I adore.
When I wake up (when I wake up) to sleep no more (to sleep no more)

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Glory to God I'll have a new body,
Changed in the twinkling of an eye
When I wake up (when i wake up) to sleep no more (to sleep no more)
Leaving behind all trouble and sorrow,
Bound for that city up on high
When I wake up (when I wake up) to sleep no more (to sleep no more)

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Lead me gently home, Father,Lead me gently home,When life’s toils are ended,And parting days have come,Sin no more shall tempt me,Ne’er from Thee I’ll roam,If Thou’lt only lead me, Father,Lead me gently home.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Lead me gently home, Father,Lead me gently,Lest I fall upon the wayside,Lead me gently home.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Lead me gently home, Father,Lead me gently home,In life’s darkest hours, Father,When life’s troubles come,Keep my feet from wandering,Lest from Thee I roam,Lest I fall upon the wayside,Lead me gently home.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Silent night! Holy night!All is calm, all is bright’round yon virgin mother and child!Holy infant, so tender and mild,sleep in heavenly peace,sleep in heavenly peace.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Silent night! Holy night!Shepherds quake at the sight.Glories stream from heaven afar,heav'nly hosts sing, “Alleluia!Christ the Savior is born!Christ the Savior is born!”

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Silent night! Holy night!Son of God, love’s pure lightradiant beams from Thy holy facewith the dawn of redeeming grace,Jesus, Lord, at Thy birth!Jesus, Lord, at Thy birth!

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Silent night! Holy night!Wondrous star, lend thy light;with the angels let us sing"Alleluia" to our King:“Christ the Savior is born!Christ the Savior is born.”

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Anywhere with Jesus I can safely go;Anywhere He leads me in this world below;Anywhere without Him dearest joys would fade;Anywhere with Jesus I am not afraid.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Anywhere! anywhere! Fear I cannot know;Anywhere with Jesus I can safely go.Verse 2:
Anywhere with Jesus I am not alone,Other friends may fail me, He is still my own;Though His hand may lead me over dreary ways,Anywhere with Jesus is a house of praise.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Anywhere with Jesus over land and sea,Telling souls in darkness of salvation free;Ready as He summons me to go or stay,Anywhere with Jesus when He points the way.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: As He heard His waiting peopleIn the upper room one day,God will hear us when we seek HimIn the old time way .

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: In the old time way ….In the old time way ….Lord, revive and save Thy peopleIn the old time way

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: He will bless the Gospel story,He will save the lost today.He will give them grace and gloryIn the old time way.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: He who walked upon the watersIs the very same today,He can still the storm and tempestIn the old time way.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Send the old time power upon us,Cleanse each waiting heart, we pray;Let Thy mighty zeal possess usIn the old time way.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: The Savior has come in His mighty power,And spoken peace to my soul;And all of my life from that very hourI’ve yielded to His control,I’ve yielded to His control.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Wonderful, wonderful,Marvelous and wonderful,What He has done for my soul!The half has never been told;Oh, it is wonderful.It is marvelous and wonderful,What Jesus has done for this soul of mine!The half has never been told.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: ’Twas only a foretaste of joys divineIn Canaan waiting for me,Where sweetest of honey and milk and wineWere dripping from every tree,Were dripping from every tree.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: From glory to glory He leads me on,From grace to grace every day;And brighter and brighter the glory dawns,While pressing my homeward way,While pressing my homeward way.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: If fellowship here with my Lord can beSo inexpressibly sweet,Oh, what will it be when His face we see,When ’round the bright throne we meet?When ’round the bright throne we meet?

number: 663: I WILL WAIT PATIENTLY ON THE LORD

englishTitle: AM I A SOLDIER OF THE CROSS

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Am I a soldier of the cross,A foll'wer of the Lamb?And shall I fear to own His cause,Or blush to speak His name?

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: And when the battle's over we shall wear a crown!Yes, we shall wear a crown!Yes, we shall wear a crown!And when the battle's over we shall wear a crownIn the new Jerusalem.Wear a crown, wear a crown,Wear a bright and shining crown.And when the battle's over we shall wear a crownIn the new Jerusalem.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Must I be carried to the skiesOn flow'ry beds of ease,While others fought to win the prize,And sail'd thro' bloody seas?

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Are there no foes for me to face?Must I not stem the flood?Is this vile world a friend to graceTo help me on to God?

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Sure I must fight if I would reign;Increase my courage, Lord,I'll bear the toil, endure the pain,Supported by thy word.

number: 664: AM I A SOLDIER OF THE CROSS

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: The Master has come, and He calls us to followthe track of the footprints He leaves on our way;far over the mountain and through the deep hollow,the path leads us on to the mansions of day:the Master has called us, the children who fear Him,who march 'neath Christ's banner, His own little band;we love Him and seek Him, we long to be near Him,and rest in the light of His beautiful land.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: The Master has called us; the road may be dreary,and dangers and sorrows are strewn on the track;but God's Holy Spirit shall comfort the weary;we follow the Savior and cannot turn back;The Master has called us: though doubt and temptationmay compass our journey, we cheerfully sing:"press onward, look upward," thru much tribulation;the children of Zion must follow their King.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: The Master has called us, in life's early morning,with spirits as fresh as the dew on the sod:we turn from the world, with its smiles and its scorning,to cast in our lot with the people of God:the Master has called us, His sons and His daughters,We plead for His blessing and trust in His love;and thru the green pastures, beside the still waters,He'll lead us at last to His kingdom above.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:

Ao ma wa oju Re

A ki yo tun pada ,

‘yemeji oun ‘danwo

Oun yio bukun fun wa b’a ba gbekele
‘Nu papa oko tutu ati l’ori oke
Oun yio samona de ‘bugbe Orun

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Arise O youth of God
Have done lesser things
Give heart and soul
and mind and strength
To serve the King of kings

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Arise Arise
The Master calls for thee
Arise, Arise
O youth of God
March on to the victory

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Arise O youth of God
His kingdom tarries long
Bring in the day of joy and peace
And end the night of wrong

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Arise O youth of God
The church for you doth wait
Her strength shall
make your spirit strong
Her service make you great

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Lift high the cross of Christ
Tread where His feet have trod
Be loyal to the King of kings
March on O youth of God

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
L’akoko yi,  o nfe Bibeli
L’akoko yi, mase jafara
Ri daju pe…. Ri daju pe
‘Dakoro re, so ‘le lor’apata

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ni ‘ru ‘gbayi, mo nf’Olugbala
Ni ‘ru ‘gbayi, mo ni ‘dakoro

‘Dakoro mi so ‘le lor’apata

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: My soul in sad exile was out on life’s sea,So burdened with sin and distressed,Till I heard a sweet voice, saying, “Make Me your choice”;And I entered the “Haven of Rest”!

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: I’ve anchored my soul in the “Haven of Rest,”I’ll sail the wide seas no more;The tempest may sweep over wild, stormy, deep,In Jesus I’m safe evermore.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: I yielded myself to His tender embrace,In faith taking hold of the Word,My fetters fell off, and I anchored my soul;The “Haven of Rest” is my Lord.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: The song of my soul, since the Lord made me whole,Has been the old story so blest,Of Jesus, who’ll save whosoever will haveA home in the “Haven of Rest.”

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: How precious the thought that we all may recline,Like John, the beloved so blest,On Jesus’ strong arm, where no tempest can harm,Secure in the “Haven of Rest.”

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics: Oh, come to the Savior, He patiently waitsTo save by His power divine;Come, anchor your soul in the “Haven of Rest,”And say, “My Beloved is mine.”

items.title: Ese 1

‘banuje b’ori okan mi

englishTitle: I CAN ALMOST HEAR THE SOUND OF THE TRUMPET

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Many signs of the times abound everywhere
The coming of the Lord is so near
When I read God’s word then look at this world
I can almost hear the sound fill the air

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Well I can almost hear the sound of the trumpet
What a day, there His glory we’ll behold
We’ve got a hope that reaches far beyond this world below
It can’t long till we meet up there

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Through the heat of the day and the still of the night
Excitement is building everywhere
Can you see, can you feel, the moment is near
I can almost hear the sound fill the air

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Lift your eyes t’wards the skies your redemption is near
Remember how He said He’d come again
As a thief in the night, the trumpet will sound
I can almost hear the sound fill the air

number: 670: I CAN ALMOST HEAR THE SOUND

englishTitle: HE IS ABLE TO DELIVER THEE
yorubaTitle: O Lagbara Lati Gba O La

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: 'Tis the grandest theme thro' the ages rung;'Tis the grandest theme for a mortal tongue;'Tis the grandest theme that the world e'er sung:Our God is able to deliver thee.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: He is able to deliver thee,He is able to deliver thee;Tho' by sin opprest, Go to Him for rest;Our God is able to deliver thee.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: 'Tis the grandest them in the earth or main;'Tis the grandest theme for a mortal strain;'Tis the grandest theme, tell the world again:Our God is able to deliver thee

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: 'Tis the grandest theme, let the tidings rollTo the guilty heart, to the sinful soul;Look to God in faith, He will make thee whole:Our God is able to deliver thee.

number: 671: HE IS ABLE TO DELIVER THEE

englishTitle: IN THE HOLLOW OF GOD’S HANDS

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: I am safe, whatever may betide me;I am safe, who ever may deride me;I am safe, as long as I confide meIn the hollow of God’s hand.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: In the hollow, hollow of his hand!In the hollow, hollow of his hand!I am safe, while God himself doth hold meIn the hollow of his hand.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: What tho’ fierce the stormy blasts roar round me;What tho’ sore life’s trials oft confound me;I am safe, for nought of ill can wound meIn the hollow of God’s hand.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Everlasting arms of love enfold me;Words of peace the voice divine has told me;I am safe, while God himself doth hold meIn the hollow of his hand.

englishTitle: JESUS IS THE FRIEND YOU NEED
yorubaTitle: Jesu ni Ore Ti o Ni Lo

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: When the sun shines bright and your heart is light,Jesus is the friend you need;When the clouds hang low in this world of woe,Jesus is the friend you need.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Jesus is the friend you need,Such a friend is He indeed;He who noteth every tear,He will banish every fear,Jesus is the friend you need.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: If you’re lost in sin, all is dark within,Jesus is the friend you need;God alone can save through the Son He gave,Jesus is the friend you need.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: When in that sad hour, when in death’s grim pow’r,Jesus is the friend you need;If you would prepare ’gainst the tempter’s snare,Jesus is the friend you need.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: When the cares of life all around are rife,Jesus is the friend you need;Glory to His name, always He’s the same,Jesus is the friend you need.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:

Jesu ni okan re nfe

number: 674: JESUS IS THE FRIEND YOU NEED

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Faith of our mothers, living stillIn cradle song and bedtime prayer;In nursery lore and fireside love,Thy presence still pervades the air.Faith of our mothers, living faith,We will be true to thee till death.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Faith of our mothers, loving faith,Fount of our childhood's trust and grace,Oh, may thy consecration proveSource of a finer, nobler race;Faith of our mothers, loving faith,We will be true to thee till death.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Faith of our mothers, guiding faith,For youthful longing, youthful doubt,How blurred our vision, blind our way,Thy providential care without.Faith of our mothers, guiding faith,We will be true to thee till death.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Faith of our mothers, Christian faith,In truth beyond our stumbling creeds,Still serve the home and save the Church,And breathe thy spirit through our deeds;Faith of our mothers, Christian faith,We will be true to thee till death.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: As I travel thru this pilgrim landThere is a Friend who walks with me,Leads me safely thru the sinking sand,It is the Christ of Calvary;This would be my pray’r, dear Lord, each dayTo help me do the best I can,For I need Thy light to guide me day and night,Blessed Jesus, hold my hand.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Jesus, hold my hand, (blessed Jesus hold my hand)
I need Thee every hour (Yes I need thee every hour)Thru this pilgrim land (through this land this pilgrim land)Protect me by Thy power; ((protect me by thy pow’r)Hear my feeble plea  (hear my plea my feeble plea)O Lord, look down on me (O dear Lord look down on me)When I kneel in pray’r (When I kneel in prayer)I hope to meet You there,Blessed Jesus, hold my hand.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Let me travel in the light divineThat I may see the blessed way;Keep me that I may be wholly ThineAnd sing redemption’s song some day;I will be a soldier brave and trueAnd ever firmly take a stand,As I onward go and daily meet the foe,Blessed Jesus, hold my hand.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: When I wander thru the valley dimToward the setting of the sun,Lead me safely to a land of restIf I a crown of life have won;I have put my faith in Thee, dear Lord,That I may reach the golden strand,There’s no other friend on whom I can depend,Blessed Jesus, hold my hand.

englishTitle: THERE IS POWER IN THE BLOOD OF JESUS

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Would you be free from the burden of sin?There’s pow’r in the blood, pow’r in the blood;Would you o’er evil a victory win?There’s wonderful pow’r in the blood.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: There is pow’r, pow’r, wonder-working pow’rIn the blood of the Lamb;There is pow’r, pow’r, wonder-working pow’rIn the precious blood of the Lamb.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Would you be free from your passion and pride?There’s pow’r in the blood, pow’r in the blood;Come for a cleansing to Calvary’s tide;There’s wonderful pow’r in the blood.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Would you be whiter, much whiter than snow?There’s pow’r in the blood, pow’r in the blood;Sin-stains are lost in its life-giving flow;There’s wonderful pow’r in the blood.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Would you do service for Jesus your King?There’s pow’r in the blood, pow’r in the blood;Would you live daily His praises to sing?There’s wonderful pow’r in the blood.

englishTitle: TRIM YOUR LAMP AND BE READY

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Rejoice, ye saints, the time draws near,When Christ will in the clouds ap­pear,And for His people call

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Trim your lamps and be rea­dy/3xFor the mid­night call.
For the midnight call/2x
Trim your lamps and be ready for the midnight cry.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: The trum­pet sounds, the thun­ders roll,The hea­vens pass­ing as a scroll,The earth will burn with fire,The earth will burn with fire.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Poor sin­ners then on earth will cry,While light­ning flash­es from the sky,O mount­ains, on us fall,O mount­ains, on us fall.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Come, all be rea­dy; let us tryTo warn the sin­ner and to cry,Behold, the Bride­groom comes,Behold, the Bridegroom comes.

number: 680: TRIM YOUR LAMP AND BE READY

englishTitle: CHRIST FOR THE WHOLE WIDE WORLD

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: The whole wide world for Jesus!This shall our watchword be;Upon the highest mountain,Down by the widest sea;The whole wide world for Jesus!To Him shall all men bow,In city or in prairie—The world for Jesus now!

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: The whole wide world,The whole wide world—Proclaim the Gospel tidings through the whole wide world;Lift up the cross for Jesus, his banner be unfurled,Till every tongue confess Him through the whole wide world!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: The whole wide world for JesusInspires us with the thoughtThat all God's wandering childenHave by his love been bought.The whole wide world for Jesus!O faint not by the way!The cross shall surely conquerIn this our glorious day.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: The whole wide world for Jesus!The marching order sound:Go ye and preach the gospelWherever man is found.The whole wide world for Jesus!Ride forth, O conquering King,Through all the mighty nations,The world to glory bring!

number: 681: CHRIST FOR THE WHOLE WIDE WORLD

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Are you sitting idle, while there's work to do?In the Master's vineyard there's a place for you;Be a faithful servant, ever ready stand,Where the Master calls you, lend a helping hand.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Lend a hand, lend a hand, lend a helping hand;Precious ones are falling,Lend a helping hand.Lend a hand, lend a hand, lend a helping hand;Jesus still is calling,Lend a helping hand.

english.title: chorus
english.lyrics: make his praises ring;Till the strains are wafted over all the land,Reaching up to heaven, lend a helping hand.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Do your prayers no longer reach the throne of grace,That some fallen brother might his steps retrace?Every prayer will help him from the sinking sand,Yours today may save him, lend a helping hand.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Has your heart ceased yearning precious souls to win?Just a word from you might rescue one from sin;Work with all the strength you have at your command,Jesus will reward you, lend a helping hand.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: We shall meet in that beautiful land,On the banks of the bright golden shore,And with all the redeemed spirit-band,There with Jesus to reign ever more.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: In a bright, happy home, we shall meet,In that beautiful, beautiful land,In a bright, happy home we shall meet,In that beautiful, beautiful land.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Over there on the bright azure plains,Where the river of life sweetly flows;For the Saviour eternally reigns,And the beautiful gates never close.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Blessed Jesus has gone to prepareUs a crown that is brighter than day;Then forever we’ll dwell with Him there,And His hand shall wipe all tears away.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: There no sorrow shall e’er taint the air,Where God dwells evil never can come;And no weeping will break on the ear,When the day of life’s turmoil is done.

Pelu ayo l’a ntesiwaju

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Upon life’s boundless ocean where mighty billows roll,I’ve fixed my hope in Jesus, blest anchor of my soul;When trials fierce assail me as storms are gathering o’er,I rest upon His mercy and trust Him more.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: I’ve anchored in Jesus, the storms of life I’ll brave,I’ve anchored in Jesus, I fear no wind or wave.I’ve anchored in Jesus, for He hath power to save,I’ve anchored to the Rock of Ages.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: He keeps my soul from evil and gives me blessèd peace,His voice hath stilled the waters and bid their tumult cease;My Pilot and Deliverer, to Him I all confide,For always when I need Him, He’s at my side.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: He is my Friend and Savior, in Him my anchor’s cast,He drives away my sorrows and shields me from the blast;By faith I’m looking upward beyond life’s troubled sea,There I behold a haven prepared for me.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ninu igbi omi okun aye tiu nlu mi

‘Gbati ‘danwo lile fere bori okan mi
Mo le sinmi le aanu Re, mo gbeke le O

Mo sinmi le Jesu ninu igbi aye

Mo sinmi le Jesu apata

O npa okan mi mo kuro ninu gbogbbo ibi

On yo ma pelu mi  lati se ranwo

Igbagbo mi nw’oke, nibi ti ‘ranwo mi nwa
Mo nreti isinmi ti ko nipekun

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Patiently, tenderly pleading,Jesus is standing todayAt your heart’s doorHe knocks as before,Oh, turn Him no longer away!

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Don’t turn Him away, don’t turn Him away,He has come back to your heart again,Although you’ve gone astray;O how you’ll need Him to plead your causeOn that eternal day!Don’t turn the Savior away from your heart,Don’t turn Him away.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Gracious, compassionate mercyBrought Him from mansions above;Caused Him to waitJust outside your gate,O yield to His wonderful love.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Can you not now hear Him calling?Do not ill treat such a Friend;Give up your sin, Oh, let Him come in,Lo! He will be true to the end.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Now is the time to receive Him,Grant Him admission today;Grieve Him no more,But open your door,And turn Him no longer away.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Oluwa nfi suru duro O nro o
Jeje l’oni O nkan ‘lekun okan re
Sibe ma je ki O fi o sile

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ma je ki O lo, Je ki O wo ‘le
O nkankun okan re leekan si
Bi ‘wo tile sako,
Alagbawi re ni Jesu je,
Ni waju Olorun
Ma sai pe olugbala s’okan re
Ma je ki O lo

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ife anu alailegbe l’o fi b’ogo re sile
T’o wa duro lenu ‘lekun re
Jowo gba ife iyanu yi

englishTitle: THE VICTORY MAY DEPEND ON YOU
yorubaTitle: Isegun Le Ti Owo Re Wa

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Thro’ the land a call is sounding,And it comes to age and youth;’Tis a summons to the conflict,In the cause of right and truth:To the standard of our Captain,Lo, there comes a faithful few;But the victory, my brother,May depend on you.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: The vict’ry may depend on you,The vict’ry may depend on you;Dare to stand among the few,With the faithful tried and true,For the vict’ry may depend on you.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: See the mighty hosts of evilSpreading death thro'out the land;Who is there will answer quickly,And the hosts of sin withstand!Do not fear to join our standard,For our ranks are tried and true,And the victory, my brother,May depend on you.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Lo, a triumph day is coming,When our arms shall be laid down;Then each faithful, loyal soldierShall receive a victor’s crown;Would you stand among the victors,With the band of faithful few?Then the victory, my brother,May depend on you.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Jake jado ile gbogbo
Ipe si gbogbo eda
S’oju ogun lati ja dun otiti at’ododo
Ni jije omo ‘gun Krist’
Iwo ha se olooto
Arakunrin iranwo re le mu ‘segun wa

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ranwo re le mu ‘segun wa
B’o bay an lati pelu awon die
Iranwo re le mu ‘segun wa

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Igba isegun mbo kankan
Nigbati ija yo d’opin
Nigbati awon oloto asegun yo gb’ade iye
Iwo yo ha pelu awon omo’ogun olotito
Nigbati isegun na le je tiRe pelu

number: 686: THE VICTORY MAY DEPEND ON YOU

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
There's a city of gold across the river
When I reach it I'm told I'll live for aye
My soul will fly over chilly Jordan
Over Jordan on wings of love I'll fly away

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Not a moment to lose, make up your mind,
Take a moment and choose God's love divine
From the moment you're saved
How happy you'll be
Take a moment and live eternally
for heaven is free,
how happy you'll be
when heaven you see

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
I'm so glad that I know sweet peace and pardon
Where soever I go I'm glad to say
My soul will fly over chilly Jordan
Over Jordan on wings of love I'll fly away

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
It's a privilege here to help another
Just to tell of His love in all I say
My soul will fly over chilly Jordan
Over Jordan on wings of love I'll fly away

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
O the river is wide and rough the water
But the Savior will come for me some day
My soul will fly over chilly Jordan
Over Jordan on wings of love I'll fly away

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ilu wura kan wa lehin aye yi
Iye ainipekun lo wa nibe
‘Gba t’okan mi ba f’aye yi sile
Emi yo fi ayo fo lo s’odo Jesu

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Sop: Akoko nsure lo mase jafara
Gba Jesu gbo yo gba o la
‘Wo yo si l’ayo
Yan jesu l’Oluwa
Iwo yo ye
Others: Akoko nsure lo s’okan re giri mase jafara
Se ipinnu loni,
Mase s’aniyan mo
Gba Jesu gbo
Jesu yo gba o la
Yo fun o l’oruko
Iwo yi si l’ayo
Yan Jesu l’Oluwa
Jowo aye re, ofe ni ‘gbala
Ayo re yo po
‘Gba t’o ba d’orun

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Inu mi dun pe mo d’eni igbala
Emi yo so eyi ni ‘bi gbogbo
Gba t’okan mi ba f’aye yi sile
Emi yo fi ayo fo lo s’odo Jesu

englishTitle: I AM A SOLDIER OF THE CROSS

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Am I a soldier of the Cross—
A follower of the Lamb?
And shall I fear to own His cause,
Or blush to speak His name?

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
In the name, the precious name,
Of Him who died for me,
Through grace I’ll win the promised crown,
Whate’er my cross may be.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Must I be carried to the skies
On flowery beds of ease,
While others fought to win the prize
And sailed through bloody seas?

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Are there no foes for me to face?
Must I not stem the flood?
Is this vile world a friend to grace,
To help me on to God?

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics:
Since I must fight if I would reign,
Increase my courage, Lord!
I’ll bear the toil, endure the pain,
Supported by Thy Word.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ajagun Jesu l’emi bi (l’emi bi)/3x
At’omo ehin Re
Ngo ha beru lati waasu (ihinrere/2x
Agbara isin Re?

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
A’o duro n’ni igbi
Bass: Ao duro ninu igbi danwo
All: Laipe ao gunle l’ebute ogo
Bass: A o duro n’nu igbi
All: Ao duro ninu igbi idanwo
Ao gunle s’ebute ogo
Alto/Ten: Nigbose

items.lyrics:
Ko ha s’ota lati ba ja (lati ba ja)/3x
Ti mo ni lati ko
Aye ha f’or’ofe ti yo (ore-ofe)/2x
T’yo mu mi d’odo Re?

items.lyrics:
Mo gbodo ‘ja bi ki nto d’ade (ki nto d’ade)/3x

Ngo f’ayo ru agbelebu (agbelebu)/2x
