number: 838. WHAT A FRIEND WE HAVE IN JESUS

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Softly and tenderly Jesus is calling,calling for you and for me;see, on the portals he's waiting and watching,watching for you and for me.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Come home, come home;you who are weary come home;earnestly, tenderly, Jesus is calling,calling, O sinner, come home!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Why should we tarry when Jesus is pleading,pleading for you and for me?Why should we linger and heed not his mercies,mercies for you and for me?

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Time is now fleeting, the moments are passing,passing from you and from me;shadows are gathering, deathbeds are coming,coming for you and for me.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: O for the wonderful love he has promised,promised for you and for me!Though we have sinned, he has mercy and pardon,pardon for you and for me

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Li ohun jeje ni Jesu Kristi npe
O npe iwo at’emi
L’enu ‘lekun li o duro to nwo wa
O nwo iwo at’emi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Wale…. (wale)/2x
On pe elese wale
Li ohun jeje ni Jesu Kristi npe
O npe elese wa ‘le

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Fun ‘fe iyanu ti Jesu seleri
T’o se fun ‘wo at’emi
Bi a tile se onyoo dariji
Dariji ‘wo at’emi
Option

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Li ohun jeje l’Olugbala mi npe
O npe iwo at’emi
O nduro nisiyi li enu ona
Nduro de ‘wo at’emi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Wale (wale)/2x
‘Wo ti are nmu wale
Kikan kikan ni Jesu Kristi npe o
O np’elese wa sile

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Akoko sin lo igba ko duro pe
Ojo ola le pe ju
Ojo nsure lo opin si fere de
Fun iwo ati emi

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
One is our Master,
the blessed Redeemer,
Strong is the bond that
unites us in Him:
Oh, may the love
His own Spirit hath kindled
Burn with a light
that will never grow dim.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Brethren in Jesus,
let us be faithful,
Faithful to Him
who is guiding our ways;
True in allegiance
and loving obedience,
Till in His glory hosannas we raise.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
One is our Master;
with gladness we’ll serve Him,
“Doing the will” of the
Lord “from the heart,”
Knowing His strength
is made perfect in weakness—
All that is needful
His grace will impart.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
One is our Master,
the highest and noblest,
Yet in His tenderness
always “the same”;
Be it our honour
to follow His banner,
Blessing for ever be unto His name.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics:
One is our Master;
and happy those servants,
Watching and ready
whene’er He may come;
Changed in His image,
from “glory to glory,”
Joyful reward in
His kingdom and home.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Enikan l’oga wa, Jesu Olugbala
‘Fe to so wa po n’nu Re ko l’egbe
Emi Olorun wa fi ‘fe yi sinu wa
Ko ma gbe ‘nu wa ko ma si se ku

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ara n’nu Jesu je ka j’oloto
Si Krist’ Oba ti o nto s’ise wa
Ninu isin wa n’ife ati ‘gboran
Tit’ao ri Oba wa ninu ogo

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Pel’ayo lao ma sin Jesu oga wa
Ao fi gbogbo okan se ‘fe Oluwa
Agbara Re nfi okun fun alare
Ore-ofe Re lo npese f’aini won

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Oga ni Jesu yo si tun pada wa
Ibukun ni fun awon ti ns’ona
Yo gba won soke yo pin ibukun fun won
Won yoo joko lowo ‘tun Re l’oke

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: How love­ly on the mount­ains are the feet of HimWho brings good news, good news;Announcing peace, pro­claim­ing news of hap­pi­ness:Our God reigns, our God reigns!

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Our God reigns! Our God reigns!Our God reigns! Our God reigns!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: He had no state­ly form, He had no ma­jes­tyThat we should be drawn to Him.He was de­spised and we took no ac­count of Him.Our God reigns, our God reigns!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: It was our sin and guilt that bruised and wound­ed Him.It was our sin that brought Him down.When we like sheep had gone astray our Shep­herd cameAnd on His shoul­ders bore our shame.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Meek as a lamb that’s led out to the slaugh­ter­house,Dumb as a sheep be­fore its shear­er,His life ran down up­on the ground like pour­ing rainThat we might be born again.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics: Out from the tomb He came with grace and ma­jes­ty;He is alive, He is alive.God loves us so, see here His hands, His feet, His sideYes we know, He is alive.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Alagbara ni Olorun ti an sin
Ogo ni fun oruko Re
Oun lo npese fun gbogbo aini wa
Jesu wa yi o njoba

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Jesu joba… on joba
Jesu joba… l’aye wa

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Jesu mbe larin wa on yo si bukun fun wa
Ore re ni ko je paro
Sa ni ‘gbagbo ki ‘wo ki o si gbkele
Jesu tan sin.. o njoba

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Kini isoro re eyin omo eniyan
Gbe wa to Jesu ti o nsin
Oun yo fi opin si gbogbo re dandan
Jesu wa yi o njoba

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Ring the bells ring the bellsLet the whole world knowChrist the Savior lives todayAs He did so long ago

english.title: Chorus

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Lu agogo lu agogo
Je ki aye gbo
P’abi Krist’ ni Bethlehem
L’opo odun s’ehin

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
A bi ko le tun wa bi
A bi ko le gba wa la
Omo Meri n’irele
L’opo odun sehin

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Olorun ran Omo Re
Omo Re nikan soso
Sinu aye ese yi
Lati ra ‘rapada wa

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Lu agogo/2x
Je ki aye gbo
Olorun wa bakanna
B’o ti wa latijo

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Amazing Grace will always be my song of praise
For it was grace, that brought my liberty
And i do not know just why He came to love me so
He looked beyond my fault and saw my need

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
I shall forever lift mine eyes to Calvary
To view the cross where Jesus died for me
how marvelous the grace that caught my falling soul
He looked beyond my fault and saw my need.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
If not for grace my soul would be a drifting shape
With no safe harbor from the angry waves
But Calvary′s cross shines brightest through the darkest of storms
And just in time His mercy rescued me

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
I shall forever lift my eyes to Calvary
To view the cross where Jesus died for me
And how marvelous the grace that caught my falling soul
He looked beyond my fault
He saw me in need

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ore-ofe ni yo je orin mi titi
On lo gba mi to so mi d’omnira
Nko mo idid re t’o fi feran mi to yi
O bojuwo mi o tan aini mi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Titi lailai l’emi o ranti Kalfari
Ngo si ma wo agbelebu Jesu
Iyanu ni, ore-ofe t’o fa mi mora
O bojuwo mi o si tan gbogb’aini mi

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ife Olorun wo bi o ti dun to
O dun koja ju ohun aye fun mi
On te mi lorun bi mo ti mbar in lojojo
O bojuwo mi o tan aini mi

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Iru ‘fe ‘yanu yi je oro ‘yebiye
A ko le di owo ra l’aye yi
Ore-ofe lo tobi ju oro aye
O bojuwo mi o tan aini  mi

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: There are so many things which to be thankful,There are so many things which to be glad;If we just tried to count all of our blessings,We would have joy that never have had.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Thank you, Jesus, for your true love.Thank you, Jesus, for saving my soul,Lest I wander from home yonder,Thank you, Jesus, for keeping me whole;And thank you, Jesus for salvation,For unfailing, mighty pow'r;I want to worship and adore you,And to thank you ev'ry hour.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: One day the Father sent Christ our RedeemerDown to this world to die for a lost race;What a great price was paid for our transgressions,Freely Christ offered love, mercy and grace.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Fun opo ibukun o ye k’a dupe
Fun opo ibukun o ye k’a yo
Bi a ba le siro gbogbo ‘bukun wa
A o ni ayo t’enu ko le so

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
A dupe Jesu (o seun Jesu)
A dupe t’o gb’okan mi la , o seun t’o gb’okan mi la
(fun agbara ti ki ye lai)
Ki nma ba sako (kin ma sako )
Kuro lodo Re (ni odo Re)
A dupe Jesu (o seun Jesu)
T’o gb’okan mi la (to gb’okan mi la)
A tun dupe Jesu (o suen Jesu)
Fun igbala Re (fun igbala)
(fun agbara ti ki ye lai)
Mo fe O juba Re (kin juba re)
Ki nsi sin O (ki nsi sin O)
Ki nsi dupe (ki nsi dupe)
Ni ‘gba gbogbo (ni ‘gba gbogbo)

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ni ‘gba kan Olorun, ran Omo Re s’aye
Lati gba ar’aye kuro ‘nu egbe
O f’emi Re le ‘le fun igbala wa
O fi emi re le ‘le fun ese wa

yorubaTitle: Je ki Ife Ki O Wa

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Let there be love shared among us,
Let there be love in our eyes,
May now Your love sweep this nation,
Cause us O Lord to arise.
Give us a fresh understanding
Of brotherly love that is real,
Let there be love shared among us,
Let there be love.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Se wa l’okan/2x
Je ki ‘fe Re wa pelu wa
Ki ife re wa yi ‘hinyi ka
Mu wa dide se okan
Fun wa ni oye Re l’otun
Ife ara ti o jinle
Je ki ‘fe Re wa pelu wa, we wa l’okan

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: A mighty fortress is our God,a bulwark never failing;our helper he, amid the floodof mortal ills prevailing.For still our ancient foedoes seek to work us woe;his craft and power are great,and armed with cruel hate,on earth is not his equal.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Did we in our own strength confide,our striving would be losing,were not the right Man on our side,the Man of God's own choosing.You ask who that may be?Christ Jesus, it is he;Lord Sabaoth his name,from age to age the same;and he must win the battle.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: And though this world, with devils filled,should threaten to undo us,we will not fear, for God has willedhis truth to triumph through us.The prince of darkness grim,we tremble not for him;his rage we can endure,for lo! his doom is sure;one little word shall fell him.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: That Word above all earthly powersno thanks to them abideth;the Spirit and the gifts are oursthrough him who with us sideth.Let goods and kindred go,this mortal life also;the body they may kill:God's truth abideth still;his kingdom is forever!

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Alagbara l’Olorun wa
Agbara Re ki ye lailai
O nran wa lowo nigba ‘danwo
O gba wa lowo ese
Esu eni ‘bi ni
On sa gbogbo ‘pa re
Lati m’ese wa ye
Ota onigbagbo
O laggbara ju eniyan

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
A ha ngbekele ipa wa
Ipa wa ko si je nkan
Jesu ha samona wa lo
Eniti Olorun yan
Eni ‘yanu Kristi
Jesu ni eni na
Oluwa gbogb’aye
Ti ko le yi pada
On yo si segun fun wa

englishTitle: THIS WORLD IS NOT MY HOME
yorubaTitle: Aye Yi Ki Se Ile Mi

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: This world is not my home, I’m just a-passing through,My treasures are laid up somewhere beyond the blue;The angels beckon me from heaven’s open door,And I can’t feel at home in this world anymore.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: O Lord, You know I have no friend like You,If heaven’s not my home, then, Lord, what will I do?The angels beckon me from heaven’s open door,And I can’t feel at home in this world anymore.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: They’re all expecting me, and that’s one thing I know—My Savior pardoned me, and now I onward go;I know He’ll take me through though I am weak and poor,And I can’t feel at home in this world anymore.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: I have a loving Savior up in glory-land,I don’t expect to stop until I with Him stand;He’s waiting now for me in heaven’s open door,And I can’t feel at home in this world anymore.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Just up in glory-land we’ll live eternally,The saints on every hand are shouting victory,Their songs of sweetest praise drift back from heaven’s shore,And I can’t feel at home in this world anymore.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Aye ki ‘se ‘le mi, atipo ni mo je
Mo nto isura mi jo si oke Orun
Nibiti Jesu wa, at’awon t’o ti lo
Okan mi ko fe duro l’aye osi yi mo

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Oluwa nko l’ore t’o dabi Re
B’orun ko se t’emi, odo tani ngo lo?
Awon ore nduro de mi l’enu ‘bode Orun
Okan mi ko fe duro l’aye osi yi mo

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Orun nduro de mi eyi da mi loju
Mo ti pinnu fun Jesugba t’o gb’okan mi la
Bi mo tile jaye ngo wa ninu ogo
Okan mi ko fe duro lye osi yi mo

number: 847: THIS WORLD IS NOT MY HOME

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Gone from my heart the world and all its charms;Now through the blood I’m saved from all alarms;Down at the cross my heart is bending low;The precious blood of Jesus cleanses white as snow.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: I love Him, I love Him,Because He first loved me,And purchased my salvation on Calv’ry’s tree.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Once I was lost, and ’way down deep in sin;Once was a slave to passions fierce within;Once was afraid to meet an angry God;But now I’m cleansed from ev’ry stain through Jesus’ blood.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Once I was bound, but now I am set free;Once I was blind, but now the light I see;Once I was dead, but now in Christ I live,To tell the world around the peace that He doth give.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ife aye ti kuro l’okan mi
Nipa eje Re mo bo lowo ewu
Okan mi si nfa si b’agbelebu
Eje iyebiye jesu we mi mo

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Mo feran Jesu mi
Tor’On lo ko fe mi
O si ra ‘gbala fun mi ni Kalfari

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Leekan mo ti nu sinu ‘gbi ese
Leekan mo ti je eru ifoya
Leekan nko le gbekele Olorun
Sugbon a w’ese mi n’nu eje Jesu

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
A ti de mi sugbon a ti mi sile
Mo ti f’oju nisiyi mo riran
Mo ti ku sugbon mo ye ninu Kristi
Lati so t’alafia Re fun araye

yorubaTitle: Wa Gege Bi O Ti Ri

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Shall I come just as I am,Come with all my guilt and sin?If I open wide my heart,Will He enter in?

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: As you are, just as you areCome to Jesus, come today;He will kindly welcome you,Take your sins away.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Shall I come vile as I am,And bend low at Jesus' feet?Shall I plead His pard'ning grace,And His love entreat?

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Shall I come with all my fear,Lest my sins have been too great?Shall I break thro' all my doubts,To sweet mercy's gate?

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Shall I come, tho' far awayFrom the loving Shepherd's fold?Will He bless me if I firmTo His promise hold?

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Iwo ti eru ese now l’orun
Wa bi o ti ri
Wa bere aye otun loni
Jo wa bi o ti ri

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Wa bi o ti ri
Jo wa bi o ti ri
K’ese sile p’Olugbala wa
Sa wa bi o ti ri

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Wa pelu arokan on ‘banuje
Wa bi o ti ri
Ko s’eni to nto Jesu wa lasan
Jo wa bi o ti ri

englishTitle: LIFE AT BEST IS VERY BRIEF

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Life at best is very brief,
Like the falling of a leaf,
Like the binding of a sheaf,
Be in time!
Fleeting days are telling fast
That the die will soon be cast,
And the fatal line be passed,
Be in time!

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Be in time! Be in time!
While the voice of Jesus calls you,
Be in time!
If in sin you longer wait,
You may find no open gate,
And your cry be just too late:
Be in time!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Fairest flowers soon decay,
Youth and beauty pass away;
O you have not long to stay,
Be in time!
While God’s Spirit bids you come,
Sinner, do not longer roam,
Lest you seal your hopeless doom,
Be in time!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Time is gliding swiftly by,
Death and judgment draweth nigh,
To the arms of Jesus fly,
Be in time!
O I pray you count the cost!
Ere the fatal line be crossed,
And your soul in hell be lost,
Be in time!

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Sinner, heed the warning voice,
Make the Lord your final choice,
Then all heaven will rejoice,
Be in time!
Come from darkness into light;
Come, let Jesus make you right;
Come, receive His life tonight,
Be in time!

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ojo aye wa kuru, b’eweko ti nre sile
O dabi iti t’a di jo mo ‘ra
Akoko nsare tete laipe ipinya yo de
S’elese at’ayanfe jo mura

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
S: Jo mura…….
Gba Jesu npe l’ohun jeje
Jo mura b’o ko ba f’ese sile
Ilekun le ti mo o
Ekun re yo si peju jo mu

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ododo t’o le wa nku, igba odo yo dopin
Mase fi ‘gbala d’ola jo mura
Gbo ohun emi toripe elese je ipe na
Oko ni lati segbe jo  mura

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Opin aye sunmo ‘le, iku idajo de tan
Jowo wa s’odo Jesu, jo mura
Ro ohun ti yo gba o to ju pinya
T’o ko ni ni ‘bugbe l’oke jo mura

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Elese gbo ‘kilo yi, b’Olorun le ja loni
Je ki awon orun yo jo mura
Ti n’okun bo si ‘mole wa ki Jesu fun o
Ese wa dero ilu orun jo mura

number: 851: LIFE AT BEST IS VERY BRIEF

englishTitle: PAUSE FOR A MOMENT OF PRAYER
yorubaTitle: Duro Ko Gba Adura Ni Akoko

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Weary and worn in the battle of life,Driven and beaten by sorrow and strife;Turn to your Saviour your burden to share;Pause at His feet for a moment of prayer.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Pause at His feet for a moment of prayer;Honor the dear blessed name that we bearPause in your hurry, worry and care,Pause at His feet for a moment of prayer.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Pray for His strength lest you fall by the wayPlead for His grace to sustain you today;Safely through evil His armor to wearPause at His feet for a moment of prayer.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Pause to partake of the sweet living breadDrink of His life at the great fountain head;Christ will restore you from sin and despair,Pause at His feet for a moment of prayer.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Are mu o ninu ogun aye
Ibanuje idamu nyi lu o
Li Olugbala lati rue se re
Wole l’ese gbadura die

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Wole l’ese re gbaduradie
B’ola f’oruko ti a fi npe wa
Nu l’ala at damu
Wole l’ese re gbadura die

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Bere f’agbara ko ma ba subu
Ore-ofe ti yio di io mu loni
Aini ibi wo ihamora
Wole l’ese re gbadura die

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Duro ki o je ‘nu ounje iye
Mu lati orison omi iye
Kristi yo gba o lowo ese at’eru
Wole l’ese re gbadura die

number: 852: PAUSE FOR A MOMENT OF PRAYER

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: God calling yet! shall I not hear?Earth’s pleasures shall I still hold dear?Shall life’s swift passing years all fly,And still my soul in slumber lie?

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: God calling yet! shall I not rise?Can I His loving voice despise,And basely His kind care repay?He calls me still; can I delay?

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: God calling yet! and shall He knock,And I my heart the closer lock?He still is waiting to receive,And shall I dare His Spirit grieve?

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: God calling yet! and shall I giveNo heed, but still in bondage live?I wait, but He does not forsake;He calls me still; my heart, awake!

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics: God calling yet! I cannot stay;My heart I yield without delay;Vain world, farewell, from thee I part;The voice of God hath reached my heart.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Jesu npe wa kuro ninu
Adun aye ti ko duro
Aye nsure, o nkoja lo
Okun wa si sun lo sibe

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
S: Jesu npe gb’ohun re/2x
A: Jesu npe l’oni gb’ohun re/2x
Others: Jesu npe loni/2x
All: O npe o sibe
ATB: Gb’ohun Re b’o ti npe o
T: Jesu npe gbohun Re/2x
A: Jesu npe l’oni gb’ohun Re
Others:Jesu npe l’oni
A: Jesu npe l’oni feti si ohun Re

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Jesu npe o mase duro
Mase ko ohun ife re
Ma si saika oro Re si
Sugbon dide mase lora

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Jesu nkan ‘lekan okan re
‘Wo ki yo le je k’O wole
O nduro O si fe gba O
‘Wo yo ha je k’O binu lo

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Bowed beneath your burden, is there none to share?Weary with the journey, is there none to care?Courage, wayworn traveler, heed your Lord’s commands,There’s a thought to cheer you, Jesus understands.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Yes, He understands, all His ways are best.Hear, He calls to you, Come to Me and rest.Leave the unknown future in the Master’s hand,Whether sad or joyful, Jesus understands.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Every heavy burden, He will gladly share,Are you sad and weary? Jesus has a care;Well He knows the pathway o’er life’s burning sands,Courage, fainting pilgrim, Jesus understands.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Though temptation meet you, Jesus can sustain,Life has vexing problems which He can explain;Serve Him where He sends you, though in distant lands,Do not doubt or question, Jesus understands.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Weary heart, He calls you, Come to Me and rest,Does the path grow rugged? yet His way is best;Leave the unknown future in the Master’s hands,Whether sad or joyful, Jesus understands.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
O nwa eni t’o le ba o gb’eru re
O ha su o lati tesiwaju
Ma rewesi ara, Jesu wa fun o
Gbogbo re ni jesu ti mo

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
O mo gbogbo re, sa tesiwaju
Jesu yio si fun o n’isegun
F’ojo ola re le Oluwa lowo
Ipokipo t’o wa o mo gbogbo re

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Gbogbo eru wuwo ni yi mu fuye
Jesu yo so gbogbo ‘banuje d’ayo
O mo pe irin ajo na ko rorun
Mase pada l’ona o mo gbogbo re

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Bi ‘danwo tile de, Jesu wa fun o
Oun na sa ti la gbogbo re koja ri
Jolooto s’Oluwa b’o ku ‘wo nikan
Mase se Oluwa, o mo gbogbo re

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Jesu yo f’okan are re ni sinmi
B’okunkun tile su, ma so ‘reti nu
F’ojo ola re le Oluwa lowo
Ipokipo t’o wa, o mo gbogbo re

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: There is no friend like Jesus, in weakness,No one who lifts such burdens of care;No one like Him to strengthen and guide me,No one like Him to hearken to prayer.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: There is no friend like Jesus my Saviour,No one like Him to help and defend,No one like Him, my blessed Redeemer,No one like Him, my Wonderful Friend.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: There is no friend like Him in temptation,Fully He knows the depth of its power,Met it for me and triumphed forever,Just to become my strength and my tower.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: There is no friend like Jesus, in sorrow;No one like Him hath sorrowed and sighed;No one so comforts me like a mother,No one whose heart is open so wide.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: There is no friend such hope hath imparted;No one but Jesus bringeth such calm;No one who comes to earth’s broken hearted,Ever bestows such healing and balm

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ore bi Jesu ko si l’aye yi
Jesu nikan l’ore otito
Ore aye yi le ko wa sile
Sugbon Jesu ko je gbagbe mi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
A.. ko je gbagbe mi/2x
A! sugbon jesu ko je gbagbe mi

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Duro d’Oluwa ma s’iyemeji
Ohunkohun t’o wu ko le de
Gbat’o ro p’o pin, ‘ranwo yo de
Eni ‘yanu l’Oba Oluwa

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ojo mbo t’a o dan gbogbo nyin wo
Eyin enia mimo aye
Ina l’a o fi dan gbogbo nyin wo
T’eni to ba jona, padanu

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Akoko nkoja l’aif’ota pe
A tun f’ojo kan sunmo ‘le wa
Onidajo mbo gongo yo so
Awon kan ko si l’ojo na

items.title: Ese 5
items.lyrics:
Ogo fun Baba ogo fun Omo
Ogo fun Emi-mimo
A o fi ogo fun Metalokan
O daju pe ko je gbagbe mi

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: We would see Jesus, for the shadows lengthenAcross this little landscape of our life;We would see Jesus, our weak faith to strengthenFor the last weariness, the final strife.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: We would see Jesus, the great rock foundationWhereon our feet were set with sov’reign grace;Nor life nor death, with all their agitation,Can thence remove us, if we see His face.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: We would see Jesus; other lights are paling,Which for long years we have rejoiced to see;The blessings of our pilgrimage are failing;We would not mourn them, for we go to Thee.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: We would see Jesus: this is all we’re needing;Strength, joy, and willingness come with the sight;We would see Jesus, dying, risen, pleading;Then welcome day, and farewell mortal night.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
A fe ri Jesu fun eto aye wa
Fun ojo aye wa ti o kuru
A fe ri Jesu ki gbogbo wa o le gba
Ki are aye wa ba le fo lo

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
A fe ri Jesu apata ayeraye
Lor’apata yi ni a fe duro
Ko si ohun  aye yi t’o le mi wa
B’a ba ti wa ni ‘repo pelu Re

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
A fe ri Jesu ni okunkun aye
Ti a ti nreti fun opo odun
Ki o ba le fun okan wa ni ‘sinmi
Awa o si segun bi ti Jesu

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
A fe ri Jesu eyi l’adura wa
Agbara ati ayo mbe fun wa
A fe ri Jesu ni yiye ni kiku
Nigbati a ba pa oju wa de

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: The name of Jesus is so sweet,I love its music to repeat;It makes my joys full and complete,The precious name of Jesus!

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: “Jesus,” oh, how sweet the name!“Jesus,” every day the same;“Jesus,” let all saints proclaimIts worthy praise forever!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: I love the name of Him whose heartKnows all my griefs and bears a part;Who bids all anxious fears depart,I love the name of Jesus!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: That name I fondly love to hear,It never fails my heart to cheer;Its music dries the falling tear,Exalt the name of Jesus!

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: No word of man can ever tellHow sweet the name I love so well;Oh, let its praises ever swell,Oh, praise the name of Jesus!

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Oruko kan mbe ti mo fe
Mo fe lati ma korin re
Iro didun ni l’eti mi
Oruko iyebiye na

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Jesu oruko didun, jesu okan na titi
Jesu yje ki gbogbo wa
Jumo gberin re kikan

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ko s’ohun ti mo le fi we
Oruko Jesu ti fun to
Gb’ogo re ga kikan kikan
Gbe oruko Jesu ga

englishTitle: BRING YOUR VESSEL NOT A FEW

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Are you looking for the fullnessof the blessing of the lordIn your heart and life today?Claim the promise of your Father,come according to His word,in the blessed old time way.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: He will fill your heart today to overflowing,As the Lord commandeth you,"Bring your vessels, not a few;"He will fill your heart today to overflowingWith the Holy Ghost and pow'r.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Bring your empty earthen vessels,clean thro' Jesus' precious blood,Come, ye needy, one and all;And in human consecrationwait before the throne of God,'Till the Holy Ghost shall fall.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Like the cruse of oil unfailingis His grace forevermore,And His love unchanging still;And according to His promisewith the Holy Ghost and pow'r,He will ev'ry vessel fill.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
O ha nfe ibukun ekun rere l’odo Oluwa
Ninu okan re l’oni gba ileri Baba gbo
Je wa geg bi re
Gege bi ti ojo igbani

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Yo fi Emi Re kun o ni ekunrere
Bi Oluwa ti pese
Mu ohun elo Re wa
Yo kun okan re loni
Ni ekunrere pel’agbara Emi-mimo

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ao fo koko ofifo re mo
Nipa eje Jesu jo wa iwo alaini
Ni ifararubo wa sibi ite Olorun
Emi mimo yo kun O

number: 859: BRING YOUR VESSEL NOT A FEW

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: My soul is so happy in Jesus,For He is so precious to me;His voice it is music to hear it,His face it is heaven to see.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: I am happy in Him,I am happy in Him;My soul with delightHe fills day and night,For I am happy in Him.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: He sought me so long ere I knew Him,When wand’ring afar from the fold;Safe home in His arms He hath bro't me,To where there are pleasures untold.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: His love and His mercy surround me,His grace like a river doth flow;His Spirit, to guide and to comfort,Is with me wherever I go.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: They say I shall some day be like Him,My cross and my burden lay down;Till then I will ever be faithful,In gathering gems for His crown.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mo ti l’ayo ninu Jesu halleluya
Oba mimo t’o f’ife ra mi pada
Titi aye l’emi o ma ko alleluya
Alleluya s’Oba mi olore

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Mo ni ‘bukun ninu Jesu halleluya
To ni egbegberun agbo l’or’oke
Ibukun ayeraye mbe l’odo Jesu
E ba mi yin Oba mi olore

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Mo ri ‘mularada gba ‘nu eje Jesu
Ina alafia Re lo nwo mi san
Alafia pipe n’nu Jesu si je t’emi
E ba mi yin Oba mi oloore

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Mo ri ‘dande pipe gba ninu Jesu
T’o t’eje Re sile fun iwenumo mi
Nipa or’ofe Re igbala je t’emi
Ogo ni fun Oba mi olore

englishTitle: NO ONE EVER CARED LIKE JESUS
yorubaTitle: KO Si Eniti o Feran Bi Jesu

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: I would love to tell youWhat I think of JesusSince I found in HimA friend so strong and trueI would tell you howHe changed my life completelyHe did somethingThat no other friend could do

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: No one ever cared for me like JesusThere's no other friend so kind as HeNo one else could take the sinAnd darkness from meO how much He cared for me

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: All my life was full of sinWhen Jesus found meAll my heart was fullOf misery and woeJesus placed His strongAnd loving arms around meAnd He led me in the wayI ought to go

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Ev'ry day He comes to meWith new assuranceMore and more I understandHis words of loveBut I'll never knowJust why He came to save meTill someday I seeHis blessed face above

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mo le so ohun ti mo nro nipa Jesu
Lati ‘gba ti mo ti yan l’ore tooto
Mo fe so bi o se yi aye mi pada
O se ohun t’ore aye ko le se

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ko s’eni to feran mi bi Jesu
Ko tun s’ore alaanu bi Re
Ko tun s’eni to le mu ese mi kiro
A! o ntoju mi pupo

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Lojojo lo mu k’oro Re da mi l’oju
Lojojo lo mu ki ‘fe Re ye m si
Nko mo idi re t’o fi gba okan mi la
Tit’ojo na tin go ri ninu ogo

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
O bikita, beni mo mo
Po ns’aniyan l’ori mi
Ni ojo ‘banuje ati ‘gba ‘soro
Mo mo pe o ntoju mi

number: 861: NO ONE EVER CARED LIKE JESUS

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Life is like a mountain railway,With an engineer that’s brave;We must make the run successful,From the cradle to the grave;Watch the curves, the fills, the tunnels;Never falter, never fail;Keep your hands upon the throttle,And your eyes upon the rail.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Blessed Savior, Thou wilt guide us,Till we reach that blissful shore,Where the angels wait to join usIn Thy praise forevermore.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: You will roll up grades of trial;You will cross the bridge of strife;See that Christ is your conductorOn this lightning train of life;Always mindful of obstruction,Do your duty, never fail;Keep your hands upon the throttle,And your eyes upon the rail.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: You will often find obstructions,Look for storms and wind and rain;On a fill, or curve, or trestleThey will almost ditch your train;Put your trust alone in Jesus,Never falter, never fail;Keep your hands upon the throttle,And your eyes upon the rail.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: As you roll across the trestle,Spanning Jordan’s swelling tide,You behold the Union DepotInto which your train will glide;There you’ll meet the Sup’rintendent,God the Father, God the Son,With the hearty, joyous plaudit,“Weary Pilgrim, welcome home.”

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Aye dab’oke giga kan
To ni ‘gboya atuk’ogun
A si le se aseyori
Lati bere de opin
T’a ba pa gbogbo ikilo mo
L’aiya s’otun ya s’osi
Je k’owo re di Jesu mu
K’oju Re wa l’ara Re

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Olugbala yo ma to wa
Titi de ‘bute ofo
‘Bi t’awon angeli nreti wa
Tao ma korin ‘yin titi

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
‘Wo le ba isoro pade
Wo le la ewu koja
Ri pe Kristi wa pelu re
Yo si je ‘mole fun O
Jo yago f’ohun ikose
S’ise re l’aise ‘mele
Je k’owo re di Jesu mu
K’oju re wa l’ara Re

englishTitle: JUST A CLOSER WALK WITH THEE
yorubaTitle: Jo Je Ki Nle Ba O Rin

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: 1 I am weak but Thou art strong;Jesus, keep me from all wrong;I'll be satisfied as longAs I walk, let me walk close to Thee.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Just a closer walk with Thee,Grant it, Jesus, is my plea,Daily walking close to Thee,Let it be, dear Lord, let it be.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Thro' this world of toil and snares,If I falter, Lord, who cares?Who with me my burden shares?None but Thee, dear Lord, none but Thee.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: When my feeble life is o'er,Time for me will be no more;Guide me gently, safely o'erTo Thy kingdom shore, to Thy shore.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Emi ko ni okun,
Jesu jowo di  mi mu
Eyi nikan sa l’ebe mi
Ki nfi ‘rele ba O rin

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ki nfi ‘rele ba O rin
Eyi sa l’adura mi
Ki nba o rin l’ojojumo
Jesu gbo adura mi

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ninu aye osi yi
Bi mba kuna jowo t’o mi
Iwo lo mo ailera mi
Ko se lo mi a fi ‘wo nikan

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
L’opin irin ajo mi
Ti ‘se mi l’aipe pari
Mu mi gunle si ebute
Si ilu mimo lat’oke Orun
Option

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Nko l’agbara wo ni
Pa mi mo kuro n’n’ese
Edun okan mi ni pe
K’emi sa le sunmo O si

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Sa je kin le ba O rin
Eyi ni adura mi
Jowo je kin le sunmo O si
Gbadura mi Oluwa

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ninu aiye osi yi
Alabaro kan ko si
Ta lo le ba mi ru wahala
Bikose iwo Oluwa

englishTitle: MY TIMES ARE IN YOUR HANDS
yorubaTitle: Igba Mi Mbe Ni Owo Re

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: My times are in Your hand;my God, I wish them there!My life, my friends, my soul, I leaveentirely to Your care.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: My times are in Your handwhatever they may be,pleasing or painful, dark or bright,as You know best for me.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: My times are in Your hand;why should I doubt or fear?My Father's hand will never causeHis child a needless tear.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: My times are in Your hand:Jesus, the Crucified;those hands my cruel sins had piercedare now my guard and guide.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics: My times are in Your hand;such faith You give to methat after death, at Your right handI shall for ever be.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Igba mi mbe li owo Re
Jesu Kristi Olugbala
Gbogb’aniyan at’ero mi
Ni mo fir o s’odo Re

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Sanu fun mi, gbadura mi
Ran mi lowo
Iwo ni mo gbekele             2x

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Igba mi mbe li owo Re
Ko si ifoya fun mi mo
Baba ki yo je k’omo Re
Sun ekun ni aini ‘di

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Tani yo gbe Jakob’ dide
Ni ero omo ar’aye
Egun gbigbe tun le soji
L’agbara oga ogo

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Bi ko tile s’alabaro
Ti olutunu si jina
Olorun yo bo asiri
F’eni t’o ba gbekele

number: 866: MY TIMES ARE IN YOUR HANDS

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Long years we have yearnedFor the show­ers of bless­ing,Have ear­nest­ly prayed for abun­dance of rain;Praise God, some are sing­ingThe new song of Hea­ven,The breath of the Spir­it brings pow­er again.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Power again, pow­er again,Our hearts have been tuned to the sweet re­frain,The breath of the Spir­it brings pow­er again.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: The life has been fruit­less,The heart dry and thirs­ty,The task of the Mas­ter seemed giv­en in vain;But now ev’ry day is a day of rich bless­ing,The breath of the Spir­it brings pow­er again.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: No tithes have been broughtTo the store­house of Hea­ven,Our pow­ers for ser­vice long dor­mant have lain;But now ev’ry im­pulse is used in God’s glo­ry,The breath of the Spir­it brings pow­er again.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: No souls have been wonFor the king­dom of glo­ry,But pow­er for ser­vice we now may ob­tain;Then glad­ly as reap­ers we enter the har­vest,The breath of the Spir­it brings pow­er again.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Agbara Emi-mimo Olorun
Agbara t’o ji Jesu ninu oku
Ji ko si mu okan wa soji
Ki a le ma yin oruko Jesu

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Emi mimo s’okan wo ji
Ina orun yo tun wa se
Olutunu tu wa ninu
Emi Mimo jare wa

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Agbara Emi-mimo Olorun
Je ki ife re ba le wa
Ina orun jowo mu wa soji
We wa mo, jo ese runn ninu wa

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Olutunu jowo wa sarin wa
Wa jo ese run n’nu okan gbogbo
Fun wa ni ore ofe re l’oni
Fun wa ni Sioni at’ayo pipe

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Unbounded grace it reached to meWhen hope was gone from viewIn my despair Christ came to meAs He alone could do

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Grace was for me the only wayMy guilt could find reliefMy destiny was changed that dayI reached out in belief

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: God’s grace does not on me dependIt’s God who is my StayHis love is offered without endHe walks with me each day

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: The universe with joy will ringWhen grace has won the dayAs all creation joins to singPraise God who paid man’s way

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ore-ofe gba okan mi
Gbati reti mi pin n’nu ‘banuje
Krist’gba okan mi
O gba okan mi n’nu ese

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ore-ofe b’o ti dun to
To gba emi abosi mo ti sonu
O wa mi ri
O si si mi l’oju

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ore-ofe nikan l’ole fun-un
Okan ese mi simi
Aye mi yipada nigba
Ti mo fi gbagbe wa

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ore-ofe le gba o loni
Okan tie se npa bi ‘wo
Ba lefi gbagbo ro mo
Jesu Olugbala Re
Ore –ofe sa
Ni ‘gbekele mi
Jesu ki fun ar’aye
O ku fun mi pelu

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Jesus wants me for a sun­beam,To shine for Him each day;In ev­ery way try to please Him,At home, at school, at play.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: A sun­beam, a sun­beam,Jesus wants me for a sun­beam;A sun­beam, a sun­beam,I’ll be a sun­beam for Him.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Jesus wants me to be lov­ing,And kind to all I see;Showing how plea­sant and hap­pyHis lit­tle one can be.
I will ask Je­sus to help meTo keep my heart from sin,Ever re­flect­ing His good­ness,And al­ways shine for Him.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: I’ll be a sun­beam for Je­sus;I can if I but try;Serving Him mo­ment by mo­ment,Then live with Him on high.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Jesu fe k’emi je ‘mole
Ki nma tan lojojo
Ki nse ife Re
Nigbagbogbo n’ilu n’ise l’ode

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Imole, Imole
Jesu fe k’emi je je ‘mole
Imole, imole
L’emi o je fun Jesu

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Jesu fe ki nfi ‘fe re han
Fun gbogbo eniyan
Ki nwon le ri ayo Jesu
Ninu aye omo re

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ngo ba Jesu pe ko gba mi
K’emi ma ba di ‘se
Ki nfi ore-ofe re han
Kin ma tan lojojo

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Ngo je imole fun Jesu
Nipa iranwo re
Ngo sin Jesu lojojo
Ngo si ba gbe l’Orun

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Go, labor on: spend, and be spent,Thy joy to do the Father’s will:It is the way the Master went;Should not the servant tread it still?

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Go, labor on! ’Tis not for naughtThine earthly loss is heav’nly gain;Men heed thee, love thee, praise thee not;The Master praises: what are men?

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Go, labor on! Enough, while here,If He shall praise thee, if He deignThe willing heart to mark and cheer:No toil for Him shall be in vain.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Go, labor on! Your hands are weak,Your knees are faint, your soul cast down;Yet falter not; the prize you seekIs near—a kingdom and a crown.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics: Go, labor on while it is day:The world’s dark night is hast’ning on;Speed, speed thy work, cast sloth away;It is not thus that souls are won.

english.title: Verse 6
english.lyrics: Men die in darkness at thy side,Without a hope to cheer the tomb;Take up the torch and wave it wide—The torch that lights time’s thickest gloom.

english.title: Verse 7
english.lyrics: Toil on, faint not, keep watch and pray,Be wise the erring soul to win;Go forth into the world’s highway,Compel the wand’rer to come in.

english.title: Verse 8
english.lyrics: Toil on, and in thy toil rejoice!For toil comes rest, for exile home;Soon shalt thou hear the Bridegroom’s voice,The midnight peal, “Behold, I come!”

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ninu ogba ajara ise po fun wa
Tori kore po Olugbala s’owon
Ohun Oluwa npe onigbagbo
Jo dahun ipe na loni

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ma sise ma saare,
‘Wo yo gb’ere ise re
Fi ere nla na s’okan
Oluwa se ‘leri iye ailopin
Jowo sise titi d’opin

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
E tun aka se lati kore jo
Pelu orin ayo oun okan mimo
Ma f’akoko sofo, ki ‘le to su
Nitori ojo bu lo tan

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ninu ise yi ere pupo mbe
B’o ti le je pe, se na lera
Ayo Oluwa f’awon ayanfe
Mu ibanuje ojo kuro

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Kiyesi ile ikore l’oke
Yo je ere awon ti ku s’are
Ohun Oluwa ‘nu ife nla Re
Yo pe wa fun ‘ye ailopin

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: When your grief cannot be spokenIf you smile, it's but a tokenWhen your heart is nearly brokenSpend a little time with Jesus in prayer

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Spend a little time with Jesus in prayerHe alone can lift your heavy load of careTell him all about the things that try youEvery little need he will supply youSpend a little time with Jesus in prayer
When you're weary from life's hurryWhen you're filled with doubt and worryWhen the storm-clouds show their furySpend a little time with Jesus in prayer
When the future makes you wonderAs the road ahead you ponderAre there many problems yonder?Spend a little time with Jesus in prayer

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
To Olugbala lo n’nu adura
‘Gbati ‘sudede wa l’ona Re
Yo mu gbogbo isudede fo lo
Yo so gbogbo ‘banuje d’ayo

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
All: To Olugbala lo n’nu adura
S: To-Je-su- lo ninu adura
All: Gba t’eru wuwo wo O l’orun
S: Gba-t’e-ru-ba wo o l’orun
All: Yo ba o ru eru aniyan re
B’o ba le to lo ninu adura (n’nu adura)

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
To Olugbala lo ninu adura
Gba t’oludanwo sunmo ‘tosi
Yoo so agbara  re di otun
‘mole ‘fe Re yo m’okan re yo

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
To Olugbala lo ninu adura
Nigbati okan re poruru
Ayo ni lati gb’ohun re oe wa
Sinmi lodo mi wo alare

items.title: Ese 4

englishTitle: I’VE A HOME BEYOND THE RIVER
yorubaTitle: Mo Ni Ile Kan Loke Odo

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: I've a home beyond the riverI've a mansion bright and fairI've a home beyond the riverI will dwell with Jesus there

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Oh the blessed contemplationWhen with trouble here I sighI've a home beyond the riverThat I'll enter by and by

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Just a little more to laborTell the story watch and prayJust a few more earthly sorrowsThen to heav'n we'll fly away

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Oh how sweet t'will be to meet themAll the ransomed host aboveSweeter still to see the SaviorPraise Him for redeeming love

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Tho the world is filled with sorrowAnd the teardrops often fallThere will be but joy and gladnessSafe inside the jasper wall

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics: Tho the hills are rough and stonyAnd the valleys dark and coldI must walk the path before meIt will someday turn to gold

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
A ti ireti didun ‘gba tao no ninu wahala
Mo n’ile kan l’oke odo
T’emi yoo lo lojo kan

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Mo ni ‘le kan l’oke odo
Ile t’o dara julo
Mo ni ‘le kan l’oke odo
Ngo wa pelu Jesu mbe

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Aye yi kun fun ‘banuje
Ekun gba oju wa kan
Ayo pupo lao ni l’Orun
L’alafia nile ogo

number: 874: I’VE A HOME BEYOND THE RIVER

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Christ has need of soldiers,brave and staunch and true;In the front of battlethere’s a place for you;Ever marching onwardthrough a world of sin,For the heav’nly countryis the prize we win.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: :Onward! soldiers of the cross,Doubting never, trusting ever;Onward! soldiers of the cross,Trusting the Lord, heeding His Word,Onward to victory!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Satan would oppose us,tempt our souls to stray,But through Him who loves uswe shall win the day;Other valiant soldiersin the ages past,O’er this upward pathwayreached their home at last.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Let us then with couragepress our upward way,With our gaze on Jesus,ever watch and pray;Blazoned on our banner,Christ the Lord of all,While we shout, Hosanna,Satan’s hosts must fall

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Gbo ‘pe Kristi, O nfe oloto omo ogun
Aye mbe fun O t’o ba ni igboya
Tesiwaju si fo itegun ese
Iye ailopin ni yo je ere wa

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
SAT: Te-si-waju omo ogun
B: Tesiwaju eyin omo ogun Kristi
SAT: Te-si-waju omo ogun
All: Gbekele Krsit’ tesiwaju ‘wo yo ni isegun

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Idanwo yo fe lati mu wa sako
Sugbon l’agbara Oluwa, ao segun awon
Awon ogun t’o wa saju wa
Nwon segun, won si de Orun nikehin

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
E je k’a fi igboya tesiwaju
K’a si tejumo Jesu Balogun wa
Gb’asia Krist soke fun gbogbo aye
Si ke hosanna, ogun esu yo fo

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Thanks to God for my Redeemer,Thanks for all Thou dost provide!Thanks for times now but a mem’ry,Thanks for Jesus by my side!Thanks for pleasant, balmy springtime,Thanks for dark and stormy fall!Thanks for tears by now forgotten,Thanks for peace within my soul!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Thanks for prayers that Thou hast answered,Thanks for what Thou dost deny!Thanks for storms that I have weathered,Thanks for all Thou dost supply!Thanks for pain, and thanks for pleasure,Thanks for comfort in despair!Thanks for grace that none can measure,Thanks for love beyond compare!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Thanks for roses by the wayside,Thanks for thorns their stems contain!Thanks for home and thanks for fireside,Thanks for hope, that sweet Thanks for joy and thanks for sorrow,Thanks for heav’nly peace with Thee!Thanks for hope in the tomorrow,Thanks through all eternity!

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
A dupe Olugbala wa
Fun gbogbo ipese Re
Ope fun igba t’o koja
Fun Jesu to da wa si
A dupe fun igba ayo
Fun igba isudede
F’omije t’o ti nu kuro
F’alafia nin’okan wa

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
A dupe fun ‘dahun s’adura
At’eyi t’a nwona fun
Fun ‘danwo t’a ti la koja
Fun gbogbo ipese nla Re
Ope fun akoko ‘rora
Fun ‘tunu ‘nu ‘banuje
Fun ore-ofe lailosuwon
Fun ife t’o ta ‘fe yo

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: (Oh) God is so WonderfulI can't explain but I can sayGlory hallelujahPraise His Holy Name

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: It's wonderful because He saved meIt's wonderful that He forgave meIt's wonderful wonderfulSo very wonderful wonderful that He is mine

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: I cast on Him my ev'ry burdenLay at His feet my ev'ry careIt's wonderful wonderfulSo very wonderful wonderful that He is mine

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Iyanu l’Olorun, nko le salaye
Sugbon mo le korin alleluya
Ogo f’Oruko Re

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Iyanu ni pe O gba mi la
Iyanu ni pe O dariji mi
Ah iyanu, iyanu, o je iyanu pe
Jesu Kristi je t’emi

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Mo ko gbogbo aniyan mi le
Mo mu isoro mi wa s’odo Re
Ah! Iyanu, iyanu o je iyanu pe
Jesu Kristi feran mi

englishTitle: PRAISE YE THE LORD O SING

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: O praise ye the LORD and sing a new song,amid all His saints His praises prolong;the praise of their Maker His people shall sing,and children of Zion rejoice in their King.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: With timbrel and harp and joyful acclaim,with gladness and mirth, sing praise to His name;for God in His people His pleasure doth seek,with robes of salvation He clotheth the meek.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: In glory exult, ye saints of the LORD;with songs in the night high praises accord;go forth in His service, be strong in His mightto conquer all evil and stand for the right.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: For this is His word: His saints shall not fail,but over the earth their pow'r shall prevail;all kingdoms and nations shall yield to their sway.To God give the glory and praise Him for aye.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Yin Oluwa, e fi ogo fun Jehofa
Yin Oluwa, e fo ‘go fun oruko Re
Yin Oluwa E f’ogo fun oruko Re
E gbe oruko Re ga lai ati lailai
E gbe oruko Re ga lai ati lailai
…. Gb’oko Re ga e gbe oruko re g alai
E gbe oruko Re g alai ati lailai
….Yin Oluwa…. Yin Oluwa
… Yin Oluwa, e yin ‘fe Re, e yin oruko Re
Yin oruko Re lai, Yin oruko Re lai

number: 880: PRAISE YE THE LORD O SING

englishTitle: GUIDE ME O THOU GREAT JEHOVAH

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Guide me, O my great Redeemer,pilgrim through this barren land;I am weak, but you are mighty;hold me with your powerful hand.Bread of heaven, bread of heaven,feed me now and evermore,feed me now and evermore.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Open now the crystal fountain,where the healing waters flow.Let the fire and cloudy pillarlead me all my journey through.Strong Deliverer, strong Deliverer,ever be my strength and shield,ever be my strength and shield.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: When I tread the verge of Jordan,bid my anxious fears subside.Death of death, and hell's Destruction,land me safe on Canaan's side.Songs of praises, songs of praisesI will ever sing to you,I will ever sing to you.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ma toju mi Jehofa nla
Ero l’aye osi yi
Emi ko l’okun iwo ni
F’ow’agbara di mi mu
Ounje orun/2x ma bo mi titi lae

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Si ‘lekun isun ogo ni
Orisun im’ara le
Jeki imole Re Orun
Se amona mi jale
Olugbala/2x s’agbara at’asa mi

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
‘Gba mo ba te eba Jordan’
F’okan eru mi bale
Iwo t’o ti segun iku
Mu ni gunle Kenaan’ je
Orin iyin/2x
L’emi o fun o titi

number: 882: GUIDE ME O THOU GREAT JEHOVAH

englishTitle: THE SON HATH MADE YOU FREE
yorubaTitle: Omo Ti So Yin Di Ominira

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: I was once in Egypt’s bondage,But deliverance came to me,And I’m living now in Canaan,For the Son hath made me free.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: I am dwelling now in Canaan,Jesus’ blood avails for me;I am free from condemnation,For the Son hath made me free.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: I was once a slave to Satan,And he worked his will in me,But I’m bound by sin no longer,For the Son hath made me free.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Ere I entered into Canaan,Inbred sin remained in me;But from it I’ve found a cleansing,For the Son hath made me free.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: All my fear, all condemnation,All that stood ’twixt God and me,Praise His name! are left behind meFor the Son hath made me free.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Lekan mo ngbe n’nu ese
Sugbon mo ti d’ominira
Mo ngbe nisisiyi ni Kenaan’
Tori Jesu da mi nde

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Mo ngbe nisisiyi ni Kenaan
Eje Jesu we mi mo (o we mi)
Emi ti bo lowo ebi ese (ebi ese)
Tori Jesu da mi nde

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Eru esu ni mo je ri
Sugbon o fi ‘fe re gba mi
Ese ko ni ‘pa lori mi
Tori Jesu da mi nde

number: 883: THE SON HATH MADE YOU FREE

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
The path that I have trod,
Has brought me nearer God,
Though oft it led through sorrow's gates .
Though not the way I choose,
In my way I might lose
The joy that yet for me awaits
Not what I wish to be,
Nor where I wish to go,
For who am I that I should choose my way?
The Lord shall choose for me,
'Tis better far, I know,
So let him bid me go, or stay

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
The cross that I must bear,
If I a crown would wear,
Is not the cross that I should take;
But since on me 'tis laid,
I'll take it unafraid,
And bear it for the Master's sake.
Not what I wish to be,
Nor where I wish to go,
For who am I that I should choose my way?
The Lord shall choose for me,
'Tis better far, I know,
So let him bid me go, or stay

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Submission to the will
Of him who guides me still
Is surety of His love revealed;
My soul shall rise above
This world in which I move,
I conquer only when I yield.
Not what I wish to be,
Nor where I wish to go,
For who am I that I should choose my way?
The Lord shall choose for me,
'Tis better far, I know,
So let him bid me go, or stay

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ona ti mo ti nto mu mi sunmo Olorun
B’o tile je ninu isoro, ki s’ona ti mo yan
Tori n’nu ona mi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Kin se bi mo ti fe, tabi bi mo fe lo
Tani emi, ti yo yan ona mi
Jesu yo yan fun mi, eyi t’o dara ju
Ngo ma duro, fun ase re

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Agbelebu ti ngo fi gba l’Orun
Ki nse eyi tie mi yan
Sugbon ngo fi ayo ru agbelebu yi
Ki mba le gba ade iye

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Igboran si ase Olorun ti nto mi
Yo fi ife re han fun mi
Okan mi yo goke, si ‘lu Olorun mi
Ngo segun nipa igboran

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Saviour, blessed Saviour,
Listen while we sing;
Hearts and voices raising
Praises to our King:
All we have we offer,
All we hope to be,
Body, soul, and spirit,
All we yield to thee.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Nearer, ever nearer,
Christ we draw to thee,
Deep in adoration
Bending low the knee;
Thou for our redemption
Cam'st on earth to die;
Thou, that we might follow,
Hast gone up on high.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Great and ever greater,
Are thy mercies here;
True and everlasting
Are the glories there,
Where no pain nor sorrow,
Fear nor care, is known,
Where the angel legions
Circle round thy throne.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Higher then, and higher,
Bear the ransomed soul,
Earthly toils forgotten,
Saviour, to its goal;
Where, in joys unthought of,
Saints with angels sing,
Never weary, raising
Praises to their King.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Olurapada wa gba orin ope wa
A gb’okan wa soke, a yin oruko Re
A f’ohun gbogbo sile, gbogbo ireti wa
Ara, okan , emi li a fi fun O

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Asako jinna si O, kuro l’odo re
Kuro ninu ‘fe Re sinu okunkun
Sugbon ninu ‘fe Re, o wa okan wa ri
O si fi ‘fe fa wa sinu agbo Re

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Kristi ao sunmo O, ao sunm’odo Re
A wole niwaju re ao yin oruko Re
O wa si aye osi yi, lati ku fun wa
O goke lo s’orun o njoba l’oke

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
‘Fe Olorun si wa, o tobi jojo
Ogo re wa titi ayeraye
Nibiti ki yo si ekun at’ose
Awon angel’ korin yi ite re ka

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Speak, my Lord, speak, my Lord,Speak, and I'll be quick to answer Thee;Speak, my Lord, speak, my Lord,Speak, and I will answer, “Lord, send me.”

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: When the coal of fire touched the prophet,Making him as pure, as pure can be;When the voice of God said, “Who'll go for us?”Then he answered, “Here am I, send me.”

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Millions now in sin and shame are dying;Listen to their sad and bitter cry;Hasten, brother, hasten to the rescue;Quickly answer, “Master, here am I.”

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Soon the time for reaping will be over;Soon we'll gather for the harvest, home;May the Lord of harvest smile upon us,May we hear His blessed, “Child, well done.”

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Gbo b’Oluwa k’ore ti npe jeje
Tani yo sise fun mi loni
Tani yoo le gba ‘won ti nsegbe
Ti yo to won si ona iye

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ran mi Oluwa mi
Emi yo si yara tete lo
Ran mi Oluwa mi
Ran mi Oluwa mi, emi o lo

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Nigbati Oluwa fi ina re
So ahon Isaiah di mimo
Oluwa bere pe tani yio lo
O si wipe ran mi Oluwa

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Gbo igbe opolopo elese
Nke roar ninu ese won
Yara dide lo lati gba won
Yara lati jise fun kesu

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Laipe akoko ‘kore yo koja
Ao si ko ikore wole
Jesu jowo je ka le gb’ohun Re
Pe o seun omo odo rere

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: In the book of God so preciousWe are told of pentecost,How the blessed Lord’s disciplesTarried for the Holy Ghost.Pentecostal fire fell on them,Burning up their sin and dross,Filling them with pow’r for service,Making them a mighty host.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Pentecostal fire is falling,Praise the Lord, it fell on me,Pentecostal fire is falling,Brother, it will fall on thee.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Pentecost can be repeated,For the Lord is just the same,Yesterday, today, forever,Glory to His precious name!Saints of God can be victoriousOver sin and death and hell;Have a full and free salvation,And the blessed story tell.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: When the Church of Jesus tarries,Pentecostal fire will fall;Sin and wrong will be defeated,Sinners on the Lord will call.She will march to glorious vict’ry,Over ev’ry land and sea,Lifting high the blood-stained banner,Holiness her motto be.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
N’nu iwe momo Olorun
La so nijia pentikost’
B’awon omo ehin Oluwa
Ti nw’ona f’emi mimo
Ina pentikosti sokale
O mu aipe won kuro
Fun won lagbara fun ise
O so won d’om’ogun Re

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ogo ni fun Olorun wa
T’o ran emi Re si wa
Emi yi si tiba le mi
Yo ba le o loni yi

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Emi Re le tun sokale
Bi ti ojo Pentikost’
Olorun si wa bakanna
L’ana, l’oni, titi aye
Awon mimo le ni ‘segun
Lori iku at’ese
Ki won si  ni ‘gbala kikun
Lati le waasu Jesu

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Bi ijo Jesu ti nduro
Emi re yoo sokale
Yoo fo t’egun gbogbo ese
Elese yoo ri ‘dande
Yoo lo gbogb’ojo re laye
Pelu ayo isegun
Yoo gb’opagun Jesu s’oke
Lati je mimo titi

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Master, speak! thy servant heareth,waiting for thy gracious word,longing for thy voice that cheereth,Master, let it now be heard.I am list'ning, Lord, for thee;what hast thou to say to me?

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Speak to me by name, O Master,let me know it is to me;speak, that I may follow faster,with a step more firm and free,where the Shepherd leads the flock,in the shadow of the Rock!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Master, speak! tho' least and lowest,let me not unheard depart;Master, speak! for oh, thou knowestall the yearning of my heart,knowest all its truest need;speak! and make me blest indeed.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Master, speak! and make me ready,when thy voice is truly heard,with obedience glad and steady,still to follow ev'ry word.I am listening, Lord, for thee:Master, speak, oh speak to me!

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ma wi tori ‘ranse re ngbo
Mo nduro de oro Re
Mo fe gb’ohun iwosan Re
Je k’emi gbo Oluwa

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
S’ohun to fe wi fun mi
Mo t’eti sile Oluwa
Ma wi pe mi Oluwa mi
Ki nle mo ohun re

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ma wi ki nyara tele Oki nsunmo O girigiri
Nibiti o nto agbo Re
L’abe ibi itura

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Ma wi Oluwa ma wi ng ko ni
Lo lai gbo ‘Wo mo ero okan mi
Mo m’ohun ti mo fe Oluwa mi
Jo ba mi soro eyi l’adura mi

items.title: Ese 5
items.lyrics:
Mo setan lati se ife Re
Jo so mi d’eni ‘bukun
Ma wi je ki emi mura
Bi mo ba ti gb’ohun re
Pelu ‘gboran at’ayo
Ni ki nfi tel’oro Re

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Are you weary, are you heavyhearted?Tell it to Jesus,Tell it to Jesus;Are you grieving over joys departed?Tell it to Jesus alone.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Tell it to Jesus, tell it to Jesus,He is a friend that's well known;You've no other such a friend or brother,Tell it to Jesus alone.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Do the tears flow down your cheeks unbidden?Tell it to Jesus,Tell it to Jesus;Have you sins that to men's eyes are hidden?Tell it to Jesus alone.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Are you troubled at the thought of dying?Tell it to Jesus,Tell it to Jesus;For Christ's coming kingdom are you sighing?Tell it to Jesus alone.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Aare mu o, okan re poruru
So won fun Jesu/2x
Ibanuje dipo ayo fun o
So won fun Jesu nikan

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
So won fun Jesu/2x
Oun l’ore ti o mo
Ko tun s’ore tabi ‘ye kan bi Re
So fun Jesu nikan

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Asun dekun omije lo nsun bi
So fun Jesu/2x
Iwo l’ese ti enikan ko mo
So fun Jesu nikan

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Iwo nfoya ‘banuje ti mbo bi
So fun Jesu/2x
Iwo nsaniyan ojo ola bi
So fun Jesu nikan

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
‘Ronu iku mu o damu bi
So won fun Jesu/2x
Iso ns’aniyan ojo ola bi
So fun Jesu nikan

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
See him lying on a bed of straw:
a draughty stable with an open door;
Mary cradling the babe she bore
the prince of glory is his name.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
O now carry me to Bethlehem
to see the Lord of love again:
just as poor as was the stable then,
the prince of glory when he came.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Star of silver, sweep across the skies,
show where Jesus in the manger lies;
shepherds, swiftly from your stupor rise
to see the saviour of the world!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Angels, sing again the song you sang,
sing the glory of God's gracious plan;
Sing that Bethl'em's little baby can
be the saviour of us all.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Mine are riches, from your poverty,
from your innocence, eternity;
mine, forgiveness by your death for me,
child of sorrow for my joy.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Wo Jesu lori ibusun Re
N’ibuje eran t’a si ‘lekun re
Maria gbe omo na lowo
Oba ibukun l’oko Re

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Jowo gbe mi lo si Bethlehem
Lati lo ri Olugbala
‘Buje eran ti ko ni lari
Nibe la bi Oba ogo

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Rawo didan tan loju orun
Fi ‘bi ta bi Jesu si han fun wa
Awon olus’aguntan dide
Lati r’Olugbala aye

englishTitle: I LOVE TO WALK WITH JESUS
yorubaTitle: Mo Fe Lati Rin Pelu Jesu

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Oh, I love to walk with JesusLike the publicans of old,When He gathered them about HimAnd the blessed tidings told;How He came to bring deliv'ranceTo the captives in distress,Take away our ev’ry burden,Giving perfect peace and rest

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: I will follow where He leadeth,I will pasture where He feedeth,I will follow all the way, Lord,I will follow Jesus ev’ry day.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Oh, I love to walk with JesusLike the man of long ago,Who had tarried by the waysideNear the gates of Jericho;Jesus heard his cry for mercy,Gave him back his sight that day,And immediately he followedJesus all along the way.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Oh, I love to walk with JesusAll the way to Calv’ry’s brow,Gaze upon that scene of suff'ring,While my tears of sorrow flow;There He tells me how He loves me,Takes my ev’ry sin away,So I follow Him so gladly,Lead me anywhere He may.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: Oh, sometime I’ll walk with JesusIn the land of endless day,When our journey here is overAnd we’ve reached our home to stay;Then I’ll walk with Him foreverSing His praises o’er and o’er,Laugh and shout, and ever tell HimThat I love Him more and more.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Okan mi fe ba Jesu rin bi t’ara igba nwon
Gba t’o ko won mora t’O so ihinrere fun won
O ti wa lati fi ‘dande fun awon ti a ti de
Lati fi Alafia dipo gbogbo ibanuje

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
‘Bi ti O to mi ni ngo lo
Ninu igbi re ni o je
Ngo tele o l’ona gbogbo
Ngo tele Jesu l’ona gbogbo

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
L'ojo kan ngo rin pelu Jesu, N’ile ti ‘le ki isu
Gba t’ajo mi l’aye ba pin,Ti ‘le mi Orun mo de
Nigbana ngo rin pelu Re, titi mo ma korin
Ngo ma yo ngo si mo wipe, Oluwa mo fe O si

number: 892: I LOVE TO WALK WITH JESUS

yorubaTitle: Awon Aguntan Mi Gbo Ohun Mi

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: My sheep hear My voice, and the path that I take,They follow wherever I go;My sheep know My voice and come at my call,But a stranger’s voice do they not know.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: My sheep know My voice, and day by day They abide in the fold and go not astray,They love Me because I have made them my choice,And they follow My call for My sheep know My voice.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: My sheep know My voice, and the pastures of green,Where I lead them so often to feed;My sheep know My voice and the cool sparkling streamWhere beside its still waters I lead.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: My sheep know My voice, and the valley of deathThrough which I shall lead them some day;But no danger nor harm can touch one of them,For I will be with them alway.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Awon aguntan mi gbo ohun mi
Won tele mi nigbagbogbo
Won wa lodo mi won nf’eti si mi
Won ko to alejo lehin

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Won mo ohun mi ni ojojumo
ATB: Won mo ohun mi lojojumo/2x
S: Won wa ninu agbo
ATB: Won wa ninu agbo won ko je sako/2x
S; Won ko je sako
ATB: Won fe mi toripe mo ti fe won/2x
S: won fe mi toripe emi ti fe won
ATB: Won wa lodo mi won nf’eti si mi
S: Won wa lodo mi won nf’eti si mi
All: Won nse ife mi

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Awon aguntan mi gbo ohun mi
Won ri papa oko tutu
Won lo si odo didake roro
Mo sit e okan mi l’orun

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Awon aguntan mi gbao ohun mi
Bi won wa l’ojiji iku
Won wa lai l’ewu
Okan won bale

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: O my brother, do you know the Savior,Who is wondrous, kind, and true?He’s the Rock of your salvation!There’s honey in the Rock for you.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: :Oh, there’s honey in the Rock, my brother;There’s honey in the Rock for you.Leave your sins for the Blood to cover;There’s honey in the Rock for you.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Have you tasted that the Lord is gracious?Do you walk in the way that’s new?Have you drunk from the living fountain?There’s honey in the Rock for you.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Do you pray unto God the Father,“What wilt Thou have me to do?”Never fear, He will surely answer,There’s honey in the Rock for you.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics: Then go out through the streets and byways,Preach the Word to the many or few;Say to every fallen brother,There’s honey in the Rock for you.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Arakunrin ‘wo ha mo Oluwa
Ti nfun ni ni ore-ofe
Oun ni apata igbala
Yo f’oyin fun o ‘nu apata

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Oyin mbe fun o ninu apata
Oyin wa ninu apata
Je k’eje Jesu we ese pe
Yo f’oyin fun O ‘nu apata

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
To Jesu wa ‘wo yo r’ore-ofe
‘Wo ha nrin lona tooro na
‘Wo ha ti to orisun na
‘Wo yo f’oyin fun o ninu apata

englishTitle: LET US HEAR YOU TELL IT OVER
yorubaTitle: Je Ki A Gbo Ohun Re, So Itan Naa

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: O brother, have you told how the Lord forgave?Let us hear you tell it over once again;Thy coming to the cross, where he died to save,Let us hear you tell it over once again.Are you walking now in his blessed light?Are you cleansed from ev’ry guilty stain?Is he your joy by day and your song by night?Let us hear you tell it over once again.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Let us hear, you tell to over tell it over once again.Tell the sweet and blessed story,It will help you on to glory,Let us hear you tell it over once again.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: When toiling up the way, was the Saviour there?Let us hear you tell it over once again;Did Jesus bear you up in His tender care?Let us hear you tell it over once again.Never have you found such a friend as he,Who can help you ‘midst the toil and pain;O all the world should hear what he’s done for thee;Let us hear you tell it over once again.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Was ever on your tongue such a blessed theme?Let us hear you tell it over once again;‘Tis ever sweeter far than the sweetest dream,Let us hear you tell it over once again.There are aching hearts in the world’s great throng,Who have sought for rest, and all in vain;Hold Jesus up to them by your word and song;Let us hear you tell it over once again.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: The battles you have fought, and the vict’ries won,Let us hear you tell it over once again;‘Twill help them on the way who have just begun,Let us hear you tell it over once again.We are striving now with the hosts of sin,Soon with Christ our Savior we shall reign;Ye ransomed of the Lord, try a soul to win;Let us hear you tell it over once again.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Arakunrin o ti gbo pe Jesu ngbala
Jek’a gbo ki o tan ihin na kale
B’o ti ku l’ori igi lati gba ola
Jeka gbo ki o tan ihin na kale
O ha nrin ninu imole Jesu
Ati we  gbogbo eri re nu bi
Oun l’ayo ati orin re gba gbogbo
Jek’a gbo ki o tan ihin na kale

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
SA: Je ki a gbo ko tan ihin na
TB: Je k’a gbo ki itan ihin na kale
SA: Ki o ma …. So ‘gba gbogbgo
TB: Je k’a gbo ki o tan ihin na kale
All:So itan Jesu ti o ni ‘bukun ti yo to o de ‘le ogo
Je ka gbo ki o tan ihin na kale

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Isoro ati isegun t’o ti ni
Je ka gbo ki o tan ihin na kale
Yo ran opo lowo l’ona aye won
Je ka gbo ki o tan ihin na kale
Awa mba esu jagun nisinyi
Nigbose ao ba Jesu joba
Eyin ayanfe e so ti ‘fe Jesu
Je ka gbo ki o tan ihin na kale

number: 895: LET US HEAR YOU TELL IT OVER

yorubaTitle: Di Owo Mi Mu Oluwa Mi Owon

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Precious Lord, take my hand,Lead me on, let me stand,I am tired, I am weak, I am worn;Through the storm, through the night,Lead me on to the light:

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: Take my hand, pre­cious Lord,Lead me home.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: When my way grows drear,Precious Lord, lin­ger near,When my life is al­most gone,Hear my cry, hear my call,Hold my hand lest I fall:

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: When the dark­ness ap­pearsAnd the night draws near,And the day is past and gone,At the ri­ver I stand,Guide my feet, hold my hand:

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Gba ‘na mi bas u jo samona mi
Gb’aye mi ba fe dopin gbo adura mi
Di mi mu ki ma ba subi samona mi
Lo si ‘le Orun

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Olorun di mi mu se oluto mi
Are ti mu okan mi
‘Nu igbi at’okun aye yi
To mi lo si ile orun

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Gbati ‘le ba su t’okunkun dide
T’ojo mi ba fe d’opin gba mo ba duro
Leti odo ni samona mi
Lo si ‘le orun

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Breathe on me, Breath of God,fill me with life anew,that I may love the way you love,and do what you would do.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Breathe on me, Breath of God,until my heart is pure,until my will is one with yours,to do and to endure.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Breathe on me, Breath of God,so shall I never die,but live with you the perfect lifefor all eternity.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Emi mimo mi si mi
Ti to okan mi yo mo
Je ki Emi Re k’okan mi
Mu okunkun mi kuro

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Emi mimo mi si mi
Emi mimo gbe ‘nu mi
W’okan mi mo wag be ‘nu mi
Emi mimo mi si mi

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Emi mimo mi si mi
Fo apata okan mi
Ko mi ni oro mimo Re
Olorun t’o fe kin se

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Emi mimo mi si mi
F’agbara Re kun mi
Da ‘na ife Re s’okan mi
Ki ‘fe Re gb’okan mi kan

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Emi mimo mi si mi
Se mi ni tiRe nikan
Titi ise re yo kun ‘nu mi
T’ngo je tiRe nikan

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: On life’s pathway I am never lonely,My Lord is with me, my Lord divine;Ever present guide, I trust Him only,No longer lonely, for He is mine.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: No longer lonely, no longer lonely,For Jesus is the friend of friends to me;No longer lonely, no longer lonely,For Jesus is the friend of friends to me.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: I shall not be lonely in my sorrow,He will sustain me until the end;Darkest night He turns to brightest morrow,No longer lonely! He is my friend.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: I shall not be lonely in the valleyTho’ shadows gather, I will not fear;He has promised ever to uphold me,No longer lonely! He will be near.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
N’nu irin mil’aye k’yo fi mi sile
Oluwa mi lo nba mi rin lo
Mo gbekele amona mi lojojo
K’yo fi mi sile, on je t’emi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
K’yo fi mi sile/2x
Tori Jesu je ore fun okan mi
K’yo fi mi sile/2x
Tori Jesu je ore f’okan mi

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Nko ni kan wa n’nu ‘banuje mi
Oun yo di mi mu titi d’opin
O nso okunkun d’imole ayo
K’yo fi mi sile ore mi ni

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Yio wa pelu mi l’eti ibi iku
Bi ‘ji tile nja, emi k’yo beru
K’yo fi mi sile o wa ntosi
K’yo fi mi sile, On je t’emi

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
There is something in my soul
Which keeps the shadows all away;
It is love, my Savior’s love!
Something lightens every burden,
Gives me gladness day by day,
It is love, my Savior’s love.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
O the precious love of Jesus,
How it thrills my ransomed soul!
More and more I’ll sing its praises
While the happy ages roll.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
When the tempter tries to win me
Something keeps me true and strong;
It is love, my Savior’s love!
Something makes my life a blessing
To the needy in the throng,
It is love, my Savior’s love.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
When misfortune overtakes me
Something calms my troubled breast;
It is love, my Savior’s love!
Something draws my soul to heaven,
That sweet land of peace and rest.
It is love, my Savior’s love.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Soul astray and bowed in sorrow,
Something waits for you today;
It is love, my Savior’s love!
It would give you peace and comfort,
Make your burdens roll away,
It is love, my Savior’s love.

englishTitle: WE SHALL SEE THE KING SOMEDAY

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Tho' the way we journey may be often drear,We shall see the King some day;On that blessèd morning clouds will disappear;We shall see the King some day.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: We shall see the King some day,We will shout and sing some day;Gathered ’round the throne,When He shall call His own,We shall see the King some day.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: After pain and anguish, after toil and care,We shall see the King some day;Thro' the endless ages joy and blessing share,We shall see the King some day.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: After foes are conquered, after battles won,We shall see the King some day;After strife is over, after set of sun,We shall see the King some day.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: There with all the loved ones who have gone before,We shall see the King some day;Sorrow past forever, on that peaceful shore,We shall see the King some day.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:

items.lyrics:

Ao r’Oba wa lojo kan

Ao r’Oba wa lojo kan

Ao r’Oba wa lojo kan

number: 902. WE SHALL SEE THE KING ONE DAY

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: Come, Thou Almighty King,help us Thy name to sing;help us to praise:Father, all glorious,o'er all victorious,come, and reign over us,Ancient of Days.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Come, Thou Incarnate Word,gird on Thy mighty sword,our pray'r attend:come, and Thy people bless,and give Thy Word success:Spirit of holiness,on us descend.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Come, Holy Comforter,Thy sacred witness bearin this glad hour:Thou who almighty art,now rule in every heart,and ne'er from us depart,Spirit of pow'r.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: To Thee, great One in Three,eternal praises behence, evermore.His sov'reign majestymay we in glory see,and to eternitylove and adore!

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Wa Oba lagbara, ka le korin si o
Ka si yin o Bab’ologo julo, Olus’aguntan
Wa je Oba fun wa ‘lupinlese

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Wa oro ti dara ida l’oju ona yi
Gbadura wa ‘buk’awon eyan re

Emi iwa mimo wa ba le wa

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: To Canaan’s land I’m on my way,Where the soul never dies;My darkest night will turn to day,Where the soul never dies.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: No sad farewells,No tear-dimmed eyes;Where all is love,And the soul never dies.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: A rose is blooming there for me,Where the soul never dies;And I will spend eternity,Where the soul never dies.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: A love light beams across the foam,Where the soul never dies;It shines to light the shores of home,Where the soul never dies.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: My life will end in deathless sleep,Where the soul never dies;And everlasting joys I’ll reap,Where the soul of man never dies.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics: I’m on my way to that fair land,Where the soul of man never dies;Where there will be no parting hand,Where the soul never dies.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
L’ona Kenaani ni mo wa
Nibi t’okan (eniyan) ki ku
Okunkun mi yo di ‘mole
Nibi t’okan (eniyan) ku ku

AT: Eyin ore ‘banuje ko si ki yio si ekun

Nibi t’okan (eniyan) ki ku

Nibi t’okan (eniyan) ki ku

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:

Nibi t’okan (eniyan) ki ku

Nibi t’okan (eniyan) ki ku

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics: When the storms of life are raging,Tempests wild on sea and land,I will seek a place of refugeIn the shadow of God’s hand.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics: He will hide me, He will hide me,Where no harm can e’er betide me;He will hide me, safely hide me,In the shadow of His hand.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics: Though He may send some affliction,’Twill but make me long for home;For in love and not in anger,All His chastenings will come.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics: Enemies may strive to injure,Satan all his arts employ;He will turn what seems to harm meInto everlasting joy.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics: So while here the cross I’m bearing,Meeting storms and billows wild,Jesus for my soul is caring,Naught can harm His Father’s child.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Nigba igbi lile ba nja
Nile at’oju okun
Emi o wa bi abo
Lojiji owo Olorun

items.title: Egbe

Yo pa mi mo
Yo pa mi mo
Lalailewu titi lailai
Yo pa mi mo lalafia

items.title: Ese 2

Bi irora ba tile de

items.lyrics:
