Ko si bori gbogb’aye

number: 988: GLORIOUS IS THY NAME O LORD

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
The cross upon which Jesus died
Is a shelter in which we can hide
And its grace so free is sufficient for me
And deep is its fountain as wide as the sea

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
There's room at the cross for you
There's room at the cross for you
Tho' millions have come
There's still room for one
Yes there's room at the cross for you

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Tho' millions have found Him a friend
And have turned from the sins they have sinned
The Savior still waits to open the gates
And welcome a sinner before it's too late

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
The hand of my Savior is strong
And the love of my Savior is long
Through sunshine or rain through loss or in gain
The blood flows from Calv'ry to cleanse ev'ry stain

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
‘Wo enit’a kan mo ‘gi l’ori agbelebu
Nibi t’a ra igbala fun O
O f’emi Re le ‘le fun ‘se asepari
Ise ti Baba fun lati se
Egbe
A! aye mbe nibi agbelebu
Aye mbe fun gbogbo eniyan
Aye sim be l’odo eni t’a kan mo ‘gi
Irapada f’eni t’o gbagbo

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Iwo enit’a kan mo ‘gi lor’agbelebu
Lori agbelebu lo ta ‘je Re
Loni o npe o ko wa bi iwo ba fe
Ko fie je re so di mimo

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
‘Wo enit’a kan mo ‘gi lori agbelebu
Yo nikan rin isoro na ja
B’o ti kigbe pelu ‘rora pe o pari
T’o f’emi Re le Baba l’owo

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Jesus may come today,
Glad day! Glad day!
And I would see my Friend;
Dangers and troubles would end
If Jesus should come today.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Glad day! Glad day!
Is it the crowning day?
I'll live for today, nor anxious be,
Jesus my Lord I soon shall see;
Glad day! Glad day!
Is it the crowning day?

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
I may go home today,
Glad day! Glad day!
Seemeth I hear their song;
Hail to the radiant throng!
If I should go home today.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Why should I anxious be?
Glad day! Glad day!
Lights appear on the shore,
Storms will affright nevermore,
For He is "at hand" today.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Faithful I'll be today,
Glad day! Glad day!
And I will freely tell
Why I should love Him so well,
For He is my all today.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Jesu le de l’oni, ojo ayo
Ngo si ri ore mi
‘Damu at’ewu yo pin
Bi Jesu ba de l’oni

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ojo ayo, ojo didan julo
K’okan mi mase s’aniyan mo
Jesu Oluwa fere de
Ojo ayo ojo ologo julo

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Bi Kristi pe mi loni ojo ayo
Oakn mi ngbo ‘rin na
T’awon mimo nko l’Orun
Mba le pelu won l’oni

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ngo se ma s’aniyan ojo ayo
Mo now ‘mole didan
Igbi ki yo ni ‘pa mo
Nitori Kristi fere de

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Ngo joloto loni ojo ayo
Ngo si ma kede pe
O je ohun gboggbo fun mi
Ngo fi gbogb’aye mi fun

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
I cannot tell why he, whom angels worship,
should set his love upon the sons of men,
or why, as Shepherd, he should seek the wanderers,
to bring them back, they know not how or when.
But this I know, that he was born of Mary
when Bethl'em's manger was his only home,
and that he lived at Nazareth and laboured,
and so the Saviour, Saviour of the world, is come

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
I cannot tell how silently he suffered,
as with his peace he graced this place of tears,
or how his heart upon the cross was broken,
the crown of pain to three and thirty years.
But this I know, he heals the broken-hearted
and stays our sin and calms our lurking fear
and lifts the burden from the heavy laden;
for still the Saviour, Saviour of the world is here.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
I cannot tell how he will win the nations,
how he will claim his earthly heritage,
how satisfy the needs and aspirations
of east and west, of sinner and of sage.
But this I know, all flesh shall see his glory,
and he shall reap the harvest he has sown,
and some glad day his sun will shine in splendour
when he the Saviour, Saviour of the world, is known

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
I cannot tell how all the lands shall worship,
when at his bidding every storm is stilled,
or who can say how great the jubilation
when every heart with love and joy is filled.
But this I know, the skies will thrill with rapture,
and myriad myriad human voices sing,
and earth to heav'n, and heav'n to earth, will answer,
'at last the Saviour, Saviour of the world, is King!'

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Nko le so bi enit’awon angeli nsin
Se feran awon eniyan to bee
B’Olus’aguntan se nmu awon t’o ti nu
Pada sinu agbo ninu ife nla Re
Sugbon mo  mo wipe omo Maria ni
A bi ni ‘buj’eran ni Betlehemu
Jesu Kristi t’o gbe ni Nasareti
Olugbala araye ni Jesu t’o de

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Nko le so ni Jesu Kristi se jiya
B’o ti farada iya lori igi
Pelu ojan igbagbo lor’agbelebu
O nse rere fun odun metalelogbon
O nw’okan t’o gbogbe, o nse ‘wosan arun
O ndariji o nle eru jinna
O now gbogbo okan ti eru ese npa
Jesu Olugbala araye wa nihin

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Nko le so bi Jesu se segun aye
Bi yo se jere ise owo Re
Bi O tin tan aniyan gbogbo eniyan
Ti awon elese at’olododo
Mo mo pe gbogbo oju yo ri ogo Re
Yo si ko alikama Re s’aba
L’ojo ologo kan yo joba n’ola Re
Araye yo mo Jesu Olugbala

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Nko le so b’araye to se juba Re
Gba t’O ba pase ti igbi dakeroro
Ta lo le mo bi ayo yi o ti po to
Ti okan gbogbo eniyan kun fun ayo
Sugbon mo mo gbat’o ba gb’ayanfe s’oke
Ailoye an’ayo f’ayo gberin
Aye at’orun yo dahun nikehin pe
Jesu Olugbala araye li Oba

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
My God my Father, while I stray
Far from my home, on life’s rough way,
O teach me from my heart to say,
“Thy will be done!”

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Tho' dark my path, and sad my lot,
Let me be still and murmur not,
Or breathe the prayer divinely taught,
“Thy will be done!”

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Let but my fainting heart be blest
With Thy sweet Spirit for its Guest,
My God, to Thee I leave the rest;
“Thy will be done!”

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Renew my will from day to day;
Blend it with Thine, and take away
All that now makes it hard to say,
“Thy will be done!” AMEN.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Baba mi gba mba nsako lo
Kuro l’ona re l’aye yi
Ko mi kin le wi bayi pe
Se ‘fe tiRe

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
S: Se ‘fe tiRe ‘nu mi, eyi l’adura mi
A: Mu ife tiRe se nu mi, eyi sa ni adura mi
All: Mo fi gbogbo okan mi fun O
Se ‘fe TiRe ‘nu mi

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Bi ‘pin mi l’aye ba buru
Ko mi ki ngba ka nmase kun
Ki ngbadura to ko mi wipe
Se ‘fe tiRe

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Tun ‘fe mi se lojojumo
Ko si mu ohun na kuro
Ti ko je k’emi le wipe
Se ‘fe tiRe

items.title: Ese 5
items.lyrics:
Nje gbat’emi mi ba pin l’aye
Ni ‘lu t’o dara ju aye
L’emi o ma korin titi
Se ‘fe tiRe

englishTitle: I AM ON THE BATTLEFIELD FOR MY LORD
yorubaTitle: Mo Wa Loju ija Fun Oluwa Mi

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
I am on the battlefield for my Lord,
I'm on the battlefield for my Lord;
And I promised Him that I would serve Him till I die.
I am on the battlefield for my Lord.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
I was alone and idle,
I was a sinner too,
I heard a voice from heaven
Say there is work to do,
I took the Master's hand,
And I joined the Christian band,
I'm on the battlefield for my Lord.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
I left my friends and kindred
Bound for the Promised Land,
The grace of God upon me,
The Bible in my hand,
In distant lands I trod,
Crying, sinner, come to God,
I'm on the battlefield for my Lord.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Now when I met my Savior,
I met Him with a smile,
He healed my wounded spirit,
And owned me as His child,
Around the throne of grace,
He appoints my soul a place,
I'm on the battlefield for my Lord

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mo je alairikan se
Mo je elese pelu
Mo gb’ohun kan lat’Orun
Pei se wa lati se
Mo d’egbe om’ogun
Lati ma sin Jesu
Mo wa l’oju ogun fun Oba mi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Mo wa l’oju ogun fun Oba mi/2x
Mo si ti se ‘leri pe
Ngo sin d’oju iku
Mo wa l’oju ogun fun Oba mi

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Mo f’ara, ore sile
Mo nlo si ‘le ‘leri
Or’ofe Re pelu mi
Bibeli wa l’owo mi
L’ona jinjin, mo nke pe
Elese wa Olorun
Mo wa l’oju ogun fun Oba mi

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Lehin aye osi yi
Mo pad’Olugbala mi
O wo ogbe okan mi san
O gba mi s’odo Re
Niwaju ‘te ogo
O pese aye fun mi
Mo wa l’oju ogun fun Oba mi

number: 995: I AM ON THE BATTLEFIELD FOR MY LORD

englishTitle: WHEN THE SAINTS GO MARCHING IN

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
I am just a lonesome trav’ler,
Through this big, wide world of sin;
Want to join that grand procession,
When the saints go marching in.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Oh, when the saints go marching in,
Oh, when the saints go marching in;
Lord, I want to be in that number,
When the saints go marching in.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
All my folks have gone before me,
All my friends and all my kin;
But I’ll meet with them up yonder,
When the saints go marching in.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Come and join me in my journey,
’Cause it’s time that we begin;
And we’ll be there for that judgment,
When the saints go marching in.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mo ni arakunrin kan
T’o ti rekoja lo
Mo ti pinnu pea o pade
Gba ‘won mimo nlo s’Orun

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Gb’awon mimo ba nwole
Gb’awon mimo nlo s’Orun
Jesu jo ka mi mo won
Gb’awon mimo nlo s’Orun

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Mo ni baba rere kan
T’o ti lo saju
O daju pe ao tun pade
L’ebute ologo ni

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Mo ni Olugbala kan
O gba mi lowo ese
Mo ti pinnu pe ao pade
Gb’awon mimo nlo s’Orun

number: 997: WHEN THE SAINTS GO MARCHING IN

englishTitle: I WANT TO LOVE HIM MORE

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
With Jesus I would ever be,
His matchless name adore;
He’s done so very much for me,
I want to love Him more.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
I want to love Him more,
I want to love Him more,
I want to love Him more,
I do, I do, I do;
I want to love Him more,
I want to love Him more,
He’s done so much for me.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
He died upon the cruel tree,
Our load of guilt He bore;
He suffered shame for you and me,
I want to love Him more.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
His children He will not forsake,
When troubles press them sore;
But in their souls sweet peace awakes,
I want to love Him more.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
O Prince of life, sweet Prince of peace,
Who dwelt on earth below.
My faith in Him will never cease,
I want to love Him more.

Ngo o je ti Jesu titi lae

Ngo ma feran re si

items.lyrics:

O ru itiju gbogbo wa
Ngo ma feran Re si

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ko je gbagbe awon omo Re
Ni igba idanwo
Sugbon yo f’ayo kun okan won
Ngo ma feran re si

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Omo alade Alafia
Oba gbogbo aye
Ngo gba O gbo titi aye
Ngo ma feran Re si

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Jesus is tenderly calling thee home-
Calling today, calling today;
Why from the sunshine of love wilt thou roam
Farther and farther away?

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
:
Calling today,
Calling today,
Jesus is calling,
Is tenderly calling today.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Jesus is calling the weary to rest-
Calling today, calling today;
Bring Him thy burden and thou shalt be blest-
He will not turn thee away.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Jesus is waiting; O come to Him now-
Waiting today, waiting today;
Come with thy sins, at His feet lowly bow-
Come, and no longer delay.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Jesus is pleading; O list to His voice-
Hear Him today, hear Him today;
They who believe on His name shall rejoice-
Quickly arise and away.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Jesu nf’ohun jeje pe o wa ‘le
O npe loni, o npe l’oni
Eese t’o fi ko ife Re sile
T’o sako jina rere

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
O npe l’oni/2x
(O npe, O npe loni, loni)/2x
S: Jesu npe jeje, o npe jeje gbo ipe Re
(Jesu npe jeje, gbo o npe jeje gbo ipe Re)

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Jesu npe alare fun isinmi
O npe loni o npe l’oni
Gb’eru re to wa yi o bukun
Ki yio le o pada

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Wa nisiyi Jesu nduro de O
Nduro l’oni, nduro l’oni
Fi irele gb’ese re s’abe ‘se Re
Wa mase duro pe mo

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Holy, holy, holy! Lord God Almighty!
Early in the morning our song shall rise to Thee;
Holy, holy, holy! merciful and mighty!
God in three Persons, blessed Trinity!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Holy, holy, holy! all the saints adore Thee,
casting down their golden crowns around the glassy sea;
cherubim and seraphim, falling down before Thee,
which wert and art and evermore shalt be.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Holy, holy, holy! though the darkness hide Thee,
though the eye of sinful man Thy glory may not see;
only Thou art holy, there is none beside Thee,
perfect in pow'r, in love, and purity.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Holy, holy, holy! Lord God Almighty!
All Thy works shall praise Thy name, in earth and sky and sea;
Holy, holy, holy! merciful and mighty!
God in three Persons, blessed Trinity!

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mimo, Mimo Mimo Olodumare
Ni kutukutu ni wo o gbo orin wa
Mimo, mimo, mimo oniyonu julo
Ologo meta, lai Olubukun

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Mimo, Mimo, Mimo awon t’Orun nyin
Nwon nfi ade wura won le ‘le yi ‘te ka
Kerubim, Serafim nwole niwaju Re
‘Wo to ti wa to si wa titi lai

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Mimo, Mimo, Mimo, b’okunkun pa o mo
Bi oku elese ko le ri ogo re
Iwo nikan lo mo, ko tun si elomi
Pipe ‘nu agbara ati ni ‘fe

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Mimo, Mimo, Mimo, Olodumare
Gbogbo ise Re ni ‘le l’oke lo nyin O
Mimo, Mimo, Mimo, oniyonu julo
Ologo meta, lai Olubukun

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Our father and our God
Accept our songs of praise
On earth and heaven above
The God who reigns in love
To thee is due all praise and thanks
And majesty forever more

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Eternal son of God
Who shed His blood for us
Who rose up from the dead
And up to heaven ascend
To thee is due all praise and thanks
And majesty for ever more

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
To thee the Holy Ghost
We raise our songs of praise
Thou who hast shed the light
Of life into our hearts
To thee is due all praise and thanks
And majesty for ever more

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Our Holy Triune God
We praise thee three in one
On earth and even above
We raise our songs of praise
To thee is due all praise and thanks
And majesty for ever more

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Baba Eleda wa, gbo orin iyin wa
L’aye ati l’Orun, baba olubukun
Iwo l’ogo ati iyin, ope ati ola ye fun

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
‘Wo Olorun Omo, t’O ku lati gba wa
Enit’o ji dide ti o si g’oke lo
Iwo l’ogo ati iyin,ope ati ola ye fun

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Si O Emi mimo, ni a nkorin iyin
Iwo t’o fi ‘mole iye si okan wa
Iwo l’ogo ati iyin, ope ati ola ye fun

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Mimo, Mimo, Mimo, ni ‘yin metalokan
L’aye ati l’Orun la o ma korin pe
Iwo l’ogo ati iyin, ope ati ola ye fun

englishTitle: LET US WITH A GLADSOME MIND
yorubaTitle: E Je K’a Fi Inu Didun

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Let us, with a gladsome mind,
Praise the Lord for he is kind:
For his mercies shall endure,
Ever faithful, ever sure.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Let us sound his name abroad,
For of gods he is the God:
For his mercies shall endure,
Ever faithful, ever sure.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
He with all-commanding might
Filled the new-made world with light:
For his mercies shall endure,
Ever faithful, ever sure.

english.title: Verse 4
Verse 5
english.lyrics:
Let us then, with glad-some mind,
Praise the Lord for he is kind:
For his mercies shall endure,
Ever faithful, ever sure.

number: 1005: LET US WITH A GLADSOME MIND

englishTitle: NOW THANK WE ALL OUR GOD

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Now thank we all our God
with heart and hands and voices,
who wondrous things has done,
in whom his world rejoices;
who from our mothers' arms
has blessed us on our way
with countless gifts of love,
and still is ours today.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
O may this bounteous God
through all our life be near us,
with ever joyful hearts
and blessed peace to cheer us,
to keep us in his grace,
and guide us when perplexed,
and free us from all ills
of this world in the next.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
All praise and thanks to God
the Father now be given,
the Son and Spirit blest,
who reign in highest heaven
the one eternal God,
whom heaven and earth adore;
for thus it was, is now,
and shall be evermore.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
A f’ope f’Olorun, l’okan ati l’ohun wa
Eni s’ohun ‘yanu, ‘nu eni t’araye nyo
Gbat’a wa l’om’owo, On na lo ntoju wa
O si nf’ebun ife, se ‘toju wa sibe

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Oba onib’ore, ma fi wa sile lailai
Ayo ti ko l’opin, on ‘bukun yo je tiwa
Pa wa mo ‘nu ore, to wa ‘gba ba damu
Yo wa ninu ibi, l’aye ati l’Orun

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
K’a fi ‘yin on ope, f’Olorun Baba, Omo
Ati Emi Mimo, ti o ga julo l’Orun
Olorun kan lailai, t’aye at’Orun mbo
Bee lo wa di ‘sinyi, beni yo wa lailai

number: 1006: NOW THANK WE ALL OUR GOD

english.title: Verse 1
Chorus
english.lyrics:
O, the children of the Lord have a right to shout and sing,
For the way is growing bright, and our souls are on the wing;
We are going by and by to the palace of a King!
Glory to God, hallelujah!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
We are lost amid the rapture of redeeming love
Glory to God, hallelujah!
We are rising on its pinions to the hills above:
Glory to God, hallelujah!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
We are going to a palace that is built of gold;
Glory to God, hallelujah!
Where the King in all His splendor we shall soon behold
Glory to God, hallelujah!

english.title: Verse 4

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ko su wa lati ma ko orin ti igbani
Ogo f’Olorun alleluya
A le fi igbagbo korin na soke kikan
Ogo f’Olorun alleluya

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Omo Olorun ni eto lati ma bu s’ayo
Pe ona yi ye wa si okan wa s’aferi re
Nigbose a o de afin Oba wa ologo
Ogo f’Olorun alleluya

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Awa mbe n’ni ibu ife t’o ra wa pada
Ogo f’Olorun alleluya
Awa yo fi iye goke lo s’oke Orun
Ogo f’Olorun alleluya

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Awa nlo si afin kan ti a fi wura ko
Ogo f’Olorun alleluya
Nibiti a o ri Oba ogo n’nu ewa Re
Ogo f’Olorun alleluya

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Nibe ao korin titun t’anu to da wan de
Ogo f’Olorun alleluya
Nibe awon ayanfe yo korin ‘yin ti Krist’
Ogo f’Olorun alleluya

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Praise him, praise him! Jesus, our blessed redeemer!
Sing, O earth, his wonderful love proclaim!
Hail him, hail him! Highest archangels in glory!
Strength and honor give to his holy name!
Like a shepherd, Jesus will guard his children.
In his arms he carries them all day long.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Praise him! Praise him! tell of his excellent greatness.
Praise him! Praise him! ever in  joyful song.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Praise him, praise him! Jesus, our blessed redeemer!
For our sins, he suffered, and bled, and died.
He our rock, our hope of eternal salvation,
hail him, hail him! Jesus, the crucified.
Sound his praises, Jesus who bore our sorrows,
love unbounded, wonderful, deep, and strong.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Praise him, praise him! Jesus, our blessed redeemer!
Heav’nly portals loud with hosannas ring!
Jesus, Savior, reigneth forever and ever!
Crown him, crown him! prophet, and priest, and king!
Christ is coming, over the world victorious.
Pow’r and glory unto the Lord belong.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Fi iyin fun Jesu Olurapada wa
Ki aye k’okiki ife Re nla
Fi iyin fun eyin angeli ologo
F’ola at’ogo fun oruko Re
B’Olus’aguntan Jesu yo to omo Re
Apa Re l’o gbe won le lojojo
Eyin eniyan mimo ti ngoke Sion’
Fi iyin fun pelu orin ayo

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Fi iyin fun Jeus olurapada wa
Fun wa o t’eje Re sile o ku
On ni apata ati ‘reti ‘gbala wa
Yin Jesu ti a kan m’agbelebu
Olugbala t’o f’ara da irora nla
Ti a fi ade egun de l’ori
Eniti a pa nitori awa eda
Oba ogo njoba titi lailai

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Fi iyin fun Jesu olurapada wa
Ki ariwo iyin gba orun kan
Jesu oluwa njoba lai ati lailai
Se l’Oba gbogb’enyin alagbara
A segun iku, fi ayo rohin na ka
Isegun re ha da isa oku?
Jesu ye ko tun si wahala fun wa mo
Tori O l’agbara lati ‘gbala

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Praise the king of Glory, He is God alone,
Praise Him for the wonders He to us hath shown;
For His promised presence, All the pilgrim way,
For the flaming pillar, And the cloud by day.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Praise... Him, shining angels,
Strike ... your harps of gold,
All ... His hosts adore Him,
Who ... His face behold;
Through ... His great dominion,
While ... the ages roll,
All His works shall praise Him (3ce)
Bless the Lord, my soul!

english.title: Verse 2
Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Praise Him for the trials, Sent as chords of love,
Binding us more closely, To the things above;
For the faith that conquers, Hope, that naught can dim,
For the land where loved ones, Gather unto Him.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
E yin Oba ogo Oun ni Olorun
Yin fun ‘se ‘yanu ti o ti fi han
O wa pel’awon ero mimo l’ona
O si je imole won l’osan, l’oru

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
E… yin angel’ didan, Lu…. Duru wura
Ki gbogbo yin juba, t’e nwo oju Re
Ni gbogbo ‘joba Re, b’aye ti nyi lo
Ise Re yo ma yin/2x
Fi ibukun fun Oluwa okan mi

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
E yin fun ‘rapada ti gbogbo okan
E yin fun orisun imularada
Fun inu rere ati itoju Re
Fun ‘daniloju pe O ngbo adura

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Eyin fun idanwo bi okun ife
To nso wa po mo awon ohun OrunFun  ‘gbagbo ti nsegun, ‘reti ti ki isa
Fun ile ogo t’O ti pese fun wa

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
To God be the glory, great things He hath done,
So loved He the world that He gave us His Son,
Who yielded His life our redemption to win,
And opened the life-gate that all may go in.

english.title: Chorus
Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Oh, perfect redemption, the purchase of blood,
To every believer the promise of God;
The vilest offender who truly believes,
That moment from Jesus a pardon receives.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Great things He hath taught us, great things He hath done,
And great our rejoicing through Jesus the Son;
But purer, and higher, and greater will be
Our wonder, our transport when Jesus we see.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ogo ni f’Olorun f’ohun nla t’o se
O fe wa to bee to f’omo Re fun wa
Ti o fi aye Re s’etutu f’ese
O silekun iye fun gbogbo eda

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Yin Oluwa/2x je k’aye gb’ohun Re
Yin Oluwa/2x je ki aye ko yo
Ko s’ona si iye af’odo Jesu
Yin Jesu l’ogo fun ohun nla t’o se

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Irapada pipe l’o f’eje Re ra
T’o fi ‘leri fun gbogb’eni t’o gbagbo
Elese t’o buruju t’o ba gbagbo
Yi o ri ayo ti idariji gba

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ohun nla lo ko wa ohun nla lo se
Ayo wa kun ninu Omo Olorun
Iyanu yo ti po, ayo wa yo po
Nigbati a ba f’oju wa ri Jesu

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Joy to the world, the Lord is come!
Let earth receive her King!
Let every heart prepare Him room,
and heav'n and nature sing,
and heav'n and nature sing,
and heav'n, and heav'n and nature sing.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Joy to the earth, the Savior reigns!
Let men their songs employ,
while fields and floods, rocks, hills, and plains
repeat the sounding joy,
repeat the sounding joy,
repeat, repeat the sounding joy.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
No more let sins and sorrows grow,
nor thorns infest the ground;
He comes to make His blessings flow
far as the curse is found,
far as the curse is found,
far as, far as the curse is found.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
He rules the world with truth and grace,
and makes the nations prove
the glories of His righteousness
and wonders of His love,
and wonders of His love,
and wonders, wonders of His love.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ayo b’aye Oluwa de,
K’aye gba Oba Re
Ki gbogbgo okan mura de
K’aye korin s’oke/3x

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ayo b’aye Jesu joba,
E je k’a ho f’ayo
Gbogbo igbe, omi oke
Nwon ngberin ayo na/3x

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
K’ese on ‘yonu pin l’aye,
K’egun ye hu ni ‘le
O de lati mu ‘bukun ‘san
De ‘bi t’egun gbe de/3x

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
O f’ooto ati ‘fe joba
O je k’orile ‘de
Mo ododo ijoba Re
Ati ‘fe ‘yanu Re/3x

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
O come, all ye faithful, joyful and triumphant,
O come ye, O come ye to Bethlehem!
Come, and behold Him, born the King of angels!

english.title: Chorus
Verse 2
Verse 3
Verse 4

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Wa eyin olooto, l’ayo ati ‘segun
Wa ka lo/2x si Betlehem’
Wa ka lo wo, Oba awon angel’

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
E wa k’a lo juba Re/2x
E wa k’a lo juba Krist’ Oluwa

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Olodumare ni, imole ododo
Ko si korira inu wundia
Olorun papa ti a bi t’a ko da

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Angeli e korin, korin itoye Re
Ki gbogbo eda Orun si gberin
Ogo f’Olorun l’oke Orun l’ohun

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Nitooto a wole, f’Oba t’a bi l’Oni
Jesu Iwo li awa nfi ogo fun
Ogo fun ‘wo Omo Baba t’o gbe ara wa wo

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Abide with me: fast falls the eventide;
the darkness deepens; Lord, with me abide.
When other helpers fail and comforts flee,
Help of the helpless, O abide with me.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Swift to its close ebbs out life's little day;
earth's joys grow dim, its glories pass away.
Change and decay in all around I see.
O thou who changest not, abide with me.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
I need thy presence every passing hour.
What but thy grace can foil the tempter's power?
Who like thyself my guide and strength can be?
Through cloud and sunshine, O abide with me.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
I fear no foe with thee at hand to bless,
ills have no weight, and tears no bitterness.
Where is death's sting? Where, grave, thy victory?
I triumph still, if thou abide with me.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics:
Hold thou thy cross before my closing eyes.
Shine through the gloom and point me to the skies.
Heaven's morning breaks and earth's vain shadows flee;
in life, in death, O Lord, abide with me.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Wa ba mi gbe, ale fere le tan
Okunkun su, Oluwa ba mi gbe
Bi oluranlowo miran ba ye
Iranwo alaini wa ba mi gbe

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ojo aye mi nsare lo s’opin
Ayo aye nku, ogo re nw’omi
Ayida ati ‘baje ni mo nri
‘Wo ti ki ‘yipada, wa ba mi gbe

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ma wa l’eru b’Oba awon Oba
Sugbon ki O ma bo b’oninure
Ki o si ma kanu fun egbe mi
Wa ore elese wa ba mi gbe

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Mo nfe O ri ni wakati gbogbo
Ki lo le segun ese b’ore Re?
Ta lo le se amona mi bi Re?
‘nu banuje at’ayo ba mi gbe

items.title: Ese 5
items.lyrics:
Pelu ‘bukun Re eru ko ba mi
Ibi ko wuwo, ekun ko koro
Oro iku da, ‘segun isa da?
Ngo segun sibe bi ‘Wo ba mi gbe

english.title: Verse 1
Chorus
english.lyrics:
Cling to the Bible!
Cling to the Bible!
Cling to the Bible—
Our Lamp and our Guide!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Cling to the Bible! This jewel and treasure
Brings life eternal, and saves fallen man;
Surely its value no mortal can measure:
Seek for its blessing, O soul, while you can!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Lamp for the feet that in byways have wandered,
Guide for the youth that would otherwise fall;
Hope for the sinner whose life has been squandered,
Staff for the agèd, and best book of all.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ro mo Bibeli bi a ngba ‘kan yoku
Ma so ‘lana Re ti o s’owon nu
Ihin re nji gbogbo okan ti ntogbe
Ileri re nso oku d’alaye

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ro mo Bibeli/3X
‘Mole f’ese wa

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ro mo Bibeli, oro ‘yebiye yi
Nfi iye ainipekun f’araye
Oni ‘ye lori ju b’eda ti nro lo
Wa ibukun re nigbat’o le ri

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Fitila f’eni t’o ti sako lo
Amona fun odo ti ba subu
‘reti elese t’aye Re ti s’onu
Opa f’agba, iwe t’o da julo

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
When we walk with the Lord
in the light of his word,
what a glory he sheds on our way!
While we do his good will,
he abides with us still,
and with all who will trust and obey.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Trust and obey, for there's no other way
to be happy in Jesus, but to trust and obey.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Not a burden we bear,
not a sorrow we share,
but our toil he doth richly repay;
not a grief or a loss,
not a frown or a cross,
but is blest if we trust and obey.

english.title: Verse 3
Verse 4

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
‘Gbat’a b’Oluwa rin, ‘nu ‘mole oro Re
Ona wa yi o ti mole to
Gbat’a ba se ‘fe Re, Oun yo ma ba wa gbe
Ati awon t’o gbeke won le

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Sa gbekele, ona miran ko si
Lati l’ayo ‘nu Jesu, ju pe k’a gbekele

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ko s’ohun t’o le de, l’oke tabi n’ile
T’o le ko agbara Re l’oju
Iyemeji, eru, ibanuje ekun
Ko le duro bi a gbekele

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ko si wahala mo, tabi ibanuje,
O ti san gbogbo gbese wonyi
Ko si arokan mo, tabi ifajuro
Sugbon ‘bukun b’a ba gbekele

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
A ko le f’enu so, bi ‘fe Re ti po to
Titi ao fi f’ara wa rubo
Anu ti O nfihan, at’ayo t’oo nfun ni
Je ti awon ti o gbekele

englishTitle: SAFE IN THE ARMS OF JESUS

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Safe in the arms of Jesus,
Safe on His gentle breast,
There by His love o’ershaded,
Sweetly my soul shall rest.
Hark! ’tis the voice of angels,
Borne in a song to me,
Over the fields of glory,
Over the jasper sea.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Safe in the arms of Jesus,
Safe on His gentle breast,
There by His love o’ershaded,
Sweetly my soul shall rest.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Safe in the arms of Jesus,
Safe from corroding care,
Safe from the world’s temptations,
Sin cannot harm me there.
Free from the blight of sorrow,
Free from my doubts and fears;
Only a few more trials,
Only a few more tears.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Jesus, my heart’s dear refuge,
Jesus has died for me;
Firm on the Rock of Ages,
Ever my trust shall be.
Here let me wait with patience,
Wait till the night is o’er;
Wait till I see the morning
Break on the golden shore.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Laifoya l’apa Jesu, laifoya l’apa Re
L’abe ojiji ife Re, l’okan mi o sinmi
Gbo ohun angeli ni, orin won d’eti mi
Lati papa ogo wa, lati okun Jaspa
Laifoya l’apa Jesu, laifoya l’aya Re
L’abe ojiji ife Re, l’okan mi yo sinmi

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Laifoya l’apa  Jesu, mo bo l’owo aniyan
Mo bo lowo idanwo, ese ko ni ‘pa mo
Mo bo l’owow ‘banuje, mo bo lowo eru
O ku idanwo die, o ku omije die
Laifoya l’apa Jesu laifoya laya Re
L’abe ojiji ife Re, l’okan mi o sinmi

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Jesu abo okan mi, Jesu ti ku fun mi
Apata ayaraye l’emi o gbekele
Nihin l’emi o duro, tit’oru yo koja
Titi ngo fi ri ‘mole, ni ebute ogo
Laifoya l’apa Jesu, laifoya Re
Labe ojiji ife Re, l’abe ojiji ife Re
L’okan mi o sinmi

number: 1016: SAFE IN THE ARMS OF JESUS

englishTitle: MY FAITH LOOKS UP TO THEE

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
My faith looks up to Thee,
Thou Lamb of Calvary,
Savior divine!
Now hear me while I pray,
take all my guilt away;
O let me from this day
be wholly Thine.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
May Thy rich grace impart
strength to my fainting heart,
my zeal inspire;
as Thou hast died for me,
O may my love to Thee
pure, warm, and changeless be,
a living fire.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
While life’s dark maze I tread,
and griefs around me spread,
be Thou my Guide;
bid darkness turn to day,
wipe sorrow’s tears away,
nor let me ever stray
from Thee aside.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
When ends life's transient dream,
when death’s cold, sullen stream
shall o'er me roll,
blest Savior, then in love,
fear and distrust remove;
O bear me safe above,
a ransomed soul.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Igbagbo mi nwo o
Iwo od’aguntan, Olugbala
Jo gbo adura mi,
M’ese mi gbogbo lo
K’emi lat’oni lo
Si je tiRe

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ki ore-ofe Re
Fi ‘lera f’okan mi, mu mi tara
B’iwo ti ku fun mi
A ki ‘fe mi si O
Ko ma gbona titi
B’ina iye

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
‘Gba mo rin l’okunkun
Ninu ibanuje, samona mi
M’okunkun lo l’oni
Pa ‘banuje mi re
Ki nma sako kuro
Li odo Re

number: 1017: MY FAITH LOOKS UP TO THEE

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Through the love of God our Saviour,
all will be well.
Free and changeless is his favour,
all, all is well.
Precious is the blood that healed us,
perfect is the grace that sealed us,
strong the hand stretched forth to shield us,
all must be well.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Though we pass through tribulation,
all will be well.
Ours is such a full salvation,
all, all is well.
Happy, still in God confiding,
fruitful, if in Christ abiding,
holy, through the Spirit’s guiding,
all must be well.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
We expect a bright tomorrow,
all will be well.
Faith can sing through days of sorrow,
'All, all is well.'
On our Father’s love relying,
Jesus every need supplying,
in our living, in our dying,
all must be well.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Nipa ife Olugbala, ki yo si nkan
Ojurere Re ki npada, ki yo si nkan
Owon l’eje t’o nwo wa san
Pipe l’edidi or’ofe
Agbara l’owo t’o ngba ni
Ki yo si nkan

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Bi a wa ninu iponju, ki yo si nkan
Igbala kikun ni tiwa, ki yo si nkan
Igbekele Olorun dun
Gbigbe inu Kristi l’ere
Emi si nso wa di  mimo
Ko le si nkan

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ojo ola yi o dara, ki yo si nkan
‘Gbagbo le korin ‘nu ‘ponju, ki yo si nkan
A gbekele ‘fe Baba wa,
Jesu nfun wa l’ohun gbogbo
Titi Jesu yi o fi de
Ko le si nkan

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Lord, I care not for riches, neither silver nor gold;
I would make sure of heaven, I would enter the fold.
In the book of Thy kingdom with its pages so fair,
Tell me, Jesus, my Savior, is my name written there?

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Is my name written there
On the page white and fair?
In the book of Thy kingdom,
Is my name written there?

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Lord, my sins they are many, like the sands of the sea,
But Thy blood, O my Savior, is sufficient for me;
For Thy promise is written in bright letters that glow,
"Though your sins be as scarlet, I will make them like snow."

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
O that beautiful city with its mansions of light,
With its glorified beings in pure garments of white;
Where no evil thing cometh to despoil what is fair,
Where the angels are watching, yes, my name's written there.
Yes, my name’s written there
On the page white and fair;
In the book of Thy Kingdom,
Yes, my name’s written there!

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Oluwa n ko bere fun fadaka on wura
Ngo jijakadi f’Orun ngo si wo ‘nu agbo
‘Nu iwe ijoba Re ti o l’ewa pupo
So fun mi Oluwa mi
Ooko mi ha wa mbe?

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ooko mi ha wa mbe?
Ninu iwe nla ni?
Iwe ti ijoba Re?
Ooko mi ha wa mbe?

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Oluwa ese mi po bi iyanrn okun
Sugbon eje Re Jesu ti to fun gbogbo re
Tori wo ti se ‘leri ninu oro Re pe
B’ese re pon b’ododo,
Ngo fo won fun bi sno

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
N’ilu daradara ni at’opo  ‘bugbe re
Nibit’awon mimo wa nin’aso funfun won
T’ohun eeri ko le de lati b’ewa re je
‘Bit’awon angeli nso
Ooko mi ha wa mbe?

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
More love to Thee, O Christ,
More love to Thee!
Hear Thou the prayer I make
On bended knee;
This is my earnest plea:
More love, O Christ, to Thee,
More love to Thee,
More love to Thee!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Once earthly joy I craved,
Sought peace and rest;
Now Thee alone I seek,
Give what is best;
This all my prayer shall be:
More love, O Christ, to Thee,
More love to Thee,
More love to Thee!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Then shall my latest breath
Whisper Thy praise;
This be the parting cry
My heart shall raise;
This still its prayer shall be:
More love, O Christ, to Thee,
More love to Thee,
More love to Thee!

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ki nfe O si Kristi, ki nfe O si
Gb’adura ti  mo ngba lor’ekun mi
Eyi l’adura mi, ki nfe O si Kristi
Ki nfe O si/2x

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Lekan ohun aye ni mo ntoro
Nisisiyi ‘Wo nikan ni mo nwa
Eyi l’adura mi, ki nfe O si Kristi
Ki nfe O si/2x

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Je ki ‘banuje de ati ‘rora
Didun l’ojise Re ati ‘se won
‘Gba won mba mi korin, ki nfe O si Kristi
Ki nfe O si/2x

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Nje opin emi mi, yo wi ‘yin Re
Eyi ni yo je oro k’ehin re
Adura na o je, ki nfe O si Kristi
Ki nfe O si/2x

englishTitle: I HAVE FOUND A FRIEND IN JESUS
yorubaTitle: Mo ti Ni Jesu ni Ore

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
I’ve found a friend in Jesus, He’s everything to me,
He’s the fairest of ten thousand to my soul;
The Apple-tree of trees, in Him alone I see
All I need to cleanse and make me fully whole.
In sorrow He’s my comfort, in trouble He’s my stay,
He tells me every care on Him to roll:
He’s the Apple-tree of trees, the Bright and Morning Star,
He’s the fairest of ten thousand to my soul.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
He all my griefs has taken, and all my sorrows borne;
In temptation He’s my strong and mighty tower;
I’ve all for Him forsaken, and all my idols torn
From my heart, and now He keeps me by His power.
Though all the world forsake me, and Satan tempt me sore,
Through Jesus I shall safely reach the goal:
He’s the Apple-tree of trees, the Bright and Morning Star,
He’s the fairest of ten thousand to my soul.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
He’ll never, never leave me, nor yet forsake me here,
While I live by faith and do His blessed will;
A wall of fire about me, I’ve nothing now to fear,
With His manna He my hungry soul shall fill.
Then sweeping up to glory to see His blessed face,
Where rivers of delight shall ever roll:
He’s the Apple-tree of trees, the Bright and Morning Star,
He’s the fairest of ten thousand to my soul.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mo ti ni Jesu ni ore, o j’ohun gbogbo fun mi
Oun nikan l’arewa ti okan mi nfe
Oun ni ‘tanna ipado, Oun ni enikan na
T’o le we mi kuro ninu ese mi
Olutunu mi l’o je ‘nu gbogbo wahala
On ni ki nk’aniyan mi l’Oun lori
Oun ni ‘tanna ipado, irawo owuro
Oun nikan l’arewa ti okan mi nfe

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Olutunu mi l’o je ‘nu gbogbgo wahala
On ni ki nk’aniyan mi l’Oun lori
Oun ni ‘tanna ipado, irawo owuro
Oun nikan l’arewa ti okan mi nfe

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
O gbe gbogbo ‘banuje ati ‘rora mi ru
O j’odi agbara mi nigba ‘danwo
Tori Re mo k’ohun gbogbo ti mo ti fe sile
O si f’agbara Re gbe okan mi ro
Bi aye tile ko mi, ti satan’ dan mi wo
Jesu yo mu mi d’opin irin mi
Oun ni ‘tanna ipado, irawo owuro
Oun nikan l’arewa ti okan mi nfe

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Oun ki yo fi mi sile, Be kyo ko mi nihin
Niwon ti mba fi ‘gbagbo p’ofin Re mo
Oo j’odi ina yi mi ka, Ng kiyo berukeru
Yo fi manna Re b’okan mi t’ebi npa
Gba mba d’ade nikehin, ng r’oju ‘bukun Re
Ti adun Re yo ma san titi lae
Oun ni ‘tanna ipado, irawo owuro
Oun nikan l’arewa ti okan mi nfe

number: 1021: I HAVE FOUND A FRIEND IN JESUS

englishTitle: WHAT A FRIEND WE HAVE IN JESUS

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
What a friend we have in Jesus,
all our sins and griefs to bear!
What a privilege to carry
everything to God in prayer!
O what peace we often forfeit,
O what needless pain we bear,
all because we do not carry
everything to God in prayer!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Have we trials and temptations?
Is there trouble anywhere?
We should never be discouraged;
take it to the Lord in prayer!
Can we find a friend so faithful
who will all our sorrows share?
Jesus knows our every weakness;
take it to the Lord in prayer!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Are we weak and heavy laden,
cumbered with a load of care?
Precious Savior, still our refuge--
take it to the Lord in prayer!
Do your friends despise, forsake you?
Take it to the Lord in prayer!
In his arms he'll take and shield you;
you will find a solace there.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ore wo la ni bi Jesu
Ti o ru ‘banuje wa
Anfani wo lo po bayi
Lati ma gbadura si
Alafia pupo la nsonu
A si ti je ‘rora po
Tori a ko fi gbogbo nkan
S’adura niwaju Re

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Idanwo ha wa fun wa bi?
A ha ni wahala bi
A ko gbodo so ‘reti nu
Sa gbadura s’Oluwa
Ko s’oloto ore bi Re
Ti o le ba wa daro
Jesu ti mo ailera wa
Sa gbadura s’Oluwa

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Eru ha nwo wa l’orun bi
Aniyan ha po fun wa
Olugbala je abo wa
Sa gbadura s’Oluwa
Awon ore ha sa o ti
Sa gbadura s’Oluwa
yo gbe o s’oke l’apa Re
Iwo yo si ni ‘tunu

number: 1022: WHAT A FRIEND WE HAVE IN JESUS

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Just as God who reigns on high
Spake to men in days gone by;
So the Lord is calling men today;
And, my brother, this is true,
Whatsoe’er He says to you,
There is but one thing to do –
Just obey.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Just obey . . ..just obey . . .,
Is the way . . ., God’s way . . .,
When His message comes to you,
There is but one thing to do:
Just obey . . . just obey.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
If you’re in the Saviour’s hands,
You must do as He commands,
For there is no other gospel way;
Never put the message by,
Never stop to reason, “why?”
When the Saviour speaks to you –
Just obey.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
If for mansions fair you sigh,
In that land beyond the sky,
After time with you has pass’d away;
Though the way you may not see,
Christ is calling, “Follow me,”
Faith and duty both will cry –
Just obey.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
B’Olorun Oba Orun
Ti ma nsoro nigbani
O tun mba wa soro bee l’oni
Arakunrin ooto ni
Ohun t’o ba wi fun O
Ohun kan l’aigbodmase, gboran

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Sa gboran/2x
Eyi ni ‘fe Re
Gbat’O ba ranse si O
Ohun kan ni ki o se
Sa gboran/2x

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Bi o ba je t’Oluwa
O ni lati gbo tiRe
Ko s’ona ‘hinrere miran mo
Mase sa ase Re ti,
Ma si se lo oro Re
Gbat’Olugbala ba nsoro sa gbo

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Bi o ba fe ni ipin
N’ilu daradara ni
Lehin aye wa buburu yi
Bi o ko tile m’ona,
Krist’ yo wipe tele mi
Igbagbo yo si wipe, Sa gboran

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Alas, and did my Savior bleed?
And did my Sovereign die?
Would He devote that sacred head
For such a worm as I?

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
At the cross, at the cross where
I first saw the light,
And the burden of my heart rolled away,
It was there by faith I received my sight,
And now I am happy all the day!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Was it for sins that I had done
He groaned upon the tree?
Amazing pity! grace unknown!
And love beyond degree!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Well might the sun in darkness hide,
And shut His glories in,
When Christ, the mighty Maker, died
For man, His creature’s sin.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Thus might I hide my blushing face
While His dear cross appears.
Dissolve my heart in thankfulness,
And melt mine eyes to tears.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics:
But drops of grief can ne’er repay
The debt of love I owe;
Here, Lord, I give myself away,
’Tis all that I can do.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
O se Olugbala mi ta
‘je Re sile O ku
Nje o je f’ori mimo na
Fun kokoro b’emi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Nibi agbelebu,
Ni mo ko ri ‘mole
Nibe eru okan mi si fo lo
Nibe nipa igbagbo mo riran
Nisi mo wa l’alafia titi

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Nje tor’ese ti mo ti da
L’o se jiya oro
Anu at’ore-ofe yi
Ko se diwon rara

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
O to k’orun ko s’okunkun
K’o f’ogo re pamo
Nigba Krist’ eleda nla ku
F’ese awa eda

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Be lo ye ki nf’oju pamo
Nibi agbelebu
K’okan mi si yo ni ‘dupe
K’oju mi s’omije

englishTitle: I GAVE MY LIFE FOR THEE
yorubaTitle: Mo Fi Ara Mi Fun O

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
I gave My life for thee,
My precious blood I shed,
That thou mightst ransomed be,
And quickened from the dead;
I gave, I gave My life for thee,
What hast thou done for Me?
I gave, I gave My life for thee,
What hast thou done for Me?

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
My Father's house of light,
My glory-circled throne
I left for earthly night,
For wanderings sad and lone;
I left, I left it all for thee,
Hast thou left aught for Me?
I left, I left it all for thee,
Hast thou left aught for Me?

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
I suffered much for thee,
More than thy tongue can tell,
Of bitterest agony,
To rescue thee from hell;
I've borne, I've borne it all for thee,
What hast thou borne for Me?
I've borne, I've borne it all for thee,
What hast thou borne for Me?

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
And I have brought to thee,
Down from My home above,
Salvation full and free,
My pardon and My love;
I bring, I bring rich gifts to thee,
What hast thou brought to Me?
I bring, I bring rich gifts to thee,
What hast thou brought to Me?

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mo f’ara mi fun o, mo ku nitori re
Ki nle ra o pada, k’o le jinde n’oku
Mo f’ara mi fun o, fun o
Kini ‘wo se fun mi

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Mo f’ojo aye mi, se wahala fun o
Ki iwo ba le mo, adun ayeraye
Mo lo ‘po ‘dun fun o, fun o
O lo okan fun mi bi

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ile ti Baba mi, ati ‘te ogo mi
Mo fi sile w’aye, mo d’alarinkiri
Mo fi sile nitori re,
Ki lo fi ‘le fun mi

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Mo jiya po fun o, tie nu ko le so
Mo jijakadi nla, tori igbala re
Mo jiya po fun, fun o
O le jiya fun mi

number: 1025: I GAVE MY LIFE FOR THEE

englishTitle: WHEN THE ROLL IS CALLED UP YONDER
yorubaTitle: Nigbati a Ba Npe Oruko Lohun

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
When the trumpet of the Lord shall sound and time shall be no more,
And the morning breaks, eternal, bright and fair;
When the saved of earth shall gather over on the other shore,
And the roll is called up yonder, I'll be there.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
When the roll is called up yonder,
When the roll is called up yonder,
When the roll is called up yonder,
When the roll is called up yonder, I'll be there.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
On that bright and cloudless morning when the dead in Christ shall rise,
And the glory of his resurrection share;
When his chosen ones shall gather to their home beyond the skies,
And the roll is called up yonder, I'll be there.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Let us labor for the Master from the dawn till setting sun;
Let us talk of all his wondrous love and care.
Then when all of life is over and our work on earth is done,
And the roll is called up yonder, I'll be there.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
‘Gbati ipe Oluwa ba dun t’aye yo si fo lo
Ti imole ojo titun yo si de
Nigbati awon omo igbala ba pejo l’oke
T’a ba si np’oruko l’ohun ngo wa mbe

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Gbat’a ba np’oruko l’ohun/3x
Nipa ore-ofe nikan ngo wa mbe

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
L’ooro ojo na t’awon oku ‘nu Kristi yo jinde
Ti won yo si pin ‘nu ogo ajinde
Gbati awon aynfe yo peji si ode Orun
T’a ba si np’oruko l’ohun ngo wa mbe

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Je ki a fi gbogbgo akoko wa sise f’Oluwa
Je ki a rohin ife iyanu Re
Nigbati a ba si pari ire ije wa l’aye
T’a ba si np’oruko l’ohun ngo wa mbe

number: 1026: WHEN THE ROLL IS CALLED UP YONDER

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Ring the bells of heaven!
There is joy today,
For a soul, returning from the wild!
See, the Father meets him out upon the way,
Welcoming His weary, wandering child.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Glory! Glory! How the angels sing:
Glory! Glory! How the loud harps ring!
'Tis the ransomed army, like a mighty sea,
Pealing forth the anthem of the free.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Ring the bells of heaven!
There is joy today,
For the wanderer now is reconciled;
Yes, a soul is rescued from his sinful way,
And is born anew, a ransomed child.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Ring the bells of heaven!
Spread the feast today!
Angels, swell the glad triumphant strain!
Tell the joyful tidings, bear it far away!
For a precious soul is born again.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ke Hosanna l’Orun li ojo oni
Tori okan t’o sako ti pada
Wo bi Baba ti npade re pel’ayo
Lati gb’omo t’o sako sile

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ogo, ogo l’orin t’angel’ nko
Ogo ni won nfi harpu won nko
Awon t’a ra pada b’egbe ogun nla
Nko orin ayo irapada

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ke hosanna l’Orun li ojo oni
Tor’asako b’Olorun laja
A gba okan kan la kuro nin’ese
A tun bi a si ra a pada

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ke hosanna l’Orun so t’ife nla na
K’angeli gbe orin ‘segun nag a
Kede ihin ayp na jakejado
Tori okan t’a ti rapada

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Amazing grace (how sweet the sound)
that saved a wretch like me!
I once was lost, but now am found,
was blind, but now I see.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
'Twas grace that taught my heart to fear,
and grace my fears relieved;
how precious did that grace appear
the hour I first believed!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Through many dangers, toils and snares
I have already come:
'tis grace has brought me safe thus far,
and grace will lead me home.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
The Lord has promised good to me,
his word my hope secures;
he will my shield and portion be
as long as life endures.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics:
Yes, when this flesh and heart shall fail,
and mortal life shall cease:
I shall possess, within the veil,
a life of joy and peace.

english.title: Verse 6
english.lyrics:
The earth shall soon dissolve like snow,
the sun forbear to shine;
but God, who called me here below,
will be forever mine.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ore ofe b’o ti dun to
To gba emi a….bosi
Mo ti sonu, o wa mi ri
O si mi l’oju

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Or’ofe ko  mi ki mberu
O si l’eru mi lo
B’ore-ofe na ti han to
Nigba mo ko gbagbo

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Opo ewu ati ‘dekun
Ni mo ti la koja
Or’ofe npa mi mo d’oni
Yo si sin mi de ‘le

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Nje gbat’ara at’okan ye
Ti emi ba si pin
Ngo gba ‘yo at’alafia
L’oke Orun l’ohun

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Rescue the perishing,
Care for the dying,
Snatch them in pity from sin and the grave;
Weep o’er the erring one, lift up the fallen,
Tell them of Jesus the mighty to save.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Rescue the perishing,
Care for the dying;
Jesus is merciful,
Jesus will save.

english.title: Verse 2
Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Down in the human heart,
Crushed by the tempter,
Feelings lie buried that grace can restore;
Touched by a loving heart, wakened by kindness,
Chords that were broken will vibrate once more.

english.title: Verse 4

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Yo awon ti nsegbe, s’aajo eni nku
F’anu ja won kuro ninu ese
Ke f’awon ti nsina, gb’eni subu ro
So fun won pe Jesu le gba won la

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Yo awon ti nsegbe, s’aajo eni nku
Alaanu ni Jesu yi o gbala

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Bi nwon tile ngan an, sibe O nduro
Lati gb’omo t’o ronupiwada
Sa fi ‘tara ro won, si ro won jeeje
Oun yo dariji bi won je gbagbo

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Yo awon ti nsegbe, ise tire ni
Oluwa yi o f’agbara fun o
Fi suru ro won pada s’ona tooro
So f’asako p’Olugbala ti ku

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Hark! 'Tis the Shepherd's voice I hear,
Out in the desert dark and drear,
Calling the sheep who've gone astray,
Far from the Shepherd's fold away.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Bring them in, bring them in,
Bring them in from the fields of sin;
Bring them in, bring them in,
Bring the wandering ones to Jesus.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Who'll go and help this Shepherd kind,
Help Him the wandering ones to find?
Who'll bring the lost ones to the fold,
Where they'll be sheltered from the cold?

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Out in the desert hear their cry,
Out on the mountains wild and high;
Hark! 'Tis the Master speaks to thee,
"Go find My sheep where'er they be."

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Olus’guntan ni npe mi
Kuro nin’aginju ese
O np’aguntan t’o sako lo
Jinna rere sinu agbo

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Mu won wa/2x
Mu won wa kuro l’oko ese
Mu won wa/2x
M’asako wa s’odo Jesu

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ran Olus’aguntan lowo
Lati wa ‘guntan Re t’o nu
Mu awon t’o nu pada wa
Sin’agbo kuro l’otutu

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Gbo igbe won nin’aginju
Ati lori oke giga
Gb’Olusaguntan nwi fun o
Lo mu aguntan mi wole

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Whither, pilgrims, are you going,
Going each with staff in hand?
We are going on a journey,
Going at our King’s command.
Over hills and plains and valleys,
We are going to His palace,
We are going to His palace,
Going to the better land;
We are going to His palace,
Going to the better land.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Fear ye not the way so lonely—
You, a little, feeble band?
No, for friends unseen are near us:
Holy angels round us stand.
Christ, our Leader, walks beside us:
He will guard and He will guide us,
He will guard and He will guide us,
Guide us to the better land;
He will guard and He will guide us,
Guide us to the better land.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Tell me, pilgrims, what you hope for
In that far-off better land.
Spotless robes and crowns of glory
From a Saviour’s loving hand.
We shall drink of life’s clear river,
We shall dwell with God forever,
We shall dwell with God forever
In that bright and better land;
We shall dwell with God forever
In that bright and better land.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Pilgrims, may we travel with you
To that bright, that better land?
Come and welcome, come and welcome,
Welcome to our pilgrim band.
Come, O come, and do not leave us,
Christ is waiting to receive us,
Christ is waiting to receive us
In that bright, that better land;
Christ is waiting to receive us
In that bright, that better land.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Eyin ero nibo le nlo, t’eyin t’opa lowo yin
A rin ajo mimo kan lo, nipa ase Oba wa
Lori oke oun petele, a nlo s’afin Oba rere
A nlo s’afin Oba rere, a nlo si ‘le t’o dara/2x

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Eyin ero, e so fun ni, ti ‘reti ti eyin ni?
Aso mimo, ade ogo ni Jesu yo fi fun wa
Omi iye la o ma mu, a o ba Olorun wag be
A o ba Olorun wag be ni ‘le mimo didara/2x

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
E ko beru ona t’e nrin, eyin ero kekere
Ore airi pelu wan lo, awon angel’ yi wa ka
Jesu Krsiti l’amona wa, yo ma so wa yo ma to wa
Yo ma so wa, yo ma to wa ninu ona ajo wa/2x

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Ero a le ba yin k’egbe l’ona ajo sile na
Wa ma k’a lo, wa ma k’a lo, wa si egbe ero wa,
Wa e mase fi wa sile, Jesu duro O nreti wa
Jesu duro o nreti wa ni ‘le mimo t’o dara/2x

englishTitle: GOD WILL TAKE CARE OF YOU

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
:
Be not dismayed whate’er betide,
God will take care of you;
Beneath his wings of love abide,
God will take care of you.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
God will take care of you,
through ev'ry day, o’er all the way;
He will take care of you,
God will take care of you.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Through days of toil when heart doth fail,
God will take care of you;
When dangers fierce your path assail,
God will take care of you.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
No matter what may be the test,
God will take care of you;
Lean, weary one, upon his breast,
God will take care of you.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mase f’oya ohunkohun,
Olorun yo to o
Ma gbe ibi ikoko Re,
Olorun yo to o

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Olorun yo to o
L’ojojumo, l’ona gbogbo
Oun yo ma toju re
Olorun yo to o

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Gbati okan re ba damu
Olorun yo to o
Gbat’ewu ba wa l’ona re
Olorun yo to o

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Oun yo pese fun aini re
Olorun yo to o
Yo si mu ibere re se
Olorun yo to o

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
B’o ti wu ki ‘danwo po to
Olorun yo to o
Sinmi alare l’aya Re
Olorun yo to

number: 1032: GOD WILL TAKE CARE OF YOU

english.title: Verse 1
Chorus
english.lyrics:
Ask the Savior to help you,
Comfort, strengthen and keep you;
He is willing to aid you,
He will carry you through.

english.title: Verse 2
Verse 3

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ma f’ara fun ‘danwo, Nitor’ese ni
Isegun kan yo tun fun o l’agbara
Ja bi okunrin si b’ori ‘fekufe
Sa tejumo Jesu, yo mu o laja

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Beere ‘ranwo at’agbara l’odo Olugbala
O setan fun ‘ranwo, Oun yo mu o laja

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ma k’egbe buburu, ma soro ibi
Mase pe oruko Olorun lasan
Je eniti ti nronu at’olotito
Sa tejumo Jesu, yo mu o laja

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Olorun yo f’ade f’eni t’o segun
Ao fi ‘gbagbo segun b’ota nde si wa
Kristi yo so agbara wa di otun
Sa tejumo Jesu, Oun yo mu o laja

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Trust on! trust on, believer!
Tho’ long the conflict be,
Thou yet shall prove victorious;
Thy God shall fight for thee.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Trust on! (trust on!)/2x
Tho’ dark the night and drear;
Trust on! (trust on!)/2x
The morning dawn is near.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Trust on! trust on; thy failings
May bow thee to the dust,
But in thy deepest sorrow,
O give not up thy trust.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Trust on! the danger presses;
Temptation strong is near,
Yet o’er life’s dangerous rapids,
He shall thy passage steer.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
O Christ is strong to save us,
He is a faithful friend;
Trust on! trust on! believer,
O trust Him to the end.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Gbekele Onigbagbo,
Bi ‘ja na tile pe
Iwo ni yoo sa segun
Baba yo ja fun o

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Sa gbe…..kele
B’okunkun tile su
Sa gbe…kele
Ile fere mo na

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Gbekele larin ewu
‘danwo wa nitosi
Laarin wahala aye
Yo ma samona re

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Jesu to lati gba wa
Ore tooto lo je
Gbekele Onigbagbo
Sa gbekele d’opin

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
There’s a place I love to tarry,
When my soul is sad, oppressed,
‘Tis alone with Christ my Saviour,
Where He bids me “Come and rest.”

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Just to be alone with Jesus,
Just to hear Him softly say:
“Fear not, though the world forsake you,
Lo I’m with you alway.”

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
When the cares of life are heavy,
And beneath my cross I bend;
Then I go alone with Jesus,
For He is my dearest Friend.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
When the tempter would assail me,
Jesus bids me to Him flee;
He’s my Refuge, Friend and Saviour,
He is all in all to me.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ibi kan wa ti mo feran
Gba t’okan mi poruru
Ki nwa pelu Kristi nikan
Ti o wipe wa sinmi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ki nwa pelu Krsiti nikan
Ki ngb’ohun jeje Re pe
Mase beru b’aye ko o
Emi wa pelu re

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Gbat’eru aye ba wuwo
Ti o si teri mi ba
Ngo lo sodo Jesu nikan
Tori ore mi ni Oun

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Gbati esu nfe lepa mi
Jesu wipe ki nsa wa
Oun ni abo at’ore mi
O j’ohun gbogbo fun mi

english.title: Verse 1
Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Calm is thy slumber as an infant's sleep;
But thou shalt wake no more to toil and weep:
Thine is a perfect rest, secure and deep--
Good-night! Good-night! Good-night!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Until the shadows from this earth are cast,
Until He gathers in His sheaves at last,
Until the twilight gloom be over past--
Good-night! Good-night! Good-night!

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Until the Easter glory lights the skies,
Until the dead in Jesus shall arise,
And He shall come, but not in lowly guise--
Good-night! Good-night! Good-night!

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ma sun lo olufe sa ma sinmi
F’ori re le aya Olugbala
A fe o sugbon Jesu fe o ju
Sun re/3x

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Orun re dun bi orun omode
B’o si ji ekun ko si fun o mo
Isinmi t’o daju ni sinmi re
Sun re/3x

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Titi okunkun aye yo fi tan
Titi ao fi ko ikore wole
Titi oye aye yio fi la
Sun re/3x

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Titi orun ajinde yo fi yo
Ti awon oku Jesu yo dide
Titi oun yo de ninu olanla Re
Sun re/3x

englishTitle: GOD BE WITH YOU TILL WE MEET

english.title: Verse 1
Chorus
english.lyrics:
Till we meet, till we meet,
till we meet at Jesus’ feet.
Till we meet, till we meet,
God be with you till we meet again.

english.title: Verse 2
Verse 3
Verse 4

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
K’Olorun so o k’a tun pade
Ki imoran Re gbe o ro
Ko ka o mo aguntan Re
K’Olorun so o k’a tun pade

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ka pade/2x
Ka pade l’ese Jesu
Ka pade/2x
K’Olorun so o ka tun pade

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
K’Olorun so o ka tun pade
K’o fi ‘ye Re dabo bo o
K’o ma pese fun aini re
K’Olorun so o k’a tun pade

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
K’Olorun so o ka tun pade
Nigba t’ewu ba yi o ka
Ko f’owo ‘fe Re gba o mu
K’Olorun so o ka tun pade

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
K’Olorun so o ka tun pade
Ko fi ife rado bo o
Ko pa oro iku fun o
K’Olorun so o ka tun pade

number: 1037: GOD BE WITH YOU TILL WE MEET

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
The soul that would live close to Jesus,
Is He who spends much time in prayer.
Although it may not always please us,
'Tis that which relieves us from care.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Would God that more people would pray,
For 'tis prayer that moves mountain away;
Those mountains of doubt are sure to move out,
If unceasingly, brother, you pray.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
'Twas Elijah that prayed on Mount Carmel,
And the heavens gave ear to his cry;
And I'm sure it was not very formal,
For fire came down from the sky.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
We read that a prophet for praying
Was cast to the lions to eat;
But an angel prevented the slaying,
And delivered old Daniel complete.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
The Saviour now looks for prevailers,
Who will pray with a confidence bold,
Will you join this band of availers
And pray till the heavens unfold?

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Okan ti yo ma gbe ‘nu Jesu
Ni eni ti ngbadura pupo
O si le je ohun ti ko wu ni
Oun lo le mu aniyan kuro

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Olorun nf’opo eyan f’adua
Adura lo nle isoro lo
Gbogbo iyemeji re yo si fo lo
Arakunrin b’o ba gbadura

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Elijah gbadura l’oke Karmel’
Awon Orun f’eti si ‘gbe re
Emi si mo daju pe ki ns’asa
Ki ina ti Orun bo sile

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Won si so wooli kan ti ngbadura
Si iho kiniun fun ije
Sugbon angeli kan se ‘toju re
O si gba Danieli sile

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Olugbala nf’awon ti ngbadura
Awon ti ngbadura nigboya
O ki yo pelu awon egbe yi
Lati f’adura s’orun sile

englishTitle: WHEN WE ALL GET TO HEAVEN

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Sing the wondrous love of Jesus,
Sing His mercy and His grace;
In the mansions bright and blessed
He'll prepare for us a place.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
:
When we all get to heaven,
what a day of rejoicing that will be!
When we all see Jesus,
we'll sing and shout the victory!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
While we walk the pilgrim pathway
Clouds will overspread the sky;
But when trav'ling days are over
Not a shadow, not a sigh.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Let us then be true and faithful,
Trusting, serving ev'ry day;
Just one glimpse of Him in glory
Will the toils of life repay.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Onward to the prize before us!
Soon His beauty we'll behold;
Soon the pearly gates will open–
We shall tread the streets of gold.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Korin ‘fe ‘yanu ti Jesu
T’anu at’ore’ofe Re
Oun yo pese bugbe fun wa
Ni ile didan l’oke

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Gbat’a ba… d’Orun rere
Bawo ni ayo wa yo ti po to
Gbat’a ba ri Jesu
Ao yo ao korin isegun

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Gbat’a bar in ajo wa lo
Ti kuku b’oju orun
Gbati ‘rin ajo wa ba pin
K’yo s’ekun at’aro mo

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Tesiwaju lati gb’ere
Laipe ao ri ewa Re
Ilekun Pearli yo si si
Ao rin nita wura

number: 1040:  WHEN WE ALL GET TO HEAVEN

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Once in royal David’s city
stood a lowly cattle shed,
where a mother laid her baby
in a manger for His bed:
Mary was that mother mild,
Jesus Christ her little Child.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
He came down to earth from heaven
who is God and Lord of all,
and His shelter was a stable,
with the poor, and meek, and lowly,
lived on earth our Savior holy.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
And our eyes at last shall see Him,
through His own redeeming love;
for that Child so dear and gentle
is our Lord in heav'n above,
and He leads His children on
to the place where He is gone.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Not in that poor lowly stable,
with the oxen standing by,
we shall see Him, but in heaven,
set at God’s right hand on high;
when like stars His children crowned
all in white shall wait around.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Nwon duro fun ete kan
Nwon gbo t’Olorun
B’ola fun olotito
Ka yin egbe Daniel’

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ka duro bi Daniel’
Pelu igboya ati
Pelu f’Olorun
Ko si han gbangba

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Fun awon ti o nsubu
Ti ko ni gboya
Akye isegun ti wa
Ninu egbe Daniel’

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Awon ota eniyan
To nrin kakiri
Yo subu l’ogedengbe
N’waju egbe Daniel’

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Gbe asia Kirst’ s’oke
E kale segun
Egbe esu ni a ngan
Ka ki egbe Daniel’

english.title: Verse1
english.lyrics:
Once in royal David’s city
stood a lowly cattle shed,
where a mother laid her baby
in a manger for His bed:
Mary was that mother mild,
Jesus Christ her little Child.

english.title: Verse2
english.lyrics:
He came down to earth from heaven
who is God and Lord of all,
and His shelter was a stable,
and His cradle was a stall:
with the poor, and meek, and lowly,
lived on earth our Savior holy.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
And our eyes at last shall see Him,
through His own redeeming love;
for that Child so dear and gentle
is our Lord in heav'n above,
and He leads His children on
to the place where He is gone.

english.title: Verse4
english.lyrics:
Not in that poor lowly stable,
with the oxen standing by,
we shall see Him, but in heaven,
set at God’s right hand on high;
when like stars His children crowned
all in white shall wait around.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Nigbakan ni Betlehemu,
Ilu kekere kan wa
Nib’iya kan te ‘mo re si
L’ori ibuje eran
Maria niya omo na
Jesu Krist’ si l’omo na

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
O t’Orun wa sodo aye
Oun l’Olorun Oluwa
O fi le eran se ile
‘Buje eran fun ‘busun
L’odo awon otosi
Ni Jesu gbe li aye

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ni gbogbo igba ewe Re
O ngboran o si mb’ola
O nferan o si nteriba
Fun iya ti ntoju re
O ye ki gbogbo omode
Ko se olugboran be

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Tori oun je awose wa
A ma dagba bi awa
O kere ko le da nkan se
A ma s’okun bi awa
O si le ba wa daro
O le ba wa yo pelu

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
All to Jesus I surrender,
I will ever love and trust Him,
In His presence daily live.
Refrain:
I surrender all, I surrender all;
All to Thee, my blessed Savior,
I surrender all.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
All to Jesus I surrender,
Make me, Savior, wholly Thine;
Let me feel Thy Holy Spirit,
Truly know that Thou art mine.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
All to Jesus I surrender,
Lord, I give myself to Thee;
Fill me with Thy love and power,
Let Thy blessing fall on me.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mo fi gbogbo re fun Jesu
Patapata lai ku kan
Ngo ma fe, ngo si gbekele
No wa l’odo Re titi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Mo fi gbogbo re/2x
Fun O Olugbala mi ni
Mo fi won sile

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Mo fi gbogbo re fun Jesu
Mo fi ‘rele wole fun
Mo fi ‘gbadun aye sile
Gba mi Jesu si gba mi

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Mo fi gbogbo re fun Jesu
Se mi ni tire nikan
Je kin kun fun Emi Mimo
Ki nmo pe ‘Wo je temi

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Mo fi gbogbo re fun Jesu
Mo fi ara mi fun O
Fi ‘fe at’agbara kun mi
Ki ‘bukun Re ba le mi

items.title: Ese 5
items.lyrics:
Mo fi gbogbo re fun Jesu
Mo mo p’emi ba le mi
A! ayo igbala kikun
Ogo, ogo f’ooko re

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
What can wash away my sin?
Nothing but the blood of Jesus.
What can make me whole again?
Nothing but the blood of Jesus.
Refrain:
O precious is the flow
that makes me white as snow;
no other fount I know;
nothing but the blood of Jesus.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
For my pardon this I see:
nothing but the blood of Jesus.
For my cleansing this my plea:
nothing but the blood of Jesus.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Nothing can for sin atone:
nothing but the blood of Jesus.
Naught of good that I have done:
nothing but the blood of Jesus.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
This is all my hope and peace:
nothing but the blood of Jesus.
This is all my righteousness:
nothing but the blood of Jesus.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Jesu wo mi l’ese Re
Eje Re nikan lo ngbala
‘Wo nikan lo le gba mi
Eje re nikan lo ngbala

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ko si nkan ti mo mu wa
Sugbon pelu igbagbo
Si ibi agbelebu
Eje Re nikan lo ngbala
Eje Re nikan lo nwosan
Eje re nikan lo npese

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Wo okan mi to gb’ogbe
Eje Re nikan lo ngbala
Ma s’alai dariji mi
Eje re nikan lo ngbala

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ese mi po l’apoju
Eje Re nikan lo ngbala
Sugbon f’aanu re gba mi
Eje re nikan lo ngbala

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
I’m tempted then to murmur, and of my lot complain,
But when I think of Jesus, and all He’s done for me,
Then, I cry, O Rock of Ages,
Hide Thou Me.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
O Rock of Ages,
Hide Thou Me,
No other Refuge, have I but Thee,
When life’s dark vale I wander,
Far, far from Thee;
Then I cry, O Rock of Ages,
Hide Thou me.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Sometimes it seems I dare not go one step farther on,
And from my heart all courage has slipped away and gone;
But, I remember Jesus, and all His love for me,
Then, I cry, O Rock of Ages,
Hide Thou Me.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
O what a Friend is Jesus, sure Anchor for my soul,
So tender, true and gracious, I’m safe in His control.
My help in time of danger, my strong defense is He,
O Thou blessed Rock of Ages,
Hide Thou Me.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Opo igba ni aare mu mi ti ireti tan fun mi
A si dan mi wo lati kun l’ona mi gbogbo
Sugbon mo ranti Jesu at’ohun t’O se fun mi
Mo ke pe apat’ayeraye se isadi mi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
A….pata ‘yeraye, se isadi mi
Ko si abo miran lehin re
Nigba mo sako jina kuro lodo re
Mo kigbe ‘Wo apata ‘yeraye se isadi mi

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Opo igba lati tesiwaju soro fun mi
Gbogbo ireti mi ati ‘gboya mi pin
Sugbon mo ranti Jesu ati ife re si mi
Mo ke pe apata ayeraye, se isadi mi

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ore tooto ni jesu, idakoro fun okan mi
L’odo Re ewu ko si, nitori alanu ni
Abo mi nigba iponju, alagbara lo je
Iwo apata ayeraye se isadi mi

english.title: Verse 1
Verse 2
english.lyrics:
All Your works with joy surround You,
Earth and heav'n reflect Your rays,
Stars and angels sing around You,
Center of unbroken praise;
Field and forest, vale and mountain,
Flow'ry meadow, flashing sea,
Chanting bird and flowing fountain
Praising You eternally!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Always giving and forgiving,
Ever blessing, ever blest,
Well-spring of the joy of living,
Ocean-depth of happy rest!
Loving Father, Christ our Brother,
Let Your light upon us shine;
Teach us how to love each other,
Lift us to the joy divine.

english.title: chorus
english.lyrics:
,
Which the morning stars began;
God's own love is reigning o’er us,
Joining people hand in hand.
Ever singing, march we onward,
Victors in the midst of strife;
Joyful music leads us sunward
In the triumph song of life.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Tayotayo l’a wole fun
Olorun onife nla
Fi ogo re kun okan wa
Gege bi ‘tansan oorun
Pa ese run nin’okan wa
Le ‘yemeji at’eru lo
Jesu ‘Wo t’o nfun ni l’ayo
Je k’ayo Re kun ‘nu wa (DS)

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Gbogbo ise Re lo nso ti,
Ogo ati ewa Re
Awon irawo pel’awon
Angeli yi ‘te Re ka
Igbo, oke ati odan
Okun at’odo nyin O
Awon eye nkorin wipe
E ba wa yin Olorun (DS)

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Olorun oloore alaanu
Olubukun titi lai
Orisun ayo ati iye
F’okan wa se ‘bugbe re
Wo ni Baba Krist’ Oluwa
Gbogbo aye si ni tiRe
Ko wa ki a le ni ‘fe nla
Gege bi t’Oluwa wa (DS)

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Gbogbo eda alaaye
E d’ohun yin po mo wa
Lati yin Oba onife
Ti o njoba lori wa
A o ma korin isegun
Bi a ti nrin l’ona na
Awa ko ni beru ota
A o ma tesiwaju (DS)

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Nothing, either great or small—
Nothing, sinner, no;
Jesus died and paid it all,
Long, long ago.
Refrain:
“It is finish’d!” yes, indeed,
Finished, every jot;
Sinner, this is all you need,
Tell me, is it not?

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
When He, from His lofty throne,
Stoop’d to do and die,
Ev’rything was fully done;
Hearken to His cry!

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Weary, working, burden’d one,
Wherefore toil you so?
Cease your doing; all was done
Long, long ago.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Cast your deadly “doing” down—
Down at Jesus’ feet;
Stand in Him, in Him alone,
Gloriously complete.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ona kan si sile fun gbogbo eda
Loju re agbelebu kan wa
Lori re ogun nja kikan kikan
Lati gb’okan  wa lowo iku

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
O pari, ogun na ti pari
O pari ki yo s’ogun mo
O opari ijakadi d’opin
O pari Jesu li Oluwa

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
L’egbe kan esu gba ogun re jo
Ati gbogbo ‘gun orun apadi
L’egbe keji awon Angeli ‘mole
Pejo sori oke Golgota

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ile mi ni agbara, ogun yo, orun si ko
Lati tan imole
Tori a gb’omo Olorun ko ‘gi nibe
To kigbe na bayi pe okunkun

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Tho’ the foes of right oppress,
Keep on praying;
Christ, the Lord, is near to bless,
All prevailing.
Let not fear your heart appall,
Naught of evil can befall,
Stronger is your God than all;
Keep on praying.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Keep on praying,
Keep on praying,
Thro’ the Savior’s blessed name,
All prevailing.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Christian, has your faith grown weak?
Keep on praying;
Do the tears roll down your cheek?
Keep on praying.
Soon you never more will sigh,
Tears no more shall dim your eye,
Pray to Him who’s always nigh,
Never failing.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Pilgrim, have you weary grown?
Keep on praying,
God is yet upon His throne,
Keep on praying.
He will hear your faithful cry,
He to help is ever nigh,
You shall conquer by and by,
Keep on praying.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Praises shall with prayers ascend
Keep on praying;
Pray and praise till life shall end,
Keep on praying.
Till you reach the golden gate,
Where the ransomed souls await,
Claiming there your triumph great,
Keep on praying.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ma gbadura b’okun tile su
Olorun yo ka okan kuro
Gbadura titi ‘mole yo tan
Olorun yo gbo

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ma gbadura Krist’ wa nitosi
Ma gabdura, o daju yo gbo (bo ba le)
Ma gbadura, ko si gbeke le
Ma gbadura, Olorun yo gbo

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ma gbadura, gbati ona sokun
On yo to o bob a gbeke le
Yo tan ‘mole Orun s’ona re
Tor’o gb’ebe Re

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ma gbadura f’okan to nsako
To wa n’okun to jina s’ile
Bere ‘ranwo lati mu won wa
Olorun yo gbo

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Ma gbadura ki yo lo lasan
Iwo yo ni ‘segun lojojo
Iwo yio ma jo Jesu si
Tor’o gbe be re

englishTitle: IF SALVATION HAD NOT BEEN FREE
yorubaTitle: Bi Igbala Ko Ba Je Ofe

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
If the price of salvation were silver and gold,
all the poor of this world would be lost;
But the Savior who loved us, in mercy we're told,
paid the price on the cruel  cross.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Oh Lord, oh Lord, what could I have done,
if salvation had not been free?
God so loved the world, He gave His only Son,
thus making a way for me.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
All the poor of my people  thus speaketh the Lord,
they shall feast on the fat of the land;
Everyone who will trust me, believing my word,
shall be strengthened and made to stand.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Oh what love and compassion, was made manifest,
when He gave up His life on the tree;
sure deliverance He brought to the poor and oppressed,
and salvation to all is free.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
It is finished oh, hear Him so tenderly say,
when He gave up His all on the tree;
thus the plan of salvation was made on that day,
full salvation for you and me.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
B’o je wura fadaka la fi ra igbala
Gbogbo talaka ni yo segbe
Sugbon Oluwa t’o fe wa l’anu re
San gbese wa lori igi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Jesu Kristi ki l’emi ba se
B’o se pe ‘gbala ki s’ofe
Olorun f’araye o ran omo re
O lana ‘gbala kan mi

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Gbogbo awon talaka l’Oluwa
So pe yo je ninu ora ile na
Enikeni to gboran si gbogb’oro mi
Yo l’okun  yo duro sinsin

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ife ati anu l’Olugbala fihan
Nigbati o ku lori igi
Idasile lo mu wa f’awon alaini
O si wa gba wa la l’ofe

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
O ti pari ni oro t’Olugbala so
B’o ti nku lo lor’agbelebu
O mu eto igbala se li ojo na
Igbala fun gbogbo eniyan

english.lyrics:
Magnify, glorify, extol and exalt the LORD

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
F’ogo fun Olorun gb’oruko mimo Re ga
F’ogo fun Olorun gbe oruko mimo Re  ga
F’ogo fun Olorun gb’oruko mimo Re ga
F’ogo fun Olorun e gb’oruko re ga
