englishTitle: THERE IS HONEY IN THE ROCK

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
O my brother, do you know the Savior,
Who is wondrous, kind, and true?
He’s the Rock of your salvation!
There’s honey in the Rock for you.
Refrain:
Oh, there’s honey in the Rock, my brother;
There’s honey in the Rock for you.
Leave your sins for the Blood to cover;
There’s honey in the Rock for you.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Have you tasted that the Lord is gracious?
Do you walk in the way that’s new?
Have you drunk from the living fountain?
There’s honey in the Rock for you.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Do you pray unto God the Father,
“What wilt Thou have me to do?”
Never fear, He will surely answer,
There’s honey in the Rock for you.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Then go out through the streets and byways,
Preach the Word to the many or few;
Say to every fallen brother,
There’s honey in the Rock for you.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
O ti gbo nipa itan iyanu na
Ti a nrohin re jakejado
Jesu ni apata igbala wa
Oyin mbe ninu apata fun o

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
S: Oyin mbe ninu apata
ATB: …Mbe ninu apata,
Adun wa ninu Jesu
All: adun wa f’awon ayanfe re
S: oyin mbe ninu apata
ATB: mbe ninu apata
Adun wa ninu Jesu
All: oyin mbe ninu apata fun o

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
O ti to agbara Jesu wo bi
O ha ti mo nipa anu Re
F’eti si ohun re b’o ti npe o
Adun wa ninu Jesu fun o

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Okan re ha ndaku fun ounje bi
Kristi yo so agbara re d’otun
B’o ba bere yo f’ayo da o l’ohun
Adun wa ninu Jesu fun o

number: 1060. THERE IS HONEY IS THE ROCK

englishTitle: GOD IS HERE AND THAT TO BLESS US

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
God is here, and that to bless us
With the Spirit’s quick’ning power;
See, the cloud already bending,
Waits to drop the grateful shower.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Let it come, O Lord, we pray Thee,
Let the shower of blessing fall;
We are waiting, we are waiting,
Oh, revive the hearts of all.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
God is here! we feel His presence
In this consecrated place;
But we need the soul refreshing
Of His free, unbounded grace.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
God is here! oh, then, believing,
Bring to Him our one desire,
That His love may now be kindled,
Till its flame each heart inspire.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Savior, grant the prayer we offer,
While in simple faith we bow,
From the windows of Thy mercy
Pour us out a blessing now.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Olorun wa mbe li arin wa
Yo si bukun gbogbo wa l’ale yi
Wo oju orun b’o ti nsu
Yi o r’ojo ibukun s’ori wa

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
E s’amin/2x
E s’amin adura
Olorun yo bukun gbogbo wa l’oni yi

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Olorun wa mbe li aarin wa
Ninu ile mimo yi l’ale yi
Sugbon a nfe itura ti okan
Ati opo ore-ofe ti isoji

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Olugbala jo gbo adura wa
B’a ti nfi okan igbagbo kunle
Jo si ferese anu re si wa
Ko da ibukun s’ori wa ni ale yi

number: 1061. GOD IS HERE AND THAT TO BLESS US

englishTitle: I WANT THAT KIND OF BLESSING

english.title: Verse1
english.lyrics:
One night while Paul and Silas alone in prison lay,
The blessing came upon them, and they began to pray;
God broke the chains that bound them and rolled the clouds away
I want that kind of blessing.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
I want, I want that kind of blessing
That saves and keeps and satisfies the soul;
I want, I want that full salvation,
Till billows of heaven o’er me roll.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Elijah on Mount Carmel prevailed with God in prayer:
God closed the doors of heaven and drought was everywhere,
He prayed again in earnest, and rain came pouring down
He had that kind of blessing.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
If you will come to Jesus and full surrender make,
Your all upon the altar, the He the gift will take;
The fire will fall upon you, and burn up inbred sin
You’ll have that kind of blessing.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
In Canaan now we’re living, and feasting on its wine,
With milk and honey flowing, and vict’ry all the time;
With triumph we are marching, and giants there are bread
We have that kind of blessing.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Gba Jakob’ pade Oluwa ni ale ojo kan
O si jijakadi titi di owuro
O si gba ibukun nla lati rin ajo naa
Mo fe ‘bukun bi eyi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Mo fe/2x
Iru ibukun naa
T’yo gba mi la
T’yo t’okan mi l’orun
Mo fe ki nni ‘rapada okan mi
K’ayo Orun sokale s’okan mi

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Gbat’awon omo Israel’ de ile Kenaani
Olorun pin ‘bukun re kari gbogbo won
Won le ota won kuro won wa l’alafia
Mo fe ‘bukun bi eyi

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ojo aanu l’oni Olutunu ti de
A je ayanfe re Olorun
O npe wa o daju yoo bukun o
T’o ba le ni gbagbo yo ran bukun re si o

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Gbati a ba gba Emi Mimo s’oke
Gbati Olorun yo f’agbara
Yo sa lo si oke Olorun mi
Jowo f’anu gba mi

number: 1062. I WANT THAT KIND OF BLESSING

englishTitle: HUMBLE THYSELF TO WALK WITH GOD
yorubaTitle: Fi Irele Rin pelu Olorun Re

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
If thou wouldst have the dear Savior from heaven
Walk by thy side from the morn till the even,
There is a rule that each day you must follow:
Humble thyself to walk with God.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Humble thyself and the Lord will draw near thee,
Humble thyself and His presence shall cheer thee;
He will not walk with the proud or the scornful,
Humble thyself to walk with God.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Just as the Lord, in the world’s early ages,
Walked and communed with the prophets and sages,
He will come now if you meet the conditions:
Humble thyself to walk with God.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Just as the stream finds a bed that is lowly,
So Jesus walks with the pure and the holy;
Cast out thy pride, and in heartfelt contrition
Humble thyself to walk with God.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
B’o ba nfe k’Olugbala owon lat’orun
Lati ma ba nrin ni ojojumo
Awon ofin wa fun o lati lo jojojo
B’Olorun rin pelu irele

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Re ara re sile Oluwa yo sun mo o
Re ara re sile yo fun o l’ayo
Oun ko je ba agberaga at’elegan rin
B’Olorun rin pelu pelu irele

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
B’Olorun tin se baa won alufa
Ati woli lo ni aye igbani
Yo se be fun o
Bo ba gboran s’ase re
B’Olorun rin pelu irele
Option 2:

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
B’iwo ba fe k’Olugbala lat’Orun
Rin pelu re ni gbogbo ona re
Pa gbogb’ofin ati ilana re mo
Fi ‘rele rin pelu Olorun

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Re ara re sile On yo si sunmo o
Re ara re sile owo re yo to o
O nw’agberaga at’elegan lokere
Fi ‘rele rin pelu Olorun

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
B’omi ti nsan gba ipa ona tiRe
Beni Jesu yo rin pel’awon mimo
Fi ‘gberaga okan sile wa Oluwa
Rin pelu Olorun ni ‘rele

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
When you are weary and sore opprest,
When sorrow darkens the day,
Have faith in Jesus, He knoweth best,
And pray your troubles away.

english.title: Chorus
Verse 2
english.lyrics:
When strong temptations in you combine
To lead your footsteps astray,
Just go to Jesus your Friend divine,
And pray your troubles away.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Be not discouraged, but press along,
And live for Jesus today;
He’ll turn your sighing into a song,
And pray your troubles away.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Oh, soul in bondage, why longer roam,
In sin’s unending dismay?
Just trust in Jesus, He’ll lead you home,
And pray your troubles away.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Gba t’are mu o t’ara ni o
Ti kuku bo ona re
Sa gba Jesu gbo Oun lo mo ju
F’adura segun ‘soro re

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Fadura segun ‘soro re (gbagbo)
F’adua segun soro re (gbogbo)
Ni g’gbagbo ninu Jesu lojojo
F’adura segun ‘soro re

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Gbati ‘danwo lile de ba o
Lati mu o sakolo
To Jesu lo ore otito
F’adura segun ‘soro re

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ma so ‘reti nu, tesiwaju
Si wa fun Jesu loni
So ekun re d’orin ayo
F’adua segun ‘soro re

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Iwo okan t’o wa n’nu ide
Ma sako l’ona ese mo
Gbeke le Jesu yo mu o de ‘le
F’adua segun ‘soro re

englishTitle: SITTING AT THE FEET OF JESUS

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Sitting at the feet of Jesus,
Oh, what words I hear Him say!
Happy place! so near, so precious!
May it find me there each day;
Sitting at the feet of Jesus,
I would look upon the past;
For His love has been so gracious,
It has won my heart at last.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Sitting at the feet of Jesus,
Where can mortal be more blest?
There I lay my sins and sorrows,
And, when weary, find sweet rest;
Sitting at the feet of Jesus,
There I love to weep and pray;
While I from His fullness gather
Grace and comfort every day.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Bless me, O my Savior, bless me,
As I sit low at Thy feet; [I’m waiting]
Oh, look down in love upon me,
Let me see Thy face so sweet;
Give me, Lord, the mind of Jesus,
Keep me holy as He is;
May I prove I’ve been with Jesus,
Who is all my righteousness.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Jijoko li ese Jesu
Oro t’o so ti dun to
Ibi ayo to sun mo mi
Ti o si se ‘yebiye
O dara k’a ba mi nibe
Ki njoko l’ese Jesu
Ngo b’ojuwo whin mi
Ife re si mi tip o to

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ki njoko li ese Jesu
Mo ri ‘bukun kikun gba
Mo fe ri ese aniyan
Ati ‘soro mi sibe
Ki njoko l’ese Jesu mi
Ki nma gbadura mi si
Lati ‘nu ekun ‘bukun re
Mo ri ore-ofe gba

number: 1066. SITTING AT THE FEET OF JESUS

yorubaTitle: Beeni Emi Naa Ko Da O L’ebi

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
By the proud worshippers,
Scorned for her sin,
Was the poor wanderer
Rudely brought in.
Scribes came and Pharisees,
Eager to see,
What the meek Nazarene’s,
Verdict would be.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
“Neither do I condemn thee,”
Precious words divine!
Falling from lips of mercy,
Like the sweetest chime.
Wonderful words of Jesus!
Sing them o’er and o’er,
“Neither do I condemn thee,
Go, and sin no more.”

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Told of her wanderings,
Marking each flaw,
Spoke they of punishment,
Quoting the law.
Sat He unheedingly,
Head bowing low,
Writing the ground upon,
Sadly and slow.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Still cried the Pharisees,
“Pray, Master, pray,
What shall we do with her
What dost Thou say?”
Spoke He rebukingly,
“Let the first stone,
Come from a sinless hand,
And thence alone.”

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Cheeks flushing red with shame,
Turned each about,
And from His presence went
Silently out.
Then saw He standing there,

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics:
Spoke He most tenderly,
“Pray, woman, pray,”
“Hast thou accusers none?”
“Nay, Master, nay,”
“Neither do I condemn,
Soul sick and sore,
Go, for I pardon thee,
Go, sin no more.”
Head bending low,
Her whom the world despised,
Saw her tears flow.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Beni nko da o l’ebi
Oro ife l’eyi
A dari ese re ji o
Maa lo l’alaafia

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Beeni nko da o l’ebi
Ko l’orin ko si tun ko
Beeni nko da lo l’ebi
Maa lo l’alaafia

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Beeni nko da o l’ebi
Tori ebi ko si nisisiyi fun o,
B’o ti wole
Nibi agbelebu

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Beeni nko da o l’ebi
Mo wa lati gbala
Kii se fun ‘dalebi re
Sugbon fun ‘gbala re

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Beeni nko da o l’ebi
Yin Oluwa oloore
Yin Omo Re Olugbala wa
F’oro Alafia Re

english.title: Verse1
Verse2
Verse 3
Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Suffer a sinner whose heart overflows,
Loving his Savior to tell what he knows;
Once more to tell it would I embrace--
I’m only a sinner saved by grace!

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ko s’ohun ti mo ni tie mi ko gba
Nipa or’ofe mo ri ‘gbala
Ifonu d’opin ‘gberaga tan
Mo je elese t’a dariji

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Elese ti a dariji/2x
Eyi l’orin mi, ogo fun Olorun
Mo je else t’a dariji

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Nigba kan ri mo je alailogbon
Eyi mu mi kuro l’odo Olorun
Jesu wa mi ri inu mi dun
Mo je elese t’a dariji

english.title: Verse1
english.lyrics:
In sorrow I wandered, my spirit oppressed,
But now I am happy - securely I rest;
From morning till evening glad carols I sing,
And this is the reason: I walk with the King.
Refrain:
I walk with the King, hallelujah!
I walk with the King, praise His name!
No longer I roam, my soul faces home,
I walk and I talk with the King.

english.title: Verse2
english.lyrics:
For years in the fetters of sin I was bound,
The world could not help me - no comfort I found;
But now like the birds and the sunbeams of Spring,
I'm free and rejoicing - I walk with the King.

english.title: Verse3

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mo nsako kiri pelu ibanuje
Sugbon nisisiyi mo l’ayo t’o daju
L’owuro at’ale, mo nk’orin ayo
Tori idi eyi mo mba Jesu rin

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Mo ba Jesu rin halleluya
Ogo ni fun oruko Re
Nko ni sako mo
Mo nlo si Orun
Mo mba Jesu rin lojojumo

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Fun opo odun mo wa ‘nu ‘de ese
Aye jo le fun mi l’ayo ti mo nwa
Sugbon nisisiyi mo ni ‘dande pipe
Mo l’ayo ninu mi bi isun omi

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Okan to nkiri ninu aginju ese
Pada ko pe Jesu snu okan re
On yo si fun o ni ayo igbala
‘Wo yo si ma gbe n’nu ‘mole titi lae

english.title: Verse1
english.lyrics:
All the way my Lord is leading me;
Praise His name,
Praise His name!
With His heav’nly manna feeding me,
Praise His holy name.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Jesus, Jesus!
This is my song,
Jesus, Jesus the whole day long;
He is mine,
A Savior divine,
Praise His holy name.

english.title: Verse2
english.lyrics:
When I faint, His grace upholdeth me;
Praise His name,
Praise His name!
When I fear, His arms enfoldeth me,
Praise His holy name.

english.title: Verse3
english.lyrics:
Cares of life have overtaken me;
Praise His name,
Praise His name!
Yet He never has forsaken me,
Praise His holy name.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Jesu fi ‘le ogo sile lati gb’elese la
O rin ‘na Kalfari tor’ese wa
O ru gbogbo ese ati ibanuje wa lo
Olugbala eni mimo t’o ku f’ope ore-ofe

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
AT: Yin Oruko re titi aye
A:  F’ayo ko orin iyin
SB: Yin in titi aye
F’ayo ko orin iyin
All: E d’ohun isegun yin po
Pel’awon t’a rapada
AT: Tesiwaju si ‘lu orun
A: nibi tao wa titi lai
SB: wa ju si orun
Nibi tao wa titi lai
All: Yin oruko Jesu mimo
Fun ‘gbala ayeraye

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
O pari gbo b’o ti wi b’o ti jiya lori ‘gi
Irapada pipe  fun ‘wo at’emi
Gbogbo iran Adamu t’o ti sina s’oko ese
Le ronupiwada k’a si gba won la titi aye

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ayo ojo na ti po to, gba Jesu pe wa re ‘le
Ipejo po awon eniyan mimo
Ao wa pelu awon mimo yika ite didan ni
Ao ri ogo re didan ao si ri bi o ti ri

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Our Sunday-school, how sweet, how dear
To meet and learn of Jesus here;
To read his word, whose ev’ry line
Is full of hope and joy divine.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Our blessed Sunday-school,
Our bright and happy home,
Within thy peaceful dome
We love, we love to come;
Our thoughts will cling to thee,
And still our prayer will be,
That God may bless and keep our Sunday-school.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Our Sunday school, where all may sing
Glad songs of praise to God our King,
And youthful hearts may find the way
To perfect peace and endless day.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Our school is like a garden fair,
Where plants are trained with tender care
To bloom for him, The Lord of all,
Whose loving smiles like sunbeams fall.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Our Sunday-school, whose golden hours
From Eden bring refreshing showers,
In thee on earth we learn to live,
For thee our thanks to God we give.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ile eko ojo ‘sinmi
L’a ti k’eko nipa Jesu
Awa o ko oro Olorun
T’o kun f’ayo ati ‘reti

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ile eko ojo isinmi
Ibi ayo fun wa
Ao ma f’ayo wa ni inu re titi
Okan wa fe o si
Adura way o je
Ki ‘bukun ba le ile eko na

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ile eko ojo isinmi
L’a ti nkorin s’Olorun wa
Awa odo nri itoni s’ona
Iye Alafia

englishTitle: LET THE LOWER LIGHT BE BURNING

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Brightly beams our Father’s mercy
From His lighthouse evermore;
But to us He gives the keeping
Of the lights along the shore.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Let the lower lights be burning!
Send a gleam across the wave!
Some poor fainting, struggling seaman
You may rescue, you may save.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Dark the night of sin has settled,
Loud the angry billows roar;
Eager eyes are watching, longing,
For the lights along the shore.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Trim your feeble lamp, my brother!
Some poor seaman, tempest-tossed,
Trying now to make the harbor,
In the darkness may be lost.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Anu Olorun ti po to
To nsan wa lat’oke Orun
O fi ojuse kan fun wa
Lati je ‘mole f’aye

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Je ki ‘mole ihinrere tan
Laarin irumi aye
Awon t’o fere segbe tan
‘ranwo re le gba won la

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Okunkun ese ti bo ‘le
Iji nja kikankikan
Awon t’o nsegbe nke si o
Jowo je imole fun won

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Tun atupa yin se ara mi
Awon ‘gi ti iji ngba lo
Won fe gunle si ebute
Won le ku lai si ‘mole

number: 1073. LET THE LOWER LIGHT BE BURNING

english.title: Verse1
english.lyrics:
There is much to do, there's work on ev'ry hand,
Hark! The cry for help comes ringing through the land;
Jesus calls for reapers, I must active be,
What wilt Thou, O Master? Here am I, send me.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Here am I,
(Here am I, send me, Lord, send me)
Lord, Send me;
(Here am I, send me, Lord, send me)
Here am I,
(Here am I, send me, Lord, send me)
Ready at Thy bidding, Lord, send me.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
There's a plaintive cry of mourning souls distressed,
And the cry of hearts who seek but find no rest;
These should have my love and tender sympathy,
Ready at Thy bidding, Here am I, send me.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
There are hung'ring souls who cry aloud for bread,
With the bread of life they're longing to be fed;
Shall they starve and famish while a feast is free?
I must be more faithful, Here am I, send me.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
There are souls who linger on the brink of woe,
Lord, I must not, cannot bear to let them go;
Let me go and tell them, "Brother, turn and flee,"
Master, I would save them, Here am I send me.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ise pupo t’o wa n’oba ajara Re
Gbo ipe fun iranwo ndun yika aye
Jesu npe o lati je osise fun
Wo o fi ‘fe dahun pe mo de ran mi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
S: E……. mi de
A: Oluwa mo de, mo setan
S: Jo……….. ran mi
A: Oluwa mi, kp ran mi
S: Mo……… setan
A: Oluwa mo de, fun ise Re
All: Mo de lati se ife Re, ran mi

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
‘Wo ko gbo b’awon elese ti nsofo
Ati imi edun awon t’are mu
Won nfe iranlowo ati ife mi
Oluwa mo de lati sise fun O

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Gbogb’okan t’ebi npa ke tantan f’ounje
Okan won nke bi fun ounje iye
Won o se kun gbati a se na je ofe
Ngo so fun won pe ofe ni igbala

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Opo okan lo wa ninu ibanuje
T’okan won nsegbe fun igbala Jesu
Mo fe so fun pelu idaniloju pe
Jesu l’agbara lati gba wa la

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Have you prayed all night, till the break of day,
And the morning light drove the dark away?
Did you linger there, till the morning dew,
In prevailing prayer, did you pray it through?

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Did you pray till the answer came,
Did you plead in the Savior’s name?
Have you prayed all night till the morning light,
Did you pray till the answer came?

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Did you pray it through, till the answer came?
There’s a promise true for your faith to claim,
At the place of prayer, Jesus waits for you,
Did you meet Him there, did you pray it through?

english.title: Verse3
english.lyrics:
As the Master prayed in the garden lone,
Let your prayer be made to the Father’s throne,
If you seek His will, He will answer you,
Are you trusting still, have you prayed it through?

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
O ha ti fi gbogb’oru gbadura
Ti ‘mole wo si le okun re lo
O ha ti pinnu t’o si gbadura
Tit iwo fi gba agbayori

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
O ha ti gba agbayori (agbayori)
O bebe l’oruko Jesu (l’oruko Re)
O ha ti fi gbogb’oru gbadura
O ha ti gba agbayori

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
O ha ti gba adura titi’esi fi de
Ileri Olorun wa fun o
Jesu nduro lati gb’adura re
O ko ha ni ke pe e n’nu adura

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Christ is our cornerstone;
On him alone we build;
With his true saints above
The courts of Heav'n are filled:
On His great love
Our hopes we place
Of present grace
And joys above.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Oh, then, with hymns of praise
These hallowed courts shall ring!
Our voices we will raise,
The Three in One to sing;
And thus proclaim
In joyful song,
Both loud and long,
That glorious name.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Here, gracious God, we pray,
Forevermore draw nigh;
Accept each faithful pray'r,
And mark each humble sigh:
In copious stores,
On all who pray,
Each holy day,
Your blessings pour.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Here may we gain from Heav’n
The grace we now implore,
And may that grace, once giv’n,
Be with us evermore.
Until that day
When all the blest
In endless rest
Are called away.

english.title: Verse5
english.lyrics:
Praise to the God of Heav’n,
Praise to his holy Son,
And praise to him be giv’n
Who joins them both in One:
The Holy Dove,
Who gives us grace
To find our place
With God above.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Kristi ni ‘pinle wa Lori Re lao ko ‘le
Awon mimo nikan lo Ngba ‘gbala Orun
Ireti wa ‘nu Re ko ye
Ayo ti mbo wa n’nu ‘fe Re

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Agbala mimo yi yo
Kun f’orin iyin
Ao korin iyin si Metalokan mimo
Be lao f’orin ayo kede oruko re titi aye

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Olorun olore fiyesi wa nihin
Lati gba eje wa at’ebe wa gbogbo
Ko si f’opo ibukun dahun adura wa
Ni gbagbogbo

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Nihin je k’ore re ta ntoro lat’Orun
B’o sori wa lekan ko ma si tun lo mo
Tit’ojo na tao sako jo
Awon mimo sibi sinmi

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Jesus is Lord of all
Jesus is Lord of all
Lord of my thoughts
And my service each day
Jesus is Lord of all

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Jesus is Savior and Lord of my life
My hope my glory my all
Wonderful Master in joy and in strife
On Him you too may call

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Blessed Redeemer all glorious King
Worthy of rev'rence I pay
Tribute and praises I joyfully bring
To Him the Life the Way

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Will you surrender your all to Him now
Follow His will and obey
Crown Him as Sov'reign before His throne bow
Give Him your heart today

items.lyrics:
Gbogbo ….. igbesi aye mi

Jesu l’Oluwa mi

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Gbogbo ……. Aniyan mi ero mi
Jesu l’Oluwa mi, ife re…… lo segun
Gbogb’ogun ota
Jesu l’Oluwa mi

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Gbogbo ilepa mi ero mi
Jesu l’Oluwa mi

Jesu l’Oluwa mi

englishTitle: THERE’S A LAND OF PURE DELIGHT

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
There is a land of pure delight,
where saints immortal reign;
infinite day excludes the night,
and pleasures banish pain.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
There everlasting spring abides,
and never-withering flowers;
death, like a narrow sea, divides
that heavenly land from ours.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Sweet fields beyond the swelling flood
stand dressed in living green;
so to the Jews old Canaan stood,
while Jordan rolled between.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
But timorous mortals start and shrink
to cross the narrow sea,
and linger shivering on the brink,
and fear to launch away.

english.title: Verse 5
english.lyrics:
O could we make our doubts remove,
those gloomy doubts that rise,
and see the Canaan that we love
with unbeclouded eyes;

english.title: Verse 6
english.lyrics:
Could we but climb where Moses stood,
and view the landscape o'er,
not Jordan's stream, nor death's cold flood,
should fright us from the shore!

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ile ayo kikun kan mbe
‘Bi t’awon mimo ngbe ko s’oru
At’osan titi irora ko si nibe

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ounje iye ni awa nje
Kanga iye li awa nmu
Enit’o ba mu kanga yii
Oungbe ki yo gbe mo lailai
Oungbe ki yo gbe mo bayi
Ni Jesu wi/2x

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Orisun iye mbe nibe
Itanna ti ki re
Iku ni boju ti ko je re ri
Ile ewa yi

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Yemeji ba wa le fo lo
Ka le aigbagbo lo
Ka fi igbagbo wo
Kenaan’ ile wura

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
A ba le goke bi Mose
K’a wo ‘le na lokan

Ki yo deru ba wa mo

items.lyrics:
Awon mimo ni yo

number: 1084. THERE IS LAND OF PURE DELIGHT

english.title: Verse1
english.lyrics:
Firmly stand for God, in the world's mad strife,
Tho' the bleak winds roar, and the waves beat high;
'Tis the Rock alone giveth strength and life,
When the hosts of sin are nigh.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Let us stand on the Rock,
Firmly stand on the Rock,
On the Rock of Christ alone;
If the strife we endure,
We shall stand secure,
'Mid the throng who surround the throne.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Firmly stand for Right, with a motive pure,
With a true heart bold, and a faith e'er strong;
'Tis the Rock alone giveth triumph sure,
O'er the world's array of wrong.

english.title: Verse 3

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Duro f’Olorun ninu aye yi
B’iji tile nla ti ‘soro si wa
Agbara jesu yo fun o l’okun
‘Gba t’esu ba gb’ogun de

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
E je k’a duro gboin lori apata wa
Ti nse Jesu Kristi nikan
B’a ba foriti isegun daju
Ni arin ogun Olorun

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Duro f’otito pelu okan mimo
Ati igboya pelu igbagbo
Awa yo bori ao ni isegun
Lori gbogb’ogun esu

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Duro f’otito ere mbe fun o
B’o tile fale ko nip e de mo
Alafia pipe wa ninu Jesu
‘Gba ti ‘ji ba rekoja

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Fight the good fight with all your might,
Christ is your strength and Christ your right.
Lay hold on life, and it shall be
your joy and crown eternally.

english.title: Verse 2
Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Cast care aside, lean on your guide;
his boundless mercy will provide.
Lean, and the trusting soul shall prove
Christ is its life and Christ its love.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Faint not, nor fear, his arms are near;
he changes not, and you are dear.
Only believe, and you will see
that Christ is Lord eternally.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
F’agbra ja ija rere Kristi ni
Igbala Oun ete re f’owo
Te iye yio si je
Ayo oun ade re titi

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Ma ja loruko Oluwa
Gb’oju s’oke wo ‘ju re
Ona iye si sile fun O
Krsiti l’ona Oun si l’ere

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Ko saniyan re s’apa kan
Sinmi l’ere Oun yo si pese
Igbekele re yoo rii pe
Kristi n’iye ati ‘fe Re

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Ma beru ma sise s’ase
Ko yipada wo si so won
Sa ‘gbagbo iwo yo sip e
Kristi l’ohun gbogbo fun O

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
I have found His grace is all complete;
He supplieth every need.
While I sit and learn at Jesus’ feet,
I am free, yes, free indeed.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
It is joy unspeakable and full of glory,
Full of glory, full of glory.
It is joy unspeakable and full of glory;
O the half has never yet been told!

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
I have found the pleasure I once craved;
It is joy and peace within.
What a wondrous blessing! I am saved
From the awful gulf of sin.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
I have found that hope so bright and clear,
Living in the realm of grace.
O the Savior’s presence is so near;
I can see His smiling face.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
I have found the joy no tongue can tell,
How its waves of glory roll!
It is like a great o’erflowing well,
Springing up within my soul.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mo ni ore-ofe ‘nu Jesu
O npese f’aini gbogbo
Bi mo ti nk’eko l’ese Jesu
Mo ni idande pipe

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Mo l’ayo ninu Jesu
Ayo ailegbe, ayo kikun
Mo l’ayo ninu Jesu ayo ailegbe
Ah ayo t’enu ko le so tan

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Mo ti ri ayo t’okan mi nfe
Ayo nla lo je fun mi
Iyanu nip e mo ri idande
Kuro ninu ese mi

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Mo riireti ninu Jesu
Tori mo ngbe ninu Re
O ti dun to pe Jesu fe mi
Mo ri oju rere Re

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Mo l’ayo ailegbe ‘nu Jesu
Lojojo lo ndun mo mi
Ife Jesu bi odo sisan
O nsan ninu okan mi

english.title: Verse1
english.lyrics:
I’ve a home prepared where the saints abide,
Just over in the gloryland;
And I long to be by my Savior’s side,
Just over in the gloryland.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Just over in the gloryland,
I’ll join the happy angel band,
Just over in the gloryland;
Just over in the gloryland,
There with the mighty host I’ll stand,
Just over in the gloryland.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
I am on my way to those mansions fair,
Just over in the gloryland;
There to sing God’s praise, and His glory share,
Just over in the gloryland.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
What a joyful thought that my Lord I’ll see,
Just over in the gloryland;
And with kindred saved, there forever be,
Just over in the gloryland.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
With the bloodwashed throng I will shout and sing,
Just over in the gloryland;
Glad hosannas to Christ, the Lord and King,
Just over in the gloryland.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Choir:
Ile ewa wonni b’o ti dara to
Ibugbe Olorun t’oju ko ti ri
Tao fe de ibe lehin aye yi
Talo fe ka woo un ni aso funfun?

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Sop:
Awon wonni t’o ji ninu orun won
CMS 249: Awon to ni ‘gbagbo si nkan ta ko ri
Awon t’o k’aniyan won l’Olugbala
Awon ti ko tijuagbelebu Krsit’

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Monologue:
Awon ti ko naani gbogbo nkan aye
Awon to le s’ooto de oju iku
BH 154: awon t’o nrubo ife lojojumo
Awon t’a fi igbala Jesu rapada

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Itiju ni fun iyin om’ogun Jesu
BH 154: Enyin ara ilu ibugbe Orun
Gordon: Kin la e nfi fere at’ilu sire
Gbat’oni ke sise t’o sip e ‘e ja’

items.title: Ese 5
items.lyrics:
Choir:
B’igbi omi aye si ti nkolu wa
Tenor (Spring Tune)
Jesu Oba ogo nso si wa l’eti
Adun t’o wa l’Orun ilu mimo ni
Nibit’isinmi w alai ati lailai

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
I care not today what the morrow may bring,
If shadow or sunshine or rain,
The Lord I know ruleth o’er everything,
And all of my worries are vain.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Living by faith in Jesus above,
Trusting, confiding in His great love;
From all harm safe in His sheltering arm,
I’m living by faith and feel no alarm.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Though tempests may blow and the storm clouds arise,
Obscuring the brightness of life,
I’m never alarmed at the overcast skies—
The Master looks on at the strife.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
I know that He safely will carry me through,
No matter what evils betide;
Why should I then care though the tempest may blow,
If Jesus walks close to my side.

english.title: Verse4
english.lyrics:
Our Lord will return for His loved ones some day,
Our troubles will then all be o’er;
The Master so gently will lead us away,
Beyond that blest heavenly shore.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Emi ko mo ohun t’ola le mu wa
Bi ‘banuje tabi ayo
Sugbon ngo fi ‘gbagbo ro m’Olugbala
Ola ko le d’aya fo mi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
SA: Ni riro mo…. Pelu igbagbo
TB: … Ngo ro mo Jesu….. pelu igbagbo
SA: Mo gbekele ….. ‘fe Re ti kii ye
TB: …. Mo gbekele…. ‘fe  Re ti kii ku
S: Mo ngbe laile…….wu l’abe ‘ye apa Re
Others: ….. Mo ngbe lailewu labe ‘ye apa Re
S: Ngo ro mo Jesu……. pelu igbagbo
Others: Ngo ro mo Jesu pelu igbagbo, pelu ‘gbagbo

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
B’igbi tile nja ti okunkun si su
Won ko le bori okan mi
Pelu Jesu Oluwa at’ore mi
Mo nf’ayo lo ni ailewu

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Mo mo pe yo mu mi d’opin  ajo mi
Ohunkohun t’o wu ko de
Emi ki yo foya bi ibi ba nja
Bi Jesu ba wa pelu mi

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Oluwa wa npada bo laipe ojo
Eru aniyan yo d’opin
Ni orun ngo gbe imope asegun
Ngo wa l’ayo l’odo re lai

english.title: Verse1
english.lyrics:
With cheerful songs and hymns of praise,
Our grateful hearts to Him we raise,
Who Leads us on with gentle hand,
And crowns with love Our Christian Band.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Then gladly let us stand,
United heart and hand,
The lost to gather in
From sorrow, pain, and sin;
Be this our constant aim—
To spread abroad the name
Of Jesus our Redeemer,
And His wondrous love proclaim.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
And while we meet together here,
In bounds of love and friendship dear,
Oh, may our prayers like incense rise,
To Him whose grace each need supplies.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
O Thou who art the children’s Friend,
Our steps direct, our paths defend,
And by Thine own almighty hand
Protect and keep our Christian Band.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Pel’ayo at;orin iyin
Awa f’ope fun Olorun
T’o f’owo aanu re to wa
To fi ife mimo s’arin wa

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Je k’a sa ipa wa
Ki a si sowo po
Lati yo awon
Ti nsegbe ninu ese
E je k’a sa ‘pa wa
Ka si kede oruko kesu
Olurapada ati ife nla Re

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Iwo ore awon ewe
To ese wa, je asa wa
Si f’owo agbara nla re
Dabobo gbogbo onigbagbo

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
All things bright and beautiful,
all creatures great and small,
all things wise and wonderful,
the Lord God made them all.

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Each little flow'r that opens,
each little bird that sings,
He made their glowing colors,
He made their tiny wings.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
The purple-headed mountain,
the river running by,
the sunset and the morning
that brightens up the sky.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
The cold wind in the winter,
the pleasant summer sun,
the ripe fruits in the garden:
He made them every one.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
He gave us eyes to see them,
and lips that we might tell
how great is God Almighty,
who has made all things well.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ohun gbogbo l’o dara
Nigba dida aye
Ohun gbogbo lo l’ewa Olorun l’o da won
Itanna ti o lewa at’eye ti nkorin
Oun lo da gbogbo awo won
At’iye won f info

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Gbogbo nkan l’ewa, o dara
Won kere won tobi
Won l’oye won je ‘yanu
Olorun l’o da won

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Gbogbo ewe ti on wu
Awon eye t’o nkonrin
Ati awon ewa won
O da awon iye won

englishTitle: MY HEAVENLY FATHER WATCHES OVER ME
yorubaTitle: Baba Mi Orun Ns’eso Lori Mi

english.title: Verse1
english.lyrics:
I trust in God wherever I may be,
Upon the land or on the rolling sea;
For come what may, from day to day,
My heav'nly Father watches over me.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
I trust in God, I know he cares for me,
On mountain bleak or on the stormy sea;
Though billows roll, he keeps my soul,
My heav'nly Father watches over me.

english.title: Verse2
english.lyrics:
He makes the rose an object of his care,
He guides the eagle through the pathless air;
And surely he remembers me,
My heav'nly Father watches over me.

english.title: Verse3
english.lyrics:
I trust in God, for, in the lion's den,
On battlefield, or in the prison pen;
Through praise or blame, through flood or flame,
My heav'nly Father watches over me.

english.title: Verse4
english.lyrics:
The valley may be dark, the shadows deep,
But oh, the shepherd guards his lonely sheep;
And through the gloom, he'll lead me home,
My heav'nly Father watches over me.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mo gbekele Olorun ngbagbogbo
Lori oke tani lori okun
Ohunkohun to wu ko de
Babab mi Orun ns’eso lori mi

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Mo gbekele E tor’O nse ‘toju mi
Loke giga tabi ni petele
Bi ‘gbi ba nja, O pa mi mo
Baba mi Orun nse’eso lori  mi

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Okunkun su ‘nu afonifoji
Sugbon Olus’aguntan pelu mi
‘Nu wahala O nto mi lo
Baba mi Orun ns’eso lori mi

number: 1095. MY  HEAVENLY FATHER WATCHES OVER ME

english.title: Verse1
english.lyrics:
Soon this life will all be over
And our pilgrimage will end,
Soon we’ll take our heav’nly journey,
Be at home again with friends;
Heaven’s gates are standing open,
Waiting for our entrance there,
Some sweet day we’re going over,
All the beauties there to share.
Refrain:
Just a little while to stay here,
Just a little while to wait,
Just a little while to labor
In the path that’s always straight,
Just a little more of troubles,
In this low and sinful state,
Then we’ll enter Heaven’s portals,
Sweeping through the pearly gates.

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Soon we’ll see the light of morning
Then the new day will begin,
Soon we’ll hear the Father calling,
“Come my children enter in;”
Then we’ll hear a choir of angels,
Singing out the vict’ry song,
All our troubles will be ended
And we’ll live with heaven’s throng.

english.title: Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Soon we’ll meet again our loved ones
And we’ll take them by the hand,
Soon we’ll press them to our bosom
Over in the promised land;
Then we’ll be at home forever,
Throughout all eternity,
What a blessed, blessed morning
That eternal morn will be!

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ojo aye wa nbuse lo ajo wa si fere pin
L’oke Orun n’ile ogo ao pade awon ore
Ilekun Orun si sile, lati gba wa si Orun
N’ile ogo l’odo Jesu, ayo wa ki yoo l’opin

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Igba die lo ku fun wa, ninu aye ese yi
Igba die ninu laala (aye)
Ajo wa s’Orun bere (lo si ‘nu ogo Orun)
Ao gbagbe wahala aye (osi)
Ati gbogbo idamu (aye)
Gba t’a ba de ‘le wa l’oke (orun)
Ayo wa ki yo l’opin (lailai)

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Imole ooro titun mbo, ojo ayo wa yo de
Laipe baba wa yo pe wa si ‘le ologo didan
Awon Angeli yo korin, orin ayo isegun
Gbogbo laala wa yio d’opin, gbat’a ba de ‘le Orun

english.title: Verse1
english.lyrics:
His love is ever true;
I've found a friend who is all to me,
I love to tell how He lifted me,
And what His grace can do for you.
Refrain:
Saved by His pow'r, by His pow'r divine,
Saved to new life, to new life sublime!
Life now is sweet and my joy is complete,
For I'm saved, saved, saved.

english.title: Verse2
english.lyrics:
He saves me from ev'ry sin and harm,
Secures my soul each day;
I'm leaning strong on His mighty arm–
I know He'll guide me all the way.

english.title: Verse3
english.lyrics:
When poor and needy and all alone,
In love He said to me,
"Come unto Me and I'll lead you home
To live with Me eternally."

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mo l’ore kan t’o s’owon fun mi
Ife re ko l’egbe
Mo fe ma so b’O ti gba mi la
Ati pe O le gba o la

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Agbara Re gba mi
Oo s’aye mi d’otun
Alafia at’ayo je t’emi
Tor’O gba mi la

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
O gba mi low’ese on ewu
O si ndabo bo mi
Mo sinmi le iye apa Re
Yo ma to mi l’ona gbogbo

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Take time to be holy, speak oft with thy Lord;
Abide in Him always, and feed on His Word.
Make friends of God’s children, help those who are weak,
Forgetting in nothing His blessing to seek.

english.title: Verse 2
Verse 3
english.lyrics:
Take time to be holy, let Him be thy Guide;
And run not before Him, whatever betide.
In joy or in sorrow, still follow the Lord,
And, looking to Jesus, still trust in His Word.

english.title: Verse 4
english.lyrics:
Take time to be holy, be calm in thy soul,
Each thought and each motive beneath His control.
Thus led by His Spirit to fountains of love,
Thou soon shalt be fitted for service above.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Mura k’o je mimo
B’Oluwa soro
Gbe ‘nu Re lojojo
Si je n’oro Re
B’om’Olorun s’ore
Ran alaare lowo
Wa ibukun Olorun
N’nu ohun gbogbo

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Mura k’o je mimo
Ojo nsure lo
Lo akoko pupo
Ninu adura
Nipa wiwo Jesu
‘Wo o dabi Re
Ao ri ewa Jesu
Ninu aye Re

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Mura k’o je mimo
Fi s’amona Re
Je k’emi Re to O
B’iji tile nja
N’ayo oun ‘banuje
Sa tele Jesu
Si gbeke l’oro Re
Tejumo Jesu

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Mura k’o je mimo
Sinmi le Jesu
Je ko s’akoso
Okan at’ero re
Yo f’Emi Re to O
D’orisun ife
Yo se o ye fun
Ibugbe kan l’oke

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
I had lived a life of sin in this world were living in
I had done forbidden things I shouldn't do
I ask a beggar along the way, & u can tell me where to stay
Where I'd find real happiness and love that's true
Across the bridge, there's no more sorrow
Across the bridge, there's no more pain
The Sun will shine across the river
And you'll never be unhappy again

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Follow footsteps of the King and you'll hear the voices ring
They'll be singing out the glory of the Lamb
The river of Jordan will be near, the sound of trumpets you will hear
You'll behold the special place ever known to man
Across the bridge, there's no more sorrow
Across the bridge, there's no more pain
The Sun will shine across the river
And you'll never be unhappy again

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Bi mo ti ngbe nin’ese
Ninu ay osi yi
Ti mo nse lodi si ife Olorun
Mo mbebe bi mo tin lo
Fun ibi ti  mo le lo
Lati ni ayo at’ife Olorun

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
L’odo Jesu ‘banuje yo tan
N’ilu Orun ‘rora yo pin
‘Mole Olorun yo s’amona wa
Ao ma gbe pelu Jesu Krist’ titi

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Titele ‘sise Oba
Tao fi gbo ohun didun
Ti won yo ma korin didun ti ‘le naa
L’eba odo Jordani
Ao gbo ohun ipe na
Ao sib a joba ni ilu Olorun

englishTitle: IN MY HEART THERE RINGS A MELODY
yorubaTitle: Orin Kan Ndun Ninu Okan Mi

english.title: Verse1
english.lyrics:
I have a song that Jesus gave me,
It was sent from heaven above;
There never was a sweeter melody,
'Tis a melody of love.

english.title: Chorus
Verse2
english.lyrics:
I love the Christ who died on Calv'ry,
For He washed my sins away;
He put within my heart a melody,
And I know it's there to stay.

english.title: Verse3
english.lyrics:
'Twill be my endless theme in glory,
With the angels I will sing;
'Twill be a song with glorious harmony,
When the courts of heaven ring.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Orin ayo kan ndun jade
Jade lati inu okan mi
Gbati mo pade Jesu ti Kalfari
Jesu mu gbogbo ‘banuje,
T’o wa l’okan mi kuro
Mo d’ominira kuro kuro ninu ese (ninu ese)

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Orin ayo kan l’emi yo ma ko
Oun l’emi yo ma ko titi
O dun ju orin awon Angeli
Orin t’o mbe ninu okan mi (l’okan mi)

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Mo nlo si ilu Orun
T’emi yoo  ma korin titi
N’ile didan ti Jesu pese sile
Oju mi yoo ri Oba ogo ninu ewa Re
Emi yo korin iyin Re titi (‘yin Re titi)

english.title: Verse 1
english.lyrics:
Holy words long preserved
For our walk in this world
They resound with God's own heart
Oh, let the ancient words impart
Words of life, words of hope
Give us strength, help us cope
In this world, where e'er we roam
Ancient words will guide us home

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
Ancient words ever true
Changing me and changing you
We have come with open hearts
Oh, let the ancient words impart

english.title: Verse 2
english.lyrics:
Holy words of our faith
Handed down to this age
Came to us through sacrifice
Oh, heed the faithful words of Christ
Holy words long preserved
For our walk in this world
They resound with God's own heart
Oh, let the ancient words impart

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Oro mimo Olorun wa
Jo J’atuko wa l’aye
Oro na, oro Olorun
Je ko nipa ninu wa

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Oro iye ati ‘reti
Jowo ran wa lowo
B’a ti s’atipo l’aye
Jo to wa de ‘le Orun

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Otito l’oro na,
On so aye wa dotun
A wa pel’okan ebe
K’oro Re nipa ’nu wa

items.title: Ese 3
items.lyrics:
Oro mimo Olorun
T’a fifun iran yi
O wa se etutu fun wa
Je ipe otito yi

items.title: Ese 4
items.lyrics:
Oro mimo Olorun
Je imole wa l’aye
Oro na oro Olorun
Je ki o mu wa d’Orun

items.title: Coda
items.lyrics:
Oro mimo Olorun
Je ko mu wa de Orun

englishTitle: I’LL SEE YOU IN THE RAPTURE

english.title: Verse1
english.lyrics:
If we never meet again
On this earth, my precious friend
And if the blood of Jesus Christ
Has redeemed us from our sin
Then for us there'll be a meetin'
What a hallelujah greeting
I'll see you in the rapture some sweet day.

english.title: Chorus
english.lyrics:
I'll see you in the rapture
I'll see you in the rapture
I'll see you at that meeting in the air
There with our blessed Savior
We'll live and reign forever
I'll see you in the rapture some sweet day.

english.title: Verse2
english.lyrics:
O my loved ones, let me say
That there'll surely come a day
That the Lord will come again
And He'll take His bride away
So get ready now to greet Him
With hallelujahs, greet Him
I'll see you in the rapture some sweet day.

items.title: Ese 1
items.lyrics:
Ore Mi bi a ko ba
Tun pade nihinyi mo
B’a joloto s’Olorun
O daju pe a o l’ayo
Ipade didun wa fun wa
Ao pade l’ojo ipa-la-rada

items.title: Egbe
items.lyrics:
Ao ni ‘pade didun l’ojo
Tao pa wa l’arada
Ao pade l’aipe l’awosanmo
Nibe pel’Olugbala wa
Ao ye ao si ba jobaao pade l’ojo ipa-la-ra-da

items.title: Ese 2
items.lyrics:
Eyin olufe e gbe
Ojo na sunm’etile
Ti Oluwa yo pade
Lati mu ‘yawo Re lo
Nje mura lati pade Re
Pelu orin Alleluya
Ao apde l’ojo ipa-la-ra-da
